original: 1. Bhūtagāmasikkhāpada-atthayojanā
89. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame tassāti devatāya. Ukkhittaṃ pharasunti uddhaṃ khittaṃ

original: Himavanteti himauggiraṇe vane, himayutte vā. Tatthāti himavante, devatāsannipāte

original: mūle mūlāni jāyantīti doso bhaveyyāti manasi katvā āha “na hī”tiādi. Hīti saccaṃ,

analyzed: yasmai vā tāni iti rukkha ādīni tassa ati bhūtagāmaḥ nāma pañca bīja jātāni iti padassa

original: Etanti “bījajātānī”ti nāmaṃ. Bījesu jātāni bījajātānīti vutte “mūle jāyantī”tiādinā
analyzed: etat ti bīja jātāni iti nāmam bījesu jātāni bīja jātāni iti vutte mūle jāyanti iti ādinā

analyzed: samā iti etena ati saṅgahaḥ iti sambandhaḥ

original: “Yehī”ti padaṃ “jātattā”ti pade apādānaṃ, hetu vā “vuttānī”ti pade karaṇaṃ, kattā
analyzed: yehi iti padam jāta ttā ati pade apādānam hetu vā vuttāni iti pade karaṇam kattā

original: vā. Tesanti bījānaṃ. Rukkhādīnaṃ viruhanaṃ janetīti bījaṃ. “Bījato”tiādinā kāriyopacārena
analyzed: vā bījānam rukkha ādīnam janeti iti bījam kāriyā upacārena

original: kāraṇassa dassitattā kāraṇūpacāraṃ padīpeti. Aññānipi yāni vā pana gacchavallirukkhādīni

analyzed: atthi saṃvijjanti tāni gaccha valli rukkha ādīni jāyanti sañjāyanti iti yojanā tāni iti

original: gacchavallirukkhādīni. Tañca mūlaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ vuttahaliddādi ca atthi, sabbampi etaṃ
analyzed: gaccha valli rukkha ādīni tat ca mūlam pāḷiyam vutta halidda ādi ca atthi sabbam pi etam

original: mūlabījaṃ nāmāti sambandho. Etthāti bījesu, khandhabījesu vā.

original: 92. Saññāvasenāti “bīja”nti saññāvasena. “Tatthā”ti padaṃ “veditabbo”ti pade ādhāro.
analyzed: saññā vasena ati bījam ti saññā vasena tattha ati padam veditabbaḥ iti pade ādhāro

original: “Yathā”tiādinā kāraṇopacārena kāriyassa vuttattā phalūpacāraṃ dasseti. Yaṃ bījaṃ
analyzed: yathā iti ādinā kāraṇa upacārena kāriyassa vutta ttā phala upacāram dasseti yam bījam

original: vuttaṃ, taṃ dukkaṭavatthūti yojanā. Yadetaṃ ādipadanti yojetabbaṃ. Tenāti ādipadena.
analyzed: vuttam tam dukkaṭa vatthu iti yojanā yat etam ādi padam ti yojetabbam tena ati ādi padena

original: Ravīyati bhagavatā kathīyatīti rutaṃ, pāḷi, tassa anurūpaṃ yathārutaṃ, pāḷianatikkantanti attho.
analyzed: ravīyati bhagavatā kathīyati iti rutam pāḷi tassa anurūpam yathārutam attho

original: Etthāti “bīje bījasaññī”tiādipade, imasmiṃ sikkhāpade vā. Udake ṭhāti pavattatīti

original: udakaṭṭho, evaṃ thalaṭṭhopi. Tatthāti udakaṭṭhathalaṭṭhesu. Sāsapassa mattaṃ pamāṇaṃ

original: assa sevālassāti sāsapamattiko. Tilassa bījapamāṇaṃ assa sevālassāti tilabījako.
analyzed: assa sevālassa ati sāsapa mattiko tilassa bīja pamāṇam assa sevālassa ati tila bījako

original: Pamāṇatthe ko. Ādisaddena saṅkhapaṇakādayo sevāle saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha tilabījapamāṇo

original: jalasaṇṭhito nīlādivaṇṇayutto sevālo tilabījaṃ nāma, sapatto appakaṇḍo ukkhalipidhānādipamāṇo

original: samūlo eko sevālaviseso saṅkho nāma, bhamarasaṇṭhāno nīlavaṇṇo eko sevālaviseso paṇako
analyzed: sa mūlaḥ ekaḥ sevāla viseso saṅkhaḥ nāma bhamara saṇṭhānaḥ nīla vaṇṇaḥ ekaḥ sevāla viseso paṇako

original: nāma. Udakaṃ sevatīti sevālo. Tatthāti sevālesu. Yoti sevālo. Patiṭṭhitaṃ sevālanti
analyzed: nāma udakam sevati iti sevālo tattha ati sevālesu yaḥ ti sevālo patiṭṭhitam sevālanti

original: sambandho. Yattha katthacīti mūle vā naḷe vā patte vā. Uddharitvāti uppāṭetvā. “Hatthehī”ti
analyzed: sambandhaḥ yattha katthaci iti mūle vā naḷe vā patte vā uddharitvā ati uppāṭetvā hatthehi iti

original: padaṃ “viyūhitvā”ti pade karaṇaṃ. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Tassāti sevālassa. Ettāvatāti
analyzed: padam viyūhitvā ati pade karaṇam hi iti saccam yasmai vā tassa ati ettāvatā iti

original: ito cito ca viyūhanamattena. Yo sevālo nikkhamati, taṃ sevālanti yojanā. Parissāvanantarenāti
analyzed: ito cito ca viyūhana mattena yo sevālaḥ nikkhamati tam sevālanti yojanā parissāvana antarena ati

original: parissāvanachiddena. Uppalāni asmiṃ gaccheti uppalinī. Padumāni asmiṃ gaccheti paduminī,
analyzed: parissāvana chiddena uppalāni asmin gaccha iti uppalinī padumāni asmin gaccha iti paduminī

original: ino, itthiliṅgajotako ī. Tatthevāti udakeyeva. Tānīti vallītiṇāni. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā
analyzed: inaḥ itthi liṅga jotakaḥ ī tattha iva ati udakeya iva tāni iti vallī tiṇāni hi iti saccam yasmai

original: vā. Anantakoti sāsapamattiko sevālo. So hi natthi attato anto lāmako sevālo etassāti
analyzed: vā anantakaḥ ti sāsapamattiko sevālo so hi natthi attataḥ antaḥ lāmakaḥ sevālo etassa ati

original: katvā “anantako”ti vuccati. Attanāyeva hi sukhumo, tato sukhumo sevālo natthīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: katvā anantakaḥ iti vuccati attanāya iva hi sukhumaḥ tatas sukhumaḥ sevālo natthi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Tatthāti dukkaṭavatthubhāve. Tampīti “sampuṇṇabhūtagāmaṃ na hotī”ti vacanampi. Pisaddo
analyzed: tattha ati dukkaṭa vatthu bhāve tam pi iti sampuṇṇa bhūta gāmam na hoti iti vacanam pi saddaḥ

original: mahāpaccariādiaṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanāpekkho. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Na āgato,
analyzed: mahāpaccariā ādi aṭṭhakathā cariyānam vacana apekkhaḥ hi iti saccam yasmai vā naḥ āgataḥ

original: tasmā na sametīti yojanā. Athāti tasmiṃ anāgate. Etanti anantakasevālādiṃ. Gacchissatīti
analyzed: tasmāt na sameti iti yojanā atha ati tasmin anāgate gacchissati iti

original: vadeyyāti sambandho. Tampīti “gacchissatī”ti vacanampi. Pisaddo purimaṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanāpekkho.

original: Abhūtagāmamūlattā tādisassa bījagāmassāti ettha bījagāmo tividho hoti – yo sayaṃ
analyzed: abhūta gāma mūla ttā tādisassa bīja gāmassa ati ettha bīja gāmaḥ tividhaḥ hoti yaḥ sayam

original: bhūtagāmato hutvā aññampi bhūtagāmaṃ janeti, ambaṭṭhiādiko. Yo pana sayaṃ bhūtagāmato

original: hutvā aññaṃ pana bhūtagāmaṃ na janeti, tālanāḷikerādikhāṇu. Yo pana sayampi bhūtagāmato

original: ahutvā aññampi bhūtagāmaṃ na janeti. Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevāloti. Bhūtagāmo pana

original: catubbidho hoti – yo sayaṃ bījagāmato hutvā aññampi bījagāmaṃ janeti, etarahi ambarukkhādiko.

original: Yo pana sayaṃ bījagāmato ahutvāva aññaṃ bījagāmaṃ janeti, ādikappakāle ambarukkhādiko.

original: Ayaṃ pana tatiyabījagāmassa ca catutthabhūtagāmassa ca viseso – tatiyabījagāme mūlapaṇṇāni
analyzed: ayam pana tatiya bīja gāmassa ca catuttha bhūta gāmassa ca visesaḥ tatiya bīja gāme mūlapaṇṇāni

original: na paññāyanti, catutthabhūtagāme tāni paññāyantīti. Mūlapaṇṇānaṃ apaññāyanattā bījagāmoti
analyzed: na paññāyanti catuttha bhūta gāme tāni paññāyanti iti mūla paṇṇānam a paññāyana ttā bīja gāmaḥ ti

original: vutto, tesaṃ paññāyanattā bhūtagāmoti vutto. Itarathā hi virodho bhaveyyāti. Attano

original: vāde pācittiyabhāvato garukaṃ, mahāpaccariādīnaṃ vāde dukkaṭamattabhāvato lahukaṃ. Etanti ṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vāde pācittiya bhāvataḥ garukam mahāpaccariā ādīnam vāde dukkaṭa matta bhāvataḥ lahukam etat ti ṭhānam

original: Dantasūci viyāti hatthidantasūci viya. Yathā asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo tatiyo koṭṭhāso na

analyzed: āgataḥ naḥ evam amūlaka bhūta gāmaḥ saḥ pana āgataḥ yā iva ati āha amūlaka bhūta gāmā iti amūlika latā

original: viya amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti attho.
analyzed: amūlaka bhūta gāme saṅgaham gacchati iti attho

original: Vandākāti rukkhādanī. Sā hi sayaṃ rukkhaṃ nissāya jāyantīpi attano nissayānaṃ rukkhānaṃ

original: adanattā bhakkhanattā vadīyati thutīyatīti “vandākā”ti vuccati. Aññā vāti vandākāya
analyzed: ada nattā bhakkha nattā vadīyati thutīyati iti vandākā ati vuccati aññā vā ati vandākāya

original: aññā vā. Tanti vandākādiṃ. Tatoti rukkhato. Vananti khuddako gaccho. Pagumboti mahāgaccho.

original: Daṇḍakoti rukkho daṇḍayogato. Tassāpīti amūlikalatāyapi. Ayameva vinicchayoti vandākādikassa
analyzed: daṇḍakaḥ ti rukkho daṇḍa yogato tassa api iti ayam eva vinicchayaḥ ti vandāka ādikassa

original: vinicchayo viya ayaṃ vinicchayo daṭṭhabboti yojanā. “Dve tīṇi pattānī”ti vuttattā

original: ekapatto sañjāyantopi aggabījasaṅgahaṃ gacchatīti attho. “Anupasampannenā”ti padaṃ
analyzed: eka pattaḥ sañjāyantaḥ api agga bīja saṅgaham gacchati iti atthaḥ anupasampannena ati padam

original: “littassā”ti pade kattā. Nidāghasamayeti gimhakāle. Abbohārikoti āpattiyā aṅganti
analyzed: littassa ati pade kattā nidāgha samaye iti gimha kāle abbohāriko ti āpattiyāḥ aṅganti

original: na voharitabbo. Voharituṃ na arahatīti attho. Etanti abbohārikataṃ, “sace…pe… pamajjitabbā”ti vacanaṃ vā.
analyzed: na voharitabbaḥ voharitum na arahati iti atthaḥ etat ti abbohārikatam sa cepe pamajjitabbā ati vacanam vā

original: Ahiṃ sappaṃ chādetīti ahicchattaṃ, taṃyeva ahicchattakaṃ. Yathākathañci hi byuppatti,
analyzed: ahim sappam chādeti iti ahicchattam taṃ yā iva ahicchattakam yathā kathañci hi

original: ruḷhiyā atthavinicchayo. Tasmāti tato vikopanato. Tatthāti ahicchattake. Heṭṭhā “udakapappaṭako”ti

original: vatvā idha “rukkhapappaṭikāyapī”ti vuttattā pappaṭakasaddo dviliṅgoti daṭṭhabbo.

original: Tanti pappaṭikaṃ. Ṭhitaṃ niyyāsanti sambandho. Evaṃ “lagga”nti etthāpi. Hatthakukkuccenāti
analyzed: tanti pappaṭikam ṭhitam niyyāsanti sambandhaḥ evam lagganti ettha api hattha kukkuccena ati

original: hatthalolena. “Chindantassāpī”ti pade hetu.
analyzed: hattha lolena chindantassa api iti pade hetu

original: Vāsatthikenāti vāsaṃ icchantena. “Ocināpetabbā”ti pade kattā. Uppāṭentehīti uddharantehi. Tesanti sāmaṇerānaṃ. Sākhaṃ gahitanti sambandho. Ṭhapitassa siṅgīverassāti yojanā.

original: Chijjanakanti chijjanayuttaṃ, chijjanārahanti attho. “Caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmī”ti
analyzed: chijjanakanti chijjana yuttam chijjana arahanti attho caṅkamita ṭṭhānam dassessāmi iti

original: iminā vattasīsena caṅkamanaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. “Bhijjatī”ti iminā abhijjamāne gaṇṭhipi
analyzed: iminā vatta sīsena caṅkamanam vaṭṭati iti dasseti bhijjati iti iminā a bhijjamāne gaṇṭhipi

original: kātabboti dasseti. Dārumakkaṭakanti makkaṭassa hattho makkaṭo upacārena, makkaṭo
analyzed: kātabbo ti dasseti dārumakkaṭakanti makkaṭassa hatthaḥ makkaṭaḥ upacārena makkaṭaḥ

original: viyāti makkaṭako, sadisatthe ko. Dārusaṅkhāto makkaṭako dārumakkaṭako. Taṃ ākoṭentīti
analyzed: viyāti makkaṭako sadisatthe kaḥ dāru saṅkhātaḥ makkaṭakaḥ dārumakkaṭako tam ākoṭenti iti

original: sambandho. Aniyāmitattāti imanti aniyāmitattā vacanassa. Idaṃ mahāsāmaññaṃ, visesasāmaññampi
analyzed: sambandhaḥ aniyāmita ttā ati iman ti aniyāmita ttā vacanassa idam mahā sāmaññam visesa sāmaññam pi

original: vaṭṭatīti āha “nāmaṃ gahetvāpī”tiādi. Sabbanti sabbaṃ vacanaṃ.

original: Paṇṇakuṭīsūti paṇṇena chāditakuṭīsu. Sabhāgabhikkhūnanti attanā sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ,

original: santikanti sambandho. Anovassake ṭhāneti yojanā. Laggetvāti lambetvā, ayameva vā
analyzed: santikam ti sambandhaḥ anovassake ṭhāne ti yojanā laggetvā ati lambetvā ayam eva vā

original: pāṭho. “Sammajjani”nti padaṃ “gahetvā”ti pade avuttakammaṃ, “ṭhapetabbā”ti pade vuttakammaṃ.
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ sammajjanin ti padam gahetvā ati pade a vutta kammam ṭhapetabbā ati pade vutta kammam

original: Dhovitvāti sammajjaniṃ suddhaṃ katvā. Uposathāgārādīsūtiādisaddena pariveṇādīni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: dhovitvā iti sammajjanim suddham katvā uposatha āgāra ādīsu uti ādi saddena pariveṇa ādīni gahetabbāni

original: Yo pana bhikkhu gantukāmo hoti, tenāti yojanā. Tatthāti sālāyaṃ. Yattha katthacīti
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu gantu kāmaḥ hoti tena ati yojanā tattha ati sālāyam yattha katthaci iti

original: yasmiṃ kismiñci ṭhāne. Pākatikaṭṭhāneti pakatiyā gahitaṭṭhāne. Tatra tatrevāti tesu
analyzed: yasmin kismiñci ṭhāne pākatika ṭṭhāne iti pakatiyā gahita ṭṭhāne tatra tatra iva ati tesu

original: tesu cetiyaṅgaṇādīsuyeva. Asanasālanti asanti bhakkhanti assaṃ sālāyanti asanā, asanā
analyzed: tesu asana sālanti asanti bhakkhanti assam sālāyanti asanāḥ asanā

original: ca sā sālā ceti asanasālā, bhojanasālāti attho. Tatrāti tassa sammajjantassa, tasmiṃ
analyzed: ca sā sālā ca iti asana sālā bhojana sālā ati attho tatra ati tassa sammajjantassa tasmin

original: “vattaṃ jānitabba”nti pāṭhe vā. Majjhatoti pavittato, suddhaṭṭhānatoti attho. Pādaṭṭhānābhimukhāti
analyzed: vattam jānitabbanti pāṭhe vā majjhataḥ ti pavittataḥ suddha ṭṭhānataḥ ti attho pāda ṭṭhāna abhimukhā ati

original: sammajjantassa pādaṭṭhānaṃ abhimukhā. Vālikā haritabbāti paṃsu ca vālikā ca apanetabbā.
analyzed: sammajjantassa pādaṭṭhānam abhimukhā vālikā haritabbā ati paṃsu ca vālikā ca apanetabbā

original: Sammuñcanīsalākāya paraṃ pelletabbāti adhippāyo. Bahīti sammajjitabbatalato bahi.
analyzed: sammuñcanī salākāya param pelletabbā ati adhippāyaḥ bahi iti sammajjitabba talataḥ bahi

original: 111. Masārakotīti ettha itisaddo nāmapariyāyo, masārako nāmāti attho. Evaṃ bundikābaddhotītiādīsupi.
analyzed: masārako ti iti ettha iti saddaḥ nāma pariyāyaḥ masārakaḥ nāma ati atthaḥ evam bundikā baddhaḥ ti iti ādīsu pi

original: Pāde masitvā vijjhitvā tattha aṭaniyo pavesetabbā etthāti masārako. Bundo eva bundiko,
analyzed: pāde masitvā vijjhitvā tattha aṭaniyo pavesetabbā ettha ati masārakaḥ bundaḥ eva bundiko

original: pādo, tasmiṃ ābaddhā bandhitā aṭanī yassāti bundikābaddho. Kuḷīrassa pādo viya pādo
analyzed: tasmin ābaddhā bandhitā aṭanī yassa ati bundikā baddhaḥ kuḷīrassa pādaḥ viya pādaḥ

original: yassāti kuḷīrapādako, yathā kuḷīro vaṅkapādo hoti, evaṃ vaṅkapādoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: yassa iti kuḷīra pādakaḥ yathā kuḷīraḥ vaṅka pādaḥ hoti evam vaṅka pādaḥ ti vuttam hoti

original: Āhacca aṅge vijjhitvā tattha pavesito pādo yassāti āhaccapādako. Āṇinti aggakhilaṃ.
analyzed: aṅge vijjhitvā tattha pavesitaḥ pādaḥ yassa ati āhaccapādakaḥ agga khilam

original: Mañcati puggalaṃ dhāretīti mañco. Pīṭhati visamadukkhaṃ hiṃsatīti pīṭhaṃ. Paṇavoti
analyzed: mañcati puggalam dhāreti iti mañcaḥ pīṭhati visama dukkham hiṃsati iti pīṭham paṇavaḥ ti

original: eko tūriyaviseso, tassa saṇṭhānaṃ katvāti attho. Tañhi etarahi buddhapaṭimassa pallaṅkasaṇṭhānaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ tūriya viseso tassa saṇṭhānam katvā iti atthaḥ tat hi etarahi buddha paṭimassa pallaṅka saṇṭhānam

original: hoti. Tanti kocchaṃ. Karonti kirāti sambandho. Etthāti senāsanaparibhoge. Hīti saccaṃ.
analyzed: hoti koccham karonti kirāti sambandhaḥ ettha ati senāsana paribhoge hi iti saccam

original: Tanti kocchaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, mahagghattā bhaddapīṭhantipi vuccati. Yenāti yena bhikkhunā.
analyzed: tatti koccham mahaggham hoti mahagghattā bhaddapīṭham ti pi vuccati yena ati yena bhikkhunā

original: “Thāmamajjhimassā”ti padena pamāṇamajjhimaṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: thāma majjhimassa ati padena pamāṇa majjhimam nivatteti

original: Etthāti “anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyā”ti pade. Thero āṇāpetīti yojanā. Āṇāpetīti ca āṇa-dhātuyā
analyzed: ettha ati anāpuccham vā gaccheyya ati pade theraḥ āṇāpeti iti yojanā āṇāpeti iti ca āṇa dhātuyā

original: eva pesanasaṅkhātassa hetvatthassa vācakattā ṇāpesaddo svatthova. Soti daharo. Tathāti
analyzed: eva pesana saṅkhātassa hetvatthassa vācaka ttā ṇāpesaddaḥ su atthaḥ uva saḥ ti daharaḥ tathā ati

original: yathā therena vutto, tathā katvāti attho. Tatthāti divāṭṭhāne, mañcapīṭhe vā. Tatoti
analyzed: yathā therena vuttaḥ tathā katvā iti attho tattha ati divāṭṭhāne mañca pīṭhe vā tatoti

original: ṭhapanakālato. Paribundheti hiṃ setīti palibodho, parisaddo upasaggo, so vikāravasena
analyzed: ṭhapana kālataḥ paribundheti him seti iti palibodho parisaddo upasaggo so vikāra vasena

original: aññathā jāto. So palibodho aññattha āvāsādiko, idha pana santharāpitamañcādiko. Sāyanti
analyzed: aññathā jātaḥ so palibodho aññattha āvāsa ādiko idha pana santharāpita mañca ādiko

original: sāyanhe, bhummatthe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Thero bhaṇatīti sambandho. Tatthāti mañcapīṭhe.
analyzed: upayoga vacanam theraḥ bhaṇati iti sambandho tattha ati mañca pīṭhe

original: “Bālo hotī”ti vatvā tassa atthaṃ dassento āha “anuggahitavatto”ti. Anuggahitaṃ vattaṃ
analyzed: bālaḥ hoti iti vatvā tassa attham dassentaḥ āha anuggahita vatto ti anuggahitam vattam

original: yenāti anuggahitavatto, thero. Tajjetīti ubbejeti. Tasminti dahare. Assāti therassa.
analyzed: yena iti anuggahita vattaḥ theraḥ tajjeti iti ubbejeti tasmin ti dahare assa ati therassa

original: Āṇattikkhaṇeyevāti therassa pesanakkhaṇeyeva. Daharo vadatīti yojanā. “Thero”ti padaṃ
analyzed: āṇatti kkhaṇeya iva ati therassa pesana kkhaṇeya iva daharaḥ vadati iti yojanā thera uti padam

original: “vatvā gacchatī”ti padadvaye kattā, “kāretabbo”ti pade kammaṃ. Nanti mañcapīṭhaṃ,
analyzed: vatvā gacchati iti pada dvaye kattā kāretabbā iti pade kammam mañcapīṭham

original: “paññapetvā”tipadamapekkhiya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Nanti daharaṃ vā. “Vatvā”ti padamapekkhiya
analyzed: paññapetvā ati padam apekkhiya evam vuttam nanti daharam vā vatvā iti padam apekkhiya

original: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatthevāti mañcapīṭheyeva. Assāti therassa. Tatthāti divāṭṭhāne. Bhojanasālato
analyzed: evam vuttam tattha iva ati mañca pīṭhe iva iva assa ati therassa tattha iti divāṭṭhāne bhojana sālato

original: aññattha gacchantoti bhojanasālato nikkhamitvā mañcapīṭhapaññāpanaṭṭhānato aññaṃ
analyzed: aññattha gacchanto ti bhojana sālataḥ nikkhamitvā mañca pīṭha paññāpana ṭṭhānato aññam

original: ṭhānaṃ gacchanto, theroti yojanā. Tatthevāti divāṭṭhāneyeva. Yatricchatīti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: ṭhānam gacchantaḥ yojanā tattha iva ati yatra icchati iti yam ṭhānam

original: gantumicchatīti attho. Antarasannipāteti sakalaṃ ahorattaṃ asannipātetvā antare sannipāte satīti yojanā.
analyzed: gantum icchati iti atthaḥ antara sannipāta iti sakalam ahorattam a sannipātetvā antare sannipāte sati iti yojanā

original: Tatthāti tasmiṃ ṭhāne. Āgantukā gaṇhantīti sambandho. Tatoti gaṇhanato. Tesanti āgantukānaṃ.
analyzed: tattha ati tasmin ṭhāne āgantukāḥ gaṇhanti iti sambandhaḥ tatas ti gaṇhanataḥ tesanti āgantukānam

original: Yehīti āvāsiko vā hotu, āgantuko vā, yehi bhikkhūhi. Teti nisinnakabhikkhū. Uddhaṃ
analyzed: yehi iti āvāsikaḥ vā hotu āgantukaḥ vā yehi bhikkhūhi te ti nisinnaka bhikkhū uddhaṃ

original: pāḷipāṭhaṃ sāreti pavattetīti ussārako. Dhammakathāyaṃ sādhūti dhammakathiko. Tasminti
analyzed: pāḷi pāṭham sāreti pavatteti iti ussārakaḥ dhamma kathā ayam sādhu uti dhamma kathikaḥ tasmin ti

original: ussārake vā dhammakathike vā. Ahorattanti aho ca ratti ca ahorattaṃ, accantasaṃyogapadaṃ.
analyzed: ussārake vā dhamma kathike vā ahorattanti aho ca ratti ca ahorattam ac canta saṃyoga padam

original: Itarasminti paṭhamaṃ nisinnabhikkhuto aññasmiṃ bhikkhumhīti yojanā. Antoupacāraṭṭheyevāti
analyzed: itarasmin ti paṭhamam nisinna bhikkhutaḥ aññasmim bhikkhumhi iti yojanā

original: leḍḍupātasaṅkhātassa upacārassa anto ṭhiteyeva, anādare cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Sabbatthāti
analyzed: leḍḍupāta saṅkhātassa upacārassa antar ṭhitā iya iva anādare ca itam bhummam sabbattha ati

original: āpattivāraanāpattivāresu.
analyzed: āpattivāra anāpattivāresu

original: 112. Cimilikaṃ vātiādīsu vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Tanti cimilikattharaṇaṃ.
analyzed: cimilikam vā ati ādīsu vinicchayaḥ evam veditabbaḥ iti yojanā tanti cimilika ttharaṇam

original: Uttari attharitabbanti uttarattharaṇanti dassento āha “uttarattharaṇaṃ nāmā”tiādi.
analyzed: uttari attharitabbanti uttara tharaṇanti dassentaḥ āha uttara tharaṇam nāma atiādi

original: Bhūmiyanti sudhādiparikammena akatāyaṃ pakatibhūmiyaṃ. Cammakhaṇḍoti ettha cammaṃyeva
analyzed: bhūmiyanti sudhā ādi parikammena akatā ayam pakati bhūmiyam camma khaṇḍo ti ettha cammaṃyā iva

original: ante khaṇḍattā chinnattā cammakhaṇḍoti vuccati. Nanu sīhacammādīni na kappantīti
analyzed: ante khaṇḍa ttā chinna ttā cammakhaṇḍo ti vuccati nanu sīha camma ādīni na kappanti iti

analyzed: āha aṭṭhakathāsu hi itiādi hi iti saccam tasmā iti yasmā na dissati tasmā

original: attano santakanti paricchinditvā, puggalikanti vā pariggahetvā taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ haraṇeyeva.
analyzed: attano santakanti paricchinditvā puggalikanti vā pariggahetvā tam tam ṭhānam haraṇeya iva

original: Pādo puñchīyati sodhīyati etāyāti pādapuñchanīti katvā rajjupilotikāyo pādapuñchanīti
analyzed: pādaḥ puñchīyati sodhīyati etā āyāti pāda puñchanī iti katvā pāda puñchanī iti

original: vuccatīti āha “pādapuñchanī nāmā”tiādi. Mayasaddalopaṃ katvā phalakapīṭhanti vuttanti

original: āha “phalakapīṭhaṃ nāma phalakamayaṃ pīṭha”nti. Phalakañca pīṭhañca phalakapīṭhanti
analyzed: āha phalaka pīṭham nāma phalaka mayam pīṭhanti phalakam ca pīṭham ca phalaka pīṭhanti

original: vā dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “atha vā”ti. Etenāti “phalakapīṭha”nti padena. “Saṅgahita”nti
analyzed: vā dassetum vuttam atha vā ti etena āti phalaka pīṭham ti padena saṅgahitan ti

original: pade karaṇaṃ, kattā vā. Bījanipattakanti caturassabījanīyeva sakuṇapattasadisattā
analyzed: pade karaṇam kattā vā catur assa bījanīyā iva sakuṇa patta sadisa ttā

original: bījanipattakaṃ, sadisatthe ko. “Ajjhokāse”ti padaṃ “pacitvā”ti pade ādhāro. Aggisālāyanti
analyzed: bīja nipattakam sadisatthe kaḥ ajjhokāse iti padam pacitvā iti pade ādhāraḥ aggisālāyanti

original: agginā pacanasālāyaṃ. Pabbhāreti leṇasadise pabbhāre. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne.
analyzed: agginā pacana sālā ayam pabbhāra iti leṇa sadise pabbhāre yatthā ati yasmin ṭhāne

original: Yasminti puggale. “Attano puggalikamiva hotī”ti iminā anāpattīti dasseti.
analyzed: yasmin ti puggale attano puggalikam iva hoti iti iminā anāpatti iti dasseti

original: 113. Yo bhikkhu vā lajjī hoti, tathārūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā ti yojanā. “Lajjī hotī”ti vatvā
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu vā lajjī hoti tathārūpam bhikkhum vā ti yojanā lajjī hoti iti vatvā

original: tassa atthaṃ dassento āha “attano palibodhaṃ viya maññatī”ti. Yoti āpucchako bhikkhu.
analyzed: tassa attham dassento āha attanaḥ palibodham viya maññati iti yaḥ ti āpucchakaḥ bhikkhu

original: “Kenaci upaddutaṃ hotī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārento āha “sacepi hī”tiādi.
analyzed: kenaci upaddutam hoti iti saṅkhepena vuttam attham vitthārentaḥ āha sace pi hi itiādi

original: Hisaddo vitthārajotako. Vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu gaṇhātīti sambandho. Taṃ padesanti senāsanaṭṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: hi saddaḥ vitthāra jotakaḥ vuḍḍhataraḥ bhikkhu gaṇhāti iti sambandho tam senāsana ṭhapita ṭṭhānam

original: Āpadāsūti vipattīsūti. Catutthaṃ.
analyzed: āpadāsu iti vipattīsu iti catuttham

original: 5. Dutiyasenāsanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya senāsana sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 116. Pañcame mañcakabhisīti mañce attharitabbo mañcako, soyeva bhisīti mañcakabhisi.
analyzed: pañcame mañcaka bhisi iti mañce attharitabbaḥ mañcakaḥ saḥ yā iva bhisi iti mañcaka bhisi

original: Evaṃ pīṭhakabhisipi. Pāvāro kojavoti dveyeva paccattharaṇanti vuttāti āha “pāvāro”tiādi.
analyzed: evam pīṭhaka bhisipi pāvāro kojavaḥ ti dveyā iva paccattharaṇanti vuttā ati āha pāvāra itiādi

original: Vuttanti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Dutiyātikkameti dutiyapādātikkame. Senāsanatoti sace
analyzed: vuttam ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttam dutiya atikkame ti dutiya pāda atikkame senāsanataḥ ti sace

original: ekaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti, tato. Atha bahūni senāsanāni honti, sabbapacchimasenāsanato.
analyzed: ekam senāsanam hoti tatas atha bahūni senāsanāni honti sabba pacchima senāsanato

original: Eko leḍḍupāto senāsanassa upacāro hoti, eko parikkhepārahoti āha “dve leḍḍupātā”ti.
analyzed: ekaḥ leḍḍupātaḥ senāsanassa upacāraḥ hoti ekaḥ parikkhepa āraho ti āha dve leḍḍupātā ti

original: Sace bhikkhu, sāmaṇero, ārāmiko cāti tayo honti, bhikkhuṃ anāpucchitvā sāmaṇero vā
analyzed: sace bhikkhu sāmaṇeraḥ ārāmiko ca ati tayaḥ honti bhikkhum an āpucchitvā sāmaṇeraḥ vā

original: ārāmiko vā na āpucchitabbo. Atha sāmaṇero, ārāmiko cāti dve honti, sāmaṇeraṃ anāpucchitvā
analyzed: ārāmikaḥ vā na āpucchitabbaḥ atha sāmaṇeraḥ ārāmikaḥ ca ati dve honti sāmaṇeram an āpucchitvā

original: ārāmikova na āpucchitabboti dassento āha “bhikkhumhi satī”tiādi. Tīsupi asantesu
analyzed: ārāmikaḥ iva na āpucchitabbaḥ ti dassentaḥ āha bhikkhumhi sati itiādi tīsu pi asantesu

original: āpucchitabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “tasmimpi asatī”tiādi. Yenāti upāsakena, “kārito”ti
analyzed: āpucchitabba vidhim dassetum vuttam tasmim pi asati itiādi yena ati upāsakena kāritaḥ ti

original: pade kattā. Tassāti vihārasāmikassa. Tasmimpi asati gantabbanti yojanā. Pāsāṇesūti
analyzed: pade kattā tassa ati vihāra sāmikassa tasmim pi asati gantabbanti yojanā pāsāṇesu iti

original: pāsāṇaphalakesu. Sace ussahatīti sace sakkoti. Ussahantena bhikkhunā ṭhapetabbanti
analyzed: pāsāṇa phalakesu sace ussahati iti sace sakkoti ussahantena bhikkhunā ṭhapetabbanti

original: yojanā. Tepīti upāsakāpi, na sampaṭicchantīti sambandho. Tatthāti dārubhaṇḍādīsu.
analyzed: yojanā te pi iti upāsakāḥ api na sampaṭicchanti iti sambandhaḥ tattha ati dārubhaṇḍa ādīsu

original: Paricchedākārena veṇīyati dissatīti pariveṇaṃ. “Atha kho”ti padaṃ “veditabba”nti
analyzed: pariccheda ākārena veṇīyati dissati iti pariveṇam atha kho iti padam veditabbanti

original: pade arucilakkhaṇaṃ. “Āsanne”ti iminā upacārasaddassa upaṭṭhānatthaaññaropanatthe
analyzed: pade aruci lakkhaṇam āsanna iti iminā upacāra saddassa upaṭṭhāna ttha añña ropana atthe

original: nivatteti. Yasmā vammikarāsiyeva hoti, tasmāti yojanā. Upacinantīti upacikā, tāhi
analyzed: nivattā iti yasmai hoti tasmā iti yojanā upacinanti iti upacikā

original: nimittabhūtāhi palujjati nassatīti attho. Senāsananti vihāraṃ. Khāyitunti khādituṃ,
analyzed: nimitta bhūtāhi palujjati nassati iti attho senāsananti vihāram khāyitum ti khāditum

original: ayameva vā pāṭho. Tanti mañcapīṭhaṃ. Mañcapīṭhaṃ vihāre apaññapetvā vihārūpacāre
analyzed: ayam eva vā pāṭho tanti mañca pīṭham mañca pīṭham vihāre a paññapetvā vihāra upacāre

original: paññāpanassa visesaphalaṃ dassetuṃ āha “vihārūpacāre panā”tiādi. Vihārūpacāre paññapitanti sambandho.
analyzed: paññāpanassa visesa phalam dassetum āha vihāra upacāre pana atiādi vihāra upacāre paññapitanti sambandho

original: 118. “Gacchantenā”ti padaṃ “gantabba”nti pade kattā. Tathevāti yathā purimabhikkhu
analyzed: gacchantena ati padam gantabbanti pade kattā tathā iva ati yathā purima bhikkhu

original: karoti, tatheva. Vasantena bhikkhunā paṭisāmetabbanti yojanā. Rattiṭṭhānanti rattiṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: karoti tathā iva vasantena bhikkhunā paṭisāmetabbanti yojanā ratti ṭṭhānam ti rattim vasana ṭṭhānam

original: Yā dīghasālā vā yā paṇṇasālā vā upacikānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tatoti yojanā. Tasminti
analyzed: yā dīgha sālā vā yā paṇṇa sālā vā upacikānam uṭṭhāna ṭhānam hoti tatas iti yojanā tasmin ti

original: dīghasālādike. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā, santiṭṭhantīti sambandho. Siluccayoti pabbato,
analyzed: dīgha sāla ādike hi iti saccam yasmai vā santiṭṭhanti iti sambandhaḥ pabbataḥ

original: tasmiṃ leṇaṃ siluccayaleṇaṃ, pabbataguhāti attho. Upacikāsaṅkāti upacikānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: tasmim leṇam siluccaya leṇam pabbata guhā ti attho upacikā saṅkā ati upacikānam uṭṭhāna ṭṭhānam ti

original: āsaṅkā. Tatoti pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇathambhesu vā katasenāsanādito. Āgantuko yo
analyzed: āsaṅkā tatas ti pāsāṇa piṭṭhiyam vā pāsāṇa thambhesu vā kata senāsana āditaḥ āgantukaḥ yaḥ

original: bhikkhu anuvattanto vasatīti sambandho. Soti āgantuko bhikkhu. Puna soti āgantuko
analyzed: bhikkhu anuvattantaḥ vasati iti sambandho saḥ ti āgantukaḥ bhikkhu puna saḥ ti āgantukaḥ

original: bhikkhuyeva. Tatoti gahetvā issariyena vasanato. Ubhopīti āvāsikopi āgantukopi dve
analyzed: tatas ti gahetvā issariyena vasanataḥ ubho pi iti āvāsikaḥ api āgantukaḥ api dve

original: bhikkhū. Tesūti dvīsu tīsu. Pacchimassāti sabbapacchimassa. Ābhogenāti ābhogamattena
analyzed: bhikkhū tesu iti dvīsu tīsu pacchimassa ati sabba pacchimassa ābhogena ati ābhoga mattena

original: mutti natthi, āpucchitabbamevāti adhippāyo. Aññatoti aññāvāsato. Aññatrāti aññasmiṃ
analyzed: mutti natthi āpucchitabbam eva āti adhippāyaḥ aññatas ti añña āvāsataḥ aññatra ati aññasmin

original: āvāse. Tatthevāti ānītāvāseyeva. Tenāti vuḍḍhatarena, “sampaṭicchite”ti pade kattā.
analyzed: āvāse tattha iva ati ānītā āvāsā iya iva tena ati vuḍḍhatarena sampaṭicchitā iti pade kattā

original: Sampaṭicchiteti vuḍḍhatarena sampaṭicchitepi itarassa gantuṃ vaṭṭati āpucchitattāti
analyzed: sampaṭicchitā iti vuḍḍhatarena sampaṭicchite pi itarassa gantum vaṭṭati āpucchita ttā ati

original: vadanti. Naṭṭhaṃ vāti naṭṭhe vā senāsane sati gīvā na hotīti yojanā. Aññassāti avissāsikapuggalassa.
analyzed: vadanti naṭṭham vā ati naṭṭhe vā senāsane sati gīvā na hoti iti yojanā aññassa ti avissāsika puggalassa

original: Naṭṭhānīti naṭṭhesu mañcapīṭhesu santesu.
analyzed: naṭṭhāni iti naṭṭhesu mañca pīṭhesu santesu

original: Vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu ca issariyo ca yakkho ca sīho ca vāḷamigo ca kaṇhasappo ca vuḍḍha…pe…

original: kaṇhasappā, te ādayo yesaṃ teti vuḍḍha…pe… kaṇhasappādayo, tesu. Ādisaddena petādayo

original: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “upadduto”ti. Pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum vuttam upadduto ti pañcamam

original: 6. Anupakhajjasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: an upakhajja sikkhāpadam

original: 119. Chaṭṭhe rūmbhitvāti nivāretvā, āvaraṇaṃ katvāti attho. Vassaggenāti vassagaṇanāya.
analyzed: chaṭṭhe rūmbhitvā iti nivāretvā āvaraṇam katvā iti attho vassaggena ati vassa gaṇanāya

original: Anupakhajjāti ettha khada hiṃsāyanti dhātupāṭhesu (saddanītidhātumālāyaṃ 15 dakārantadhātu)

original: vuttattā khadasaddo hiṃsattho hoti. Anusamīpaṃ upagantvā khadanaṃ hiṃ sanaṃ nāma
analyzed: vutta ttā khada saddaḥ hiṃsa atthaḥ hoti anusamīpam upagantvā khadanam hiṃ sanam nāma

original: anusamīpaṃ pavisanamevāti dassento āha “anupavisitvā”ti.
analyzed: anusamīpam pavisanam eva ati dassentaḥ āha anupavisitvā iti

original: 120. “Jāna”nti ettha jānanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “anuṭṭhāpanīyo aya”nti. Tenevāti
analyzed: jānanti ettha jānana ākāram dassetum vuttam anuṭṭhāpanīyaḥ ayanti tena eva āti

original: jānanahetunā eva. Assāti “jāna”ntipadassa. Hīti vitthārajotako. Saṅgho pana detīti
analyzed: jānana hetunā eva assa ati jānanti padassa hi iti vitthāra jotako saṅghaḥ pana deti iti

original: sambandho. Yassāti vuḍḍhādīsu aññatarassa. Etthāti vuḍḍhagilānādīsu. Gilānassapi
analyzed: sambandhaḥ yassa ti vuḍḍha ādīsu aññatarassa ettha ati vuḍḍha gilāna ādīsu gilānassa api

original: detīti yojanā. “Gilāno”ti padaṃ “na pīḷetabbo, anukampitabbo”tipadadvaye vuttakammaṃ.

original: “Kāmañcā”ti padassa anuggahatthajotakattā panasaddo garahatthajotako.
analyzed: kāmañca iti padassa anuggaha attha jotaka ttā pana saddaḥ gara hattha jotakaḥ

original: 121. Mañcapīṭhānaṃ upacāro nāmāti sambandho. Yatoti yato kutoci ṭhānato. Yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ atthi, tāva upacāro nāmāti yojanā. Tasmiṃ upacāre ṭhitassa bhikkhuno upacāreti sambandho.
analyzed: mañca pīṭhānam upacāraḥ nāma ati sambandhaḥ yato ti yatas kutoci ṭhānataḥ yāva mañca pīṭham atthi tāva upacāraḥ nāma ati yojanā tasmin upacāre ṭhitassa bhikkhuno upacāre ti sambandhaḥ

original: “Abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā”ti ettha vāsaddassa aniyamavikappatthaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “abhinisīdanamattenā”tiādi.

original: 122. Itoti vārato. Idhāti imasmiṃ pācittiyavāre. Yathā vutto, evanti sambandho. Sabbatthevāti
analyzed: itas ti vārataḥ idha āti imasmin pācittiya vāre yathā vuttaḥ evam ti sambandhaḥ sabbattha eva ati

original: sabbesu eva vihārapariveṇesu. Assāti visabhāgapuggalassa. Idhāpīti imasmimpi sikkhāpade.

original: Tatthāti vissāsikapuggale.
analyzed: tattha ati vissāsika puggale

original: 123. Pāḷiyaṃ “āpadāsū”tipadaṃ “pavisatī”ti ajjhāhārapadena sambandhitabbanti āha “āpadāsūtiādī”ti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: pāḷiyam āpadāsūti padam pavisati iti ajjhāhāra padena sambandhitabbanti āha āpadāsūti ādi iti chaṭṭham

original: 7. Nikkaḍḍhanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: nikkaḍḍhana sikkhāpadam

original: 126. Sattame ye pāsādā vā yāni vā catussālānīti yojanā. Catasso bhūmiyo etesanti

original: vuttaṃ “ye”tipadaṃ, “catussālānī”tipade apekkhite “yānī”ti liṅgavipallāso hoti. Senāsanesu

original: ñāpeti atthato pākaṭattā. Anāmasitvāti achupitvā.
analyzed: ñāpa iti atthataḥ pākaṭattā an āmasitvā iti a chupitvā

original: Ettakānīti etapamāṇāni. Tassāti nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa bhikkhussa. Gāḷhanti daḷhaṃ.
analyzed: ettakāni iti tassa ati nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa bhikkhussa gāḷham daḷham

original: 127. Idhāpīti imasmimpi sikkhāpade. Pisaddo purimasikkhāpadāpekkho. Sabbatthāti sabbesu sikkhāpadesu. Yatrāti yasmiṃ sikkhāpade.

original: vuttaṃ “dvibhūmikakuṭiyā vā”tiādi. “Mañca”nti padaṃ “abhī”tiupasaggena sambandhitabbanti

original: 9. Mahallakavihārasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: mahallakavihāra sikkhāpadam

original: Adhippāyoti bhagavato abhisandhi. Hi-saddo vitthārajotako. Kampatīti bhusaṃ kampati.

original: Tattha tatthāti “aggaḷaṭṭhapanāyā”tivacane na vuttanti sambandho. Atthassa kāraṇassa

analyzed: uppatti atthuppatti sāya iva aṭṭhuppatti iti vuccati tthakārassa ṭṭhakāram katvā adhikārataḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ iti yojanā

original: Yaṃ pana vacanaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Yassāti mahāvihārassa. Uparīti dvārato upari.
analyzed: yam pana vacanam vuttanti sambandhaḥ yassa ati mahāvihārassa upari iti dvārataḥ upari

original: Tīsu disāsūti ubhosu passesu, uparīti tīsu disāsu. Tatrāpīti khuddake vihārepi. Sāti

original: bhitti. Aparipūraupacārāpīti samantā kavāṭapamāṇena aparipūraupacārāpi. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedenāti

original: Imināti setavaṇṇādinā. Sabbametanti etaṃ sabbaṃ setavaṇṇādikaṃ.

original: 10. Sappāṇakasikkhāpadaṃ

analyzed: bhūtagāma vaggaḥ dutiyaḥ

original: saṃsaddassa atthaṃ dasseti, “ā”itipadena ātyūpasaggaṃ, “gata”itipadena gamudhātuṃ,
analyzed: attham dassa iti ā iti padena gata eti padena

original: “ttha”itipadena hiyyattanīsaṅkhātaṃ tthavacanaṃ vā, pañcamīsaṅkhātassa thavacanassa
analyzed: ttha eti padena hiyyattanī saṅkhātam ttha vacanam vā pañcamī saṅkhātassa tha vacanassa

original: tthattaṃ vā dasseti. Ayaṃ panetthattho – samaṃ tumhe āgatatthāti. Pañcamīsaṅkhātassa
analyzed: tthattam vā dasseti ayam pana itthatthaḥ samam tumhe āgata tthā ti pañcamī saṅkhātassa

original: thavacanassa tthattakāle samaṃ tumhe āgā attha bhavathāti. “Āgacchantī”tipadena “vattantī”ti

original: ettha vatudhātuyā atthaṃ dasseti, “paguṇā vācuggatā”tipadehi adhippāyaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: ettha vatu dhātuyāḥ attham dasseti paguṇāḥ adhippāyam dasseti

original: Pāḷīti garudhammapāḷi.
analyzed: pāḷi iti garudhammapāḷi

original: Tatthāti tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ, tesu vā abhivādanādīsu catūsu. Maggasampadānanti maggaṃ

original: pānīyassa āpucchanaṃ. Ādisaddena paribhojanīyāpucchanādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Ettha cāti

analyzed: etesu catūsu abhivādana ādīsu antar gāme vā ati ādīni cha padāni kātabbam eva atipade

original: etthāti mahāsannipātaṃ, tasmiṃ mahāsannipāte ṭhāne nisinne satīti yojanā. Paccuṭṭhānanti

analyzed: uṭṭhānam tam tanti sāmīcikammaṃ

original: Sakkatvāti cittiṃ katvā, saṃ ādaraṃ katvāti attho. Tenāha “yathā kato”tiādi. Tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: sakkatvā iti cittim katvā sam ādaram katvā iti tena āha yathā kata itiādi

original: kammatthoti āha “na atikkamitabbo”ti.
analyzed: kamma atthaḥ iti āha na atikkamitabbaḥ iti

original: Natthi bhikkhu etthāti abhikkhuko āvāso, so kittake ṭhāne abhikkhuko, yo āvāso abhikkhuko

analyzed: nāma hoti iti āha sacā iti ādi upassayato iti padam abbhantara iti pade apādānam ettha iti

analyzed: abhikkhuke āvāse hi iti saccam tatas ti aḍḍha yojana bbhantare ṭhita āvāsataḥ paranti

analyzed: aññasmin āvāse bhumma atthe ca itam upayoga vacanam pacchābhattanti bhattataḥ pacchā

original: Tatthāti abhikkhuke āvāse. “Bhikkhuniyo”tipadaṃ “vadantī”tipade kammaṃ. Vuttappamāṇeti

original: aḍḍhayojanabbhantarasaṅkhāte vuttappamāṇe. Sākhāmaṇḍapepīti sākhāya chāditamaṇḍapepi.
analyzed: aḍḍha yojana bbhantara saṅkhāte vutta ppamāṇe sākhāmaṇḍape iti sākhāya chādita maṇḍape pi

original: Pisaddena āvāse pana kā nāma kathāti dasseti. Vuttāti vasitā. Ettāvatāti ekarattaṃ
analyzed: pi saddena āvāse pana kā nāma kathā ati dasseti vuttā ati vasitā ettāvatā iti eka rattam

analyzed: vasita mattena ettha ati sa bhikkhuke āvāse upagacchantīhi bhikkhunīhi yācitabbā ati

analyzed: yojanā pakkhassa ati āsaḷhī māsassa juṇha pakkhassa terasiyanti padena avayavi avayava bhāvena

original: yojetabbaṃ. Mayanti amhe. Yatoti yena ujunā maggenāti sambandho. Tenāha “tena maggenā”ti.
analyzed: yojetabbam mayanti amhe yatas iti yena ujunā maggena ati sambandhaḥ tena āha tena maggena ati

original: Aññena maggenāti ujumaggato aññena jimhamaggena. Ayanti ayaṃ āvāso. Tatoti bhikkhūnaṃ

analyzed: āvāsataḥ bhikkhuni upassayataḥ vā idam eva yuttataram vakkhati hi amhākam upassayataḥ

original: gāvutamatte”ti. Khemaṭṭhāneti abhayaṭṭhāne. Tañhi khīyanti bhayā etthāti khemaṃ,
analyzed: khema ṭṭhāne iti abhaya ṭṭhāne tat hi khīyanti bhayāḥ ettha ati khemam

original: khemañca taṃ ṭhānañceti khemaṭṭhānanti katvā “khemaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Tāhi bhikkhunīhīti

original: cetaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ. Ṭhite maggeti sambandho “santikā”tipadaṃ “āgata”itipade apādānaṃ.

original: Tatthāti aññāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upassaye. Iti yācitabbāti yojanā. Tatoti bhikkhūnaṃ

original: yācitabbato, paranti sambandho.
analyzed: yācitabbato paranti sambandho

original: Cātuddaseti āsaḷhīmāsassa juṇhapakkhassa catuddasannaṃ divasānaṃ pūraṇe divase. Idhāti
analyzed: cātuddasa iti āsaḷhīmāsassa juṇha pakkhassa catuddasannam divasānam pūraṇe divase idha ati

original: vuttiṃ karontiyo. Vuttā bhikkhūti sambandho. Dutiyadivaseti āsaḷhīpuṇṇamiyaṃ. Athāti

original: pakkamanānantaraṃ. Etthāti bhikkhūnaṃ pakkantattā apassane. “Ābhogaṃ katvā”tiiminā
analyzed: pakkamana anantaram ettha ati bhikkhūnam pakkanta ttā apassane ābhogam katvā ati iminā

original: ābhogaṃ akatvā vasituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Sabhikkhukāvāsaṃ gantabbamevāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ābhogam a katvā vasitum na vaṭṭati iti dīpeti sa bhikkhuka āvāsam gantabbam eva ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Sāti vassacchedāpatti. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Kenaci kāraṇenāti bhikkhācārassa asampadādinā
analyzed: sā ati hi iti saccam yasmā vā kenacid kāraṇena ati bhikkhācārassa asampad ādinā

original: kiṃ abhikkhukāvāseva pavāretabbanti āha “pavārentiyā panā”tiādi.
analyzed: kim abhikkhuka āvāsā iva pavāretabbanti āha pavārentiyā pana atiādi

original: Anvaddhamāsanti ettha anusaddo vicchatthavācako kammappavacanīyo, tena payogattā
analyzed: ettha anu saddo kamma ppavacanīyo tena payoga ttā

original: bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “addhamāse addhamāse”ti. Paccāsīsitabbāti ettha patipubbo

analyzed: ca āpubbaḥ ca si dhātu icchatthā iti āha icchitabbā ati si dhātuyāḥ dve bhāvaḥ hoti āpubbaḥ

original: ovādo uttarapadalopena, soyeva attho payojanaṃ ovādattho, tadatthāya. Pāṭipadadivasatoti
analyzed: ovādaḥ uttara pada lopena payojanam tad atthāya

original: dutiyadivasato. So hi cando vuddhiñca hāniñca paṭimukhaṃ pajjati ettha, etenāti vā

original: pāṭipadoti vuccati. Itīti evaṃ vuttanayena. Bhagavā paññapetīti yojanā. Aññassāti
analyzed: pāṭipado ti vuccati iti iti evam vutta nayena bhagavā paññapeti iti yojanā aññassa āti

original: dhammassavanakammato aññassa. Nirantaranti abhikkhaṇaṃ, “paññapetī”tipade bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ.
analyzed: dhamma ssavana kammataḥ aññassa abhikkhaṇam paññapeti iti pade bhāva napuṃsakam

original: Hīti vitthāro. Evañca satīti evaṃ bahūpakāre sati ca. Yanti yaṃ dhammaṃ. Sātthikanti

analyzed: sa payojanam yathā anusiṭṭhanti anusiṭṭhiyāḥ anurūpam sabbāya iva bhikkhuniyā api iti yojanā hi iti saccam

original: Ovādaṃ gacchatīti ovādaṃ yācituṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmaṃ gacchati. Na ovādo gantabboti
analyzed: ovādam gacchati iti ovādam yācitum bhikkhu saṅghassa ārāmam gacchati na ovādaḥ gantabbo ti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itarathā hi saddapayogo virujjheyya. Ovādaṃ gantunti ovādaṃ yācanatthāya
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam itarathā hi sadda payogaḥ virujjheyya ovādam gantun ti ovādam yācana atthāya

original: bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmaṃ gantuṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhu saṅghassa ārāmam gantum

analyzed: dve tissaḥ bhikkhuniyo tipadam yācitvā atipade dutiyā kammam pesetabbā atipade paṭhamā kammam

original: Ovādūpasaṅkamananti ovādassa gahaṇatthāya upasaṅkamanaṃ. Ārāmanti bhikkhusaṅghassa

original: ārāmaṃ. Tatoti gamanato paranti sambandho. Tena bhikkhunāti ovādapaṭiggāhakena bhikkhunā.

original: Tanti sammataṃ bhikkhuṃ.
analyzed: tanti sammatam bhikkhum

original: Ussahatīti sakkoti. Pāsādikenāti pasādaṃ āvahena pasādajanakena kāyavacīmanokammenāti
analyzed: ussahati iti sakkoti pāsādikena ati pasādam āvahena pasāda janakena kāya vacī manaḥ kammena ati

original: attho. Sampādetūti tividhaṃ sikkhaṃ sampādetu. Ettāvatāti ettakena “pāsādikena sampādetū”ti
analyzed: attho sampādetu uti tividham sikkham sampādetu ettāvatā ati ettakena pāsādikena sampādetu uti

original: vacanamattena. Hīti phalajotako. Etanti “tāhī”tivacanaṃ.
analyzed: vacanam attena hi iti

original: Ettha ca bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghagaṇapuggalavasena vacanavāro tividho hoti, taṃ tividhaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca bhikkhūnam saṅgha gaṇa puggala vasena vacana vāro tividhaḥ hoti tam tividham

original: vacanavāraṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ saṅghagaṇapuggalavasena tīhi vacanavārehi guṇitaṃ katvā
analyzed: vacanavāram bhikkhunīnam saṅgha gaṇa puggala vasena tīhi vacanavārehi guṇitam katvā

original: nava vacanavārā honti, taṃ ākāraṃ dassento āha “tatrāyaṃ vacanakkamo”ti. Tatrāti
analyzed: nava vacanavārāḥ honti tam ākāram dassentaḥ āha tatra ayam vacana kkamaḥ ti tatra ati

original: purimavacanāpekkhaṃ. Vacanākāro pākaṭova.
analyzed: purima vacana apekkham vacana ākāraḥ pākaṭaḥ uva

original: Ekā bhikkhunī vā bahūhi bhikkhunīupassayehi ovādatthāya pesite vacanākāraṃ dassento āha “bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayyā”tiādi.
analyzed: ekā bhikkhunī vā bahūhi bhikkhunī upassayehi ovāda tthāya pesite vacana ākāram dassentaḥ āha bhikkhuni saṅghaḥ ca ayya ati ādi

original: Tenāpīti ovādapaṭiggāhakenāpi “ovāda”ntipadaṃ “paṭiggāhakenā”ti pade kammaṃ. Puna
analyzed: tena api iti ovāda paṭiggāhakena api ovāda antipadam paṭiggāhakena ati pade kammam puna

original: “ovāda”ntipadaṃ “apaṭiggahetu”ntipade kammaṃ. Balati assāsapassāsamattena jīvati,
analyzed: ovāda antipadam a paṭiggahetuntipade kammam balati assāsa passāsa mattena jīvati

original: na paññājīvitenāti bālo. Gilāyati rujatīti gilāno. Gamissati gantuṃ bhabboti gamiko.
analyzed: na paññā jīvitena ati bālaḥ gilāyati rujati iti gilānaḥ gamissati gantum bhabbaḥ uti gamiko

original: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā – gantuṃ bhabbo yo bhikkhu gamissati gamanaṃ karissati, iti
analyzed: ayam pana ittha yojanā gantum bhabbaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu gamissati gamanam karissati iti

original: tasmā so bhikkhu gamiko nāma. Atha vā yo bhikkhu gantuṃ bhabbattā gamissati gamanaṃ
analyzed: tasmā saḥ bhikkhu gamikaḥ nāma atha vā yaḥ bhikkhu gantum bhabbattā gamissati gamanam

original: karissati, iti tasmā so bhikkhu gamiko nāmāti. “Bhabbo”ti ca hetuantogadhavisesanaṃ.
analyzed: karissati iti tasmā so bhikkhu gamikaḥ nāma ati bhabbaḥ ti ca hetu anta gadha visesanam

original: Tatthāti bālādīsu tīsu puggalesu. Dutiyapakkhadivaseti pāṭipadato dutiyapakkhadivase.
analyzed: tattha ati bāla ādīsu tīsu puggalesu dutiya pakkha divase iti pāṭipadataḥ dutiya pakkha divase

original: Uposathaggeti uposathagehe. Tañhi uposathaṃ gaṇhanti, uposatho vā gayhati asminti
analyzed: uposathaggā iti uposatha gehe tat hi uposatham gaṇhanti uposathaḥ vā gayhati asmin ti

original: “uposathagga”nti vuccati. Tasmiṃ uposathagge. “Anārocetu”nti vacanassa ñāpakaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: uposathagganti vuccati tasmin uposathagge an ārocetum ti vacanassa ñāpakam dassetvā

original: “apaccāharitu”nti vacanassa tameva dassento āha “aparampi vutta”ntiādi.
analyzed: a paccāharitum ti vacanassa tam eva dassentaḥ āha aparam pi vutta ntiādi

original: Tatthāti ovādapaṭiggāhakesu bhikkhūsu. No cassāti no ce assa. Sabhaṃ vāti samajjaṃ
analyzed: tattha ati ovāda paṭiggāhakesu bhikkhūsu no ca assa ati no ce assa sabham vā ati samajjam

original: vā. Sā hi saha bhāsanti ettha, santehi vā bhāti dibbatīti “sabhā”ti vuccati, taṃ
analyzed: vā sā hi saha bhāsanti ettha santehi vā bhāti dibbati iti sabhā ati vuccati tam

original: sabhaṃ vā upasaṅkamissāmīti yojanā. Tatrāti tasmiṃ sabhādike. Evaṃ “tatthā”tipadepi.
analyzed: sabham vai upasaṅkamissāmi iti yojanā tatra ati tasmin sabhā ādike evam tattha atipade pi

original: Catuddasannaṃ pūraṇo cātuddaso, tasmiṃ pavāretvāti sambandho. Bhikkhusaṅgheti bhikkhusaṅghassa
analyzed: pūraṇaḥ cātuddaso tasmin pavāretvā iti sambandhaḥ bhikkhu saṅghe iti bhikkhu saṅghassa

original: santike, samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Ajjatanāti ettha asmiṃ ahani ajja, imasaddato
analyzed: santike samīpa atthe ca itam bhumma vacanam ettha asmin ahani ajja ima saddataḥ

original: ahanīti atthe jjapaccayo, imasaddassa ca akāro, ajja eva ajjatanā, svattho hi tanapaccayo.

original: 176. Yaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsituṃ vā pārupituṃ vā sakkā hoti, taṃ cīvaraṃ nāmāti yojanā.

original: sibbāti vutto”ti. Atha panāti tato aññathā pana. Āṇattassāti āṇāpitassa. Sambahulānipi

analyzed: pācittiyāni honti iti sambandhaḥ

original: ekāyeva hotīti dasseti. Paccūseti pabhāte. So hi paṭiviruddhaṃ timiraṃ useti nāsetīti

original: Tatrāti “gāmantare gāmantare”ti vacane. Hīti vitthāro. Ubhopīti bhikkhubhikkhuniyopi

original: Sopīti sāmaṇeropi, na piṇḍapātikoyevāti attho.

original: dasseti. “Ariyasāvikā”tiādinā ariyānaṃ bhikkhūhi apaṭivibhattabhogaṃ dasseti. Na

original: kevalaṃ kiñci parikkhayaṃ agamāsi, atha kho sabbanti āha “sabbaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsī”ti.
analyzed: kevalam kiñci parikkhayam agamāsi atha kho sabbanti āha sabbam parikkhayam agamāsi iti

original: Kāṇāpīti pisaddo na kevalaṃ mātāyeva maggaphalabhāginī ahosi, atha kho kāṇāpi sotāpannā
analyzed: kāṇā api iti pi saddaḥ na kevalam mātāya iva magga phala bhāginī ahosi atha kho kāṇā api sotāpannā

original: ahosīti dasseti. Sopi purisoti kāṇāya patibhūto sopi puriso. Pakatiṭṭhāneyevāti jeṭṭhakapajāpatiṭṭhāneyeva.
analyzed: ahosi iti dasseti so api puriso ti kāṇāya pati bhūto so api puriso pakati ṭṭhāneya iva ati jeṭṭhaka pajāpati ṭṭhāneya iva

original: 231. Imasmiṃ pana vatthusminti imasmiṃ pūvavatthusmiṃ. Etanti pātheyyavatthuṃ. Ariyasāvakattāti ariyabhūtassa sāvakassa bhāvato, ariyassa vā sammāsambuddhassa sāvakabhāvato.
analyzed: imasmin pana vatthusmin ti imasmin pūva vatthusmin etat ti pātheyya vatthum ariya sāvaka ttā ati ariya bhūtassa sāvakassa bhāvataḥ ariyassa vā sammāsambuddhassa sāvaka bhāvataḥ

original: 233. Paheṇakapaṇṇākārasaddānaṃ aññamaññavevacanattā vuttaṃ “paheṇakatthāyāti paṇṇākāratthāyā”ti.
analyzed: paheṇaka paṇṇa ākāra saddānam aññamañña vevacanattā vuttam paheṇaka tthāya ati paṇṇa ākāra tthāya ati

original: Idhāti “pūvehi vā”tipade, sikkhāpade vā. Baddhasattūti madhusakkharādīhi missetvā
analyzed: idha ati pūvehi vā atipade sikkhāpade vā baddha sattu uti madhu sakkhara ādīhi missetvā

original: baddhasattu. Thūpīkatanti thūpīkataṃ katvā.
analyzed: baddha sattu thūpīkatam ti thūpīkatam katvā

original: “Dvattipattapūre”tipadassa visesanuttarabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “pūre patte”ti. Dve
analyzed: dvatti patta pūra iti padassa visesa nuttara bhāvam dassetum vuttam pūre patta iti dve

original: vā tayo vā pattāti dvattipattā, vāsaddatthe saṅkhyobhayabāhiratthasamāso, tisaddaparattā
analyzed: vā tayaḥ vā pattā ati dvatti pattā vā a sadda tthe saṅkhyā ubhaya bāhirattha samāsaḥ

original: dvissa ca akāro hoti, dvattipattā ca te pūrā cāti dvattipattapūrā, te dvattipattapūre
analyzed: dvis sa ca akāraḥ hoti dvatti pattā ca te pūrā ca ati dvatti patta pūrā te dvatti patta pūre

original: gahetvāti yojanā. “Ācikkhitabba”nti vuttavacanassa ācikkhanākāraṃ dassento āha “atra
analyzed: gahetvā iti yojanā ācikkhitabbanti vutta vacanassa ācikkhana ākāram dassentaḥ āha atra

original: mayā”tiādi. Tenāpīti dutiyenāpi. Paṭhamabhikkhu ekaṃ gahetvā dutiyabhikkhussa ārocanañca
analyzed: mayā atiādi tena api iti dutiyena api paṭhama bhikkhu ekam gahetvā dutiya bhikkhussa ārocanam ca

original: dutiyabhikkhu ekaṃ gahetvā tatiyabhikkhussa ārocanañca atidisanto āha “yenā”tiādi.
analyzed: dutiya bhikkhu ekam gahetvā tatiya bhikkhussa ārocanam ca atidisantaḥ āha yena atiādi

original: Tattha yenāti paṭhamabhikkhunā. Paṭikkamanti bhuñjītvā etthāti paṭikkamananti vutte
analyzed: tattha yena iti paṭhama bhikkhunā paṭikkamanti bhuñjītvā ettha ati paṭikkamanam ti vutte

original: asanasālāva gahetabbāti āha “asanasāla”nti. Yatthāti yassaṃ asanasālāyaṃ. Mukholokanaṃ
analyzed: asanasālā ava gahetabbā ti āha asanasālam ti yattha ati mukholokanam

original: na vaṭṭatīti āha “attano”tiādi. Aññatthāti paṭikkamanato aññattha. Assāti bhikkhussa.
analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti āha attanā utiādi aññatthā ti paṭikkamanato aññattha assa āti bhikkhussa

original: “Saṃvibhajitabba”nti vuttavacanassa saṃvibhajanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “sace tayo”tiādi. Yathāmittanti yassa yassa mittassa. Akāmāti na kāmena. Kāraṇatthe cetaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ.
analyzed: saṃvibhajitabbam ti vutta vacanassa saṃvibhajana ākāram dassetum vuttam sace tayā utiādi yathāmittam ti yassa yassa mittassa akāmā ati na kāmena kāraṇa atthe ca itam nissakka vacanam

original: 235. Antarāmaggeti maggassa antaro antarāmaggo, sukhuccāraṇatthaṃ majjhe dīgho, tasmiṃ.
analyzed: antarāmagga iti maggassa antaraḥ antarāmaggaḥ sukha uccāraṇa attham majjhe dīghaḥ tasmin

original: Bahumpi dentānaṃ etesaṃ ñātakapavāritānaṃ bahumpi paṭiggaṇhantassāti yojanā. Aṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: bahum pi dentānam etesam ñātaka pavāritānam bahum pi paṭiggaṇhantassa ati yojanā aṭṭhakathāsu

original: pana vuttanti sambandho. Aṭṭhakathānaṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyā na sametīti. Catutthaṃ.
analyzed: pana vuttam ti sambandhaḥ aṭṭhakathānam vacanam pāḷiyā na sameti iti catuttham

original: 5. Paṭhamapavāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama pavāraṇa sikkhāpadam

original: 236. Pañcame pavāritāti ettha vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā, paccayapavāraṇā, paṭikkhepapavāraṇā,
analyzed: pañcame pavāritā ti ettha vassaṃvuttha pavāraṇā paccaya pavāraṇā paṭikkhepa pavāraṇā

original: cāti dve pavāraṇā adhippetāti dassento āha “brāhmaṇenā”tiādi. Brāhmaṇena pavāritāti

original: sambandho. Sayanti tatiyantanipāto “pavāritā”tipadena sambandho. Casaddo aññattha

original: yojetabbo yāvadatthapavāraṇāya ca paṭikkhepapavāraṇāya cāti. Paṭimukhaṃ attano gehaṃ

original: visanti pavisantīti paṭivissakāti vutte āsannagehavāsikā gahetabbāti āha “sāmantagharavāsike”ti.

original: 237. Uddhaṅgamo ravo oravo, soyeva saddo oravasaddo, kākānaṃ oravasaddo kakoravasaddoti dassento āha “kākāna”ntiādi.
analyzed: uddhaṅgamaḥ ravaḥ oravaḥ saḥ yā iva saddo oravasaddo kākānam oravasaddo kakoravasaddo ti dassentaḥ āha kākāna ntiādi

original: 239. Tavantupaccayassa atītatthabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “tattha cā”tiādi. Tatthāti
analyzed: tava ntu paccayassa atīta attha bhāvam dassetum vuttam tattha ca ati ādi tattha ati

original: “bhuttavā”tipade. Yasmā yena bhikkhunā ajjhoharitaṃ hoti, tasmā so “bhuttāvī”ti saṅkhyaṃ
analyzed: bhuttavāti pade yasmai yena bhikkhunā ajjhoharitam hoti tasmai saḥ bhuttāvī iti saṅkhyam

original: gacchatīti yojanā. Saṅkhāditvāti dantehi cuṇṇaṃ katvā. Tenāti tena hetunā. Assāti
analyzed: gacchati iti yojanā saṅkhāditvā iti dantehi cuṇṇam katvā tena ati tena hetunā assa ati

original: “bhuttāvī”tipadassa. Pavāreti paṭikkhipatīti pavārito bhikkhūti dassento āha “katapavāraṇo”ti.
analyzed: bhuttāvī iti padassa pavāreti paṭikkhipati iti pavāritaḥ bhikkhu iti dassentaḥ āha kata pavāraṇaḥ ti

original: Sopi cāti so paṭikkhepo ca hotīti sambandho. Assāti “pavārito”tipadassa. Tatthāti
analyzed: saḥ api ca ati saḥ paṭikkhepaḥ ca hoti iti sambandhaḥ assa ati pavāritaḥ iti padassa tattha ati

original: “asanaṃ paññāyatī”tiādivacane. Yasmā bhuttāvītipi saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tasmā na passāmāti
analyzed: asanam paññāyati iti ādi vacane yasmai saṅkhyam gacchati tasmai na passāma ati

original: yojanā. “Asanaṃ paññāyatī”ti padabhājaniyā “bhuttāvī”ti mātikāpadassa asaṃsandanabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yojanā asanam paññāyati iti pada bhājaniyā bhuttāvī iti mātikā padassa a saṃsandana bhāvam

analyzed: dassetum vuttam asanam paññāyati iti iminā atiādi yat ca ati yat ca bhojanam diratta ādi iti

original: ettha ādisaddena pañcādivacanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Etanti “bhuttāvī”tipadaṃ.

original: “Asanaṃ paññāyatī”tiādīsu vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti sambandho. “Paññāyatī”ti ettha

analyzed: ñā dhātuyā khāyana attham dassetum vuttam dissati iti hattha pāsa iti padassa dvādasa hattha ppamāṇaḥ

original: hatthapāso nādhippetoti āha “aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe”ti. Vācāya abhiharaṇaṃ nādhippetaṃ.

original: Tenāha “kāyenā”ti. Abhiharatīti abhimukhaṃ harati. Tanti bhojanaṃ. Etanti pañcaṅgabhāvaṃ,
analyzed: tena āha kāyena ati abhiharati iti abhimukham harati bhojanam pañcaṅga bhāvam

original: “pañcahi…pe… paññāyatī”ti vacanaṃ vā.
analyzed: pañcahipe paññāyati iti vacanam vā

original: Tatrāti “asanaṃ paññāyatī”tiādivacane. Asnātīti kīyādigaṇattā, tassa ca ekakkharadhātuttā
analyzed: tatra ati asanam paññāyati itiādi vacane a snāti iti tassa ca ekakkhara dhātuttā

original: sakāranakārānaṃ saṃyogo daṭṭhabbo. Tanti bhojanaṃ. Undati pasavati bhuñjantānaṃ āyubalaṃ
analyzed: sakāra nakārānam saṃyogaḥ daṭṭhabbo tanti bhojanam undati pasavati bhuñjantānam āyu balam

analyzed: janeti iti odanaḥ yava ādayaḥ pūtim katvā katattā kucchitena masīyati āmasīyati iti kumāsaḥ

original: Sacati samavāyo hutvā bhavatīti sattu. Byañjanatthāya māretabboti maccho. Mānīyati
analyzed: sacati samavāyaḥ hutvā bhavati iti sattu byañjana atthāya māretabbā uti macchaḥ mānīyati

original: bhuñjantehīti maṃsaṃ. Tatthāti odanādīsu pañcasu bhojanesu. Sāro assatthi aññesaṃ
analyzed: bhuñjantehi iti maṃsam tattha ati odana ādīsu pañcasu bhojanesu sāraḥ assatthi aññesam

original: dhaññānanti sālī. Vahati bhuñjantānaṃ jīvitanti vīhi. Yavati amissitopi missito viya
analyzed: dhaññānam ti sālī vahati bhuñjantānam jīvitanti vīhi yavati a missitaḥ api missitaḥ viya

original: bhavatīti yavo. Gudhati pariveṭhati milakkhabhojanattāti godhumo. Sobhanasīsattā
analyzed: bhavati iti yavaḥ pariveṭhati milakkha bhojana ttā ati godhumaḥ sobhana sīsa ttā

original: kamanīyabhāvaṃ gacchatīti kaṅgu. Mahantasīsattā, madhurarasanāḷattā ca varīyati patthīyati

original: janehīti varako. Koraṃ rudhiraṃ dūsati bhuñjantānanti kudrūsako. Nibbatto odano nāmāti
analyzed: janehi iti varako koram rudhiram dūsati kudrūsakaḥ nibbattaḥ odanaḥ nāma ati

original: sambandho. Tatthāti sattasu dhaññesu. Sālītīti ettha itisaddo nāmapariyāyo. Sālī
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tattha ati sattasu dhaññesu sālī iti iti ettha iti saddaḥ nāma pariyāyaḥ sālī

original: nāmāti attho. Eseva nayo “vīhītī”tiādīsupi.
analyzed: nāma ati attho esa eva nayaḥ vīhi iti iti ādīsu pi

original: Etthāti tiṇadhaññajātīsu. Nīvāro sāliyā anulomo, varakacorako varakassa anulomo.
analyzed: ettha ati tiṇa dhañña jātīsu nīvāro sāliyā anulomaḥ varaka corako varakassa anulomaḥ

original: Ambilapāyāsādīsūti ettha ādisaddena khīrabhattādayo saṅgaṇhanti. Odhīti avadhi, mariyādoti
analyzed: ambila pāyāsa ādīsu iti ettha ādi saddena khīrabhatta ādayo saṅgaṇhanti odhi iti avadhi mariyādo ti

original: attho. So hi avahīyati cajīyati asmāti odhīti vuccati.
analyzed: so hi avahīyati cajīyati asmāti odhī iti vuccati

original: Yopi pāyāso vā yāpi ambilayāgu vā odhiṃ na dasseti, so pavāraṇaṃ na janetīti yojanā.
analyzed: yaḥ api pāyāsaḥ vā ambila yāgu vā odhim na dasseti saḥ pavāraṇam na janeti iti yojanā

original: Payena khīrena katattā pāyāso. Pātabbassa, asitabbassa cāti dvinnaṃ byuppattinimittānaṃ
analyzed: payena khīrena kata ttā pāyāsaḥ pātabbassa asitabbassa ca ati dvinnam byuppatti nimittānam

analyzed: sambhavataḥ vā pāyāsaḥ ti vuccati uddhanataḥ ti cullitaḥ sā hi upari dhīyanti

analyzed: thālī ādayaḥ ettha ati uddhananti vuccati āvajjitvā ati pariṇāmetvā ghana bhāvanti kathina bhāvam

original: Etthāpi vākye “yo so”ti padāni yojetabbāni. Pubbeti abbhuṇhakāle. Nimantaneti nimantanaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: ettha api vākye yaḥ saḥ iti padāni yojetabbāni pubba iti abbhuṇha kāle nimantane iti nimantana ṭṭhāne

original: Bhatte ākiritvā dentīti sambandho. Yāpanaṃ gacchati imāyāti yāgu. Kiñcāpi tanukā
analyzed: bhatte ākiritvā denti iti sambandhaḥ yāpanam gacchati kiñca api tanukā

original: hoti, tathāpīti yojanā. Udakādīsūtiādisaddena kiñjikakhīrādayo saṅgayhanti. Yāgusaṅgahameva

original: vā. Aññasmiṃ vāti pakkuthitaudakādito aññasmiṃ udakādike vā. Yattha yasmiṃ udakādike

original: pakkhipanti, taṃ pavāraṇaṃ janetīti yojanā.
analyzed: pakkhipanti tam pavāraṇam janeti iti yojanā

original: Suddharasakoti macchamaṃsakhaṇḍanhārūhi amisso suddho macchādirasako. Rasakayāgūti
analyzed: suddha rasakaḥ iti amissaḥ suddhaḥ maccha ādi rasakaḥ

original: rasakabhūtā dravabhūtā yāgu. Ghanayāgūti kathinayāgu. Etthāti ghanayāguyaṃ. Pupphiatthāyāti

original: tadatthāya katanti sambandho. Te taṇḍuleti te seditataṇḍule. Acuṇṇattā neva sattusaṅkhyaṃ,

original: apakkattā na bhattasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Tehīti seditataṇḍulehi. Te taṇḍule pacanti,
analyzed: a pakkattāḥ na bhatta saṅkhyam gacchanti tehi iti sedita taṇḍulehi te taṇḍule pacanti

original: karontīti sambandho.
analyzed: karonti iti sambandhaḥ

original: “Yavehī”ti bahuvacanena satta dhaññānipi gahitāni. Esa nayo sālivīhiyavehīti etthāpi.
analyzed: yavehi iti bahuvacanena satta dhaññāni pi gahitāni esa nayo sāli vīhi yavehi iti ettha api

original: Thuseti dhaññatace. Palāpetvāti paṭikkamāpetvā. Tanti cuṇṇaṃ gacchatīti sambandho.
analyzed: thusa iti dhañña tace palāpetvā iti paṭikkamāpetvā tanti cuṇṇam gacchati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Kharapākabhajjitānanti kharo pāko kharapāko, kharapākena bhajjitā kharapākabhajjitā,
analyzed: khara pāka bhajjitā ananti kharaḥ pākaḥ khara pākaḥ khara pākena bhajjitā khara pāka bhajjitā

original: tesaṃ. Na pavārenti asattusaṅgahattāti adhippāyo. Kuṇḍakampīti kaṇampi. Pavāreti
analyzed: tesam na pavārenti a sattu saṅgaha ttā ati adhippāyaḥ kuṇḍakampi iti kaṇampi pavāreti

original: sattusaṅgahattāti adhippāyo. Tehīti lājehi. Suddhakhajjakanti piṭṭhehi amissitaṃ
analyzed: sattu saṅgaha ttā ati adhippāyaḥ tehi iti lājehi suddha khajjakam ti piṭṭhehi a missitam

original: suddhaṃ phalāphalādikhajjakaṃ. Yāguṃ pivantassa dentīti yojanā. Tānīti dve macchamaṃsakhaṇḍāni.
analyzed: suddham phala aphala ādi khajjakam yāgum pivantassa denti iti yojanā tāni iti dve maccha maṃsa khaṇḍāni

original: Na pavāreti dvinnaṃ macchamaṃsakhaṇḍānaṃ akhāditattāti adhippāyo. Tatoti dvemacchamaṃsakhaṇḍato
analyzed: na pavāreti dvinnam maccha maṃsa khaṇḍānam a khādita ttā ati adhippāyo

original: nīharitvā ekanti sambandho, tesu vā. Soti khādako bhikkhu. Aññanti dvīhi macchamaṃsakhaṇḍehi
analyzed: nīharitvā ekam ti sambandho tesu vā saḥ ti khādakaḥ bhikkhu aññanti dvīhi maccha maṃsa khaṇḍehi

original: aññaṃ pavāraṇapahonakaṃ bhojanaṃ.
analyzed: aññam pavāraṇa pahonakam bhojanam

original: Avatthutāyāti pavāraṇāya avatthubhāvato. Taṃ vitthārento āha “yaṃ hī”ti. Hisaddo
analyzed: avatthu tāya ati pavāraṇāya avatthu bhāvataḥ tam vitthārentaḥ āha yam hi iti hi saddaḥ

original: vitthārajotako. Yanti maṃsaṃ. Idaṃ panāti idaṃ maṃsaṃ pana. Paṭikkhittamaṃsaṃ kappiyabhāvato
analyzed: vitthāra jotakaḥ yanti maṃsam idam pana ati idam maṃsam pana paṭikkhitta maṃsam kappiya bhāvato

original: apaṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā paṭikkhittampi maṃsabhāvaṃ na jahāti. Nanu khāditamaṃsaṃ
analyzed: a paṭikkhipitabba ṭṭhāne ṭhita ttā paṭikkhittam pi maṃsa bhāvam na jahāti nanu khādita maṃsam

original: pana akappiyabhāvato paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā khādiyamānampi maṃsabhāvaṃ jahātīti
analyzed: pana akappiya bhāvataḥ paṭikkhipitabba ṭṭhāne ṭhita ttā khādiyamānam pi maṃsa bhāvam jahāti iti

original: āha “yaṃ panā”tiādi. Kuladūsakakammañca vejjakammañca uttarimanussadhammārocanañca
analyzed: āha yam pana atiādi kula dūsaka kammañca vejja kammañca uttari manussa dhamma ārocanañca

original: sāditarūpiyañca kula…pe… rūpiyāni, tāni ādīni yesaṃ kuhanādīnanti kula…pe… rūpiyādayo,
analyzed: sādita rūpiyam ca kulape rūpiyāni tāni ādīni kulape rūpiya ādayaḥ

original: tehi. Sabbatthāti sabbesu vāresu.
analyzed: tehi sabbattha ati sabbesu vāresu

original: Evantiādi nigamananidassanaṃ. Tanti bhojanaṃ. Yathāti yenākārena. Yena ajjhohaṭaṃ
analyzed: evantiādi nigamana nidassanam bhojanam yathā ati yena ākārena yena ajjhohaṭam

original: hoti, so paṭikkhipati pavāretīti yojanā. Katthacīti kismiñci pattādike. Tasmiṃ ce
analyzed: hoti saḥ paṭikkhipati pavāreti iti yojanā katthaci iti kismiñci patta ādike tasmin ce

original: antareti tasmiṃ khaṇe ce. Aññatrāti aññasmiṃ ṭhāne. Patte vijjamānabhojanaṃ anajjhoharitukāmo
analyzed: antarā iti tasmin khaṇe ce aññatra ati aññasmin ṭhāne patte vijjamāna bhojanam an ajjhoharitu kāmo

original: hoti yathā, evanti yojanā. Hīti saccaṃ. Sabbatthāti sabbesu padesu. Tatthāti kurundīyaṃ.
analyzed: hoti yathā evanti yojanā hi iti saccam sabbattha ati sabbesu padesu tattha ati kurundīyam

original: Ānisadassāti āgamma nisīdati etenāti ānisado, tassa pacchimantatoti sambandho. Paṇhiantatoti
analyzed: ānisadassa ati āgamma nisīdati etena ati ānisadaḥ tassa pacchima antataḥ ti sambandho

original: pasati ṭhitakāle vā gamanakāle vā bhūmiṃ phusatīti paṇhī, tassa antato. “Dāyakassā”tipadaṃ
analyzed: pasati ṭhita kāle vā gamana kāle vā bhūmim phusati iti paṇhī tassa antataḥ dāyakassa atipadam

original: “pasāritahattha”nti padena ca “aṅga”nti padena ca avayavīsambandho. Hatthapāsoti
analyzed: pasārita hatthanti padena ca aṅganti padena ca avayavī sambandhaḥ hattha pāso ti

original: hatthassa pāso samīpo hatthapāso, hattho pasati phusati asmiṃ ṭhāneti vā hatthapāso,
analyzed: hatthassa pāsaḥ samīpaḥ hattha pāsaḥ hatthaḥ pasati phusati asmim ṭhāne iti vā hattha pāsaḥ

original: aḍḍhateyyahattho padeso. Tasminti hatthapāse.
analyzed: aḍḍhateyya hatthaḥ padesaḥ tasmin ti hattha pāse

original: Upanāmetīti samīpaṃ nāmeti. Anantaranisinnopīti hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā anantare ṭhāne
analyzed: upanāma iti iti samīpam nāma iti anantara nisinnaḥ api iti hattha pāsam a vijahitvā anantare ṭhāne

original: nisinnopi bhikkhu vadatīti yojanā. Bhattapacchinti bhattena pakkhittaṃ pacchiṃ. Īsakanti
analyzed: nisinnaḥ api bhikkhu vadati iti yojanā bhatta pacchinti bhattena pakkhittam pacchim īsakanti

original: bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Uddharitvā vā apanāmetvā vāti sambandhitabbaṃ. Dūreti navāsane.
analyzed: bhāvanapuṃsakam uddharitvā vā apanāmetvā vā ati sambandhitabbam dūra iti nava āsane

original: Itoti pattato. Gato dūtoti sambandho.
analyzed: itas ti pattataḥ gataḥ dūto iti sambandhaḥ

original: Parivesanāyāti parivesanatthāya, bhattagge vā. Tatrāti asmiṃ parivesane. Tanti bhattapacchiṃ.
analyzed: parivesanāya ati parivesana atthāya bhattagge vā tatra ati asmin parivesane bhattapacchim

original: Phuṭṭhamattāvāti phusiyamattāva. Kaṭacchunā uddhaṭabhatte pana pavāraṇā hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: kaṭacchunā uddhaṭa bhatte pana pavāraṇā hoti iti yojanā

original: Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Tassāti parivesakassa. Abhihaṭe paṭikkhittattāti abhihaṭassa
analyzed: hi iti saccam yasmai vā tassa ati parivesakassa abhihaṭe paṭikkhitta ttā ati abhihaṭassa

original: bhattassa paṭikkhittabhāvato.
analyzed: bhattassa paṭikkhitta bhāvato

original: “Kāyena vācāya vā paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hotī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena
analyzed: kāyena vācāya vā paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hoti iti saṅkhepena vuttam attham vitthārena

original: dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tatthāti tesu kāyavācāpaṭikkhepesu. Macchikabījaninti
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha tattha atiādi tattha ati tesu kāya vācā paṭikkhepesu

original: makkhikānaṃ uttāsaniṃ bījaniṃ. Khakārassa hi chakāraṃ katvā “macchikā”ti vuccati
analyzed: makkhikānam uttāsanim bījanim khakārassa hi chakāram katvā macchikā ati vuccati

original: “sacchikatvā”tiādīsu viya. Ettha hi “sakkhikatvā”ti vattabbe khakārassa chakāro hoti.
analyzed: sacchikatvā atiādīsu viya ettha hi sakkhikatvā ati vattabbe khakārassa chakāro hoti

original: Eko vadatīti sambandho. Apanetvāti pattato apanetvā. Etthāti vacane. Kathanti kenākārena
analyzed: ekaḥ vadati iti sambandhaḥ apanetvā ati pattataḥ apanetvā ettha ati vacane katham ti kena ākārena

original: hotīti yojanā. Vadantassa nāmāti ettha nāmasaddo garahattho “atthī”tipadena yojetabbo.
analyzed: hoti iti yojanā vadantassa nāma ati ettha nāma saddaḥ garaha atthaḥ atthi iti padena yojetabbaḥ

original: Atthi nāmāti attho. Itopīti pattatopi. Tatrāpīti tasmiṃ vacanepi.
analyzed: atthi nāma ati itas api iti pattataḥ api tatra api iti tasmim vacane pi

original: Samaṃsakanti maṃsena saha pavattaṃ. Rasanti dravaṃ. Tanti vacanaṃ. Paṭikkhipato hoti.
analyzed: samaṃsakanti maṃsena saha pavattam rasanti dravam tanti vacanam paṭikkhipataḥ hoti

original: Kasmā? Maccho ca raso ca macchena misso raso cāti atthassa sambhavato. Idanti vatthuṃ.
analyzed: kasmā macchaḥ ca rasaḥ ca macchena missaḥ rasaḥ ca ati atthassa sambhavataḥ idam ti vatthum

original: Maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvāti “maṃsassa rasaṃ maṃsarasa”nti maṃsapadatthassa padhānabhāvaṃ
analyzed: maṃsam visum katvā ati maṃsassa rasam maṃsa rasanti maṃsa padatthassa padhāna bhāvam

original: akatvā, rasapadatthasseva padhānabhāvaṃ katvāti attho.
analyzed: a katvā rasa padatthassa iva padhāna bhāvam katvā iti atthaḥ

original: Āpucchantanti “maṃsarasaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āpucchantaṃ. Tanti maṃsaṃ. Karambakoti missakādhivacanametaṃ.
analyzed: maṃsa rasam gaṇhatha ati āpucchantam tanti maṃsam missaka adhivacanam etam

original: Yañhi aññena aññena missetvā karonti, so “karambako”ti vuccati. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho
analyzed: yat hi aññena aññena missetvā karonti so karambakaḥ iti vuccati ayam pana ittha vacana attho

original: – karoti samūhaṃ avayavinti karo, karīyati vā samūhena avayavināti karo, avayavo,
analyzed: karoti samūham avayavinti karo vā samūhena avayavinā ati karo avayavaḥ

original: taṃ vakati ādadātīti karambako, samūho. “Kadambako”tipi pāṭho, sopi yuttoyeva anumatattā
analyzed: tam ādadāti iti samūhaḥ pāṭhaḥ saḥ api

original: paṇḍitehi. Abhidhānepi evameva atthī. Attho pana aññathā cintetabbo. Imasmiṃ vā atthe
analyzed: paṇḍitehi abhidhāne pi evam eva atthī atthaḥ pana aññathā cintetabbaḥ imasmin vā atthe

original: rakārassa dakāro kātabbo. Maṃsena misso, lakkhito vā karambako maṃsakarambako. Na
analyzed: rakārassa dakāraḥ kātabbaḥ maṃsena missaḥ lakkhitaḥ vā karambakaḥ maṃsa karambakaḥ na

original: pavāretīti yesaṃ kesañci missakattā na pavāreti. Pavāretīti maṃsena missitattā pavāreti.
analyzed: pavāreti iti yesam kesañci missaka ttā na pavāreti pavāreti iti maṃsena missita ttā pavāreti

original: Yo pana paṭikkhipati, so pavāritova hotīti yojanā. Nimantaneti nimantanaṭṭhāne. Hīti
analyzed: yaḥ pana paṭikkhipati saḥ pavāritaḥ iva hoti iti yojanā nimantana iti nimantana ṭṭhāne hi iti

original: saccaṃ. Tatthāti kurundiyaṃ. Yenāti yena bhattena. Etthāti “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”tiādivacane.
analyzed: saccam tattha ati kurundiyam yena ati yena bhattena ettha ati yāgum gaṇhatha ati ādi vacane

original: Adhippāyoti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ adhippāyo. Etthāti “yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādivacane.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ ti aṭṭhakathā cariyānam adhippāyaḥ ettha iti yāgu missakam gaṇhatha iti ādi vacane

original: Duddasanti dukkaraṃ dassanaṃ. Idañcāti “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”tivacanañca. Na samānetabbanti
analyzed: duddasanti dukkaram dassanam idam ca ati missakam gaṇhatha ativacanam ca na samānetabbanti

original: samaṃ na ānetabbaṃ, samānaṃ vā na kātabbaṃ. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Idaṃ panāti missakaṃ
analyzed: samam naḥ ānetabbam samānam vā na kātabbam hi iti saccam yasmai vai idam pana ati missakam

original: pana. Etthāti missake. Visuṃ katvāti rasakhīrasappīni āveṇiṃ katvā. Tanti rasādiṃ.
analyzed: pana ettha ati missake visum katvā ati rasa khīra sappīni āveṇim katvā rasa ādim

original: Kaddīyati maddīyatīti kaddamo. Undati pasavati vaḍḍhatīti udakaṃ. Undati vā kledanaṃ
analyzed: kaddīyati maddīyati iti kaddamaḥ undati pasavati vaḍḍhati iti udakam undati vā kledanam

original: karotīti udakaṃ, nilīne satte gupati rakkhatīti gumbo, guhati saṃvaratīti vā gumbo.
analyzed: karoti iti udakam nilīne satte gupati rakkhati iti gumbaḥ guhati saṃvarati iti vā gumbaḥ

original: Anupariyāyantenāti anukkamena parivattitvā āyantena. Tanti nāvaṃ vā setuṃ vā. Majjhanhikanti
analyzed: anupariyāyantena ati anukkamena parivattitvā āyantena tanti nāvam vā setum vā

original: ahassa majjhaṃ majjhanhaṃ, ahasaddassa nhādeso, majjhanhaṃ eva majjhanhikaṃ. Potthakesu
analyzed: ahassa majjham majjhanham aha saddassa nha ādesaḥ majjhanham eva majjhanhikam potthakesu

original: pana majjhantikanti pāṭho atthi, so apāṭhoyeva. Yo ṭhito pavāreti, tena ṭhiteneva
analyzed: pana majjhantikanti pāṭhaḥ atthi saḥ a pāṭhaḥ yā iva yaḥ ṭhitaḥ pavāreti tena ṭhitena iva

original: bhuñjitabbanti yojanā. Ānisadanti pīṭhe phuṭṭhaānisadamaṃsaṃ. Acāletvāti acāvetvā.
analyzed: bhuñjitabbanti yojanā ānisadanti pīṭhe phuṭṭha ānisada maṃsam a cāletvā ati a cāvetvā

original: Ayameva vā pāṭho. Upari ca passesu ca amocetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Adinnādāne viya ṭhānācāvanaṃ
analyzed: ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ upari ca passesu ca a mocetvā iti vuttam hoti adinnādāne viya ṭhāna ācāvanam

original: na veditabbaṃ. Saṃsaritunti saṃsabbituṃ. Nanti bhikkhuṃ.
analyzed: na veditabbam saṃsaritunti saṃsabbitum bhikkhum

original: Atirekaṃ ricati gacchatīti atirittaṃ, na atirittaṃ anatirittanti atthaṃ dassento
analyzed: atirekam ricati gacchati iti atirittam na atirittam an atirittam ti attham dassento

original: āha “na atiritta”nti. “Adhika”ntiiminā atirittasaddassa atisuññatthaṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: āha na atiritta nti adhika nti iminā atiritta saddassa ati suññattham nivatteti

original: Adhi hutvā eti pavattatīti adhikaṃ. Taṃ panāti anatirittaṃ pana hotīti sambandho.
analyzed: adhi hutvā eti pavattati iti adhikam tam pana ati anatirittam pana hoti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Tatthāti “akappiyakata”ntiādivacane. Vitthāro evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Tatthāti atirittaṃ
analyzed: tattha iti vitthāraḥ evam veditabbaḥ iti yojanā tattha iti atirittam

original: kātabbesu vatthūsu. Yaṃ phalaṃ vā yaṃ kandamūlādi vā akatanti yojanā. Akappiyabhojanaṃ
analyzed: kātabbesu vatthūsu yam phalam vā yam kanda mūla ādi vā yojanā akappiya bhojanam

original: vāti kuladūsakakammādīhi nibbattaṃ akappiyabhojanaṃ vā atthīti sambandho. Yoti vinayadharo
analyzed: vā ti kula dūsaka kamma ādīhi nibbattam akappiya bhojanam vā atthi iti sambandhaḥ yaḥ ti vinaya dharo

original: bhikkhu. Tena katanti yojanā. “Bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kata”ntivacanato
analyzed: bhikkhu tena katanti yojanā bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena katanti vacanato

original: bhuttāvinā apavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kattabbanti siddhaṃ. Tasmā pāto addhānaṃ
analyzed: bhuttāvinā apavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kattabban ti siddham tasmā pāto addhānam

original: gacchantesu dvīsu eko pavārito, tassa itaro piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ attanā
analyzed: gacchantesu dvīsu ekaḥ pavārito tassa itaraḥ piṇḍāya caritvā laddham bhikkham attanā

original: abhutvāpi “alametaṃ sabba”nti kātuṃ labhati eva. Yanti khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ. “Tadubhayampī”tiiminā
analyzed: a bhutvā api alam etam kātum labhati eva yanti khādanīya bhojanīyam tat ubhayam pi iti iminā

original: atirittañca atirittañca atirittaṃ, na atirittaṃ anatirittanti atthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: atirittam ca atirittam ca atirittam na atirittam an atirittam ti attham dasseti

original: Tassevāti anatirittasseva. Etthāti anatiritte, “kappiyakata”nti ādīsu sattasu vinayakammākāresu
analyzed: tassa eva ati an atirittassa iva ettha ati an atiritte ādīsu sattasu vinaya kamma ākāresu

original: vā. Anantareti vinayadharassa anantare āsane. Pattato nīharitvāti sambandho. Tatthevāti
analyzed: vā anantare ti vinaya dharassa anantare āsane pattataḥ nīharitvā ati sambandho tattha eva ati

original: bhuñjanaṭṭhāneyeva. Tassāti nisinnassa. Tenāti bhattaṃ ānentena bhikkhunā bhuñjitabbanti
analyzed: bhuñjana ṭṭhānā iya iva tassa ati nisinnassa tena ati bhattam ānentena bhikkhunā bhuñjitabbanti

original: yojanā. “Nisinnena bhikkhunā”ti kāritakammaṃ ānetabbaṃ. Kasmā “hatthaṃ dhovitvā”ti
analyzed: yojanāḥ nisinnena bhikkhunā ati kārita kammam ānetabbam kasmā hattham dhovitvā ati

original: vuttanti pucchanto āha “kasmā”ti. Hīti kāraṇaṃ. Yasmā akappiyaṃ hoti, tasmā hatthaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ti pucchantaḥ āha kasmā iti hi iti kāraṇam yasmai akappiyam hoti tasmai hattham

original: dhovitvāti mayā vuttanti adhippāyo. Tassāti bhattaṃ ānentassa. Yenāti vinayadharena.
analyzed: dhovitvā iti mayā vuttan ti adhippāyaḥ tassa āti bhattam ānentassa yena ati vinaya dharena

original: Puna yenāti evameva. Yañcāti khādanīyabhojanīyañca. Yena vinayadharena paṭhamaṃ akataṃ,
analyzed: puna yena ati evam eva yat ca ati khādanīya bhojanīyam ca yena vinaya dharena paṭhamam akatam

original: teneva kattabbaṃ. Yañca khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ paṭhamaṃ akataṃ, taññeva kattabbanti
analyzed: tena iva kattabbam yat ca khādanīya bhojanīyam paṭhamam a katam tat na eva kattabbanti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthāti paṭhamabhājane. Hīti saccaṃ. Paṭhamabhājanaṃ suddhaṃ dhovitvā
analyzed: vuttam hoti tattha ati paṭhama bhājane hi iti saccam paṭhama bhājanam suddham dhovitvā

original: katampi niddosameva. Tena bhikkhunāti pavāritena bhikkhunā.
analyzed: katam pi niddosam eva tena bhikkhunā ati pavāritena bhikkhunā

original: Kuṇḍepīti ukkhaliyampi. Sā hi kuḍati odanādiṃ dāhaṃ karotīti kuṇḍoti vuccati. Tanti
analyzed: kuṇḍe pi iti ukkhaliyam pi sā hi kuḍati odana ādim dāham karoti iti kuṇḍā iti vuccati tanti

original: atirittakataṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ. Yena panāti vinayadharena pana. Bhikkhuṃ nisīdāpentīti
analyzed: atiritta katam khādanīya bhojanīyam yena pana ati vinaya dharena pana bhikkhum nisīdāpenti iti

original: sambandho. Maṅgalanimantaneti maṅgalatthāya nimantanaṭṭhāne. Tatthāti maṅgalanimantane.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ maṅgala nimantane iti maṅgala atthāya nimantana ṭṭhāne tattha ati maṅgala nimantane

original: Karontenāti karontena vinayadharena.
analyzed: karontena ati karontena vinaya dharena

original: Gilānena bhuñjitāvasesameva na kevalaṃ gilānātirittaṃ nāma, gilānaṃ pana uddissa
analyzed: gilānena bhuñjita avasesam eva na kevalam gilāna atirittam nāma gilānam pana uddissa

original: ābhataṃ gilānātirittameva nāmāti dassento āha “na kevala”ntiādi. Yaṃkiñci gilānanti
analyzed: ābhatam gilāna atirittam eva nāma ati dassentaḥ āha na kevala ntiādi yaṃ kiñci gilāna nti

original: upasampannaṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā yaṃkiñci gilānaṃ. Yaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ asaṃsaṭṭhavasena
analyzed: upasampannam vā anupasampannam vā yaṃkiñci gilānam yam dukkaṭam vuttam tam a saṃsaṭṭha vasena

original: vuttanti yojanā. Anāhāratthāyāti pipāsacchedanaābādhavūpasamatthāya.
analyzed: vuttam ti yojanā anāhāra atthāya ati pipāsa chedana ābādha vūpasama tthāya

original: 241. Sati paccayeti ettha paccayassa sarūpaṃ dassetuṃ “pipāsāya satī”ti ca “ābādhe
analyzed: sati paccaye iti ettha paccayassa sarūpam dassetum pipāsāya sati iti ca ābādhe

original: satī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Tena tenāti sattāhakālikena ca yāvajīvikena ca. Tassāti ābādhassa.
analyzed: sati iti ca vuttam tena tena ati sattāha kālikena ca yāvajīvikena ca tassa ti ābādhassa

original: Idaṃ padaṃ “upasamanattha”nti ettha samudhātuyā sambandhe sambandho, yupaccayena
analyzed: idam padam ettha samu dhātuyā sambandhe sambandhaḥ yu paccayena

original: sambandhe kammanti daṭṭhabbanti. Pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: sambandhe kammanti daṭṭhabbanti pañcamam

analyzed: vikālabhojana sikkhāpadam

original: Bhūmibhāgeti avayaviādhāro, sannipatatīti sambandho. Naṭañca nāṭakañca naṭanāṭakāni.

original: sikkhāpadeti ūnavīsativassasikkhāpadassa tāva apaññattattā. Teti sattarasavaggiyā.

original: 249. “Vikāle”ti sāmaññena vuttepi visesakālova gahetabboti āha “kālo”tiādi. So cāti

analyzed: sūriyassa ati sīgha ttā vegena ṭhitam ajjhanhikam āha kukkuccakena pana

original: Avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmāti ettha vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Yanti khādanīyaṃ

original: hotīti yojanā. Seyyathidanti pucchāvācakanipātasamudāyo. Idaṃ khādanīyaṃ seyyathā

original: Tatthāti dvādasasu khādanīyesu, ādhāre bhummaṃ. Mūlati patiṭṭhāti ettha, etenāti

original: evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Mūlakamūlādīni lokasaṅketo padesatoyeva veditabbāni. Taṃ
analyzed: evam veditabbā iti yojanā mūlaka mūla ādīni veditabbāni tam

original: Sūpassa hitaṃ sūpeyyaṃ, sūpeyyaṃ paṇṇaṃ etesanti sūpeyyapaṇṇā, tesaṃ mūlāni sūpeyyapaṇṇamūlāni.

original: Khādanīyatthanti khādanīyassa, khādanīye vā vijjamānaṃ, khādanīyena vā kātabbaṃ kiccaṃ,
analyzed: khādanīyattham ti khādanīyassa khādanīye vā vijjamānam khādanīyena vā kātabbam kiccam

original: viya khādanīyatthapadassa uttarapadatthapadhānabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tattha khādanīyassa,

original: Yañhi pūvādikhādanīyaṃ khāditvā jighacchāharaṇaṃ hoti, tassa kiccaṃ kiccaṃ nāmāti

analyzed: pharamānesu aññesu pi janapadesu pharantiyā iva ati dassana ttham tesu tesu janapadesu iti

original: vicchāpadaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi bahūsu janapadesu pathavīrasaāporasasampattivasena

original: khādanīyatthabhojanīyatthaṃ pharamānampi na pamāṇanti dasseti. Tanti mūlaṃ. Hīti
analyzed: khādanīya attha bhojanīya attham na dasseti tanti mūlam hi iti

original: saccaṃ. Nāmasaññāsūti nāmasaṅkhātāsu saññāsu.

original: Yathā mūle lakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ kandādīsupi yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ dassitanti yojanā.

original: āha “yañceta”ntiādi. Yaṃ etaṃ aṭṭhavidhanti sambandho.

original: Evaṃ mūlakhādanīye vinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni kandakhādanīye taṃ dassento āha “kandakhādanīye”tiādi.
analyzed: evam mūla khādanīye vinicchayam dassetvā idāni kanda khādanīye tam dassentaḥ āha kanda khādanīya itiādi

original: Tattha kandakhādanīyeti kaṃ sukhaṃ dadātīti kando, padumādikando, sukhassa adāyakā

original: vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Eseva nayo uparipi. Yanti kandaṃ. Iminā taṃsaddānapekkho

original: yathāvacanaṃ uparipi yojetabbāni. Evamādayo pharaṇakakandā yāvakālikāti sambandho.
analyzed: yathāvacanam evamādayaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: Adhototi visaraso udakena adhūnito. Teti kandā saṅgahitāti sambandho.
analyzed: visa rasaḥ udakena kandā saṅgahitā iti sambandhaḥ

original: Mūle alati pavattatīti muḷālo, udakato vā uddhaṭamatte milati nimilatīti muḷālaṃ.
analyzed: mūle alati pavattati iti muḷālaḥ udakataḥ vā uddhaṭa matte milati nimilati iti muḷālam

original: Evamādi pharaṇakamuḷālaṃ yāvakālikanti yojanā. Taṃ sabbampīti sabbampi taṃ muḷālaṃ
analyzed: evamādi pharaṇaka muḷālam yāvakālikanti yojanā tam sabbam pi iti sabbam pi tam muḷālam

original: saṅgahitanti sambandho.
analyzed: saṅgahitam iti sambandhaḥ

original: Masati vijjhatīti matthako. Evamādi matthako yāvakālikoti yojanā. Jaraḍḍhabundoti jarabhūtaaḍḍhasaṅkhāto pādo.
analyzed: masati vijjhati iti matthakaḥ evamādi matthakaḥ yāvakāliko iti yojanā jaraḍḍha bundo iti jara bhūta aḍḍha saṅkhāto pādo

original: Khanīyati avadārīyatīti khandho, khāyatīti vā khandho. “Antopathavīgato”tipadaṃ “sālakalyāṇikhandho”tipadeneva
analyzed: khanīyati avadārīyati iti khandho khāyati iti vā khandhaḥ antar upathavīgata iti padam sālakalyāṇikhandha iti padena iva

original: yojetabbaṃ, na aññehi. Evamādi khandho yāvakālikoti yojanā. Avasesāti tīhi daṇḍakādīhi avasesā.

original: Tacati saṃvarati paṭicchādetīti taco. Sarasoti ettha evakāro yojetabbo, saraso evāti
analyzed: tacati saṃvarati paṭicchādeti iti tacaḥ sarasaḥ iti ettha eva kāraḥ yojetabbo sarasaḥ eva ati

original: attho. Tesaṃ saṅgahoti sambandho. Hīti saccaṃ. Etanti kasāvabhesajjaṃ, “anujānāmi
analyzed: atthaḥ tesam saṅgahaḥ iti sambandhaḥ hi iti saccam etat ti kasāva bhesajjam anujānāmi

original: …pe… bhojanīyattha”nti vacanaṃ vā. Etthāti kasāvabhesajje. Etesampīti matthakakhandhattacānampi.
analyzed: pe bhojanīyatthanti vacanam vā ettha ati kasāva bhesajje etesam iti

original: Patatīti pattaṃ. Etesanti mūlakādīnaṃ. Evarūpāni pattāni ca ekaṃsena yāvakālikānīti
analyzed: patati iti pattam etesanti mūlaka ādīnam evarūpāni pattāni ca eka aṃsena yāva kālikāni iti

original: yojanā. Yā loṇī ārohati, tassā loṇiyā pattaṃ yāvajīvikanti yojanā. Dīpavāsinoti tambapaṇṇidīpavāsino,
analyzed: yojanā yā loṇī ārohati tassā loṇiyā pattam yāvajīvikam ti yojanā dīpa vāsinaḥ ti tamba paṇṇi dīpa vāsinaḥ

original: jambudīpavāsino vā. Yāni vā pharantīti vuttānīti sambandho. Tesanti nimbādīnaṃ. Idaṃ
analyzed: jambu dīpa vāsinaḥ vā yāni vā pharanti iti vuttāni iti sambandhaḥ nimba ādīnam idam

original: padaṃ pubbaparāpekkhakaṃ, tasmā dvinnaṃ majjhe vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṇṇānaṃ anto natthīti sambandho.
analyzed: padam pubba para apekkhakam tasmā dvinnam majjhe vuttanti daṭṭhabbam paṇṇānam antaḥ natthi iti sambandho

original: Pupphati vikasatīti pupphaṃ. Evamādi pupphaṃ yāvakālikanti yojanā. Tassāti pupphassa. Assāti evameva.
analyzed: pupphati vikasati iti puppham evamādi puppham yāvakālikanti yojanā tassa ati pupphassa assa ati evam eva

original: Phalatīti phalaṃ. Yānīti phalāni. Pharantīti sambandho. Nesanti phalānaṃ pariyantanti
analyzed: phalati iti phalam yāni iti phalāni pharanti iti sambandhaḥ

original: sambandho. Yāni vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikānīti yojanā. Tesampīti phalānampi pariyantanti sambandho.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ yāni vuttāni tāni yāvajīvikāni iti yojanā tesam pi iti phalānam pi sambandhaḥ

original: Asīyati khipīyati, chaḍḍīyatīti vā aṭṭhi. Evamādīni pharaṇakāni aṭṭhīni yāvakālikānīti yojanā. Tesanti aṭṭhīnaṃ.
