original: dadamāneti sambandho. Evanti imehi dvīhākārehi. Ādīyamānanti sambandho. Rathareṇumpīti

original: Tatthāti “kāyenā”tiādivacane. Hīti saccaṃ. Natthu karīyati imāyāti natthukaraṇī,

analyzed: paṭibaddho kāya paṭibaddhaḥ kaṭacchu ādi iti āha kaṭacchu ādīsu utiādi hi iti saccam pātiyamānam ti

original: Etthāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade. “Pañcahaṅgehī”ti padassa vitthāraṃ dassento āha “thāmamajjhimassā”tiādi. Tanti dātabbavatthuṃ.
analyzed: ettha iti imasmim sikkhāpade pañca haṅgehi iti padassa vitthāram dassentaḥ āha thāma majjhimassa atiādi tanti dātabba vatthum

original: bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa. Ākāsaṭṭhassāti ākāse ṭhitassa. “Hatthaṃ aṅga”nti padehi avayavisambandho

original: kātabbo. Vuttanayenevāti “bhūmaṭṭhassa ca sīsenā”tiādinā vuttanayeneva. Pakkhīti
analyzed: kātabbaḥ vutta nayena iva āti bhūmaṭṭhassa ca sīsena atiādinā vutta nayena iva pakkhī iti

original: sakuṇo. So hi pakkhayuttattā pakkhīti vuccati. Hatthīti kuñjaro. So hi soṇḍasaṅkhātahatthayuttattā

original: hatthīti vuccati. Addhena aṭṭhamaṃ ratanamassāti addhaṭṭhamaratano, hatthī, tassa. Tenāti hatthinā.

original: Eko dāyako vadatīti sambandho. Oṇamatīti heṭṭhā namati. Ettāvatāti ekadesasampaṭicchanamattena.

original: Tiṃsa hatthā ratanāni imassāti tiṃsahattho, veṇu. Guḷakumbhoti phāṇitena pūrito ghaṭo.

analyzed: vā nisinnena vā nipannena vā dāyakena sambandhaḥ

original: Pathaviyaṃ ṭhitā hontīti sambandho. Yaṃ yanti yaṃ yaṃ pattaṃ. Yattha katthacīti yesu kesucīti sambandho. Tanti taṃ vacanaṃ.
analyzed: pathaviyam ṭhitāḥ honti iti sambandhaḥ yam yanti yam yam pattam yattha katthaci iti yesu kesuci iti sambandhaḥ tanti tam vacanam

analyzed: hi iti saccam yasmai vā tattha jātake na ruhati yathā evam na yojanā

original: tintiṇikādipaṇṇāni. Sandhāretunti sammā dhāretuṃ. Ṭhito dāyakoti sambandho.

original: Kañjikanti bilaṅgaṃ. Tañhi kena jalena añjiyaṃ abhibyattaṃ assāti “kañjiya”nti vuccati,
analyzed: kañjikanti bilaṅgam tat hi kena jalena añjiyam abhibyattam assa ati kañjiyanti vuccati

original: yasmiṃ ṭhāne. Sukkhameva bhattaṃ bhajitabbaṭṭhena sevitabbaṭṭhenāti sukkhabhattaṃ,

analyzed: phusanti iti phusitāni iti vuccanti

original: Uḷuṅkoti kosiyasakuṇanāmo dīghadaṇḍako eko bhājanaviseso, tena. Thevāti phusitāni.

original: Carukenāti carīyati bhakkhīyatīti caru, habyapāko, taṃ karoti anenāti carukaṃ, thālyādikaṃ

original: khuddakabhājanaṃ, tena ākiriyamāneti sambandho. Kāḷavaṇṇakāmehi mānīyatīti masi.

original: Khādatīti chāro khakārassa chakāraṃ, dakārassa ca rakāraṃ katvā, khāraraso, so imissatthīti
analyzed: khādati iti chāraḥ khakārassa chakāram dakārassa ca rakāram katvā khāra rasaḥ saḥ imissa atthi iti

original: chārikā. Uppatitvāti uddhaṃ gantvā. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā.

original: Phāletvāti chinditvā. Dentānaṃ anupasampannānanti sambandho. Pāyāsassāti pāyāsena. Tathāpīti tena mukhavaṭṭiyā gahaṇākārenapi.
analyzed: phāletvā iti chinditvā anupasampannānam ti sambandhaḥ pāyāsassa ati pāyāsena tathā api iti tena mukhavaṭṭiyā gahaṇa ākārena api

original: Ābhogaṃ katvāti “paṭiggahessāmī”ti manasikāraṃ katvā. Soti niddaṃ okkanto bhikkhu.

original: Vaṭṭatiyevāti ābhogassa katattā vaṭṭatiyeva. Anādaranti anādarena, karaṇatthe cetaṃ

original: kāyapaṭibaddho, tena paṭibaddho kāyapaṭibaddhapaṭibaddho, tena. Vacanamattamevāti
analyzed: kāya paṭibaddhaḥ tena paṭibaddhaḥ kāya paṭibaddha paṭibaddhaḥ tena vacana mattam eva ati

original: “paṭibaddhapaṭibaddha”nti ekaṃ atirekaṃ paṭibaddhavacanamattameva nānaṃ, atthato
analyzed: paṭibaddha paṭibaddhanti ekam atirekam paṭibaddha vacana mattam eva nānam atthato

original: pana kāyapaṭibaddhamevāti adhippāyo. Yampīti yampi vatthu. Tatrāti tasmiṃ vaṭṭane. Tanti anujānanaṃ.

original: Neyyo adhippāyaṃ netvā ñāto attho imassāti neyyatthaṃ. Etthāti sutte, suttassa vā.
analyzed: neyyaḥ adhippāyam netvā ñātaḥ atthaḥ imassa ati ettha ati sutte suttassa vā

original: Yanti vatthu patatīti sambandho. Parigaḷitvāti bhassitvā. Suddhāyāti nirajāya. Sāmanti
analyzed: yanti vatthu patati iti sambandhaḥ parigaḷitvā ati bhassitvā suddhāya ati nirajāya

original: sayaṃ. Puñchitvā vātiādīsu tayo vāsaddā aniyamavikappatthā. Puñchitādīsu hi ekasmiṃ

original: kicce kate itarakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Tenāti tena bhikkhunā, “āharāpetumpī”tipade
analyzed: kicce kate itara kiccam kātabbam natthi iti adhippāyaḥ tena ati tena bhikkhunā

original: kāritakammaṃ. “Kasmā na vaṭṭatī”ti pucchā. Hīti vitthāro. Vadantena bhagavatāti sambandho.
analyzed: kārita kammam kasmā na vaṭṭati iti pucchā hi iti vitthāraḥ vadantena bhagavatā ati sambandho

original: Etthāti suttavacanesu. “Pariccattaṃ taṃ bhikkhave dāyakehī”ti vacanenāti yojanā.
analyzed: ettha ati sutta vacanesu pariccattam tam bhikkhave dāyakehi iti vacanena ati yojanā

original: Adhippāyoti nītattho adhippāyo, nippariyāyena itattho ñātattho adhippāyoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ iti nīta atthaḥ adhippāyaḥ nippariyāyena i tatthaḥ ñā tatthaḥ adhippāyaḥ iti vuttam hoti

original: Evaṃ nītatthamadhippāyaṃ dassetvā neyyattha, madhippāyaṃ dassento āha “yasmā cā”ti
analyzed: evam nīta attham adhippāyam dassetvā neyya attham adhippāyam dassentaḥ āha yasmā ca ati

original: ādi. Tanti paribhuñjanaṃ anuññātanti sambandho. Dutiyadivasepīti pisaddo sampiṇḍanattho,
analyzed: ādi tanti paribhuñjanam anuññātanti sambandhaḥ dutiya divase pi iti pi saddaḥ sampiṇḍana attho

original: aparadivasepīti attho. Adhippāyoti neyyattho adhippāyo netvā iyyattho ñātattho adhippāyoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: apara divase pi iti atthaḥ adhippāyo ti neyyatthaḥ adhippāyaḥ netvā iyyatthaḥ ñātatthaḥ adhippāyo ti vuttam hoti

original: Bhuñjantānaṃ bhikkhūnanti sambandho. Hīti vitthāro. Dantāti dasanā. Te hi daṃsīyanti
analyzed: bhuñjantānam bhikkhūnanti sambandhaḥ hi iti vitthāraḥ danta ati dasanā te hi daṃsīyanti

analyzed: bhakkhīyanti etehi iti dantāḥ ti vuccanti sattham yeva satthakam khudda kaṭṭhena tena

original: paṭiggahitena satthakena. Etanti malaṃ. Tanti lohagandhamattaṃ. Pariharantīti paṭiggahetvā
analyzed: paṭiggahitena satthakena etanti malam tanti loha gandha mattam pariharanti iti paṭiggahetvā

original: haranti. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Taṃ satthakaṃ paribhogatthāya yasmā na pariharanti,
analyzed: haranti hi iti saccam yasmai vā tam satthakam paribhoga tthāya yasmai na pariharanti

original: tasmā eseva nayoti attho. Uggahitapaccayā, sannidhipaccayā vā doso natthīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: tasmai esa iva nayo ti atthaḥ uggahita paccayā sannidhi paccayā vā doso natthi iti vuttam

original: hoti. Tatthāti tesu takkakhīresu. Nīlikāti nīlavaṇṇā snehā. Āmakatakkādīsūti apakkesu takkakhīresu.
analyzed: hoti tattha ati tesu takka khīresu nīlikā ati nīla vaṇṇā snehā āmaka takka ādīsu iti apakkesu takka khīresu

original: Kiliṭṭhaudakanti samalaṃ udakaṃ. Tassāti sāmaṇerassa. Pattagataṃ odananti sambandho.
analyzed: kiliṭṭhaudakanti sa malam udakam tassa āti sāmaṇerassa patta gatam odanam ti sambandhaḥ

original: Assāti sāmaṇerassa. Uggahitakoti avagahitako. “Uññāto”tiādīsu viya ukāro okāraviparīto
analyzed: assa ati sāmaṇerassa uggahitako ti avagahitako uññāto ti ādīsu viya ukāro okāra viparītaḥ

original: hoti, apaṭiggahetvā gahitattā duggahitakoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: hoti a paṭiggahetvā gahita ttā duggahitako ti vuttam hoti

original: Etenāti odanena. Paṭiggahitameva hoti hatthato amuttattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: etena āti odanena paṭiggahitam eva hoti hatthataḥ amutta ttā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Puna paṭiggahetabbaṃ sāpekkhe satīti adhippāyo. Ettoti ito pattato. Sāmaṇero pakkhipatīti
analyzed: puna paṭiggahetabbam sa apekkhe sati iti adhippāyaḥ ettas ti itas pattataḥ sāmaṇeraḥ pakkhipati iti

original: sambandho. Tatoti pattato. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Tanti “puna paṭiggahetabba”nti
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tatas ti pattataḥ keci iti abhayagiri vāsino puna paṭiggahetabbanti

original: vadantānaṃ kesañci ācariyānaṃ vacanaṃ veditabbanti sambandho. Yanti pūvabhattādi.
analyzed: vadantānam ācariyānam vacanam veditabbanti sambandhaḥ pūvabhatta ādi

original: Attano vāti sāmaṇerassa vā. Sāmaṇerāti āmantanaṃ. Tassāti sāmaṇerassa. Bhājaneti
analyzed: attanaḥ vā ati sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇera ati āmantanam tassa ati sāmaṇerassa bhājane iti

original: yāgupacanakabhājane. Yāgukuṭanti yāguyā pūritaṃ kuṭaṃ. Tanti yāgukuṭaṃ. “Bhikkhunā
analyzed: yāgu pacanaka bhājane yāguyā pūritam kuṭam yāgu kuṭam bhikkhunā

original: paṭiggaṇhāpetu”nti kāritakammaṃ upanetabbaṃ. Gīvaṃ ṭhapetvā āvajjetīti sambandho.
analyzed: paṭiggaṇhāpetunti kārita kammam upanetabbam gīvam ṭhapetvā āvajjeti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Āvajjetīti pariṇāmeti.
analyzed: āvajja iti iti pariṇāma iti

original: Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāranti thāmamajjhimena purisena saṃhārimaṃ bhāraṃ. Balavatā sāmaṇerenāti
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇa upagam bhāranti thāma majjhimena purisena saṃhārimam bhāram balavatā sāmaṇerena ati

original: sambandho. Telaghaṭaṃ vāti telena pakkhittaṃ ghaṭaṃ vā. Laggentīti lambenti. Ayameva vā pāṭho.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tela ghaṭam vā ti telena pakkhittam ghaṭam vā laggenti iti lambenti ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ

original: Nāgassa danto viyāti nāgadantako, sadisatthe ko. Aṅkīyate lakkhīyate anenāti aṅkuso,
analyzed: nāgassa dantaḥ viyā ti nāgadantakaḥ sadisatthe kaḥ aṅkīyate lakkhīyate anena ati aṅkusaḥ

original: gajamatthakamhi vijjhanakaṇḍako. Aṅkuso viyāti aṅkusako, tasmiṃ aṅkusake vā laggitā
analyzed: gajamatthakamhi vijjhana kaṇḍakaḥ aṅkusaḥ viyāti aṅkusakaḥ tasmin aṅkusake vā laggitā

original: hontīti sambandho. Gaṇhatoti gaṇhantassa. Mañcassa heṭṭhā heṭṭhāmañco, tasmiṃ. Tanti telathālakaṃ.
analyzed: honti iti sambandhaḥ gaṇhatoti gaṇhantassa mañcassa heṭṭhā heṭṭhāmañcaḥ tasmin tanti

original: Ārohantehi ca orohantehi ca niccaṃ sevīyatīti nisseṇī, tassā majjhaṃ nisseṇimajjhaṃ,
analyzed: ārohantehi ca orohantehi ca niccam sevīyati iti nisseṇī tassāḥ majjham nisseṇi majjham

original: tasmiṃ. Kaṇṇe uṭṭhitaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ, kaṇṇamalaṃ, kaṇṇikaṃ viya kaṇṇikaṃ, yathā hi kaṇṇamalaṃ
analyzed: tasmin kaṇṇe uṭṭhitam kaṇṇikam kaṇṇa malam kaṇṇikam viya kaṇṇikam yathā hi kaṇṇa malam

original: kaṇṇato uṭṭhahitvā sayaṃ pavattati, evaṃ telādito uṭṭhahitvā sayaṃ pavattatīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: kaṇṇataḥ uṭṭhahitvā sayam pavattati evam tela āditaḥ uṭṭhahitvā sayam pavattati iti vuttam

original: hoti. Ghanacuṇṇanti kathinacuṇṇaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhānameva nāmāti tato telādito samuṭṭhānameva
analyzed: hoti ghana cuṇṇam ti kathina cuṇṇam tat samuṭṭhānam eva nāma ati tatas tela āditaḥ samuṭṭhānam eva

original: nāma hotīti attho. Etanti kaṇṇikādi. Idaṃ padaṃ pubbāparāpekkhaṃ.
analyzed: nāma hoti iti atthaḥ etat ti kaṇṇikā ādi idam padam pubba apara apekkham

original: Yottenāti rajjunā. Añño detīti sambandho.
analyzed: rajjunā aññaḥ deti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Pavisante ca nikkhamante ca varati āvarati imāyāti vati, taṃ. Ucchūti rasālo. So
analyzed: pavisante ca nikkhamante ca varati āvarati tam ucchūti rasālo so

original: hi usati visaṃ dāhetīti ucchūti vuccati, taṃ. Timbarusakanti tindukaṃ. Tañhi temeti
analyzed: hi visam dāheti iti vuccati tam timbarusakanti tindukam tat hi temeti

original: bhuñjantaṃ puggalaṃ addeti rasenāti timbo, rusati khudditaṃ nāsetīti rusako, timbo
analyzed: bhuñjantam puggalam addeti rasena ati timbaḥ rusati khudditam nāseti iti rusakaḥ timbaḥ

original: ca so rusako cāti “timbarusako”ti vuccati, taṃ. Vatidaṇḍakesūti vatiyā atthāya nikkhaṇitesu
analyzed: ca so rusako ca ati timbarusako ti vuccati tam vati daṇḍakesu ti vatiyā atthāya nikkhaṇitesu

original: daṇḍakesu. Mayaṃ panāti saṅgahakārācariyabhūtā buddhaghosanāmakā mayaṃ pana, attānaṃ
analyzed: daṇḍakesu mayam pana ati saṅgaha kārācariya bhūtāḥ buddhaghosa nāmakāḥ mayam pana attānam

original: sandhāya bahuvacanavasena vuttaṃ. Na puthulo pākāroti aḍḍhateyyahatthapāsānatikkamaṃ
analyzed: sandhāya bahuvacana vasena vuttam na puthulaḥ pākāraḥ iti aḍḍhateyya hattha pāsa anatikkamam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Hatthasatampīti ratanasatampi.
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam hattha satam pi iti ratana satam pi

original: Soti sāmaṇero. Bhikkhussa detīti yojanā. Aparoti sāmaṇero.
analyzed: saḥ ti sāmaṇeraḥ bhikkhussa deti iti yojanā aparaḥ ti sāmaṇero

original: Phalaṃ imissatthīti phalinī, inapaccayo itthiliṅgajotako ī, taṃ sākhanti yojanā.
analyzed: phalam imissa atthi iti phalinī ina paccayo itthi liṅga jotakaḥ ī tam sākhanti yojanā

original: Phalinisākhanti samāsatopi pāṭho atthi. Macchikavāraṇatthanti madhuphāṇitādīhi makkhanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: phali nisākham ti samāsatas pi pāṭhaḥ atthi macchika vāraṇattham ti madhu phāṇita ādīhi makkhana ṭhāne

original: nilīyantīti makkhikā, tāyeva macchikā khakārassa chakāraṃ katvā, tāsaṃ nivāraṇāya.
analyzed: nilīyanti iti makkhikā tāya iva macchikā khakārassa chakāram katvā tāsam nivāraṇāya

original: Mūlapaṭiggahamevāti mūle paṭiggahaṇameva, paṭhamapaṭiggahamevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: mūla paṭiggaham eva ati mūle paṭiggahaṇam eva paṭhama paṭiggaham eva ati vuttam hoti

original: Bhikkhu gacchatīti sambandho. Arittenāti kenipātena. Tañhi arati nāvā gacchati anenāti
analyzed: bhikkhu gacchati iti sambandhaḥ arittena ati kenipātena tat hi arati nāvā gacchati anena ati

original: arittaṃ, tena. Tanti paṭiggahaṇārahaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ. Anupasampannenāti kāritakammaṃ. Tasmimpīti
analyzed: arittam tena paṭiggahaṇa araham bhaṇḍam an upasampannena ati kārita kammam tasmim pi iti

original: cāṭikuṇḍakepi. Tanti anupasampannaṃ.
analyzed: cāṭikuṇḍake pi tanti anupasampannam

original: Pātheyyataṇḍuleti pathassa hite taṇḍule. Tesanti sāmaṇerānaṃ. Itarehīti bhikkhūhi
analyzed: pātheyya taṇḍule ti pathassa hite taṇḍule sāmaṇerānam itarehi iti bhikkhūhi

original: gahitataṇḍulehi. Sabbehi bhikkhūhi bhuttanti sambandho. Etthāti bhikkhūhi gahitehi
analyzed: gahita taṇḍulehi sabbehi bhikkhūhi bhuttanti sambandhaḥ ettha ati bhikkhūhi gahitehi

original: sāmaṇerassa taṇḍulehi yāgupacane na dissatīti sambandho. Kāraṇanti parivattetvā bhuttassa
analyzed: sāmaṇerassa taṇḍulehi yāgu pacane na dissati iti sambandhaḥ kāraṇam ti parivattetvā bhuttassa

original: ca aparivattetvā bhuttassa ca kāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: ca a parivattetvā bhuttassa ca kāraṇam

original: Bhattaṃ pacitukāmo sāmaṇeroti yojanā. Bhikkhunā āropetabbaṃ, aggi na kātabboti sambandho. Puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi mūle paṭiggahitattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: bhattam pacitu kāmaḥ sāmaṇeraḥ iti yojanā bhikkhunā āropetabbam aggi na kātabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ puna paṭiggahaṇa kiccam natthi mūle paṭiggahita ttā ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Assāti sāmaṇerassa. Tatoti aggijālanato.
analyzed: assa ati sāmaṇerassa tatas ti aggijālanataḥ

original: Tatte udaketi udake tāpe. Tatoti taṇḍulapakkhipanato.
analyzed: tat te udaka iti udake tāpe tatoti taṇḍula pakkhipanato

original: Pidhānanti ukkhalipidhānaṃ. Tassevāti hatthakukkuccakassa bhikkhuno eva. Dabbiṃ vāti kaṭacchuṃ vā. So hi darīyati viloḷīyati imāyāti dabbīti vuccati.
analyzed: pidhānanti ukkhali pidhānam tassa iva ati hattha kukkuccakassa bhikkhunaḥ eva dabbim vā ati kaṭacchum vā so hi darīyati viloḷīyati imāya ati dabbī iti vuccati

original: Tatrāti tasmiṃ ṭhapane. Tassevāti lolabhikkhusseva. Tatoti pattato. Puna tatoti sākhādito. Tatthāti phalarukkhe.
analyzed: tatra ati tasmin ṭhapane tassa iva ati lola bhikkhussa iva tatoti pattataḥ puna tatoti sa ākhādito tattha ati phala rukkhe

original: Vitakkaṃ sodhetunti “mayhampi dassatī”ti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ. Tatoti ambaphalādito.
analyzed: vitakkam sodhetunti mayham pi dassati iti vitakkam sodhetum tatas ti amba phala āditaḥ

original: Puna tatoti mātāpitūnamatthāya gahitatelādito. Teti mātāpitaro. Tatoyevāti tehiyeva taṇḍulehi sampādetvāti sambandho.
analyzed: puna tato ti mātā pitūnam atthāya te iti mātā pitaraḥ tatoyeva ati tehi yeva taṇḍulehi sampādetvā ati sambandho

original: Etthāti tāpitaudake. Amuñcanteneva hatthenāti yojanā. Aṅganti vināsaṃ gacchantīti aṅgārā. Darīyanti phalīyantīti dārūni.
analyzed: ettha ati tāpita audake a muñcantena iva hatthena ati yojanāḥ aṅganti vināsam gacchanti iti aṅgārāḥ darīyanti phalīyanti iti dārūni

original: Vutto sāmaṇeroti yojanā.
analyzed: vutto sāmaṇeraḥ iti yojanā

original: Gavati paribhuñjantānaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ saddaṃ karotīti guḷo, guḷati visato jīvitaṃ rakkhatīti vā guḷo, taṃ bhājento bhikkhūti sambandho. Tassāti lolasāmaṇerassa.
analyzed: gavati paribhuñjantānam vissaṭṭham saddam karoti iti guḷaḥ guḷati visataḥ jīvitam rakkhati iti vā guḷaḥ tam bhājentaḥ bhikkhū ti sambandho tassa ati lola sāmaṇerassa

original: Dhūmassatthāya vaṭṭīyati vaṭṭitvā karīyatīti dhūmavaṭṭi, taṃ. Mukhīyati viparīyatīti mukhaṃ. Kaṃ vuccati sīsaṃ, taṃ tiṭṭhati etthāti kaṇṭho.
analyzed: dhūmaḥ satthāya vaṭṭīyati vaṭṭitvā karīyati iti dhūmavaṭṭi tam mukhīyati viparīyati iti mukham kam vuccati sīsam tam tiṭṭhati ettha ati kaṇṭhaḥ

original: Bhattuggāroti uddhaṃ girati niggiratīti uggāro, bhattameva uggāro bhattuggāro, uggārabhattanti attho. Dantantareti dantavivare.
analyzed: bhattuggāro ti uddham girati niggirati iti uggāraḥ bhattam eva uggāraḥ bhattuggāraḥ uggāra bhattanti atthaḥ dantantare iti danta vivare

original: Upakaṭṭhe kāleti āsanne majjhanhike kāle. Kakkhāretvāti sañcitvā. Tassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: upakaṭṭhe kāleti āsanne majjhanhike kāle kakkhāretvā iti sañcitvā tassa attham dassetum

original: vuttaṃ “dve tayo kheḷapiṇḍe pātetvā”ti. Phaḷusaṅkhātaṃ siṅgaṃ visāṇaṃ asmiṃ atthīti
analyzed: vuttam dve tayo kheḷa piṇḍe pātetvā ati phaḷu saṅkhātam siṅgam visāṇam asmin atthi iti

original: siṅgī, soyeva kaṭukabhayehi viramitabbattā siṅgīveroti vuccati. Aṅkīyati rukkho navaṃ
analyzed: siṅgī soyā iva kaṭuka bhayehi viramitabba ttā siṅgīveraḥ ti vuccati aṅkīyati rukkhaḥ navam

original: uggatoti lakkhīyati etehīti aṅkurā, samaṃ loṇena udakaṃ, samaṃ vā udakena loṇaṃ asminti
analyzed: uggataḥ ti lakkhīyati etehi iti aṅkurā samam loṇena udakam samam vā udakena loṇam asmin ti

original: samuddo, tassa udakaṃ avayavīavayavabhāvenāti samuddodakaṃ, tena apaṭiggahitenāti
analyzed: samuddaḥ tassa udakam avayavī avayava bhāvena ati samuddodakam tena a paṭiggahitena ati

original: sambandho. Phāṇati guḷato thaddhabhāvaṃ gacchatīti phāṇitaṃ. Karena hatthena gahitabbāti
analyzed: sambandhaḥ phāṇati guḷataḥ thaddha bhāvam gacchati iti phāṇitam karena hatthena gahitabbā ati

original: karakā, vassopalaṃ, karena gaṇhitumarahāti attho. Katakaṭṭhināti katakanāmakassa
analyzed: karakā vassopalam karena gaṇhitum arahā iti attho kataka ṭṭhinā ti kataka nāmakassa

original: ekassa rukkhavisesassa aṭṭhinā. Tanti udakaṃ. Kapitthoti ekassa ambilaphalassa rukkhavisesassa nāmaṃ.
analyzed: ekassa rukkha visesassa aṭṭhinā tanti udakam kapittho ti ekassa ambila phalassa rukkha visesassa nāmaṃ

original: Bahalanti āvilaṃ. Sanditvāti visanditvā. Kakudhasobbhādayoti kakudharukkhasamīpe ṭhitā sobbhādayo. Rukkhatoti kakudharukkhato. Parittanti appakaṃ.
analyzed: bahalam ti āvilam sanditvā ati visanditvā kakudha sobbha ādayo ti kakudha rukkha samīpe ṭhitā sobbha ādayaḥ rukkhataḥ ti kakudha rukkhataḥ parittanti appakam

original: Pānīyaghaṭe pakkhittāni hontīti sambandho. Tanti vāsamattaṃ udakaṃ. Tatthevāti ṭhapitapupphavāsitapānīyeyeva.
analyzed: pānīya ghaṭe pakkhittāni honti iti sambandhaḥ tanti vāsa mattam udakam tattha iva āti ṭhapita puppha vāsita pānīyeya iva

original: Ṭhapitaṃ dantakaṭṭhanti sambandho. Ajānantassa bhikkhussāti yojanā. Anādare cetaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapitam dantakaṭṭham ti sambandhaḥ a jānantassa bhikkhussa ati yojanā anādare ca itam

original: sāmivacanaṃ. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā.
analyzed: sāmi vacanam hi iti yasmai vā

original: Kiṃ mahābhūtaṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ na vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Yaṃ panāti mahābhūtaṃ pana. Aṅgalagganti
analyzed: kim mahābhūtam vaṭṭati kim na vaṭṭati iti yojanā yam pana ati mahābhūtam pana

original: aṅgesu laggaṃ, mahābhūtanti sambandho. Etthāti sede. Sujhāpitanti aṅgārasadisaṃ katvā suṭṭhu jhāpitaṃ.
analyzed: aṅgesu laggam mahābhūtanti sambandho ettha ati sede su jhāpitanti aṅgāra sadisam katvā suṭṭhu jhāpitam

analyzed: aṭṭhakathā cariyena balassa aggam jānanti ettha ati balaggam ti vacana tthassa piṇḍa ttho

original: ca ñāpīyati, “balaṃ gaṇīyati etthāti balagga”nti vacanattho ca dassīyati. Viyūhīyate
analyzed: ca ñāpīyati balam gaṇīyati ettha ati vacana atthaḥ ca dassīyati viyūhīyate

original: sampiṇḍīyate byūho, senāya byūho senābyūhoti atthaṃ dasseti “senāya viyūha”ntiādinā.

original: Aṇati bheravasaddaṃ karotīti aṇīkaṃ, muddhajaṇakāro, hatthīyeva aṇīkaṃ hatthāṇīkaṃ.
analyzed: bherava saddam karoti iti aṇīkam muddha jaṇa kāraḥ aṇīkam hattha aṇīkam

original: Eseva nayo sesesupi. Yo hatthī pubbe vutto, tena hatthināti yojanāti. Dasamaṃ.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ sesesu pi yaḥ hatthī pubbe vuttaḥ tena hatthinā ati yojanā ati dasamam

original: Acelakavaggo pañcamo.
analyzed: acelaka vaggaḥ pañcamaḥ

original: 6. Surāpānavaggo
analyzed: surā pāna vaggo

original: 1. Surāpānasikkhāpada-atthayojanā
326. Surāpānavaggassa paṭhame bhaddā vati etthāti bhaddavatikāti ca, bhaddā vati

analyzed: bhaddavati sā ettha atthi iti bhaddavatikā iti ca attham dassentaḥ āha so ti ādi so ti

analyzed: gāmaḥ patham gacchanti iti pathāvinā iti kate addhikāya iva ati āha addhikā iti

analyzed: sambandha apekkhāni ca honti padānam samāna ttā sambandhaḥ ca samānaḥ ti maññitum sakkuṇeyyā

analyzed: ca honti tasmā tesam sambandham ca tassa asamāna tañca dassetum vuttam attanaḥ tejasā

original: nāgassa teja”nti. “Ānubhāvenā”tiiminā pana tejasaddassa atthaṃ dasseti. Kapotassa
analyzed: nāgassa tejanti ānubhāvena ati iminā pana teja saddassa attham dasseti kapotassa

original: pādo kapoto upacārena, tassa eso kāpoto, vaṇṇo. Kāpoto viya vaṇṇo assāti kāpotikāti
analyzed: pādaḥ kapotaḥ upacārena tassa eso kāpotaḥ vaṇṇo kāpotaḥ viya vaṇṇaḥ assa ati kāpotikā ati

original: dassento āha “kapotapādasamavaṇṇarattobhāsā”ti. Pasannasaddassa pasādasaddhādayo
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha kapota pāda sama vaṇṇa rattobhāsā ti pasanna saddassa pasāda saddhā ādayaḥ

original: samānassa sāgatassāti yojanā.
analyzed: samānassa sāgatassa ati yojanā

original: 328. “Madhukapupphādīnaṃ rasena kato”tiiminā pupphānaṃ rasena kato āsavo pupphāsavoti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Esa nayo “phalāsavo”tiādīsupi. Surāmerayānaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ

original: vuttaṃ “surā nāmā”tiādi. Piṭṭhakiṇṇapakkhittāti piṭṭhena ca kiṇṇena ca pakkhittā

original: katāti surā. Madaṃ janetīti merayaṃ.
analyzed: katāti surāḥ madam jana iti iti merayam

original: 329. Loṇasovīrakanti evaṃnāmakaṃ pānaṃ. Suttantipi evameva. Tasminti sūpasaṃpāke.
analyzed: evaṃnāmakam pānam evam eva tasmin ti sūpa saṃpāke

original: Telaṃ pana pacantīti sambandho. Natthi tikhiṇaṃ majjaṃ etthāti atikhiṇamajjaṃ, atikhiṇamajje

original: tasmiṃyeva teleti attho. Yaṃ panāti telaṃ pana. Tikhiṇaṃ majjaṃ imassa telassāti

original: tikhiṇamajjaṃ. Yatthāti tele. Ariṭṭhoti evaṃnāmakaṃ bhesajjaṃ. Tanti ariṭṭhaṃ, “sandhāyā”tipade
analyzed: tikhiṇa majjam yattha ati tele ariṭṭhā ti evaṃnāmakam bhesajjam tanti ariṭṭham sandhāya atipade

original: avuttakammaṃ. Etanti “amajjaṃ ariṭṭha”ntivacanaṃ, “vutta”ntipade vuttakammanti. Paṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: a vutta kammam etat ti amajjam ariṭṭha nti vacanam vutta nti pade vutta kammanti paṭhamam

original: 2. Aṅgulipatodakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: aṅguli patodaka sikkhāpadam

original: 330. Dutiye aṅgulīhi patujjanaṃ aṅgulipatodo, soyeva aṅgulipatodakoti dassento āha
analyzed: dutiye aṅgulīhi patujjanam aṅguli patodaḥ soyā iva aṅguli patodakā ti dassentaḥ āha

original: “aṅgulīhī”tiādi. Uttantoti avatapanto. Avatapantoti ca atthato kilamantoyevāti āha
analyzed: aṅgulīhi itiādi uttanto ti avatapanto avatapantoti ca atthato āha

original: “kilamanto”ti. Kilamanto hutvāti yojanā. Assāsagahaṇena passāsopi gahetabboti āha
analyzed: kilamanto ti kilamantaḥ hutvā iti yojanā assāsa gahaṇena passāsaḥ api gahetabbo ti āha

original: 3. Hasadhammasikkhāpadaṃ

original: 335. Tatiye pakārena karīyati ṭhapīyatīti pakataṃ paññattanti dassento āha “yaṃ bhagavatā”tiādi. Yanti sikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: tatiye pakārena karīyati ṭhapīyati iti pakatam paññattanti dassentaḥ āha yam bhagavatā atiādi yanti sikkhāpadam

analyzed: hasa saṅkhātaḥ dhammo sabhāvaḥ hasa dhammo ti vutte atthataḥ kīḷikāya iva āti āha kīḷikā vuccati iti

original: 337. Gopphakānanti caraṇagaṇṭhikānaṃ. Te hi pāde pādaṃ ṭhapanakāle aññamaññūpari
analyzed: gopphakānam ti caraṇagaṇṭhikānam te hi pāde pādam ṭhapana kāle aññamaññu upari

original: ṭhapanakāle ekassa upari eko na ṭhapetabbo. Tenāha bhagavā “pāde pādaṃ accādhāyā”ti.

original: Oṭṭhajo dutiyo. Orohantassa bhikkhunoti sambandho.
analyzed: oṭṭhajaḥ dutiyaḥ orohantassa bhikkhuno ti sambandho

original: 338. Phiyārittādīhīti ādisaddena laṅkārādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Keci vadantīti sambandho.
analyzed: ādi saddena laṅkāra ādayaḥ saṅgaṇhāti keci vadanti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Patanuppatanavāresūti patanavāra uppatanavāresu. Tatthāti tassaṃ khittakathalāyaṃ.
analyzed: patana uppatana vāresu iti patana vāre uppatana vāresu tattha ati tassam khittakathalāyam

original: Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Ṭhapetvā kīḷantassāti sambandho. Likhituṃ vaṭṭati kīḷādhippāyassa

original: virahitattāti adhippāyo. Kīḷādhippāyena atthajotakaṃ akkharaṃ likhantassāpi āpattiyevāti

original: vadanti. Etthāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpadeti. Tatiyaṃ.

original: 4. Anādariyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: anādariya sikkhāpadam

original: Vinaye apaññattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “apaññattenā”ti āha “sutte vā abhidhamme vā āgatenā”ti.

analyzed: sabbam tam vacanam paveṇiyā āgatā iti paveṇiyā āgata saṅkhāte mahā aṭṭhakathā vāde iti catuttham

analyzed: pañcame manussa viggahā iti manussa viggaha pārājikā iti pañcamam

original: 6. Jotisikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: joti sikkhāpadam

original: 354. “Samādahitukāmatāyā”tipadaṃ “araṇisaṇṭhāpanato”tipade hetu. Jālāti sikhā. Sā hi jalati dibbatīti jālāti vuccati.

original: Patilātaṃ ukkhipatīti ettha “patitālāta”nti vattabbe takāralopaṃ katvā sandhivasena

original: hutvā atiuṇhattā na lātabbaṃ na gaṇhitabbanti alātanti vuccati. Avijjhātanti jhāyanato

original: ḍayhanato avigataṃ alātanti sambandho. Jhāyanaṃ ḍayhanaṃ jhātaṃ, vigataṃ jhātaṃ imassālātassāti vijjhātaṃ.
analyzed: ḍayhanataḥ a vigatam alātam ti sambandhaḥ jhāyanam ḍayhanam jhātam vigatam jhātam imassa alātassa ati vijjhātam

original: 356. Padīpādīnīti padīpajotikādīni. Tatthāti tāsu duṭṭhavāḷamigaamanussasaṅkhātāsu āpadāsu nimittabhūtāsu. Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummavacananti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: padīpa ādīni iti padīpa jotikā ādīni tattha ati tāsu duṭṭha vāḷa miga amanussa saṅkhātāsu āpadāsu nimitta bhūtāsu nimitta atthe ca itam bhumma vacanan ti chaṭṭham

original: 7. Nahānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: nahāna sikkhāpadam

original: 366. Sattame pāraṃ gacchanto na kevalaṃ saudakāya nadiyā eva nhāyituṃ vaṭṭati, sukkhāya

original: khuddakaṭṭhena āvāṭakā, tesūti. Sattamaṃ.
analyzed: khuddaka ṭṭhena āvāṭakā tesu iti sattamam

original: 8. Dubbaṇṇakaraṇasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dubbaṇṇa karaṇa sikkhāpadam

original: 368. Aṭṭhame alabhīti labhoti vacanatthe apaccayaṃ katvā ṇapaccayassa svatthabhāvaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhame alabhi iti vacana atthe a paccayam katvā ṇa paccayassa su attha bhāvam

original: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “labhoyeva lābho”ti. Apaccayamakatvā pakatiyā ṇapaccayopi yuttoyevāti
analyzed: dassetum vuttam labhaḥ yeva lābhaḥ ti a paccayam a katvā pakatiyā ṇa paccayaḥ pi yuttaḥ yeva ati

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddantaropi atthantarābhāvā samāso hotīti āha “navacīvaralābhenāti vattabbe”ti.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam attha antarā api attha antara abhāvā samāsaḥ hoti iti āha nava cīvara lābhena ati vattabbā iti

original: Anunāsikalopanti “nava”nti ettha niggahītassa vināsaṃ. Niggahītañhi nāsaṃ anugatattā
analyzed: anunāsika lopanti navanti ettha niggahītassa vināsam niggahītam hi nāsam anugata ttā

original: “anunāsika”nti vuccati, tassa adassana, makatvāti attho. Majjhe ṭhitapadadvayeti
analyzed: anunāsikanti vuccati tassa attho majjhe ṭhita pada dvayā iti

original: “nava”nti ca “cīvaralābhenā”ti ca dvinnaṃ padānamantare “ṭhite panā”ti ca “bhikkhunā”ti
analyzed: navanti ca cīvara lābhena ati ca dvinnam padānam antare ṭhite ca bhikkhunā ati

original: ca padadvaye. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Nipātoti nipātamattaṃ. Alabhīti labhoti
analyzed: ca pada dvaye niddhāraṇe bhumma vacanam nipātoti nipāta mattam alabhi iti

original: vacanatthassa abhidheyyatthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhikkhunā”ti vuttanti āha “bhikkhunā”tiādi.
analyzed: vacana tthassa abhidheyya ttham dassetum bhikkhunā iti vuttan ti āha bhikkhunā atiādi

original: Padabhājane pana vuttanti sambandho. Yanti yaṃ cīvaraṃ. “Cīvara”nti ettha cīvarasarūpaṃ
analyzed: pada bhājane pana vutta nti sambandhaḥ yanti yam cīvaram ettha cīvara sarūpam

original: dassento āha “yaṃ nivāsetuṃ vā”tiādi. Cammakāranīlanti cammakārānaṃ tiphale pakkhittassa
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha yam nivāsetum vāti ādi cammakāra nīlam ti cammakārānam ti phale pakkhittassa

original: ayagūthassa nīlaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Dubbaṇṇo karīyati anenāti dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: nīlam mahā paccariyam vuttanti sambandhaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ anena ati dubbaṇṇa karaṇam

original: kappabindunti āha “kappabinduṃ sandhāyā”ti. Ādiyantena bhikkhunā ādātabbanti sambandho.
analyzed: kappa bindunti āha kappa bindum sandhāya ati ādiyantena bhikkhunā ādātabbanti sambandho

original: Koṇesūti antesu. Vāsaddo aniyamavikappattho. Akkhimaṇḍalamattaṃ vāti akkhimaṇḍalassa
analyzed: koṇesu iti antesu vā saddaḥ aniyama vikappa atthaḥ akkhi maṇḍala mattam vā ati akkhi maṇḍalassa

original: pamāṇaṃ vā kappabindūti sambandho. Paṭṭe vāti anuvātapaṭṭe vā. Gaṇṭhiyaṃ vāti gaṇṭhikapaṭṭe
analyzed: pamāṇam vā kappa bindu iti sambandhaḥ paṭṭe vā ati anuvāta paṭṭe vā gaṇṭhiyam vā ati gaṇṭhika paṭṭe

original: vā. Pāḷikappoti dve vā tisso vā tato adhikā vā binduāvalī katvā kato kappo. Kaṇṇikakappoti
analyzed: vā pāḷikappo ti dve vā tissaḥ vā tatas adhikā vā bindu āvalī katvā kataḥ kappo kaṇṇikakappo ti

original: kaṇṇikaṃ viya bindugocchakaṃ katvā kato kappo. Ādisaddena agghiyakappādayo saṅgaṇhāti.

original: Sabbatthāti sabbāsu aṭṭhakathāsu. Ekopi bindu vaṭṭoyeva vaṭṭatīti āha “ekaṃ vaṭṭabindu”nti.

original: saggantarāyopi maggantarāyopi hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbanti. Pañcamaṃ.

analyzed: ariṭṭha sikkhāpadam

original: 449. Catutthe kasmā chabbaggiyā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ pahāraṃ denti, nanu akāraṇena pahāraṃ dentīti āha “āvuso”tiādi. Iminā yathā vadanti, tathā akatattā pahāraṃ dentīti dasseti.

original: 451. Sacepīti ettha pisaddena sace amarati, kā nāma kathā, pācittiyamevāti dasseti. Pahārenāti pahārahetunā. Yathāti yenākārena. Ayanti bhikkhu. Na virocatīti na sobhati.

original: Tatthāti mahārāme. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne, saṅkā uppajjatīti sambandho. Mahājanasañcaraṇaṭṭhānesūti

original: bahūnaṃ janānaṃ sañcaraṇasaṅkhātesu ṭhānesu. Nagahetabbassa hetuṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: bahūnam janānam sañcaraṇa saṅkhātesu ṭhānesu naga hetabbassa hetum dassetum vuttam

original: “palibodho na hotī”ti. Yasmā palibodho na hoti, tasmā na gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: palibodhaḥ na hoti iti yasmai palibodhaḥ na hoti tasmai na gahetabbanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Ekoti eko bhikkhu passatīti sambandho. Okkammāti okkamitvā.

original: Rūpasaddo bhaṇḍapariyāyoti āha “bhaṇḍa”nti. Bhaṇḍaṃ rūpaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Bhaṇḍikanti

original: Lañchanādi nimittaṃ nāmāti hi yojanā. Lañchanādīti ādisaddena nīlapilotikādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Lākhāyāti jatunā.
analyzed: lañchana ādi nimittam nāma ati hi yojanā lañchana ādi iti ādi saddena nīla pilotikā ādayaḥ saṅgaṇhāti jatunā

original: 507. Ratanasammatanti manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhoganti. Dutiyaṃ.

original: 512. Sambahulā bhikkhūti sambandho. Tasmiṃ gāmeti tasmiṃ paṭhamapavisanagāme. Taṃ kammanti taṃ icchitakammaṃ. Antarāti gāmavihārānamantare. Bhummatthe cetaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ.

original: Nikhaṇitvāti pamāṇātirekaṃ nikhaṇitvā. Uttānaṃ vā katvāti heṭṭhupari parivattanaṃ vā katvā. Ṭhapetvāti lambaṇavasena ṭhapetvāti. Pañcamaṃ.

Khuddakānaṃ anantarā pāṭidesanīyā ye dhammā saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitā, idāni tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ayaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavatīti yojanā.

analyzed: dāpeti iti hetu ttha kiriyāya kārita kattu kārita kammāni dassetum vuttam aññātikāya

original: 590. Niccalaṃ katvā kāyassa ujuṭṭhapanaṃ kāyapaggaho nāmāti āha “niccalaṃ katvā”tiādi. Eseva nayo bāhupaggahasīsapaggahesupīti. Dutiyo vaggo.

original: 600. Uddhaṃ ekā koṭi imissā gamanāyāti ukkuṭikāti dassento āha “ukkuṭikā vuccatī”tiādi. Etthāti “ukkuṭikāyā”tipade.

original: 601. Hatthapallatthīkadussapallatthīkesu dvīsu dussapallatthike āyogapallatthīkāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti āha “āyogapallatthikāpi dussapallatthikā evā”ti.
analyzed: hattha pallatthīka dussa pallatthīkesu dvīsu dussa pallatthike āyoga pallatthīkā api saṅgaham gacchati iti āha āyoga pallatthikā api dussa pallatthikā eva ati

original: 602. Satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ sakkaccanti āha “satiṃupaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
analyzed: satiyāḥ upaṭṭhānam sakkaccanti āha satim upaṭṭhapetvā iti

original: 603. Piṇḍapātaṃ dentepīti piṇḍapātaṃ patte pakkhipantepi. Patte saññā pattasaññā, sā assatthīti pattasaññī. “Katvā” tiiminā kiriyāvisesanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: piṇḍapātam dente api iti piṇḍapātam patte pakkhipante api patte saññā patta saññā sā assatthi iti patta saññī katvā tiiminā kiriyā visesana bhāvam dasseti

original: 604. Samasūpakaṃ piṇḍapātanti ettha sūpapiṇḍapātānaṃ samaupaḍḍhabhāvaṃ āsaṅkā bhaveyyāti
analyzed: sama sūpakam ettha sūpa piṇḍapātānam āsaṅkā bhaveyya iti

original: āha “samasūpako nāmā”tiādi. Yatthāti piṇḍapāte. Bhattassa catutthabhāgapamāṇo sūpo
analyzed: āha sama sūpakaḥ nāma atiādi yattha ati piṇḍapāte bhattassa catuttha bhāga pamāṇaḥ sūpo

original: hoti, so piṇḍapāto samasūpako nāmāti yojanā. Oloṇī ca sākasūpeyyañca maccharaso ca
analyzed: hoti saḥ piṇḍapātaḥ samasūpakaḥ nāma ati yojanā ca ca

original: maṃsaraso cāti dvando. Tattha oloṇīti ekā byañjanavikati. Sākasūpeyyanti sūpassa
analyzed: maṃsa rasaḥ ca ati dvando tattha oloṇī iti ekā sūpassa

original: hitaṃ sūpeyyaṃ, sākameva sūpeyyaṃ sākasūpeyyaṃ. Iminā sabbāpi sākasūpeyyabyañjanavikati
analyzed: hitam sūpeyyam sākam eva sūpeyyam sākasūpeyyam iminā sabbā api sākasūpeyya byañjana vikati

original: gahitā. Maccharasamaṃsarasādīnīti ettha ādisaddena avasesā sabbāpi byañjanavikati
analyzed: gahitā maccha rasa maṃsa rasa ādīni iti ettha ādi saddena avasesā sabbā api byañjana vikati

original: saṅgahitā. Taṃ sabbaṃ rasānaṃ raso rasarasoti katvā “rasaraso”ti vuccati.
analyzed: saṅgahitā tam sabbam rasānam rasaḥ rasa rasaḥ iti katvā rasa rasaḥ iti vuccati

original: 605. Samapuṇṇaṃ samabharitanti vevacanameva. Thūpaṃ kato thūpīkatoti atthaṃ dassento āha “thūpīkato nāmā”tiādi.
analyzed: sama puṇṇam sama bharitam ti vevacanam eva thūpam kataḥ thūpīkataḥ ti attham dassentaḥ āha thūpīkataḥ nāma atiādi

original: Tatthāti “thūpīkata”ntiādivacane. Tesanti abhayattheratipiṭakacūḷanāgattherānaṃ.
analyzed: tattha ati thūpīka tanti ādi vacane tesanti

original: Iti pucchiṃsu, tesañca therānaṃ vādaṃ ārocesunti yojanā. Theroti cūḷasumanatthero.
analyzed: iti tesam ca therānam vādaṃ ārocesunti yojanā thero iti cūḷasumana thero

original: Etassāti tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherassa. Sattakkhattunti satta vāre. Kutoti kassācariyassa
analyzed: etassa tipiṭaka cūḷanāga therassa satta kkhattunti satta vāre kutas iti

original: santikā. Tasmāti yasmā yāvakālikena paricchinno, tasmā. Āmisajātikaṃ yāgubhattaṃ
analyzed: santikā tasmā ati yasmā yāvakālikena tasmā āmisa jātikam yāgu bhattam

original: vā phalāphalaṃ vāti yojanā. Tañca khoti tañca samatitthikaṃ. Itarena panāti nādhiṭṭhānupagena
analyzed: vā phala aphalam vā ati yojanā tat ca kho ti tat ca sama titthikam itarena pana ati na adhiṭṭhāna upagena

original: pattena pana. Yaṃ pūvaucchukhaṇḍaphalāphalādi heṭṭhā orohati, taṃ pūvaucchukhaṇḍaphalāphalādīti
analyzed: pattena pana yam pūva aucchukhaṇḍa phala aphala ādi heṭṭhā orohati tam pūva aucchukhaṇḍa phala aphala ādi iti

original: yojanā. Pūvavaṭaṃsakoti ettha vaṭaṃsakoti uttaṃso. So hi uddhaṃ tasīyate alaṅkarīyateti
analyzed: yojanā ettha vaṭaṃsakā iti uttaṃsaḥ saḥ hi uddham tasīyate alaṅkarīyate iti

original: vaṭaṃsoti vuccati ukārassa vakāraṃ, takārassa ca ṭakāraṃ katvā, soyeva vaṭaṃsako,
analyzed: vaṭaṃso ti vuccati ukārassa vakāram takārassa ca ṭakāram katvā vaṭaṃsako

original: muddhani pilandhito eko alaṅkāraviseso. Pūvameva taṃsadisattā pūvavaṭaṃsako, taṃ.
analyzed: ekaḥ alaṅkāra viseso ekaḥ alaṅkāra viseso taṃsa disa ttā

original: Pupphavaṭaṃsako ca takkolakaṭukaphalādivaṭaṃsako cāti dvando, te.
analyzed: puppha vaṭaṃsakaḥ ca takkola kaṭuka phala ādi vaṭaṃsakaḥ ca ati dvandaḥ te

original: Idhāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade. Nanu sabbathūpīkatesu paṭiggahaṇassa akappiyattā paribhuñjanampi
analyzed: idha ati imasmim sikkhāpade nanu sabbathūpīkatesu paṭiggahaṇassa a kappiya ttā paribhuñjanam pi

original: na vaṭṭatīti āha “sabbattha panā”tiādi. Tattha sabbatthāti sabbesu thūpīkatesūti. Tatiyo vaggo.
analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti āha sabbattha pana atiādi tattha sabbattha ati sabbesu thūpīkatesu iti tatiyaḥ vaggo

original: 4. Sakkaccavagga-atthayojanā
analyzed: sak kacca vagga attha yojanā

original: 608. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne. Odhinti avadhiṃ mariyādaṃ.
analyzed: tattha tattha ati tasmin tasmin ṭhāne avadhim mariyādam

original: 610. Thūpakatoti thūpameva thūpakaṃ, tato thūpakatoti dassento āha “matthakato”ti.
analyzed: thūpakato ti thūpam eva thūpakam tatas thūpakato ti dassentaḥ āha matthakato ti

original: 611. Māghātasamayādīsūti “pāṇe mā ghātethā”ti rājāno bheriṃ carāpenti etthāti māghāto, soyeva samayo māghātasamayo. Ādisaddena aññaṃ paṭicchannakāraṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: māghāta samaya ādīsu iti pāṇe mā ghātetha ati rājānaḥ bherim ettha ati māghātaḥ saḥ yā iva samayaḥ māghāta samayaḥ ādi saddena aññam paṭicchanna kāraṇam gahetabbam

original: 615. Tesanti mayūraṇḍakukkuṭaṇḍānanti. Catuttho vaggo.
analyzed: catutthaḥ vaggo

original: 5. Kabaḷavagga-atthayojanā
analyzed: kabaḷa vagga attha yojanā

original: 617. “Mukhadvāra”nti kammassa “anāhaṭe”ti ca “vivarissāmī”ti ca dvīsu kiriyāsu sambandhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “anāharite mukhadvāra”nti.
analyzed: mukha dvāram ti kammassa an āhaṭā iti ca vivarissāmi iti ca dvīsu kiriyāsu sambandha bhāvam dassetum vuttam an āharite mukha dvāram ti

original: 618. Sakalaṃ hatthanti pañcaṅguliṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sakalam hattham ti pañca aṅgulim sandhāya vuttam

original: 619. Sakabaḷenāti ettha kabaḷasaddena vacanassa aparipuṇṇakāraṇaṃ sabbampi gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: sa kabaḷena ati ettha kabaḷa saddena vacanassa aparipuṇṇa kāraṇam sabbam api gahetabbam

original: 620. Piṇḍukkhepakantiādīsu vicchatthe kapaccayoti āha “piṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā”ti. Tvāsaddena kiriyāvisesanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: piṇḍukkhepaka nti ādīsu āha piṇḍam ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā iti tvā saddena kiriyā visesana bhāvam dasseti

original: 624. “Avakiritvā”ti iminā sitthāvakārakanti ettha avapubbo kiradhātuyeva, na karadhātūti dasseti.
analyzed: avakiritvā ti iminā sittha avakārakam ti ettha avapubbaḥ kira dhātuyā iva na kara dhātu uti dasseti

original: 626. “Capucapū”ti evaṃ saddanti “capucapū”ti evaṃ anukaraṇaravanti. Pañcamo vaggo.
analyzed: evam capucapūti evam evam anukaraṇa ravanti pañcamaḥ vaggo

original: 6. Surusuruvagga-atthayojanā
analyzed: suru suru vagga attha yojanā

original: 627. “Surusurū”ti evaṃ saddanti “surusurū”ti evaṃ anukaraṇaravaṃ. Davanaṃ kīḷananti
analyzed: surusurūti evam saddanti surusurūti evam anukaraṇa ravam davanam kīḷananti

original: iminā vacanatthena parihāso davo nāmāti āha “davoti parihāsavacana”nti. Tanti so
analyzed: iminā vacana tthena parihāsaḥ davaḥ nāma ati āha davo ti parihāsa vacananti so

original: davo. Liṅgavipallāso hesa. Na kātabbaṃ na kātabboti sambandho. Silakabuddhoti silāya
analyzed: davaḥ liṅga vipallāsaḥ ha isa na kātabbam na kātabbaḥ iti sambandho silakabuddho ti silāya

original: kato, silena niyutto vā buddho. Apaṭibuddhoti apaṭividdho buddho, parihāsavacanametaṃ.
analyzed: kataḥ silena niyuttaḥ vā buddhaḥ apaṭibuddhaḥ iti apaṭividdhaḥ buddhaḥ parihāsa vacanam etam

original: Godhammoti gunnaṃ dhammo. Ajadhammoti ajānaṃ dhammo. Migasaṅghoti migānaṃ saṅgho.
analyzed: go dhammo ti gunnam dhammaḥ aja dhammo ti ajānam dhammaḥ miga saṅghaḥ iti migānam saṅghaḥ

original: Pasusaṅghoti pasūnaṃ saṅgho.
analyzed: pasu saṅghaḥ iti pasūnam saṅghaḥ

original: 628. “Bhuñjantenā”ti padaṃ “nillehitu”nti pade bhāvakattā.
analyzed: bhuñjantena ati padam pade

original: 631. Evaṃnāmaketi “kokanuda”nti evaṃ nāmaṃ assa pāsādassāti evaṃnāmako, pāsādo, tasmiṃ.
analyzed: evaṃnāmaka iti kokanudanti evam nāmam assa pāsādassa ati evaṃnāmakaḥ pāsādaḥ tasmin

original: “Padumasaṇṭhāno”ti iminā pāsādassa sadisūpacārena “kokanudo”ti nāmalabhanaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: paduma saṇṭhānaḥ ti iminā pāsādassa sadisu upacārena kokanudo ti nāma labhanam dasseti

original: Tenāti padumasaṇṭhānattā. Assāti pāsādassa. Puggalikampīti parapuggalasantakaṃ gahetabbaṃ
analyzed: tena ati paduma saṇṭhāna ttā assa āti pāsādassa puggalikampī iti para puggala santakam gahetabbam

original: “attano santakampī”ti attapuggalasantakassa visuṃ gayhamānattā. Saṅkhampīti pānīyasaṅkhampi.
analyzed: attanaḥ santakampī iti atta puggala santakassa visum gayhamāna ttā saṅkhampī iti pānīya saṅkhampi

original: Sarāvampīti pānīyasarāvampi. Thālakampīti pānīyathālakampi.
analyzed: sarāvampī iti pānīya sarāvampi thālakampī iti pānīya thālakampi

original: 632. “Uddharitvā”ti sāmaññato vuttavacanassa kammāpādānāni dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “sitthāni udakato”ti. Bhinditvāti cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni katvā. Bahīti antaragharato bahi.
analyzed: uddharitvā iti sāmaññataḥ vutta vacanassa kamma apādānāni dassetum vuttam sitthāni udakataḥ ti bhinditvā ati cuṇṇa vicuṇṇāni katvā bahi iti antara gharataḥ bahi

original: 634. Setacchattanti ettha setasaddo paṇḍarapariyāyoti āha “paṇḍaracchatta”nti. Vatthapaliguṇṭhitanti
analyzed: seta chattanti ettha seta saddo paṇḍara pariyāyo ti āha paṇḍara chattanti vattha paliguṇṭhitanti

original: vatthehi samantato veṭhitaṃ. Setaṃ chattaṃ setacchattaṃ. Kiḷañjehi kataṃ chattaṃ
analyzed: vatthehi samantataḥ veṭhitam setam chattam seta chattam kiḷañjehi katam chattam

original: kiḷañjacchattaṃ. Paṇṇehi kataṃ chattaṃ paṇṇacchattaṃ. Maṇḍalena baddhaṃ maṇḍalabaddhaṃ.
analyzed: kiḷañja chattam paṇṇehi katam chattam paṇṇa chattam maṇḍalena baddham maṇḍala baddham

original: Salākāhi baddhaṃ salākabaddhaṃ. Tānīti tīṇi chattāni. Hīti saccaṃ. Yampi ekapaṇṇacchattanti
analyzed: salākāhi baddham salāka baddham tāni iti tīṇi chattāni hi iti saccam yat pi ekapaṇṇa chattanti

original: yojanā. Etesūti tīsu chattesu. Assāti yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā.
analyzed: yojanā etesu iti tīsu chattesu assa ati yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā

original: Soti yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. Chattapādukāya vāti chattadaṇḍanikkhepanāya
analyzed: saḥ ti yaḥ koci gahaṭṭhaḥ vā pabbajitaḥ vā chatta pādukāya vā ati chatta daṇḍa nikkhepanāya

original: pādukāya vā. Etthāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade.
analyzed: pādukāya vā ettha ati imasmim sikkhāpade

original: 635. Majjhimassāti pamāṇamajjhimassa. “Catuhatthappamāṇo”tiiminā catuhatthato ūnātireko
analyzed: majjhimassa ati pamāṇa majjhimassa catuhattha ppamāṇaḥ catuhatthataḥ ūna atirekaḥ

original: daṇḍo na daṇḍo nāmāti dasseti. Daṇḍo pāṇimhi assāti vacanatthaṃ atidisanto āha “vuttanayenevā”ti.
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ na daṇḍaḥ nāma ati dasseti daṇḍo pāṇimhi assa ati vacana attham atidisantaḥ āha vutta nayena iva āti

original: 636. “Satthapāṇimhī”ti ettha asi eva adhippetoti āha “asi”nti. Asinti khaggaṃ.
analyzed: sattha pāṇimhi iti ettha asi eva adhippetaḥ iti āha asinti asinti khaggam

original: 637. “Āvudhaṃ nāma cāpo kodaṇḍo”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ upalakkhaṇamevāti dassento
analyzed: āvudham nāma cāpaḥ kodaṇḍo ti pāḷiyam vutta vacanam upalakkhaṇam eva ati dassento

original: āha “āvudhapāṇissāti etthā”tiādi. Sabbāpi dhanuvikati āvudhanti veditabbāti yojanā.
analyzed: āha āvudha pāṇissa ati ettha atiādi sabbā api āvudhanti veditabbā ati yojanā

original: Yathā asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhito satthapāṇīti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, evaṃ dhanuṃ kaṇṭhe
analyzed: yathā asim sannahitvā ṭhitaḥ sattha pāṇī iti saṅkhyam na gacchati evam dhanum kaṇṭhe

original: paṭimukko āvudhapāṇīti āha “sace panā”tiādi, iminā āvudho pāṇinā gahitoyeva āvudhapāṇi
analyzed: paṭimukkaḥ āvudha pāṇi iti āha sace iminā āvudhaḥ pāṇinā āvudha pāṇi

original: nāmāti dassetīti. Chaṭṭho vaggo.
analyzed: nāma ati dasseti iti chaṭṭhaḥ vaggo

original: 7. Pādukavagga-atthayojanā
analyzed: pāduka vagga attha yojanā

original: 638. Aṅgulantaranti pādaṅgulavivaraṃ. Pādukanti upāhanaviseso. So hi pajjate imāyāti
analyzed: aṅgulantaram ti pāda aṅgula vivaram pādukam ti upāhana visesaḥ saḥ hi pajjate imāya ati

original: pādukāti vuccati, sā bahupaṭalā cammamayā vā hoti kaṭṭhamayā vā. Paṭimuñcitvāti pādukaṃ paṭimuñcītvā.
analyzed: pādukā iti vuccati sā bahu paṭalā camma mayā vā hoti kaṭṭha mayā vā paṭimuñcitvā ati pādukam paṭimuñcītvā

original: 640. Dvīhi janehi gahitoti sambandho. Vaṃsenāti veṇunā, yāne nisinnoti sambandho.
analyzed: dvīhi janehi gahitaḥ iti sambandhaḥ vaṃsena ati veṇunā yāne nisinnaḥ iti sambandhaḥ

original: Visaṅkharitvāti vipattiṃ karitvā. Dvepīti dhammakathikadhammapaṭiggāhakasaṅkhātā
analyzed: visaṅkharitvā ati vipattim karitvā dvepī iti dhamma kathika dhamma paṭiggāhaka saṅkhātā

original: ubhopi janā. Vaṭṭatīti desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: ubho api janāḥ vaṭṭati iti desetum vaṭṭati

original: 641. Sayanagatassāti sayanaṃ gatassa, sayane nipannassāti attho. Nipannassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
analyzed: sayana gatassa ati sayanam gatassa sayane nipannassa ati atthaḥ nipannassa desetum na vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ

original: 642. Tīsu pallatthikāsu yāya kāyaci pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassento āha “pallatthikāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: tīsu pallatthikāsu yāya kāyaci pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammam desetum na vaṭṭati iti dassentaḥ āha pallatthikāya atiādi

original: 643. Yathā veṭhiyamāne kesanto na dissati, evaṃ veṭhitasīsassāti yojanā.
analyzed: yathā veṭhiyamāne kesantaḥ na dissati evam veṭhita sīsassa ati yojanā

original: 647. Chapakasaddassa ca caṇḍālasaddassa ca vevacanattā vuttaṃ “caṇḍālassā”ti. Caṇḍālo
analyzed: chapaka saddassa ca caṇḍāla saddassa ca vevacanattā vuttam caṇḍālassa ati caṇḍālo

original: hi saṃ sunakhaṃ pacatīti chapakoti vuccati sakārassa chakāraṃ katvā. Chapakassa esā
analyzed: hi sam su nakham pacati iti chapakā iti vuccati sakārassa chakāram katvā chapakassa esā

original: chapakī, caṇḍālabhariyā. Yatrāti ettha trapaccayo paccatte hotīti āha “yo hi nāmā”ti.
analyzed: chapakī caṇḍāla bhariyā ettha paccatte hoti iti āha yaḥ hi nāma ati

original: Yo rājā ucce āsane nisīditvā mantaṃ pariyāpuṇissati nāma, ayaṃ rājā yāva ativiya
analyzed: yaḥ rājā ucce āsane nisīditvā mantam pariyāpuṇissati nāma ayam rājā yāva

original: adhammikoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sabbamida”nti ayaṃ saddo liṅgavipallāsoti āha “sabbo aya”nti.
analyzed: adhammikaḥ iti vuttam hoti sabbam idam ti ayam saddo liṅga vipallāsaḥ ti āha sabbaḥ ayan ti

original: “Loko”ti iminā idhasaddassa visayaṃ dasseti. Carimasaddo antimapariyāyo. Antimoti
analyzed: loko ti iminā idha saddassa visayam dasseti carima saddo antima pariyāyaḥ antimaḥ ti

original: ca lāmako. Lāmakoti ca nāma idha vipattīti āha “saṅkara”nti. Saṅkaranti vipattiṃ.
analyzed: ca lāmakaḥ ca nāma vipatti iti āha saṅkaranti saṅkaranti vipattim

original: “Nimmariyādo”ti iminā “saṅkaraṃ gato”ti padānaṃ adhippāyatthaṃ dasseti. Carimaṃ gataṃ
analyzed: iminā saṅkaram gataḥ iti padānam adhippāya attham dasseti carimam gatam

original: carimagataṃ, sabbo ayaṃ loko carimagatoti attho. Idha ca jātake ca kesuci potthakesu
analyzed: carima gatam sabbaḥ ayam loko carima gataḥ ti attho idha ca jātake ca kesuci potthakesu

original: “camarikata”nti pāṭho atthi, so ayuttoyeva. Tatthevāti ambarukkhamūleyeva. Tesanti rājabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
analyzed: camarikatanti pāṭhaḥ atthi saḥ ayuttaḥ yeva tattha iva ati amba rukkha mūle yeva tesanti rāja brāhmaṇānam

original: Tatthāti tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ. Pāḷiyāti attano ācārapakāsakaganthasaṅkhātāya pāḷiyā. Na
analyzed: tattha ati tissam gāthāyam pāḷiyā ti attanaḥ ācāra pakāsaka gantha saṅkhātāya pāḷiyā na

original: bāhiratthasamāsañca dassento āha “nibbiṭṭho”tiādi. Tattha “rañño bhatī”ti iminā rañño
analyzed: bāhirattha samāsam ca dassentaḥ āha nibbiṭṭha utiādi tattha raññaḥ bhati iti iminā raññaḥ

original: bhaṭo rājabhaṭoti chaṭṭhīsamāsaṃ dasseti, “etenā”ti iminā bāhiratthasamāsaṃ. Nibbiṭṭhoti
analyzed: bhaṭaḥ rājabhaṭaḥ iti chaṭṭhī samāsam dasseti etena ati iminā bāhirattha samāsam nibbiṭṭhaḥ ti

analyzed: vā saddena dantakaṭṭha ādayaḥ api gahetabbā ti āha dantakaṭṭhape pācittiyam eva ati sabbattha ati

original: 9. Navamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: navama sikkhāpadam

analyzed: ropiyam yakārassa makāram katvā etāni iti uccāra ādīni

original: bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ. Yattha panāti yasmiṃ khetteti. Navamaṃ.

original: 10. Dasamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dasama sikkhāpadam

original: 835. Dasame soṇḍā vāti surāsoṇḍā vā. Moroti mayūro. Suvoti suko. Makkaṭoti vānaro.
analyzed: dasame soṇḍā vāti surā soṇḍā vā moroti mayūraḥ sukaḥ makkaṭoti vānaraḥ

original: Ādisaddena sappādayo saṅgaṇhāti, makkaṭādayopi naccantūti sambandho. Asaṃyatabhikkhūnanti

original: vācasikakamme asaṃyatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, dhammabhāṇakagītaṃ vā hotūti yojanā. Tantiyā

original: guṇena baddhā tantibaddhā. “Bhi”ntisaṅkhāto rāsaddo etissāti bheri. Kuṭena katā bheri
analyzed: guṇena baddhā tanti baddhā bhinti saṅkhātaḥ rāsaddaḥ etissā ati bheri kuṭena katā bheri

original: bheri, tāya vāditampi hotūti sambandho.
analyzed: bheri tāya hotu uti sambandhaḥ

original: 836. Tesaṃyevāti yesaṃ naccaṃ passati, tesaṃyeva. Yadi pana naccagītavādite visuṃ
analyzed: tesam yeva ati yesam naccam passati tesam yeva yadi pana nacca gīta vādite visum

original: visuṃ passati suṇāti, pāṭekkā āpattiyoti dassento āha “sace panā”tiādi. Aññatoti
analyzed: visum passati suṇāti pāṭekkāḥ āpattiyaḥ ti dassentaḥ āha sace pana atiādi aññatas ti

original: aññato desato, passatīti sambandho. “Oloketvā”ti pade apekkhite upayogatthe topaccayo
analyzed: aññatas desatas passati iti sambandhaḥ oloketvā ati pade apekkhite upayoga tthe to paccayaḥ

original: hoti. Aññaṃ oloketvāti hi attho. Aññato vādente passatīti yojanā. Bhikkhunī na labhatīti
analyzed: hoti aññam oloketvā ati hi attho aññatas vādente passati iti yojanā bhikkhunī na labhati iti

original: sambandho. Aññe vattumpīti sambandho. Upahāranti pūjaṃ. Upaṭṭhānanti pāricariyaṃ.

original: Sabbatthāti sabbesu sayaṃ naccādīsu.
analyzed: sabbattha ati sabbesu sayam nacca ādīsu

original: 837. Antarārāme vāti ārāmassa antare vā. Bahiārāme vāti ārāmassa bahi vā. Aññena vāti salākabhattādīhi aññena vā. Tādisenāti yādiso corādiupaddavo, tādisenāti. Dasamaṃ.
analyzed: antara ārāme vā ati ārāmassa antare vā bahi ārāme vā ati ārāmassa bahi vā aññena vā ati salāka bhatta ādīhi aññena vā tādisena ati yādiso cora ādi upaddavo tādisena ati dasamam

original: Lasuṇavaggo paṭhamo.
analyzed: lasuṇa vaggo paṭhamaḥ

original: 2. Andhakāravaggo
analyzed: andhakāra vaggo

original: 1. Paṭhamasikkhāpada-atthayojanā
839. Andhakāravaggassa paṭhame appadīpeti upalakkhaṇavasena vuttattā aññepi ālokā gahetabbāti dassento āha “padīpacandasūriyaaggīsū”tiādi. Assāti “appadīpe”tipadassa.
analyzed: andhakāra vaggassa paṭhame appadīpa iti upalakkhaṇa vasena vutta ttā aññe pi ālokā gahetabbā ti dassentaḥ āha padīpa canda sūriya aggīsu ti ādi assa ati appadīpa iti padassa

original: 841. Narahoassādāpekkhā hutvā ca rassādato aññavihitāva hutvā cāti yojanā. Iminā
analyzed: nara ho assāda apekkhā hutvā ca rassādataḥ añña vihitā ava hutvā ca ati yojanā iminā

original: “santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā”ti pade kiriyāvisesanabhāvaṃ dasseti. Dānena vā nimittabhūtena,
analyzed: santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā ati pade kiriyā visesana bhāvam dasseti dānena vā nimitta bhūtena

original: pūjāya vā nimittabhūtāya mantetīti yojanāti. Paṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: pūjāya vā nimitta bhūtāya mantā iti iti paṭhamam

original: 2. Dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya sikkhāpadam

original: 842. Dutiye idameva padaṃ nānanti sambandhoti. Dutiyaṃ.
analyzed: dutiye idam eva padam dutiyam

original: 3. Tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: tatiya sikkhāpadam

original: 846. Tatiye “idamevā”ti padaṃ anuvattetabbaṃ. Tādisamevāti paṭhamasadisamevāti atthoti. Tatiyaṃ.
analyzed: tatiye idam eva ati padam anuvattetabbam tādisam eva ati paṭhama sadisam eva ati atthaḥ ti tatiyam

original: 4. Catutthasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: catuttha sikkhāpadam

original: 850. Catutthe kaṇṇassa samīpaṃ nikaṇṇaṃ, tameva nikaṇṇikanti vutte kaṇṇamūlanti āha
analyzed: catutthe kaṇṇassa samīpam nikaṇṇam tam eva nikaṇṇikam ti vutte kaṇṇa mūlam ti āha

original: dasseti. Āharaṇatthāyāti āharāpanatthāyāti. Catutthaṃ.

original: 5. Pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: pañcama sikkhāpadam

original: 854. Pañcame tesanti gharasāmikānaṃ. Gharampīti na kevalaṃ āsanameva, gharampi sodhemāti attho. Tatoti parivitakkanato, paranti sambandho.
analyzed: pañcame ghara sāmikānam gharam pi iti na kevalam āsanam eva gharam pi sodhema ati attho tatas ti parivitakkanato paranti sambandho

original: 858. Corā vā uṭṭhitā hontīti yojanāti. Pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: corāḥ vai uṭṭhitāḥ honti iti pañcamam

original: 6. Chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: chaṭṭha sikkhāpadam

original: 860. Chaṭṭhe abhinisīdeyyāti ettha abhisaddo upasaggamattovāti dassento āha “nisīdeyyā”ti. Eseva nayo abhinipajjeyyāti etthāpi. Dve āpattiyoti sambandhoti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: chaṭṭhe abhinisīdeyya ati ettha abhi saddo upasagga mattaḥ vā ti dassentaḥ āha nisīdeyya ati esa iva nayaḥ abhinipajjeyya ati ettha api dve āpattiyo ti sambandho ti chaṭṭham

original: 7. Sattamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sattama sikkhāpadam

original: 864. Sattame sabbanti sakalaṃ vattabbavacananti. Sattamaṃ.
analyzed: sattame sabbam iti sakalam vattabba vacanan ti sattamam

original: 8. Aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhama sikkhāpadam

original: 869. Aṭṭhame anuttānavacanaṃ natthīti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhame anuttāna vacanam na atthi iti aṭṭhamam

original: 9. Navamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: navama sikkhāpadam

analyzed: navame abhisapeyya iti ettha sapa dhātussa akkosana attham antokatvā kara dhātuyā

analyzed: attham dassentaḥ āha sapatham kareyya iti niraye nibbattāmhi iti aham niraye nibbattā

original: amhīti yojanā. Niraye nibbattatūti esā bhikkhunī niraye nibbattatūti yojanā. Īdisā
analyzed: amhi iti yojanā niraye nibbattatu uti esā bhikkhunī niraye nibbattatu uti yojanā īdisā

original: 878. Edisāti virūpādijātikā. Viramassūti viramāhi. Addhāti dhuvanti. Navamaṃ.

original: 10. Dasamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dasama sikkhāpadam

analyzed: andhakāra vaggo dutiyaḥ

analyzed: nagga vaggaḥ

original: 1. Paṭhamasikkhāpada-atthayojanā

analyzed: nagga vaggassa paṭhame brahmacariyena ciṇṇena ati ciṇṇena brahmacariyena kim nu

analyzed: vacana attham dasseti na aññam cīvaran ti iminā evattham dasseti aññattha apohanam vā ati paṭhamam

original: 2. Dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya sikkhāpadam

original: 887. Dutiye anuttānaṭṭhānaṃ natthīti. Dutiyaṃ.
analyzed: dutiye anuttānaṭṭhānam natthi iti dutiyam

original: 3. Tatiyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: tatiya sikkhāpadam

original: 893. Tatiye anantarāyikinīti ettha natthi antarāyo etissāti anantarāyā, sā eva anantarāyikinīti vacanatthaṃ dassento āha “anantarāyā”ti. Tatiyaṃ.
analyzed: tatiye anantarāyikinī iti ettha natthi antarāyaḥ etissa ati anantarāyā sā eva anantarāyikinī iti vacana attham dassentaḥ āha anantarāyā ti tatiyam

original: 4. Catutthasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: catuttha sikkhāpadam

analyzed: catutthe samāhāra digu ṇika paccayo su attho

analyzed: saṅghāṭi nāma cāra saddo kimatthaḥ ti āha paribhoga vasena vā tiādi tattha saṅghaṭita ṭṭhena āti

analyzed: saṃharita ṭṭhena iminā kena aṭṭhena saṅghāṭi nāma ati puccham visajja iti parivattananti

analyzed: iminā cāra saddo kimattho ti codanam pariharati ti cīvaram udaka sāṭikā

original: saṃkaccikāti pañcasūti. Catutthaṃ.
analyzed: saṃkaccikā ati catuttham

original: 5. Pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: pañcama sikkhāpadam

original: 903. Pañcame “cīvarasaṅkamanīya”ntiettha saṅkametabbaṃ paṭidātabbanti saṅkamanīyanti
analyzed: pañcame cīvara saṅkamanīya nti ettha saṅkametabbam paṭidātabbanti saṅkamanīya nti

original: kamudhātussa paṭidānatthañca anīyasaddassa kammatthañca, ‘cīvarañca taṃ saṅkamanīyañce’ti
analyzed: kamu dhātussa paṭidāna atthañca anīya saddassa kamma atthañca cīvaram ca tam saṅkamanīyam ca iti

original: cīvarasaṅkamanīyanti visesanaparapadabhāvañca dassento āha “saṅkametabbaṃ cīvara”nti.
analyzed: cīvara saṅkamanīyanti visesana para pada bhāvañca dassentaḥ āha saṅkametabbam cīvaram ti

original: Tattha “saṅkametabbaṃ cīvara”nti iminā kammatthañca visesanaparapadabhāvañca dasseti.
analyzed: tattha saṅkametabbam cīvaran ti iminā kammattham ca visesana para pada bhāvañca dasseti

original: “Paṭidātabbacīvara”nti iminā kamudhātuyā atthaṃ dasseti adhippāyavasenāti. Pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: paṭidātabba cīvaran ti iminā kamu dhātuyā attham dasseti adhippāya vasena ati pañcamaṃ

original: 6. Chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: chaṭṭha sikkhāpadam

original: 909. Chaṭṭhe “aññaṃ parikkhāra”ntiettha parikkhārassa sarūpaṃ dassento āha “yaṃkiñcī”tiādi.
analyzed: chaṭṭhe aññam parikkhāran ti ettha parikkhārassa sarūpam dassentaḥ āha yaṃ kiñci itiādi

original: Yaṃkiñci aññataranti sambandho. Kittakaṃagghanakanti kiṃ pamāṇena agghena arahaṃ
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci aññataranti sambandhaḥ kittakam agghanakam ti kim pamāṇena agghena araham

original: cīvaraṃ. Dātukāmatthāti tumhe dātukāmā bhavathāti attho. Katipāhenāti katipayāni
analyzed: cīvaram dātu kāmattha ati tumhe dātu kāmāḥ bhavatha ati attho katipāhena ati katipayāni

original: ahāni katipāhaṃ, yakāralopo. Katipayasaddohi dvitivācako rūḷhīsaddo, tena katipāhena.
analyzed: ahāni katipāham yakāra lopaḥ katipaya saddo hi dviti vācakaḥ rūḷhī saddo tena kati pāhena

original: Samagghanti appagghaṃ. Saṃsaddo hi appatthavācakoti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: samagghanti appaggham saṃsaddaḥ hi appattha vācakaḥ ti chaṭṭham

original: 7. Sattamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sattama sikkhāpadam

original: 911. Sattame “vipakkamiṃsū”ti ettha vividhaṃ ṭhānaṃ pakkamiṃsūti dassento āha “tattha tattha agamaṃsū”ti. Amhākampi āgamananti sambandho.
analyzed: sattame vipakkamiṃsu iti ettha vividham ṭhānam pakkamiṃsu iti dassentaḥ āha tattha tattha agamaṃsu iti amhākam pi āgamananti sambandho

original: 915. Katipāhena uppajjissatīti katipāhena cīvaraṃ uppajjissati. Tatoti tasmiṃ cīvaruppajjanakāleti. Sattamaṃ.
analyzed: kati pāhena uppajjissati iti kati pāhena cīvaram uppajjissati tatas ti tasmin cīvara uppajjana kāle iti sattamam

original: 8. Aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhama sikkhāpadam

original: 916. Aṭṭhame ye nāṭakaṃ nāṭenti, te naṭā nāmāti yojanā. Iminā naṭakaṃ nāṭentīti naṭāti
analyzed: aṭṭhame ye nāṭakam nāṭenti te naṭāḥ nāma ati yojanā iminā naṭakam nāṭenti iti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Ye naccanti, te nāṭakā nāmāti yojanā. Iminā sayaṃ naṭantīti
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti ye naccanti te nāṭakāḥ nāma ati yojanā iminā sayam naṭanti iti

original: nāṭakāti vacanatthaṃ dīpeti. Vaṃsavarattādīsūti ettha vaṃso nāma veṇu. Varattā nāma
analyzed: nāṭakā ati vacana attham dīpeti vaṃsa varattā ādīsu iti ettha vaṃsaḥ nāma veṇu varattā nāma

original: naddhikā. Ādisaddena rajjuādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Ye laṅghanakammaṃ karonti, te laṅghakā
analyzed: naddhikāḥ ādi saddena rajju ādayaḥ saṅgaṇhāti ye laṅghana kammam karonti te laṅghakā

original: nāmāti yojanā. Māyākārāti ettha māyā nāma mayanāmakena asurena sure calayituṃ katattā
analyzed: nāma ati yojanā māyā kārā ati ettha māyā nāma maya nāmakena asurena sure calayitum

original: mayassa esāti māyā, taṃ karotīti māyākāro, mayanāmako asuroyeva. Aññe pana rūḷhīvasena
analyzed: mayassa esā ati māyā tam karoti iti māyākāraḥ maya nāmako asuro yā iva aññe pana rūḷhī vasena

original: “māyākārā”ti vuccanti. Sokena jhāyanaṃ ḍayhanaṃ sokajjhāyaṃ, surānaṃ sokajjhāyaṃ
analyzed: māyākārāḥ ti vuccanti sokena jhāyanam ḍayhanam soka jjhāyam su rānam soka jjhāyam

original: karotīti sokajjhāyiko, mayanāmako asuroyeva. Aññe pana rūḷhīvasena “sokajjhāyikā”ti

original: 5. Pāṭidesanīyasikkhāpada-atthayojanā
Khuddakānaṃ anantarā pāṭidesanīyā nāma aṭṭha ye dhammā saṅkhepeneva saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā

original: saṅgītikārehi, tesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ pāṭidesanīyanāmakānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhepeneva esā vaṇṇanā pavattateti yojanā.
analyzed: saṅgīti kārehi tesam aṭṭhannam pāṭidesanīya nāmakānam dhammānam saṅkhepena iva esā vaṇṇanā pavattate ti yojanā

original: 1228. Yāni sabbitelādīnīti sambandho. Hīti vitthāro. Etthāti aṭṭhasu pāṭidesanīyesu. Pāḷivinimuttakesūti pāḷito vinimuttakesu. Sabbesūti akhilesu sabbitelādīsūti.
analyzed: yāni sabbi tela ādīni iti sambandhaḥ hi iti vitthāraḥ ettha ati aṭṭhasu pāṭi desanīyesu pāḷi vinimuttakesu ti pāḷitaḥ vinimuttakesu sabbesu iti akhilesu sabbi tela ādīsu iti

original: Bhikkhunivibhaṅge pāṭidesanīyavaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.

original: Panāti pakkhantarajotako. Ye dhammā uddiṭṭhāti sambandho. Tesanti pāṭidesanīyānaṃ. Puna tesanti sekhiyaadhikaraṇasamathadhammānaṃ.
analyzed: pana ati pakkha antara jotakaḥ ye dhammā uddiṭṭhā ati sambandho tesanti pāṭidesanīyānam puna tesanti sekhiya adhikaraṇa samatha dhammānam

original: 2. Paccayakkhayassāti paccayānaṃ khayaṭṭhānassa asaṅkhatassāti yojanā. Tatrāti dutiyaudāne.
analyzed: paccaya khayassa ati paccayānam khaya ṭṭhānassa asaṅkhatassa ati yojanā tatra ati dutiya odāne

original: Khīyanti paccayā etthāti khayaṃ, nibbānanti āha “paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbāna”nti.
analyzed: khīyanti paccayāḥ ettha ati khayam nibbānanti āha paccayānam khaya saṅkhātam nibbānanti

original: “Aññāsī”ti iminā avedīti ettha vidadhātuyā ñāṇatthaṃ dasseti, anubhavanalābhādike
analyzed: aññāsi iti iminā avedi iti ettha vida dhātuyāḥ ñāṇa attham dasseti anubhavana lābha ādike

original: nivatteti. Tasmā vapayantīti sambandho. Vuttappakārāti paṭhamaudāne vuttasadisā.
analyzed: nivattā iti tasmai vapayanti iti sambandhaḥ vutta ppakārā ati paṭhama odāne vutta sadisā

original: Dhammāti bodhipakkhiyadhammā, catuariyasaccadhammā vā.
analyzed: dhammā ti bodhi pakkhiya dhammā catu ariya sacca dhammā vā

original: 3. Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti sambandho. Yena maggena viditoti yojanā. Tatrāti tatiyaudāne.
analyzed: imam udānam udānesi iti sambandhaḥ yena maggena viditaḥ iti yojanā tatra ati tatiya odāne

original: So brāhmaṇo tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. Tehi uppannehi bodhipakkhiyadhammehi vā yassa ariyamaggassa
analyzed: saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tiṭṭhati iti sambandhaḥ tehi uppannehi bodhi pakkhiya dhammehi vā yassa ariya maggassa

original: catusaccadhammā pātubhūtā, tena ariyamaggena vā vidhūpayanti yojanā. Vuttappakāranti
analyzed: catu sacca dhammā pātubhūtā tena ariya maggena vā vidhūpayanti yojanā vutta ppakārā

original: suttanipāte vuttappakāraṃ. Mārasenanti kāmādikaṃ dasavidhaṃ mārasenaṃ. “Vidhamento”tiiminā

original: vidhūpayanti ettha dhūpadhātuyā vidhamanatthaṃ dasseti, limpanatthādayo nivatteti.

original: Sūriyoti ādicco. So hi yasmā paṭhamakappikānaṃ sūraṃ janeti, tasmā sūriyoti vuccati.

original: Abbhuggatoti abhimukhaṃ uddhaṃ ākāsaṃ gato, abbhaṃ vā ākāsaṃ uggato. Abbhasaddo hi

analyzed: tattha bhagavā udānesi iti sambandhaḥ visākha puṇṇamāya ati visākhāya yuttāya puṇṇamāya

original: “Aruṇo uggamissatī”ti vattabbasamayeti sambandho. Sabbaññutanti sabbaññubhāvaṃ, anāvaraṇañāṇanti

analyzed: ajapāla kathā

original: manti yojanā. Iminā pahitattanti ettha attasaddo kāyavācakoti dasseti.
analyzed: manti yojanā iminā ettha atta saddo kāya vācako ti dasseti

original: 11. Antarāsaddena yuttattā “gayaṃ, bodhi”nti ettha sāmyatthe upayogavacananti āha “gayāya ca bodhimaṇḍassa cā”ti.
analyzed: antarā saddena gayam bodhinti ettha sāmya tthe upayoga vacananti āha gayāya ca bodhimaṇḍassa ca ati

original: Gāthāya catūsu sabbasaddesu dutiyo sabbasaddo anavasesattho, sesā sāvasesatthāti
analyzed: gāthāya catūsu sabba saddesu dutiyaḥ sabba saddaḥ anavasesa atthaḥ sesā sa avasesa atthā ti

original: dassento āha “sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhamma”ntiādi. Vacanattho suviññeyyova. Arahattaphalassāpi
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha sabbam tebhūmaka dhamma ti ādi vacana atthaḥ su viññeyyaḥ va arahatta phalassa api

original: taṇhākkhayattā vuttaṃ “taṇhākkhaye nibbāne”ti. Sayaṃsaddo attapariyāyo, abhiññāyasaddo
analyzed: taṇhā khaya ttā vuttam taṇhā kkhaye nibbāne iti sayam saddaḥ atta pariyāyaḥ abhiññāya saddaḥ

original: tu tvāpaccayantoti āha “attanāva jānitvā”ti. “Sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhamma”nti iminā
analyzed: tu āha attanā ava jānitvā iti sabbam catu bhūmaka dhammanti iminā

original: ñādhātuyā kammaṃ dasseti. “Ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddisanākāradassanaṃ.
analyzed: ñā dhātuyā kammam dasseti ayam me ācariyo ti uddisana ākāra dassanam

original: “Lokuttaradhamme”ti iminā lokiyadhamme pana ācariyo atthīti dasseti. Paṭipuggaloti
analyzed: lokuttara dhamme ti iminā lokiya dhamme pana ācariyo atthi iti dasseti paṭipuggalo ti

original: ettha paṭisaddo paṭibhāgatthoti āha “paṭibhāgapuggalo”ti. Sadisapuggalo nāma natthīti
analyzed: ettha paṭisaddo paṭibhāga attho ti āha paṭibhāga puggalo ti sadisa puggalaḥ nāma natthi iti

original: attho. Sītibhūtoti sīti hutvā bhūto, sītibhāvaṃ vā patto.
analyzed: attho sīti bhūto ti sīti hutvā bhūto sīti bhāvam vā patto

original: Kāsīnanti bahuvacanavasena vuttattā janapadānaṃ nāmaṃ. Janapadasamūhassa raṭṭhanāmattā
analyzed: kāsīna nti bahuvacana vasena vutta ttā janapadānam nāmam janapada samūhassa raṭṭha nāmattā

original: vuttaṃ “kāsiraṭṭhe”ti. “Nagara”nti iminā purasaddo nagarapariyāyoti dasseti. Paṭilābhāyāti
analyzed: vuttam kāsiraṭṭha iti nagaran ti iminā pura saddaḥ nagara pariyāyaḥ ti dasseti paṭilābhāya ati

original: paṭilābhāpanatthāya. “Bheri”nti iminā dundubhisaddo bherivācakoti dasseti. Bheri
analyzed: paṭilābhāpana thāya bherin ti iminā dundubhi saddaḥ bheri vācakaḥ ti dasseti bheri

original: hi “duṃdu”ntisaddena ubhi pūraṇametthāti dundubhīti vuccati. Dakārarakārānaṃ saṃyogaṃ
analyzed: hi duṃdunti saddena pūraṇam ettha ati dundubhī iti vuccati dakāra rakārānam saṃyogam

original: katvā dundrubhītipi pāṭho atthi, so apāṭhoyeva. “Paharissāmī”ti ettha pahārasaddena
analyzed: katvā dundrubhī itipi pāṭhaḥ atthi saḥ a pāṭhaḥ yā iva paharissāmi iti ettha pahāra saddena

original: āhaññinti ettha āpubbahanadhātuyā atthaṃ dasseti, ssāmisaddena ajjataniiṃvibhattiyā
analyzed: ettha ā pubba hana dhātuyāḥ attham dasseti ssāmi saddena ajja tani iṃ vibhattiyā

original: anāgatakāle pavattabhāvaṃ, itisaddena gamanākāravācakassa itisaddassa lopabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: anāgata kāle pavatta bhāvam iti saddena gamana ākāra vācakassa iti saddassa lopa bhāvam dasseti

original: Anantajinoti anantasaṅkhātassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa padaṭṭhānabhūtena arahattamaggañāṇena
analyzed: ananta jinoti ananta saṅkhātassa sabbaññuta ññāṇassa padaṭṭhāna bhūtena arahatta magga ñāṇena

original: sabbakilesārīnaṃ jitavā, etena phalūpacārena anantajinabhāvaṃ dasseti. Huveyya pāvusoti
analyzed: sabba kilesa arīnam jitavā etena phala upacārena ananta jina bhāvam dasseti huveyya pāvuso ti

original: ettha “huveyya api āvuso”ti padavibhāgaṃ katvā hudhātu sattatthavācako, apisaddo
analyzed: ettha huveyya api āvuso ti pada vibhāgam katvā hu dhātu satta attha vācakaḥ api saddaḥ

original: evaṃnāmavācakoti dassento āha āvuso “evaṃ nāma bhaveyyā”ti. Vakārassa pakāraṃ katvā
analyzed: evaṃnāma vācakā iti dassentaḥ āha āvuso evam nāma bhaveyya ati vakārassa pakāram katvā

original: “hupeyyā”ti pāṭhopi yujjatiyeva.
analyzed: hupeyyā iti pāṭhaḥ pi yujjatiyā iva

original: 12. “Atthāya paṭipanno”ti iminā bāhullassa atthāya paṭipanno bāhullikoti vacanatthaṃ
analyzed: atthāya paṭipanno ti iminā bāhullassa atthāya paṭipannaḥ bāhullikaḥ ti vacana attham

original: dasseti. Padhānatoti dukkaracariyāya padahanato. “Bhaṭṭho”ti iminā vibbhantoti ettha
analyzed: dasseti padhānataḥ ti dukkara cariyāya padahanataḥ bhaṭṭho ti iminā vibbhanto ti ettha

original: vipubbabhamudhātuyā anavaṭṭhānattho nāma atthato bhaṭṭhoti dasseti. Sotanti ettha
analyzed: anavaṭṭhāna tthaḥ nāma atthataḥ bhaṭṭhaḥ ti dasseti ettha

original: sotasaddassa sotaviññāṇādivācakattā “sotindriya”nti vuttaṃ. Iriyāyāti ettha iriyanaṃ
analyzed: sota saddassa sota viññāṇa ādi vācaka ttā sotindriyanti vuttam iriyāya ati ettha iriyanam

original: caraṇaṃ iriyāti vacanatthaṃ dassento āha “dukkaracariyāyā”ti. Abhijānātha noti ettha
analyzed: caraṇam iriyā ti vacana attham dassentaḥ āha dukkara cariyāya iti abhijānātha no ti ettha

original: nosaddo nusaddatthoti āha “abhijānātha nū”ti. Vākyanti vācakaṃ. Saññāpetuntipadassa
analyzed: no saddaḥ nu sadda attho ti āha abhijānātha nu ti vākyanti vācakam

original: saññāpanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “ahaṃ buddho”ti.
analyzed: saññāpana ākāram dassetum vuttam aham buddhaḥ ti

original: 13. Itoti “cakkhukaraṇī”tiādito. Padatthatoti padato ca atthato ca, padānaṃ atthato vā. Itoti yathāvuttato. Hīti saccaṃ. Suttantakathanti suttantavasena vuttavacanaṃ.
analyzed: itas ti cakkhu karaṇī iti ādeḥ padatthato ti padataḥ ca atthataḥ ca padānam atthataḥ vā itas ti yathā vuttataḥ hi iti saccam suttanta katham ti suttanta vasena vutta vacanam

original: 18. Devatākoṭīhīti brahmasaṅkhātāhi devatākoṭīhi. Patiṭṭhitassa tassa āyasmatoti sambandho. Sāva ehibhikkhuupasampadāti yojanā.
analyzed: devatā koṭīhi iti brahma saṅkhātāhi devatā koṭīhi patiṭṭhitassa tassa āyasmato ti sambandho sā va ehi bhikkhu upasampadā ti yojanā

original: 19. Dutiyadivase dhammacakkhuṃ udapādīti sambandho. “Dutiyadivase”tiādi pāṭipadadivasaṃ
analyzed: dutiya divase dhammacakkhum udapādi iti sambandhaḥ dutiya divasa itiādi pāṭipada divasam

original: upanidhāya vuttaṃ. Pakkhassāti āsaḷhīmāsakāḷapakkhassa. Sabbeva te bhikkhūti yojanā.
analyzed: upanidhāya vuttam pakkhassa āti sabbe eva te bhikkhū iti yojanā

original: Anattasuttenāti anattalakkhaṇasuttantena.
analyzed: anatta suttena ati anattalakkhaṇa suttantena

original: Pañcamiyā pakkhassāti pakkhassa pañcamiyā. Lokasminti sattaloke. “Manussaarahantoti iminā devaarahanto bahūti dasseti.
analyzed: pañcamiyā pakkhassa ati pakkhassa pañcamiyā lokasmin ti satta loke manussa arahanto ti iminā deva arahantaḥ bahu iti dasseti

original: 7. Pabbajjākathā
analyzed: pabbajjā kathā

original: 31. Porāṇānuporāṇānanti purāṇe ca anupurāṇe ca bhavānaṃ. Ekasaṭṭhīti eko ca saṭṭhi ca, ekena vā adhikā saṭṭhi ekasaṭṭhi.
analyzed: purāṇe ca anupurāṇe ca bhavānam eka saṭṭhī iti ca saṭṭhi ca ekena vā adhikā saṭṭhi eka saṭṭhi

original: Tatrāti tesu ekasaṭṭhimanussaarahantesu. Pubbayogoti pubbe kato upāyo, pubbūpanissayoti
analyzed: tatra ati tesu eka saṭṭhi manussa arahantesu pubba yogaḥ ti pubbe kataḥ upāyaḥ pubba upanissayaḥ ti

original: attho. Vaggabandhenāti samūhaṃ katvā bandhena. Teti pañcapaññāsa janā. Jhāpessāmāti
analyzed: attho vagga bandhena ati samūham katvā bandhena te iti pañca paññāsa janāḥ jhāpessāma ati

original: ḍayhissāma. Nīhariṃsūti gāmato nīhariṃsu. Tesūti pañcapaññāsajanesu. Pañca jane ṭhapetvāti
analyzed: ḍayhissāma nīhariṃsu iti gāmataḥ nīhariṃsu tesu iti pañca paññāsa janesu pañca jane ṭhapetvā ati

original: sambandho. Sesāti pañcahi janehi avasesā. Soti yaso dārako. Tepīti cattāropi janā.
analyzed: sambandho sesā ati pañcahi janehi avasesā so ti yaso dārako te pi iti cattāraḥ api janā

original: Tatthāti sarīre. Te sabbepīti yasassa mātāpitubhariyāhi saddhiṃ sabbepi te sahāyakā. Tenāti pubbayogena.
analyzed: tattha ati sarīre te sabbe api iti yasassa mātā pitu bhariyāhi saddhim sabbe api te sahāyakā tena ati pubba yogena

original: Āmantesīti kathesi.
analyzed: āmantesi iti kathesi

original: 32. Dibbesu visayesu bhavā dibbā lobhapāsāti dassento āha “dibbā nāmā”tiādi. Lobhapāsāti
analyzed: dibbesu visayesu bhavāḥ dibbāḥ lobha pāsā iti dassentaḥ āha dibbāḥ nāma atiādi lobha pāsā iti

original: lobhasaṅkhātā bandhanā. Asavanatāti ettha karaṇatthe paccattavacananti āha “asavanatāyā”ti.
analyzed: lobha saṅkhātā bandhanā asavana tā ti ettha karaṇa atthe paccatta vacananti āha asavana tāya ati

original: Parihāyantīti ettha kena parihāyantīti āha “visesādhigamato”ti. Visesādhigamatoti
analyzed: parihāyanti iti ettha kena parihāyanti iti āha visesa adhigamataḥ ti visesa adhigamataḥ ti

original: maggaphalasaṅkhātassa visesassa adhigamato.
analyzed: magga phala saṅkhātassa visesassa adhigamataḥ

original: 33. Antaṃ lāmakaṃ karotīti antakoti vacanatthaṃ dassento āha “lāmakā”ti. “Hīnasattā”ti
analyzed: antam lāmakam karoti iti antakā uti vacana attham dassentaḥ āha lāmakā ati hīna sattā iti

original: iminā antakassa sarūpaṃ dasseti. Āmantanapadametaṃ. Tanti rāgapāsaṃ. Hīti saccaṃ.
analyzed: iminā antakassa sarūpam dasseti āmantana padam etam tanti rāga pāsam hi iti saccam

original: Soti māro pāpimā. Antalikkhe carantānaṃ pañcābhiññānampi bandhanattā antalikkhe carati
analyzed: so ti māro pāpimā antalikkhe carantānam pañca abhiññānam pi bandhana ttā antalikkhe carati

original: pavattatīti antalikkhacaroti vacanatthena rāgapāso “antalikkhacaro”ti mārena pāpimatā vutto.
analyzed: pavattati iti antalikkha caro ti vacana atthena rāgapāso antalikkha caro ti mārena pāpimatā vutto

original: 34. Nānājanapadatoti ekissāpi disāya nānājanapadato. “Anujānāmi…pe… pabbājethā”tiādimhi
analyzed: nānā janapadato ti ekissā api disāya nānā janapadataḥ anujānāmi pe pabbājetha atiādimhi

original: vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Pabbājentena bhikkhunā pabbājetabboti sambandho.
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ evam veditabbaḥ iti yojanā pabbājentena bhikkhunā pabbājetabbaḥ iti sambandho

original: Ye paṭikkhittā puggalāti yojanā. Paratoti parasmiṃ. “Na bhikkhave…pe… pabbājetabbo”ti
analyzed: ye paṭikkhittā puggalā ati yojanā paratas ti parasmin na pabbājetabbaḥ ti

original: pāḷiṃ ādiṃ katvāti yojanā. Teti paṭikkhittapuggale. Sopi cāti sopi ca puggalo. Anuññātoyeva
analyzed: pāḷim ādim katvā iti yojanā te iti paṭikkhitta puggale saḥ api ca ati saḥ api ca puggalaḥ anuññātaḥ yeva

original: pabbājetabboti sambandho. Tassa cāti puggalassa ca, atha vā tesañca mātāpitūnaṃ.
analyzed: pabbājetabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ tassa ca ati puggalassa ca atha vā tesam ca mātā pitūnam

original: Vacanavipallāso hesa. Anujānanalakkhaṇaṃ vaṇṇayissāmāti sambandho.
analyzed: vacana vipallāsaḥ hesa anujānana lakkhaṇam vaṇṇayissāma ati sambandho

original: Evanti iminā vuttanayena. Casaddo vākyasampiṇḍanattho. Sace acchinnakeso hoti ca,
analyzed: evam ti iminā vutta nayena ca saddaḥ vākya sampiṇḍana ttho sace acchinna kesaḥ hoti ca

original: sace ekasīmāya aññepi bhikkhū atthi cāti attho. Aññepīti attanā aparepi. Bhaṇḍūti
analyzed: sace eka sīmāya aññe pi bhikkhū atthi ca ati attho aññe pi iti attanā apare pi

original: muṇḍo, soyeva kammaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ. Tassāti bhaṇḍukammassa. Okāsoti pabbajjāya khaṇo.
analyzed: muṇḍaḥ so yā iva kammam bhaṇḍu kammam tassa ati bhaṇḍu kammassa okāsaḥ ti pabbajjāya khaṇaḥ

original: “Okāsaṃ na labhatī”ti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “sace”tiādi.
analyzed: okāsam na labhati iti vatvā tassa kāraṇam dassetum vuttam sacā itiādi

original: Avuttopīti ettha pisaddo vutto pana kā nāma kathāti dasseti. Upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājetīti
analyzed: avuttaḥ api iti ettha pi saddaḥ vuttaḥ pana kā nāma kathā ati dasseti upajjhāyam uddissa pabbājeti iti

original: ettha pabbajjā catubbidhā tāpasapabbajjā paribbājakapabbajjā sāmaṇerapabbajjā upasampadapabbajjāti.
analyzed: ettha pabbajjā catubbidhā tāpasa pabbajjā paribbājaka pabbajjā sāmaṇera pabbajjā upasampada pabbajjā ati

original: Tattha kesamassuharaṇaṃ tāpasapabbajjā nāma vakkalādigahaṇato paṭhamameva vajitabbattā.
analyzed: tattha kesa massu haraṇam tāpasapabbajjā nāma vakkala ādi gahaṇato paṭhamam eva vajitabba ttā

original: Isipabbajjātipi tassāyeva nāmaṃ. Kesamassuharaṇameva paribbājakapabbajjā nāma kāsāyādigahaṇato
analyzed: isipabbajjā atipi tassāya eva nāmam kesa massu haraṇam eva paribbājakapabbajjā nāma kāsāya ādi gahaṇato

original: paṭhamameva vajitabbattā. Kesamassuharaṇañca kāsāyacchādanañca sāmaṇerapabbajjā nāma
analyzed: paṭhamam eva vajitabba ttā kesa massu haraṇañca kāsāya chādanañca sāmaṇerapabbajjā nāma

original: saraṇagahaṇato paṭhamameva vajitabbattā. Upasampadapabbajjā tividhā ehibhikkhuupasampadapabbajjā
analyzed: saraṇa gahaṇataḥ paṭhamam eva vajitabba ttā upasampada pabbajjā tividhā ehi bhikkhu upasampada pabbajjā

original: saraṇagahaṇūpasampadapabbajjā ñatticatutthavācikūpasampadapabbajjāti. Tattha ehibhikkhūpasampadapabbajjāyaṃ
analyzed: saraṇa gahaṇa upasampada pabbajjā ñatti catuttha vācika upasampada pabbajjā ti tattha ehi bhikkhu upasampada pabbajjā ayam

original: kesamassuharaṇādi sabbaṃ ekatova sampajjati “ehi bhikkhū”ti bhagavato vacanena abhinipphannattā.
analyzed: kesa massu haraṇa ādi sabbam ekatas va sampajjati ehi bhikkhu iti bhagavataḥ vacanena abhinipphanna ttā

original: Saraṇagahaṇūpasampadapabbajjā sāmaṇerapabbajjasadisāyeva. Kesamassuharaṇañca kāsāyacchādanañca
analyzed: saraṇa gahaṇa upasampada pabbajjā sāmaṇera pabbajja sadisāya iva kesa massu haraṇañca kāsāya chādanañca

original: saraṇagahaṇañca ñatticatutthavācikūpasampadapabbajjā nāma kammavācāgahaṇato paṭhamameva
analyzed: saraṇa gahaṇam ca ñatti catuttha vācikūpa sampada pabbajjāḥ nāma kamma vācā gahaṇato paṭhamam eva

original: vajitabbattā. Tattha sāmaṇerapabbajjaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājetī”ti.
analyzed: vajitabba ttā tattha sāmaṇera pabbajjam sandhāya vuttam upajjhāyam uddissa pabbājeti iti

original: Upajjhāyaṃ uddissāti upajjhāyassa veyyāvaccakaraṭṭhānaniyamaṃ katvā. Pabbajjākamme
analyzed: upajjhāyam uddissāti upajjhāyassa veyyāvacca kara ṭṭhāna niyamam katvā pabbajjā kamme

original: attano issariyamakatvāti attho. Daharena bhikkhunā kesacchedanaṃ kāsāyacchādanaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ issariyam a katvā ti attho daharena bhikkhunā kesa chedanam kāsāya chādanam

original: saraṇadānanti tīṇi kiccāni kātabbāniyeva. Keci “saraṇāni pana sayaṃ dātabbānī”ti
analyzed: saraṇa dānanti tīṇi kiccāni kātabbāni iva keci saraṇāni pana sayam dātabbāni iti

original: pāṭhaṃ idhānetvā daharena bhikkhunā saraṇāni na dātabbānīti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ
analyzed: pāṭham idha ānetvā daharena bhikkhunā saraṇāni na dātabbāni iti vadanti tam na gahetabbam

original: daharassa bhikkhuttā, bhikkhūnaṃ pabbājetuṃ labhanattā ca. Upajjhāyo ce kesacchedanañca
analyzed: daharassa bhikkhuttā bhikkhūnam pabbājetum labhana ttā ca upajjhāyaḥ ce kesa chedanam ca

original: kāsāyacchādanañca akatvā pabbajjatthaṃ saraṇāniyeva deti, na ruhati pabbajjā pabbajjāya
analyzed: kāsāya chādanañca a katvā pabbajja attham saraṇāniyā iva deti na ruhati pabbajjā pabbajjāya

original: akattabbattā. Kammavācaṃ sāvetvā upasampādeti, ruhati upasampadā apattacīvarānaṃ
analyzed: a kattabba ttā kamma vācam sāvetvā upasampādeti ruhati upasampadā

original: upasampadasiddhito, kammavipattiyā abhāvato ca. Khaṇḍasīmanti upacārasīmaṭṭhaṃ baddhasīmaṃ.
analyzed: upasampad asiddhitaḥ kamma vipattiyāḥ abhāvato ca khaṇḍa sīmanti upacāra sīmaṭṭham baddha sīmaṃ

original: Pabbājetvāti kesacchedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “kāsāyāni acchādetvā”ti kāsāyacchādanassa
analyzed: pabbājetvā iti kesa chedanam sandhāya vuttam kāsāyāni a chādetvā iti kāsāya chādanassa

original: visuṃ vuttattā. Sāmaṇerassa saraṇadānassa aruhattā “saraṇāni pana sayaṃ dātabbānī”ti
analyzed: visum vutta ttā sāmaṇerassa saraṇa dānassa a ruha ttā saraṇāni pana sayam dātabbāni iti

original: vuttaṃ. Purisaṃ pabbājetunti sambandho. Hīti saccaṃ. Āṇattiyāti bhikkhūnaṃ āṇattiyā.
analyzed: vuttam purisam pabbājetunti sambandhaḥ hi iti saccam āṇattiyā ti bhikkhūnam āṇattiyā

original: Yena kenacīti gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu yena kenaci.

original: āpajjatīti assa, so vā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti yojanā. Paṇāmetabboti ettha papubba namudhātu
