original: atthapakaraṇādivasena idha apasādanatthoti āha “apasādetabbo”ti. Adhimattanti adhikappamāṇaṃ.
analyzed: attha pakaraṇa ādi vasena idha apasādana ttho ti āha apasādetabbaḥ iti adhimattanti adhikappamāṇam

original: Gehasitapemanti mettāsinehaṃ. Vuttapaṭipakkhanayenāti kaṇhapakkhe vuttena paṭipakkhena
analyzed: geha sita pemanti mettā sineham vutta paṭipakkha nayena ati kaṇha pakkhe vuttena paṭipakkhena

original: nayena. Alaṃ paṇāmetunti ettha alaṃsaddassa arahatthapaṭikkhittesu dvīsu atthesu
analyzed: nayena alam paṇāmetum ti ettha alam saddassa arahattha paṭikkhittesu dvīsu atthesu

original: arahatthoti āha “yutto paṇāmetu”nti.
analyzed: arahatthā iti āha yuttaḥ paṇāmetun ti

original: Sātisāro hotīti ettha pakatibhāvaṃ atikkamitvā saraṇaṃ pavattanaṃ atisāro, doso.
analyzed: sa atisāraḥ hoti iti ettha pakati bhāvam atikkamitvā saraṇam pavattanam atisāraḥ doso

original: Saṃvijjati so etassāti sātisāroti dassento āha “sadoso hotī”ti. Tassatthaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: saṃvijjati saḥ etassa ati sa atisāraḥ iti dassentaḥ āha sa dosaḥ hoti iti tassattham dassetuṃ

original: vuttaṃ “āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti. Āpattinti dukkaṭāpattiṃ. Tanti vattaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam āpattim āpajjati iti āpattim ti dukkaṭa āpattim tat ti vattam

original: Tesanti saddhivihārikānaṃ. Vattanti bahukānaṃ saddhivihārikānaṃ vattaṃ. Sādiyanaṃ
analyzed: tesanti saddhivihārikānam vattanti bahukānam saddhivihārikānam vattam sādiyanam

original: vā…pe… bālo hotīti ettha bālassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “sādiyanaṃ vā asādiyanaṃ
analyzed: vāpe bālaḥ hoti iti ettha bālassa kāraṇam dassetum vuttam sādiyanam vā a sādiyanam

original: vā na jānātī”ti. Sādiyanassa vā asādiyanassa vā ajānanattā bālo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vā na jānāti iti sādiyanassa vā a sādiyanassa vā a jānana ttā bālaḥ hoti iti vuttam hoti

original: Ajānanassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “bālo hotī”ti. Bālattā sādiyanaṃ vā asādiyanaṃ
analyzed: a jānanassa kāraṇam dassetum vuttam bālaḥ hoti iti bāla ttā sādiyanam vā a sādiyanam

original: vā na jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tesūti bahukesu saddhivihārikesu. Tassāti vattasampannabhikkhussa.
analyzed: vā na jānāti iti vuttam hoti tesu āti bahukesu saddhivihārikesu tassa āti vatta sampanna bhikkhussa

original: Tesanti itaresaṃ saddhivihārikānaṃ.
analyzed: tesanti itaresam saddhivihārikānam

original: Rādhabrāhmaṇavatthukathā
analyzed: rādha brāhmaṇavatthukathā

original: 69. Kiñcāpi āyasmā sāriputto jānātīti yojanā. Iminā “kiṃ nu kho ajānanto pucchī”ti
analyzed: kiñca api āyasmā sāriputto jānāti iti yojanā iminā kim nu kho a jānantaḥ pucchi iti

original: āsaṅkaṃ nivāreti. Bhagavā anuññātukāmo hotīti sambandho. Panasaddo garahattho, tathā

original: koṭiukkaṃso. Seṭṭhoti pavaro uttamo.
analyzed: koṭiukkaṃso seṭṭhaḥ ti pavaraḥ uttamaḥ

original: “Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalenā”ti ettha byattapaṭibalānaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena āti ettha byatta paṭibalānam visesam dassetum vuttam

original: Suggahitanti sāṭṭhakathāya suṭṭhu gahitaṃ. Ayampīti pisaddo purimabhikkhuṃ apekkhati.

original: Imasmiṃ attheti imasmiṃ vatthumhi, imasmiṃ visayeti attho. Byatirekānvayavasena paṭibalaṃ

original: dassento āha “yo panā”tiādi. Yo pana na sakkotīti sambandho. Kasmāti āha “kāsasosasemhādinā
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha yaḥ pana atiādi yaḥ pana na sakkoti iti sambandho kasmā iti āha kāsa sosa semha ādinā

original: vā”tiādi. Tattha kāso ca soso ca semho ca, te ādayo yassa gelaññassāti kāsasosasemhādi,

original: ādisaddena eḷamūgādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Oṭṭho ca danto ca jivhā ca, tā ādayo yesaṃ tāluādīnanti

original: oṭṭhadantajivhādayo, tesaṃ. Padabyañjanehīti padaakkharehi. Byañjanasaddo hettha
analyzed: oṭṭha danta jivhā ādayo tesam pada byañjanehi iti pada akkharehi byañjana saddaḥ ha ittha

original: 71. Upasampannasamanantarāti ettha upasampannassa samanantarāti atthaṃ nivārento
analyzed: upasampanna samanantarā ti ettha upasampannassa samanantarā ti attham nivārento

analyzed: dhara dhātussa attham dasseti ukkhipana attham dassentaḥ āha sāmaṇeḥ abhāvā

original: vā uddharitvā”ti. “Paṭiccā”ti iminā upādāyāti ettha samīpe ādiyitvāti saddatthamagahetvā

analyzed: saṅketa attha vasena pākaṭa ttā tassa saṅketa attham dasseti adhippāya ttham dasseti iti attho

analyzed: paṇāmanā khamāpanā kathā

analyzed: tesu iti catūsu antevāsikesu

original: Āṇattivinicchayo
analyzed: āṇatti vinicchayaḥ

original: Yāva āgamanāti upajjhāyassa yāva āgamanā. Nanti upajjhāyaṃ. “Vāsentiyevā”tipade kāritakammaṃ.

original: sahāye pariyesati. Soti upajjhāyo.
analyzed: sahāye pariyesati so ti upajjhāyaḥ

original: Tāvāti mahātherehi, mahātherānaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ. Aññatthāti upajjhāyassa vihārato aññaṃ

original: ettha ādisaddena ñātiviyogādidoso gahetabbo. Taṃyevāti attanā vasitaṃ tameva ṭhānaṃ.

analyzed: assamaḥ tasmin ṭhāne māpita ttā nagaram pi kapilavatthu iti vuccati ayanti vakkhamānakathā

original: Suddhodanamahārājāti ettha suddhodanoti tassa rañño nāmaṃ. Atha vā suddhaṃ odanaṃ
analyzed: suddhodana mahā rāja ati ettha suddhodano ti tassa rañño nāmam atha vā suddham odanaṃ

original: imassāti suddhodano, soyeva mahārājā suddhodanamahārājā. Viharati kirāti sambandho.
analyzed: imassa ati suddhodanaḥ saḥ yā iva mahā rājā suddhodana mahā rājā viharati sambandho

original: Soti suddhodanamahārājā. Rājagahanti rājagahanagaraṃ. Sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto.
analyzed: saḥ iti suddhodana mahā rājā rājagahanti rājagaha nagaram sādhu iti āyācana atthe nipātaḥ

original: Āyācāmīti hi attho. Meti mama, puttanti sambandho, anādare vā sāmivacanaṃ. Soti amacco.
analyzed: āyācāmi iti hi atthaḥ mā iti mama sambandhaḥ anādare vā sāmi vacanam saḥ ti amaccaḥ

original: Sādhūti sampaṭicchanatthe nipāto. Evanti hi attho. Athāti tasmiṃ nisīdanakāle. Assāti
analyzed: sādhu iti sampaṭicchana atthe nipātaḥ evam ti hi atthaḥ atha ati tasmin nisīdana kāle

original: purisasahassaparivārassa amaccassa. Tatoti yācanakāraṇā. Nanti purisasahassaparivāraṃ
analyzed: purisa sahassa parivārassa amaccassa tatas ti yācana kāraṇāḥ nanti purisa sahassa parivāram

original: amaccaṃ. Tatthevāti rājagaheyeva. Tepīti aṭṭha dūtāpi. Teti nava dūtā.
analyzed: amaccam tattha iva ati te pi iti aṭṭha dūtā api te iti nava dūtā

original: Athāti tato pacchā. Ekadivasajātakanti ekasmiṃ divase jātakaṃ. Soti kāḷudāyīamacco.
analyzed: atha ati tatas pacchā eka divasa jātakanti ekasmin divase jātakam saḥ ti

original: Pabbajitvāpīti pisaddena “apabbajitvāpī”ti atthaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Tathevāti yathā nava
analyzed: pabbajitvā api iti pi saddena a pabbajitvā api iti attham sampiṇḍeti tathā iva ati yathā nava

original: dūtā saparivārā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, tathevāti attho. Soti kāḷudāyī. Sambhatesūti
analyzed: dūtā sa parivārā arahattam pāpuṇiṃsu tathā iva ati attho saḥ iti kāḷudāyī sambhatesu iti

original: sambharitesu gahetvā niṭṭhāpitesūti attho. Vissaṭṭhakammesūti vissaṭṭhā kammantā
analyzed: sambharitesu gahetvā niṭṭhāpitesu iti atthaḥ vissaṭṭha kammesu iti vissaṭṭhā kammantā

original: etesanti vissaṭṭhakammantā, tesu. Supupphitesūti sundarapupphasañjātesu. Paṭipajjanakkhameti
analyzed: etesan ti vissaṭṭha kammantā tesu su pupphitesu iti sundara puppha sañjātesu paṭipajjana kkhamā iti

original: paṭipajjanatthāya khame yogye. Gamanavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇesīti sambandho. Saṭṭhimattāhīti
analyzed: paṭipajjana tthāya khame yogye gamana vaṇṇam saṃvaṇṇesi iti sambandhaḥ

original: saṭṭhipamāṇāhi. Etanti etaṃ saṃvaṇṇassa kāraṇaṃ kinti pucchi. Cārikaṃ pakkamituṃ
analyzed: etat ti etam saṃvaṇṇassa kāraṇam kinti pucchi cārikam pakkamitum

original: kāloti yojanā. Tena hīti uyyojanatthe nipāto. Bhagavā pakkāmīti sambandho. Parivutoti
analyzed: kālo ti yojanā tena hi iti uyyojana atthe nipātaḥ bhagavā pakkāmi iti sambandho parivutaḥ ti

original: parisamantato vuto āvuto nivuto hutvāti sambandho. Aturitacārikanti ajavanacārikaṃ.
analyzed: parisamantataḥ vutaḥ āvutaḥ nivutaḥ hutvā ati sambandhaḥ a turita cārikam ti a javana cārikam

original: Evanti iminā nayena. Bhagavati pakkante ca satīti yojanā. Nikkhantadivasatoti phagguṇapuṇṇamiyā
analyzed: evanti iminā nayena bhagavati pakkante ca sati iti yojanā nikkhanta divasāt ti

original: pāṭipadadivasato. Uttamabhojanarasassāti uttamabhojanarasena. Dassathāti dadeyyātha.
analyzed: pāṭipada divasataḥ uttama bhojana rasassa ati uttama bhojana rasena dassatha ati dadeyyātha

original: Tenevāti saddhāya uppādanakāraṇeneva. Nanti kāḷudāyiṃ. Bhagavā ṭhapesīti sambandho.
analyzed: tena iva ati saddhāya uppādana kāraṇena iva nanti kāḷudāyim bhagavā ṭhapesi iti sambandhaḥ

original: Etadagganti eso aggo. Yadidanti yo ayaṃ. Etadaggeti etadaggaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: etat aggam ti esaḥ aggaḥ yat idam ti yaḥ ayam etad aggā iti etad agga ṭṭhāne

original: Sākiyāpi kho pahiṇiṃsūti sambandho. Ñātiseṭṭhanti ñātīnaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, ñātiyeva vā seṭṭhaṃ,
analyzed: sākiyā api kho pahiṇiṃsu iti sambandhaḥ ñāti seṭṭham ti ñātīnam seṭṭham vā seṭṭham

original: bhagavantanti yojanā. Nigrodhasakkassāti nigrodhanāmakassa sakkassa. Tatthāti nigrodhasakkassa
analyzed: bhagavantanti yojanā nigrodha sakkassa ati nigrodha nāmakassa sakkassa tattha ati nigrodha sakkassa

original: ārāme. Paccuggamananti paṭimukhaṃ uṭṭhahitvā gamanaṃ. Tatoti pahiṇato, paranti sambandho.
analyzed: ārāme paccuggamanam ti paṭimukham uṭṭhahitvā gamanam tatas ti pahiṇataḥ paranti sambandho

original: Rājakumāre ca rājakumārikāyo ca pahiṇiṃsūti yojanā. Tesanti rājakumārarājakumārikānaṃ.
analyzed: rāja kumāre ca rāja kumārikāyo ca yojanā

original: Tatrāti nigrodhārāme. Māno jāti sabhāvo etesanti mānajātikā, mānena, māno vā thaddho
analyzed: tatra ati nigrodha ārāme mānaḥ māna jātikāḥ mānena mānaḥ vā

original: etesanti mānathaddhā. Teti sākiyā, āhaṃsūti sambandho.
analyzed: te iti sambandhaḥ

original: Tesūti sākiyesu. Neti ñātayo. Vuṭṭhāyāti catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhahitvā. Tesanti ñātīnaṃ.
analyzed: tesu iti sākiyesu na iti ñātayaḥ vuṭṭhāya ati catuttha jhānataḥ vuṭṭhahitvā tesanti ñātīnam

original: Kaṇḍambarukkhamūleti kaṇḍanāmakena uyyānapālena ropimassa ambarukkhassa āsanne. Rājāti
analyzed: kaṇḍamba rukkha mūla iti kaṇḍa nāmakena uyyāna pālena ropimassa amba rukkhassa āsanne rājā ati

original: suddhodanamahārājā. Voti tumhākaṃ, pādeti sambandho. Ayanti vandanā. Jambucchāyāyāti
analyzed: suddhodana mahā rājā tumhākam pāda iti sambandhaḥ ayanti vandanā jambu chāyāya ati

original: jamburukkhassa chāyāya. Iti āhāti yojanā.
analyzed: jamburukkhassa chāyāya iti āha ati yojanā

original: Sikhāppattoti aggappatto, koṭippattoti attho. Tatoti nisīdanato, paranti sambandho.
analyzed: sikhāppatto ti agga ppatto koṭippatto ti attho tatas ti nisīdanato paranti sambandho

original: Pokkharavassanti padumavane vuṭṭhavassasadisaṃ. Tambavaṇṇanti lohitavaṇṇaṃ. Tanti
analyzed: pokkhara vassanti paduma vane vuṭṭha vassa sadisam tamba vaṇṇanti lohita vaṇṇam tanti

original: apatanaṃ bhagavā kathesīti sambandho.
analyzed: apatanam bhagavā kathesi iti sambandhaḥ

original: Dutiyadivaseti kapilavatthuṃ pattadivasato dutiye divase. Indakhīleti nagarassa ummāre.
analyzed: dutiya divasa iti kapilavatthum patta divasataḥ dutiye divase indakhīla iti nagarassa ummāre

original: Kathanti kenākārena cariṃsu nu khoti yojanā. Agamaṃsu kiṃ cariṃsu kinti yojanā. Sapadānacāranti
analyzed: kathanti kena ākārena cariṃsu nu khalu iti yojanā agamaṃsu kim cariṃsu kinti yojanā

original: gharapaṭipāṭikhaṇḍanavirahitena saha pavattaṃ cāraṃ. Tatoti āvajjanato, paranti sambandho.
analyzed: ghara paṭipāṭi khaṇḍana virahitena saha pavattam cāram tatas ti āvajjanataḥ paranti sambandhaḥ

original: Ayameva vaṃsoti pubbabuddhānaṃ ayameva vaṃso. Ayaṃ paveṇīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Anusikkhantāti
analyzed: ayam eva vaṃso ti pubbabuddhānam ayam eva vaṃsaḥ ayam paveṇī iti tassa iva vevacanam anusikkhantā ti

original: anu paṭibhāgaṃ sikkhantā. Niviṭṭhagehatoti nivāsanatthāya visitagehato. Ayyoti adhipo
analyzed: anu paṭibhāgam sikkhantā niviṭṭha gehataḥ ti nivāsana atthāya visita gehataḥ ayyaḥ ti adhipaḥ

original: sāmīti attho. Siddhatthakumāroti sabbalokassa siddho attho asmiṃ atthīti siddhattho,
analyzed: sāmi iti siddhattha kumāro ti sabba lokassa siddhaḥ attho asmin atthi iti siddhattho

original: soyeva kumāro siddhatthakumāro. Sīhapañjaranti vātapānaṃ. Tañhi sīharūpaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: kumāro siddhattha kumāro vāta pānam tat hi sīha rūpam dassetvā

original: katapañjarattā sīhapañjaranti vuccati. Dassanabyāvaṭoti dassane, dassanatthāya vā
analyzed: kata pañjara ttā sīhapañjaranti vuccati dassana byāvaṭo ti dassane dassana atthāya vā

original: byāvaṭo. Rāhulamātāpi devī ārocesīti sambandho. Kapālahatthoti kapālo hatthesu assa
analyzed: byāvaṭaḥ rāhula mātā api devī ārocesi iti sambandho kapāla hatthaḥ ti kapālaḥ hatthesu assa

original: bhagavatoti kapālahattho, hutvāti sambandho. Nānāvirāgasamujjalāyāti nānāṭhānesu
analyzed: bhagavatā iti kapāla hatthaḥ hutvā iti sambandhaḥ nānā virāga samujjalāya iti nānā ṭhānesu

original: virāgāya samujjalāya. Virocamānaṃ bhagavantanti sambandho.
analyzed: virāgāya samujjalāya virocamānam sambandhaḥ

original: Uṇhīsatoti siroveṭhanato. Tañhi uparisīse nahati bandhati, nahīyati bandhīyatīti
analyzed: siroveṭhanato tat hi upari sīse nahati bandhati nahīyati bandhīyati iti

original: vā uṇhīsoti vuccati. Narasīhagāthāhi nāmāti narasīhagāthānāmakāhi. Tā hi yasmā naroyeva
analyzed: vā uṇhīso ti vuccati narasīhagāthāhi nāma ati narasīhagāthā nāmakāhi tāḥ hi yasmai

original: sabbasattānaṃ sīho seṭṭho, narānaṃ, naresu vā sīho seṭṭhoti narasīho, tassa pakāsakā
analyzed: sabba sattānam sīhaḥ seṭṭhaḥ narānam naresu vā sīhaḥ seṭṭhaḥ ti narasīhaḥ tassa pakāsakā

original: gāthā honti, tasmā narasīhagāthāti vuccanti. Raññoti sassurarañño, mātularañño vā.
analyzed: gāthāḥ honti tasmā narasīhagāthā ti vuccanti rañño ti sa ssura raññaḥ mātula raññaḥ vā

original: Saṃviggahadayoti calanacitto. Saṇṭhāpayamānoti suṭṭhu ṭhāpayamāno. Turitaturitanti
analyzed: saṃvigga hadayo ti calana citto saṇṭhāpayamāno ti suṭṭhu ṭhāpayamāno turita turitanti

original: turitato turitaṃ, atisīghanti attho. Kiṃ bhanteti kiṃ kāraṇā bhante. Ahuvatthāti
analyzed: turitataḥ turitam ati sīghanti kim bhante iti kim kāraṇā bhante ahuvattha ati

original: hiyyattanīmajjhimapurisasaṅkhātāya tthavibhattiyā hūdhātussa ūkārassa uvādeso hoti,
analyzed: hiyyattanī majjhima purisa saṅkhātāya ttha vibhattiyā hū dhātussa ūkārassa u vādesaḥ hoti

original: tasmā tumhe evaṃsaññino ahuvatthāti yojanā. Vaṃsacārittametanti etaṃ piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ
analyzed: tasmā tumhe evaṃsaññinaḥ yojanā etam piṇḍāya caraṇam

original: vaṃsato paveṇito cārittaṃ. Tattha cāti mahāsammatakhattiyavaṃse ca. Ayanti mahāsammatakhattiyavaṃso.
analyzed: vaṃsataḥ paveṇito cārittam tattha ca ati mahā sammata khattiya vaṃse ca mahā sammata khattiya vaṃso

original: Antaravīthiyanti vīthiyā majjhe. Ṭhitova āhāti sambandho.
analyzed: antara vīthiyanti vīthiyāḥ majjhe āha iti sambandhaḥ

original: Uttiṭṭheti uddissa, uṭṭhahitvā vā piṇḍāya tiṭṭhane. Dhammaṃ sucaritanti suṭṭhu caritabbaṃ
analyzed: uttiṭṭha iti uddissa uṭṭhahitvā vā piṇḍāya tiṭṭhane dhammam su caritanti suṭṭhu caritabbam

original: bhikkhācariyasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ. Careti careyya. Dhammacārīti bhikkhācariyasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhā cariya saṅkhātam dhammam careti careyya dhamma cārī iti bhikkhā cariya saṅkhātam

original: dhammaṃ caraṇasīlo samaṇo. Sukhaṃ setīti upalakkhaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Sesairiyāpathāpi
analyzed: dhammam caraṇa sīlo samaṇo sukham seti iti upalakkhaṇa vasena vuttam

original: lakkhaṇahāravasena gahetabbā samānakiccattā. Asmiñca loke paramhi ca loketi yojanā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa hāra vasena gahetabbā samāna kicca ttā asmin ca loke paramhi ca loke iti yojanā

original: Na taṃ duccaritaṃ careti vesiyādigocarasaṅkhātaṃ duṭṭhu caritabbaṃ taṃ dhammaṃ na careyya.
analyzed: na tam duccaritam cara iti vesiyā ādi gocara saṅkhātam duṭṭhu caritabbam tam dhammam na careyya

original: Ettha ca paṭhamagāthaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ kathetvā rājānaṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi,
analyzed: ettha ca paṭhama gātham antara vīthiyam kathetvā rājānam sotāpatti phale patiṭṭhāpesi

original: dutiyagāthaṃ pitunivesane kathetvā mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale, rājānaṃ sakadāgāmiphale
analyzed: dutiya gātham pitu nivesane kathetvā mahāpajāpatim sotāpatti phale rājānam sakadāgāmi phale

original: patiṭṭhāpesīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammapālajātakaṃ sutvāti puna aparasmiṃ divase dhammapālajātakaṃ
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpesi iti daṭṭhabbam dhammapāla jātakam sutvā iti puna aparasmin divase dhammapāla jātakam

original: sutvā. Maraṇasamayeti maraṇāsannakāle, maraṇasamayasamīpe vā, samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
analyzed: sutvā maraṇa samaya iti maraṇa āsanna kāle maraṇa samaya samīpe vā samīpa atthe ca itam bhumma vacanam

original: Sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikatvā parivisīti sambandho. Sabbaṃ itthāgāranti sabbo orodho.
analyzed: sotāpatti phalam sacchikatvā parivisīti sambandhaḥ sabbam itthāgāram ti sabbaḥ orodho

original: So hi itthīnaṃ agāranti itthāgāranti vuccati. Iminā vacanatthena agārameva mukhyato
analyzed: saḥ hi itthīnam agāranti itthāgāranti vuccati iminā vacana tthena agāram eva mukhyatas

original: labbhati, rājitthiyo pana upacārenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sā panāti rāhulamātā pana. Parijanenāti
analyzed: labbhati rājitthiyaḥ pana upacārena ati daṭṭhabbam sā pana ati rāhula mātā pana parijanena ati

original: parivārena. Nanti ayyaputtaṃ. “Rājāna”ntipadaṃ “gāhāpetvā”tipade kāritakammaṃ, “patta”ntipadaṃ
analyzed: parivārena nanti ayya puttam rājā anantipadam gāhāpetvā atipade kārita kammam pattantipadam

original: tattheva dhātukammaṃ. Rājadhītāyāti suppabuddharañño dhītāya. Sāti rājadhītā. Gopphakesūti
analyzed: tattha iva dhātu kammam rāja dhītāya ati suppabuddha raññaḥ dhītāya sā ati rāja dhītā gopphakesu

original: caraṇagaṇṭhīsu bhagavantaṃ gahetvāti yojanā. Atha vā bhagavato gopphake gahetvāti
analyzed: caraṇa gaṇṭhīsu bhagavantam gahetvā iti yojanā atha vā bhagavataḥ gopphake gahetvā iti

original: yojanā. Evañhi sati upayogatthe bhummavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: yojanā evam hi sati upayoga tthe bhumma vacanan ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Rājā kathesīti sambandho. Anacchariyanti na acchariyaṃ, accharaṃ paharituṃ na yogyanti attho. Rājadhītā yaṃ attānaṃ rakkhi, idaṃ anacchariyanti yojanā.
analyzed: rājā kathesi iti sambandhaḥ na acchariyam accharam paharitum na atthaḥ rāja dhītā yam attānam rakkhi idam yojanā

original: Taṃdivasamevāti tasmiṃ dutiyadivaseyeva. Kesavisajjananti rājacūḷāmaṇibandhanatthaṃ
analyzed: taṃ divasam eva ati tasmin rāja cūḷāmaṇi bandhana ttham

original: kumārakāle bandhitasikhāveṇisaṅkhātassa kesassa visajjanaṃ, mocananti attho. Paṭṭabandhoti
analyzed: kumāra kāle bandhita sikhā veṇi saṅkhātassa kesassa visajjanam mocananti attho paṭṭabandho ti

original: asuko nāma rājāti nalāṭe suvaṇṇamayassa paṭṭassa bandhanaṃ. Gharamaṅgalanti abhinavagharaṃ
analyzed: asukaḥ nāma rājā ati nalāṭe suvaṇṇa mayassa paṭṭassa bandhanam ghara maṅgalanti abhinava gharam

original: pavesanamaṅgalaṃ. Āvāhamaṅgalanti āvāhe pavattaṃ maṅgalaṃ. Chattamaṅgalanti rājachattussāpanakāle
analyzed: pavesana maṅgalam āvāha maṅgalanti āvāhe pavattam maṅgalam chatta maṅgalanti rāja chattussāpana kāle

original: pavattaṃ maṅgalaṃ. Maṅgalaṃ vatvāti maṅgalasaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā. Janapadakalyāṇīti
analyzed: pavattam maṅgalam maṅgalam vatvā ati maṅgala saṃyuttam dhamma katham kathetvā janapada kalyāṇī iti

original: janapadamhi kalyāṇasamannāgatā. Tuvaṭṭaṃ khoti khippameva. Sopīti nandarājakumāropi.
analyzed: janapadamhi kalyāṇa samannāgatā tuvaṭṭam kho ti khippam eva saḥ api iti nanda rāja kumāraḥ api

original: Itītiādi nigamanaṃ. Dutiyadivaseti kapilavatthupattadivasato dutiye divase. Dhammapadaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: iti itiādi nigamanam dutiya divasa iti kapilavatthu patta divasataḥ dutiye divase dhamma pada aṭṭhakathā iyam

original: pana “tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pana tatiya divase nandam pabbājesi iti vuttam

original: Sattame divaseti kapilavatthupattadivasatoyeva sattame divase. Etaṃ samaṇaṃ passāti
analyzed: sattame divase iti kapilavatthu patta divasa toyā iva sattame divase etam samaṇam passāti

original: yojanā. Brahmarūpavaṇṇanti brahmuno rūpasaṅkhāto vaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo imassāti brahmarūpavaṇṇo,
analyzed: yojanā brahma rūpa vaṇṇanti brahmuno rūpa saṅkhātaḥ vaṇṇaḥ viya vaṇṇaḥ imassa ati brahma rūpa vaṇṇaḥ

original: taṃ. Ayanti ayaṃ samaṇo. Tyassāti te assa. Teti nidhayo. Assāti samaṇassa. Nanti
analyzed: tam ayanti ayam samaṇaḥ tyassa ati te assa te iti nidhayaḥ assa ati samaṇassa

original: samaṇaṃ. Yācāti yācāhi. Ayaṃ dvikammikadhātu. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Putto pitusantakassa
analyzed: samaṇam yācāti yācāhi ayam hi iti saccam yasmai vā putto pitu santakassa

original: sāmiko, iti tasmā me dehīti yojanā. Anurūpaṃ vacananti sambandho. Bhagavantaṃ anubandhīti
analyzed: iti tasmai me dehi iti yojanā anurūpam sambandhaḥ bhagavantam

original: bhagavato piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.

original: sāmaṇerassāti sambandho. Tasmāti saraṇagamanaupasampadakammavācānaṃ sadisattā. Bhikkhunā

original: samādinnaṃ viya imināpi samādinnāneva hontīti yojanā. Evanti evamijjhane, samādinne
analyzed: samādinnam iminā api samādinnān eva honti iti yojanā evanti samādinne

original: vā. Daḷhīkaraṇatthanti sikkhāpadānaṃ daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ. Patiṭṭhāpanatthanti sāmaṇerassa
analyzed: vā daḷhīkaraṇa attham ti sikkhāpadānam daḷhīkaraṇa attham patiṭṭhāpana attham ti sāmaṇerassa

original: patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ. Lacchatīti labhissati. Saṅghena dātabboti sambandho. Apaloketvāti
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpana tham lacchati iti labhissati saṅghena dātabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ apaloketvā iti

original: saṅghaṃ āpucchitvā. Iminā chinnavassakaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: saṅgham āpucchitvā iminā chinna vassakam dasseti

original: Adinnādāne tiṇasalākamattenāpi vatthunā asamaṇo hotīti yojanā. Vippaṭipattiyāti vikārena
analyzed: adinnādāne tiṇa salāka mattena api vatthunā asamaṇaḥ hoti iti yojanā vippaṭipattiyā ati vikārena

original: paṭipajjanato. Bhaṇiteti bhaṇane. Jānitvāti jānitvā eva. Evakāro hettha ajjhāharitabbo,
analyzed: paṭipajjanataḥ bhaṇitā iti bhaṇane jānitvā ati jānitvā eva evakāraḥ ha ittha ajjhāharitabbo

original: tena vuttaṃ “na ajānitvā”ti. Yāni pañca sikkhāpadānīti yojanā. Assāti sāmaṇerassa.
analyzed: tena vuttam na a jānitvā ti yāni pañca sikkhāpadāni iti yojanā assa āti sāmaṇerassa

original: Ṭhapanatthāyāti sikkhāpadānaṃ ṭhapanatthāya. Ayanti pārājiko. Visesoti bhikkhūnaṃ pācittiyato viseso.
analyzed: ṭhapana thāya ati sikkhāpadānam ṭhapana thāya ayanti pārājikaḥ viseso ti bhikkhūnam pācittiyataḥ viseso

original: Paṭipakkhavasenāti “anarahaṃ asammāsambuddho”tiādinā ca “dvākkhāto”tiādinā ca “duppaṭippanno”tiādinā
analyzed: paṭipakkha vasena ati an araham a sammāsambuddhaḥ iti ādinā ca dvākkhātaḥ iti ādinā ca duppaṭippannaḥ iti ādinā

original: ca paṭiviruddhavasena garahanto sāmaṇero nivāretabboti sambandho. Kaṇḍakanāsanāyāti
analyzed: ca paṭiviruddha vasena garahantaḥ sāmaṇeraḥ nivāretabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ kaṇḍakanāsanāya iti

original: kaṇḍakanāmakassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammanāsanāya. Taṃ laddhinti avaṇṇabhāsanadiṭṭhiṃ.
analyzed: kaṇḍaka nāmakassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍa kammanā āsanāya tam avaṇṇa bhāsana diṭṭhim

original: Accayanti atikkamaṃ, dosaṃ vā. Desāpetabboti “accayo maṃ bhante accagamā”tiādinā
analyzed: accayanti atikkamam dosam vā desāpetabbaḥ iti accayaḥ mama bhante accagama iti ādinā

original: desāpetabbā. Taṃ yuttanti “liṅganāsanāya nāsetabbo”ti taṃ vacanaṃ patirūpaṃ. Hīti
analyzed: desāpetabbā tam yuttam ti liṅganāsanāya tam vacanam patirūpam hi iti

original: saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Idhāti khandhake, “sāmaṇeraṃ nāsetu”ntivacane vā.
analyzed: saccam yasmai vai idha ati khandhake sāmaṇeram vā

original: “Eseva nayo”ti vuttavacanaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto āha “sassatucchedānañhī”tiādi. Aññataradiṭṭhiko
analyzed: esa eva nayaḥ ti vutta vacanam pākaṭam karontaḥ āha aññatara diṭṭhiko

original: sāmaṇeroti yojanā. Etthāti dasasu nāsanaṅgesu. “Kāma”ntipadena punaruttiniratthakadosāropanena
analyzed: sāmaṇeraḥ ti yojanā ettha ati dasasu nāsanaṅgesu kāmanti padena punarutti niratthaka dosa āropanena

original: garahaṃ dasseti. “Panā”tipadena tesaṃ dosānaṃ pahānena sambhāvanaṃ dasseti. Abrahmacāriṃ
analyzed: garaham dasseti pana atipadena tesam dosānam pahānena sambhāvanam dasseti abrahmacārim

original: sāmaṇeranti sambandho. Upasampādetuṃ vaṭṭatīti upasampādanaṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhunidūsako
analyzed: sāmaṇeranti sambandhaḥ upasampādetum vaṭṭati iti upasampādanam vaṭṭati bhikkhu nidūsakaḥ

original: sāmaṇeroti sambandho. Pabbajjampīti ettha pisaddassa garahatthabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: sāmaṇeraḥ iti sambandhaḥ pabbajjam pi iti ettha pi saddassa gara hattha bhāvam dassetum vuttam

original: “pageva upasampada”nti. Etamatthanti etādisamatthaṃ.
analyzed: pagā iva upasampadanti etam atthanti eta ādi samattham

original: 47. Paṇḍakavatthukathā
analyzed: paṇḍaka vatthu kathā

original: 109. Daharataruṇasaddānaṃ vevacanattā vuttaṃ “dahare…pe… taruṇe”ti. Moḷigallasaddo
analyzed: dahara taruṇa saddānam vevacanattā vuttam dahara ipe taruṇa iti moḷigalla saddo

original: thūlasarīravācako anipphannapāṭipadikoti āha “moḷigalleti thūlasarīre”ti. Hatthibhaṇḍeti
analyzed: thūla sarīra vācakaḥ anipphanna pāṭipadikā iti āha moḷigallā iti thūla sarīrā iti hatthibhaṇḍā iti

original: ettha hatthisaṅkhātaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ etesanti hatthibhaṇḍāti vutte hatthigopakāti āha “hatthigopake”ti.
analyzed: ettha hatthi saṅkhātam bhaṇḍam etesanti hatthibhaṇḍā iti vutte hatthi gopakā iti āha hatthi gopakā iti

original: Abhidhāne (abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ 367 gāthāyaṃ) pana “hatthimeṇḍo”ti pāṭho atthi.
analyzed: abhidhāne abhidhāna ppadīpikāyam gāthāyam pana hatthimeṇḍo ti pāṭhaḥ atthi

original: Paṇḍakoti paḍati vikalabhāvaṃ gacchatīti paṇḍako. Saṃkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena
analyzed: paṇḍako ti paḍati vikala bhāvam gacchati iti saṃkhepena vuttam attham vitthārena

original: dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tattha yassāti paṇḍakassa. Asucināti sambhavena. Āsittassāti
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha tattha atiādi tattha yassa ati paṇḍakassa asucinā ati sambhavena āsittassa ati

original: āsiñcitabbassa. Iminā asucinā mukhe āsiñcitabboti āsittoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Ayanti
analyzed: āsiñcitabbassa iminā asucinā mukhe āsiñcitabbaḥ ti āsittaḥ ti vacana attham dasseti ayanti

original: paṇḍako. Ajjhācāranti methunajjhācāraṃ. “Usūyāya uppannāyā”tiiminā usūyatīti usūyoti
analyzed: paṇḍakaḥ ajjhācāranti methuna jjhācāram usūyāya uppannāya ati iminā usūyati iti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Upakkamenāti vāyāmena. Bījānīti aṇḍāni. Iminā upakkamena etasmā
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti upakkamena ati vāyāmena bījāni iti aṇḍāni iminā upakkamena etasmā

original: bījāni apanītānīti opakkamikoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Pakkhe pavatto paṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako,
analyzed: bījāni apanītāni iti opakkamiko ti vacana attham dasseti pakkhe pavatto paṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako

original: pakkhe pariḷāhavūpasamo paṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍakoti vacanatthaṃ dassento āha “ekacco
analyzed: pakkhe pariḷāha vūpasamo paṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako ti vacana attham dassentaḥ āha ekacco

original: panā”tiādi. Tattha pubbavacanatthe pakkheti kālapakkheti attho daṭṭhabbo. Pacchimavacanatthe
analyzed: pana atiādi tattha pubbavacana tthe pakkha iti kāla pakkha iti atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo pacchimavacana tthe

original: pakkheti juṇhapakkheti attho daṭṭhabbo. “Akusalavipākānubhāvenā”ti padaṃ “paṇḍako
analyzed: pakkha iti juṇha pakkha iti atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo akusala vipāka anubhāvena ati padam paṇḍakaḥ

original: hotī”tipadeyeva sambandhitabbaṃ. Assāti paṇḍakassa. Napuṃsakapaṇḍakoti puriso viya
analyzed: hoti iti padeya iva sambandhitabbam assa ati paṇḍakassa napuṃsaka paṇḍakaḥ iti purisaḥ viya

original: sātisayaṃ paccāmitte na puṃsaketi abhimaddanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti napuṃsako. Na pumā
analyzed: sa atisayam pacca amitte na puṃsaka iti abhimaddanam kātum na sakkoti iti napuṃsakaḥ na pumā

original: na itthīti napuṃsakoti katvā napumanaitthisaddassa niruttinayena napuṃsakakaraṇampi
analyzed: na itthī iti napuṃsakā ti katvā nirutti nayena napuṃsaka karaṇam pi

original: vadanti. Napuṃsakoyeva paṇḍako napuṃsakapaṇḍako. Tesūti pañcasu paṇḍakesu. Tesupīti
analyzed: vadanti paṇḍakaḥ tesu iti pañcasu paṇḍakesu tesu pi iti

original: opakkamikādīsu tīsupi. “Yasmiṃ pakkhe”ti iminā pakkhe pakkhe paṇḍakabhāvaṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: opakkamikā ādīsu tīsu pi yasmin pakkhe iti iminā pakkhe pakkhe paṇḍaka bhāvam nivatteti

original: Assāti paṇḍakassa. Etthāti pañcasu paṇḍakesu. Sopīti paṇḍakopi. Itoti paṇḍakavārato.
analyzed: assa ati paṇḍakassa ettha ati pañcasu paṇḍakesu saḥ api iti paṇḍakaḥ api itas ti paṇḍaka vārato

original: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā liṅganāsanameva atidisati.
analyzed: iminā liṅganāsanam eva atidisati

original: 48. Theyyasaṃvāsakavatthukathā
analyzed: theyya saṃvāsaka vatthu kathā

original: 110. Pārijaññapattassāti parihāyatīti parijāni, issariyabhogādi, tassa bhāvo pārijaññaṃ,
analyzed: pārijañña pattassa ati parihāyati iti parijāni issariya bhoga ādi tassa bhāvaḥ pārijaññam

original: issariyabhogādikkhayo, taṃ pattoti pārijaññapatto, tassa. “Pārijuññapattassā”tipi
analyzed: issariya bhoga ādi kkhayaḥ tam patto ti pārijaññapatto tassa pārijuññapattassa atipi

original: ukārena saha pāṭho atthi. Khīṇakolaññoti ettha kule jātā kolaññā, ṇyapaccayo, nakārāgamo.
analyzed: ukārena saha pāṭhaḥ atthi khīṇa kolañño ti ettha kule jātā kolaññā ṇya paccayaḥ nakāra āgamaḥ

original: Khīṇā kolaññā assāti khīṇakolaññoti vacanatthaṃ dassento āha “mātipakkhapitipakkhato”tiādi.
analyzed: khīṇā kolaññā assa ati khīṇa kolaññaḥ ti vacana attham dassentaḥ āha mātipakkha pitipakkha totiādi

original: Tattha mātipakkhapitipakkhatoti mātuyā pakkho mātipakkho, pituno pakkho pitipakkho,
analyzed: tattha māti pakkha piti pakkhato ti mātuyāḥ pakkhaḥ māti pakkhaḥ pituno pakkhaḥ piti pakkhaḥ

original: mātipakkho ca pitipakkho ca mātipakkhapitipakkhā. Phātiṃ kātunti ettha phā-dhātu
analyzed: māti pakkhaḥ ca piti pakkhaḥ ca māti pakkha piti pakkhā phātim kātunti ettha phā dhātu

original: vaḍḍhanatthoti āha “vaḍḍhetu”nti. “Pucchiyamāno”ti iminā anuyuñjiyamānoti ettha anutyūpasaggavasena
analyzed: vaḍḍhana atthaḥ ti āha vaḍḍhetum ti pucchiyamānaḥ iti iminā anuyuñjiyamānaḥ iti ettha

original: yujasaddo pucchanatthoti dasseti.
analyzed: yuja saddo pucchana ttho ti dasseti

original: Theyyasaṃvāsakoti thenanaṃ theyyaṃ nakārassa yakāraṃ katvā, theyyāya saṃvāsako imassāti
analyzed: theyya saṃvāsakaḥ uti thenanam theyyam nakārassa yakāram katvā theyyāya saṃvāsakaḥ imassa ati

original: theyyasaṃvāsako. Ettha ca na kevalaṃ vassagaṇanādikoyeva saṃvāso nāma hoti, atha
analyzed: theyyasaṃvāsakaḥ ettha ca na kevalam saṃvāsaḥ nāma hoti atha

original: kho theyyāya liṅgagahaṇampi saṃvāsoyeva nāma. Tasmā tassa tividhabhāvaṃ dassento
analyzed: kho theyyāya liṅga gahaṇam pi nāma tasmā tassa tividha bhāvam dassento

original: āha “tayo”tiādi. Tattha liṅgaṃ thenetīti liṅgathenako, eseva nayo itaresupi. Tamatthaṃ
analyzed: āha tayā utiādi tattha liṅgam thenā iti iti liṅga thenakaḥ eṣa iva nayaḥ itaresu pi tam attham

original: vitthārento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tattha yoti theyyasaṃvāsako. Liṅgamattassevāti ettha
analyzed: vitthārentaḥ āha tattha atiādi tattha yaḥ ti theyya saṃvāsakaḥ liṅga mattassa iva iti ettha

original: mattasaddena saṃvāsādayo nivatteti.
analyzed: matta saddena saṃvāsa ādayaḥ nivatta iti

original: Videsanti attano desato viyogaṃ desaṃ. Visaddo hettha viyogatthavācako. Atha vā vi
analyzed: videsanti attanaḥ desataḥ viyogam desam visaddaḥ ha ittha viyoga attha vācakaḥ atha vā

original: dūraṃ desaṃ. Visaddo hettha dūratthavācako. Musāti abhūtatthe dutiyantanipāto, abhūtaṃ
analyzed: dūram desam visaddaḥ ha ittha dūra attha vācakaḥ musā ati abhūta atthe dutiya anta nipātaḥ abhūtam

original: vacananti attho. Paṭibāhatīti aññe nivāreti. Saṃvāsathenako nāmāti ettha ko saṃvāso
analyzed: vacananti attho paṭibāhati iti aññe nivāreti saṃvāsa thenakaḥ nāma ati ettha ko saṃvāso

original: nāma, nanu ekakammādikoti āha “bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko”tiādi. Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādikoti
analyzed: nāma nanu eka kamma ādiko ti āha bhikkhu vassa gaṇanā ādikā ti ādi bhikkhu vassa gaṇanā ādikā ti

original: ādisaddena yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanasādiyanaṃ āsanapaṭibāhanaṃ uposathapavāraṇādīsu sandissananti
analyzed: ādi saddena yathāvuḍḍham vandana sādiyanam āsana paṭibāhanam uposatha pavāraṇa ādīsu sandissanan ti

original: imāni saṅgaṇhāti. “Kiriyabhedo”ti iminā saṃ ekato vasiyati anenāti saṃvāsoti vacanatthena
analyzed: imāni saṅgaṇhāti kiriya bhedo ti iminā sam ekatas vasiyati anena ati saṃvāso ti vacana tthena

original: kiriyabhedo saṃvāso nāmāti dasseti. Imasmiṃ attheti imasmiṃ vatthumhi, imasmiṃ ṭhāneti
analyzed: kiriya bhedaḥ saṃvāsaḥ nāma ati dasseti imasmin atthe iti imasmim vatthumhi imasmim ṭhāne iti

original: attho. Iminā pārājikādiṭṭhāne pana ekakammādiko saṃvāso nāmāti dasseti.
analyzed: attho iminā pārājika ādi ṭṭhāne pana eka kamma ādikaḥ saṃvāsaḥ nāma ati dasseti

original: “Liṅgassa ceva saṃvāsassa cā”ti iminā ubhayathenakoti ettha ubhayasarūpaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: liṅgassa ca iva saṃvāsassa ca ati iminā ettha ubhaya sarūpam dasseti

original: Etthāti theyyasaṃvāsakaṭṭhāne. Rāja…pe… bhayehi vāti ettha bhayasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo.
analyzed: ettha ati theyya saṃvāsaka ṭṭhāne rājape bhayehi vā ti ettha bhaya saddo paccekam yojetabbo

original: Rājabhayena ca dubbhikkhabhayena ca kantārabhayena ca rogabhayena ca veribhayena
analyzed: rāja bhayena ca dubbhikkha bhayena ca kantāra bhayena ca roga bhayena ca veri bhayena

original: cāti hi attho. Cīvaragahaṇatthanti cīvarāharaṇatthaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Vāsaddo hetvatthaṃ
analyzed: ca ati hi atthaḥ cīvara gahaṇa attham ti cīvara āharaṇa attham ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ vā saddaḥ hetu attham

original: vā sampadānatthaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti. Ayaṃ gāthā vibhattiyā uppaṭipāṭittā bhaggarītisaṅkhātā
analyzed: vā sampadāna attham vā sampiṇḍeti ayam gāthā vibhattiyā bhagga rīti saṅkhātā

original: alaṅkāradosā na muttā. Liṅganti samaṇaliṅgaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane.
analyzed: alaṅkāra dosāḥ na muttāḥ liṅganti samaṇa liṅgam idha ati imasmin sāsane

original: Nādhivāsetīti na sampaṭicchati. Yāvāti yattakaṃ kālaṃ, ayaṃ panettha yojanā – idha
analyzed: na adhivāseti iti na sampaṭicchati yāvā ati yattakam kālam ayam pana itthā yojanā

original: yo rāja…pe… bhayena vā cīvaragahaṇatthaṃ vā liṅgaṃ ādiyati, so suddhamānaso hutvā
analyzed: yaḥ rājape bhayena vā cīvara gahaṇa attham vā liṅgam ādiyati saḥ suddha mānasaḥ hutvā

original: yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, tāva eso “theyyasaṃvāsako nāmā”ti na vuccatīti.
analyzed: yāva saṃvāsam na adhivāseti tāva eso theyyasaṃvāsakaḥ nāma ati na vuccati iti

original: Tatrāti tāsu gāthāsu. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Evanti liṅge gahiyamāne. Tasminti jane.
analyzed: tatra ati tāsu gāthāsu idha ati imasmin sāsane evanti liṅge tasmin ti jane

original: Anosaritvāvāti anokkamitvāva. Liṅgaṃ apanetvāti sayaṃ gahitaṃ samaṇaliṅgaṃ vināsetvā.
analyzed: an usaritvā ava ati an ukkamitvā ava liṅgam apanetvā ati sayam gahitam samaṇa liṅgam vināsetvā

original: Pabbajitālayanti pabbajitachāyaṃ. Pubbeti saṃvāsathenake.
analyzed: pabbajita ālayanti pabbajita chāyam pubba iti saṃvāsa thenake

original: Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānīti sabbāni pāsaṇḍaṃ uddissa dinnāni bhattāni.
analyzed: sabba pāsaṇḍiya bhattāni iti sabbāni pāsaṇḍam uddissa dinnāni bhattāni

original: Satte vahatīti sattavāho. Viramitabbanti veraṃ, taṃ pavattetīti veriko. Kāyena pariharitabbānīti kāyaparihāriyāni. Tanti tuvaṃ. Hīnāyāvattabhāvanti hīnāya gihibhāvāya āvattabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: satte vahati iti satta vāhaḥ viramitabbanti veram tam pavatteti iti veriko kāyena pariharitabbāni iti kāya parihāriyāni hīnāya āvatta bhāvanti hīnāya gihi bhāvāya āvatta bhāvam

original: Uppabbajitvāti pabbajaviyogaṃ katvā. Tamatthanti uppabbajitasaṅkhātamatthaṃ. Assāti mahāsāmaṇerassa.
analyzed: uppabbajitvā iti pabbaja viyogam katvā tam attham ti uppabbajita saṅkhātam attham assa iti mahā sāmaṇerassa

original: Mahanto vāti ettha vāsaddo garahattho. Pageva daharoti dasseti. Abyatto hotīti yojanā. Soti sāmaṇero.
analyzed: mahantaḥ vā ti ettha vā saddaḥ gara hattho pagā iva daharā ti dasseti abyattaḥ hoti iti yojanā saḥ iti sāmaṇeraḥ

original: Vacchagorakkhādīnīti ettha vacchoti taruṇagoṇo. So hi mātusantike vasatīti vaccho.
analyzed: vaccha gorakkha ādīni iti ettha vaccho ti taruṇa goṇo so hi mātu santike vasati iti vaccho

original: Mātuyā viyogakāle vā vassatīti vacchoti vuccati. Iminā dammagavajaraggavāpi sāmaññato
analyzed: mātuyāḥ viyoga kāle vā vassati iti vaccho ti vuccati iminā sāmaññato

original: Pāparogīti ettha pāparogassa sarūpaṃ dassento āha “arisa”itiādi. Tattha ariso ca
analyzed: pāpa rogī iti ettha pāpa rogassa sarūpam dassentaḥ āha arisa etiādi tattha arisaḥ ca

original: bhagandaro ca pittañca semho ca kāso ca soso cāti dvando, te ādayo yesaṃ teti arisa…pe…
analyzed: bhagandaraḥ ca pittam ca semhaḥ ca kāsaḥ ca sosaḥ ca ati dvandaḥ te ādayaḥ yesam te iti arisape

original: sosādayo. Ādisaddena heṭṭhā vutte ābādhe saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha pittasemhasaddehi taṃsamuṭṭhāno
analyzed: sosa ādayaḥ ādi saddena heṭṭhā vutte ābādhe saṅgaṇhāti tattha pitta semha saddehi tad samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: rogo gahetabbo. “Niccāturo”ti iminā pāparogīti ettha mantutthe pavattassa īpaccayassa
analyzed: rogaḥ gahetabbaḥ nicca āturaḥ ti iminā pāpa rogī iti ettha man tu tthe pavattassa ī paccayassa

original: niccayogatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: nicca yoga ttham dasseti

original: Parisadūsanoti ettha itisaddo nāmapariyāyo, parisadūsano nāmāti hi attho. Yo attano
analyzed: parisadūsano ti ettha iti saddaḥ nāma pariyāyaḥ parisadūsanaḥ nāma ati hi atthaḥ yaḥ attanaḥ

original: virūpatāya parisaṃ dūseti, ayaṃ parisadūsano nāmāti yojanā. Chasarīradosaṃ ādiṃ katvā
analyzed: virūpa tāya parisam dūsa iti ayam parisadūsanaḥ nāma ati yojanā ādim katvā

original: parisadūsanabhāvaṃ vitthārento āha “atidīgho vā”tiādi. Atidīgho vāti ettha na kevalaṃ
analyzed: parisadūsana bhāvam vitthārentaḥ āha ati dīghaḥ vā ati ādi ati dīghaḥ vā ati ettha na kevalam

original: paresaṃ dvaṅgulādimattadīgho, atha kho diguṇādidīghovādhippetoti āha “aññesa”ntiādi.
analyzed: paresam dvi aṅgula ādi matta dīghaḥ atha kho diguṇa ādi dīghaḥ uvā adhippeto ti āha aññesantiādi

original: Nābhipadesoti attano nābhipadeso. Yathā hi atidīghe paravacanena atidīghassa sarūpaṃ
analyzed: nābhipadeso ti attanaḥ nābhipadesaḥ yathā hi atidīghe paravacanena atidīghassa sarūpam

original: veditabbaṃ, tathā atirassādīsupi atirassasarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahodaroti mahāudaro.
analyzed: veditabbam tathā atirassa ādīsu pi atirassa sarūpanti daṭṭhabbam mahodaro iti mahāudaro

original: Kappasīso vāti hatthisīso viya yugasīso vā. Kappasaddo hettha yugatthavācako. Kaṇṇikakeso
analyzed: kappa sīsaḥ vā ati hatthi sīsaḥ viya yuga sīsaḥ vā kappa saddo ha ittha yuga attha vācako kaṇṇika keso

original: vāti kaṇṇikasadisehi kesehi samannāgato. “Jātipalitehī”ti iminā jarāvātena pahataṃ
analyzed: vāti kaṇṇika sadisehi kesehi samannāgataḥ jāti palitehi iti iminā jarā vātena pahatam

original: palitaṃ nivatteti. Pakatitambakesoti ettha pakatisaddena kenaci payogena tambakesaṃ
analyzed: palitam nivatteti pakati tamba keso ti ettha pakati saddena kenacid payogena tamba kesam

original: nivatteti. Āvaṭṭasīsoti punappunaṃ vaṭṭatīti āvaṭṭo, kesāvaṭṭo, so etassa sīse atthīti
analyzed: nivatteti āvaṭṭa sīso ti punappunam vaṭṭati iti āvaṭṭaḥ kesāvaṭṭo so etassa sīse atthi iti

original: āvaṭṭasīso. Uddhaggehīti uddhaṃ koṭīhi. Jālabaddhena viyāti jālena baddhena iva.
analyzed: uddhaggehi iti uddham koṭīhi jāla baddhena viyāti jālena baddhena iva

original: Sambaddhabhamuko vāti aññamaññasambaddhabhamuko vā. Makkaṭabhamukoti makkaṭassa bhamu
analyzed: sambaddha bhamukaḥ vā ati aññamañña sambaddha bhamukaḥ vā makkaṭa bhamukaḥ ti makkaṭassa bhamu

original: viya bhamu etassāti makkaṭabhamuko. Vāsikoṇenāti tacchanīkoṭiyā. Visamacakkaloti
analyzed: viya etassa ati makkaṭa bhamukaḥ vāsi koṇena ati tacchanī koṭiyā

original: ettha cakkākārena lāti pavattati, cakkākāraṃ vā lāti gaṇhātīti cakkalo. Kekaroti
analyzed: ettha cakka ākārena pavattati cakka ākāram vā lāti gaṇhāti iti

original: valiro. So hi kucchitaṃ karotīti kekaroti vuccati. Kakkaṭassevāti kakkaṭassa iva.
analyzed: valiraḥ saḥ hi kucchitam karoti iti kekaroti vuccati kakkaṭassa iva ati kakkaṭassa iva

original: Mūsikakaṇṇoti ākhukaṇṇo. Jaṭukakaṇṇoti vaggulikaṇṇo. Aviddhakaṇṇoti acchiddakaṇṇo.
analyzed: mūsika kaṇṇaḥ iti ākhu kaṇṇaḥ jaṭuka kaṇṇaḥ iti vagguli kaṇṇaḥ a viddha kaṇṇaḥ iti a chidda kaṇṇaḥ

original: Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Soti aviddhakaṇṇo. Kaṇṇe bhagandaro etassāti kaṇṇabhagandaro,
analyzed: hi iti saccam yasmai vā saḥ iti a viddha kaṇṇaḥ kaṇṇe bhagandaraḥ etassa ati kaṇṇa bhagandaraḥ

original: soyeva kaṇṇabhagandariko. Gaṇḍo kaṇṇe etassāti gaṇḍakaṇṇo. Paggharitapubbenāti paggharitapūyena.
analyzed: so yā iva kaṇṇa bhagandarikaḥ gaṇḍaḥ kaṇṇe etassa ati gaṇḍa kaṇṇaḥ paggharita pubbena ati paggharita pūyena

original: Ṭaṅkito kaṇṇo yassāti ṭaṅkitakaṇṇo. Gobhattanāḷikāyāti gunnaṃ bhattapānatthaṃ katāya
analyzed: ṭaṅkitaḥ kaṇṇaḥ yassa ati ṭaṅkita kaṇṇaḥ go bhatta nāḷikāya ati gunnam bhatta pāna attham katāya

original: nāḷikāya. Biḷārakkhi viya atipiṅgalaṃ akkhi etassāti atipiṅgalakkhi. Madhuvaṇṇo viya
analyzed: nāḷikāya biḷārakkhi viya ati piṅgalam akkhi etassa ati ati piṅgalakkhi madhu vaṇṇaḥ viya

original: piṅgalaṃ akkhi etassāti madhupiṅgalakkhi. Nippakhumakkhīti ettha pakhumaṃ vuccati
analyzed: piṅgalam akkhi etassa ati madhu piṅgalakkhi nippakhumakkhi iti ettha pakhumam vuccati

original: akkhamhi jātaṃ lomaṃ. Tañhi akkhino pakkhadvaye jātattā pakhumanti vuccati. Natthi
analyzed: akkhamhi jātam lomam tat hi akkhino pakkha dvaye jāta ttā pakhumanti vuccati na atthi

original: pakhumaṃ akkhimhi etassāti nippakhumakkhi. Assupaggharaṇaṃ akkhimhā etassāti assupaggharaṇakkhi.
analyzed: pakhumam akkhimhi etassa ati nippakhuma akkhi assu paggharaṇam akkhimhi etassa ati assu paggharaṇa kkhi

original: Pupphaṃ sañjātaṃ yassa akkhinoti pupphitaṃ. Pupphitaṃ akkhi yassāti pupphitakkhi.
analyzed: puppham sañjātam yassa akkhinoti pupphitam pupphitam akkhi yassa ati pupphita kkhi

original: Akkhipākenāti akkhino dalapariyantesu paccanakena rogena.
analyzed: akkhi pākena ati akkhinaḥ dala pariyantesu paccanakena rogena

original: Cipiṭanāsikoti anunnatanāsiko. Sukatuṇḍasadisāyāti suvānaṃ mukhena sadisāya.
analyzed: cipiṭa nāsikā uti suka tuṇḍa sadisāya ati suvānam mukhena sadisāya

original: Paṭaṅgamaṇḍūkassevāti paṭaṅganāmakassa maṇḍūkassa mukhanimittaṃ iva mukhanimittaṃyevāti
analyzed: paṭaṅga maṇḍūkassa iva ati paṭaṅga nāmakassa maṇḍūkassa mukha nimittam iva mukha nimittam yeva ati

original: yojanā. Ukkhalimukhavaṭṭisadisehīti ukkhaliyā mukhavaṭṭinā sadisehi. Bhericammasadisehīti
analyzed: yojanā ukkhali mukhavaṭṭi sadisehi iti ukkhaliyā mukhavaṭṭinā sadisehi bheri camma sadisehi iti

original: bheriyā mukhe nahitacammena sadisehi. Eḷamukhoti eḷāya niccapaggharitaṃ mukhametasseti
analyzed: bheriyāḥ mukhe nahita cammena sadisehi eḷa mukho ti eḷāya nicca paggharitam mukham etassa iti

original: eḷamukho. Uppakkamukhoti uppakkaṃ kuthikaṃ mukhametassāti uppakkamukho. Saṅkhatuṇḍakoti
analyzed: eḷamukho uppakkamukho ti uppakkam kuthikam mukham etassa ati uppakkamukhaḥ saṅkhatuṇḍako ti

original: saṅkhassa tuṇḍena sadiso oṭṭho etassāti saṅkhatuṇḍako.
analyzed: saṅkhassa tuṇḍena sadisaḥ oṭṭhaḥ etassa ati saṅkhatuṇḍakaḥ

original: Aṭṭhakadantasadisehīti aṭṭhakanāmakassa naṅgalassa dantehi sadisehi. Dante pidahitunti
analyzed: aṭṭhaka danta sadisehi iti aṭṭhaka nāmakassa naṅgalassa dantehi sadisehi dante pidahitunti

original: sambandho. Dantantareti dantavivare, dantamajjhe vā. Kalandakadanto viyāti kāḷakānaṃ danto viya.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ danta antara iti danta vivare danta majjhe vā kalandaka dantaḥ viyāti kāḷakānam dantaḥ

original: Mahāhanukoti mahanto hanu etassāti mahāhanuko. Cipiṭahanukoti anunnatahanuko. Nimmassudāṭhikoti
analyzed: mahā hanukaḥ ti mahantaḥ hanu etassa ati mahā hanukaḥ cipiṭa hanukaḥ iti an unnata hanukaḥ nimmassu dāṭhiko ti

original: natthi massu ca dāṭhi ca etassāti nimmassudāṭhiko. Bhaṭṭhaaṃsakūṭoti bhaṭṭho patito
analyzed: natthi massu ca dāṭhi ca etassa ati nimmassudāṭhikaḥ bhaṭṭha aṃsakūṭaḥ ti bhaṭṭhaḥ patitaḥ

original: aṃsakūṭo imassāti bhaṭṭhaaṃsakūṭo. Godhāgattoti godhāya gattaṃ viya gattaṃ imassāti
analyzed: aṃsakūṭaḥ imassa ati bhaṭṭha aṃsakūṭaḥ godhā gatto ti godhāya gattam viya gattam imassa ati

original: godhāgatto. Sabbaṃpetanti sabbampi etaṃ “kacchugatto”tiādivacanaṃ. Etthāti “kacchugatto”tiādivacane.
analyzed: godhāgattaḥ sabbam petanti sabbam pi etam kacchu gattā iti ādi vacanam ettha ati kacchu gattā iti ādi vacane

original: Vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā.
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ veditabbā iti yojanā

original: Bhaṭṭhakaṭikoti bhaṭṭhā pannā kaṭi etassāti bhaṭṭhakaṭiko. Accuggatehi ānisadamaṃsehīti
analyzed: bhaṭṭha kaṭikaḥ ti bhaṭṭhā pannā kaṭi etassa ati bhaṭṭha kaṭikaḥ accuggatehi ānisada maṃsehi iti

original: sambandho. Vātaṇḍikoti vātena pūrito aṇḍakoso etassāti vātaṇḍiko. Saṅghaṭṭanajāṇukoti
analyzed: sambandhaḥ vātaṇḍikaḥ ti vātena pūritaḥ aṇḍa kosaḥ etassa ati vātaṇḍiko saṅghaṭṭana jāṇukaḥ ti

original: anto natattā aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ jāṇu etassāti saṅghaṭṭanajāṇuko. Vikaṭoti tiriyagamanapādo.
analyzed: antar nata ttā aññam aññam saṅghaṭṭanam jāṇu etassa ati saṅghaṭṭanajāṇukaḥ vikaṭaḥ tiriya gamana pādaḥ

original: Upaḍḍhapiṇḍikassa atthaṃ saha bhedena dassento āha “so duvidho”tiādi. Tattha duvidho
analyzed: upaḍḍhapiṇḍikassa attham saha bhedena dassentaḥ āha saḥ duvidhaḥ itiādi tattha duvidhaḥ

original: so upaḍḍhapiṇḍiko samannāgatoti yojanā. Atha vā so upaḍḍhapiṇḍiko heṭṭhā orūḷhāhi
analyzed: so upaḍḍhapiṇḍiko samannāgato ti yojanā atha vā saḥ upaḍḍhapiṇḍiko heṭṭhā

original: mahantīhi jaṅghapiṇḍikāhi samannāgato vā upari ārūḷhāhi mahantīhi jaṅghapiṇḍikāhi
analyzed: mahantīhi jaṅgha piṇḍikāhi samannāgataḥ vā upari ārūḍhāhi mahantīhi jaṅgha piṇḍikāhi

original: samannāgato vāti duvidhoti yojanā. Piṭṭhikapādoti piṭṭhiyaṃ uṭṭhito pādo etassāti
analyzed: samannāgataḥ vā ati duvidhaḥ ti yojanā piṭṭhika pādo ti piṭṭhiyam uṭṭhitaḥ pādo etassa ati

original: piṭṭhikapādo. Gaṇḍikaṅguli vāti gaṇḍena uṭṭhito aṅguli etassāti gaṇḍikaṅguli. Sabbopesāti
analyzed: piṭṭhika pādaḥ gaṇḍika aṅguli vā ati gaṇḍena uṭṭhitaḥ aṅguli etassa ati gaṇḍika aṅguli sabba upesā ati

original: esa sabbopi jano. Parisaṃ dūsetīti parisadūsano.
analyzed: esa sabbaḥ api janaḥ parisam dūseti iti parisa dūsanaḥ

original: Pubbādīhītiādisaddena cakkhupasādassa antarāyakarāni aññānipi vatthūni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: pubba ādīhi iti ādi saddena cakkhu pasādassa antarāya karāni aññāni api vatthūni gahetabbāni

original: Dvīhi vā akkhīhi, ekena vā akkhināti yojanā. Ubhayampīti dvinnaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ
analyzed: dvīhi vā akkhīhi ekena vā akkhināti yojanā ubhayam pi iti dvinnam aṭṭhakathā cariyānam

original: ubhayampi vacanaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ “andhaṃ pabbājentī”ti avatvā “kāṇaṃ pabbājentī”ti vuttattā
analyzed: ubhayam pi vacanam pāḷiyam andham pabbājenti iti a vatvā kāṇam pabbājenti iti vutta ttā

original: “pariyāyenā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyañhi “jaccandho”ti iminā dveakkhikāṇaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: pariyāyena iti vuttam mahā aṭṭhakathāyan hi jat candho ti iminā sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Kuṇīti kuṇanaṃ saṃkocanaṃ kuṇaṃ, tametassatthīti kuṇī. Khañjoti khañjati
analyzed: vuttam kuṇī iti kuṇanam saṃkocanam kuṇam tam etassa atthi iti kuṇī khañjaḥ iti khañjati

original: gativekallabhāvena pavattatīti khañjo. Kuṇḍapādakoti ettha kuṇḍoti khañjasseva nāmaṃ.
analyzed: gati vekalla bhāvena pavattati iti khañjo kuṇḍapādako ti ettha kuṇḍo ti khañjassa iva nāmaṃ

original: Khañjo hi kuḍati gamanaṃ paṭihanatīti kuṇḍoti vuccati. Kasmā kuṇḍapādako? Kasmā piṭṭhipādamajjhena
analyzed: khañjaḥ hi gamanam paṭihanati iti kuṇḍo ti vuccati kasmā kuṇḍapādako kasmā piṭṭhi pāda majjhena

original: caṅkamantoti āha “majjhe saṃkuṭitapādattā”ti. Iminā hi kuṇḍapādassa ca piṭṭhipādamajjhena
analyzed: caṅkamanto ti āha majjhe saṃkuṭita pādattā iti iminā hi kuṇḍapādassa ca piṭṭhi pāda majjhena

original: caṅkamanassa ca hetuṃ dasseti. Eseva nayo anantaravākyepi. Sabbopesāti esa sabbopi jano.
analyzed: caṅkamanassa ca hetum dasseti esa iva nayaḥ anantara vākye pi esa sabbaḥ api janaḥ

original: Pakkhahatoti ettha eko pakkho hato vināso etassāti pakkhahatoti atthaṃ dassento āha
analyzed: pakkha hataḥ ti ettha ekaḥ pakkhaḥ hataḥ vināsaḥ etassa ti pakkha hataḥ iti attham dassentaḥ āha

original: “eko hattho vā”tiādi. “Pakkhapāto”tipi pāṭho, so apāṭhoyeva. Pakkhasaddo hi koṭṭhāsavācako,
analyzed: ekaḥ hatthaḥ vā ati ādi pakkhapāto tipi pāṭhaḥ saḥ a pāṭhaḥ yā iva pakkha saddo hi koṭṭhāsa vācakaḥ

original: na paṅgulapariyāyo, pīṭhasabbī vuccatīti pīṭhena sabbati gacchati sīlenāti pīṭhasabbī
analyzed: na paṅgula pariyāyaḥ pīṭha sabbī vuccati iti pīṭhena sabbati gacchati sīlena ati pīṭha sabbī

original: vuccati. “Jiṇṇabhāvena dubbalo”ti iminā jīraṇaṃ jarā, tāya dubbalo jarādubbaloti
analyzed: vuccati jiṇṇa bhāvena dubbalaḥ ti iminā jīraṇam jarā tāya dubbalaḥ jarā dubbalaḥ ti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Balavā hotīti āgantukarogānamabhāvena balavā hoti, “vacībhedo
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti balavā hoti iti āgantuka rogānam abhāvena balavā hoti vacībhedaḥ

original: nappavattatī”ti iminā mukhamattameva gacchati pavattati, na vacībhedo ettha janeti
analyzed: nappavattati iti iminā mukha mattam eva gacchati pavattati na vacībhedaḥ ettha janeti

original: mūgoti dasseti. Yassa vacībhedo na pavattati, ayaṃ mūgo nāmāti yojanā. Mammananti
analyzed: mūgaḥ iti dassa iti yassa vacī bhedaḥ na pavattati ayam mūgaḥ nāma ati yojanā mammananti

original: khalitavacanaṃ. Yo ekameva akkharaṃ catupañcakkhattuṃ vadati, tassetamadhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: khalita vacanam yaḥ ekam eva akkharam catu pañca kkhattum vadati tassa itam adhivacanam

original: Badhīroti sutihīno. So hi hananaṃ sotapasādassa nāsanaṃ vadho, taṃ īrati gacchatīti
analyzed: badhīraḥ iti suti hīnaḥ saḥ hi hananam sota pasādassa na āsanam vadhaḥ tam īrati gacchati iti

original: badhīroti vuccati. Yo sabbena sabbaṃ na suṇāti, ayaṃ badhīro nāmāti yojanā. Iminā
analyzed: badhīro ti vuccati yaḥ sabbena sabbam na suṇāti ayam badhīraḥ nāma ati yojanā iminā

original: naṭṭhapasādataṃ dasseti. Ubhayadosavasenāti upalakkhaṇavasena vuttaṃ andhamūgabadhirapabbājane
analyzed: naṭṭha pasāda tam dasseti ubhaya dosa vasena āti upalakkhaṇa vasena vuttam andha mūga badhira pabbājane

original: tidosavasenapi vuttattā. Teti hatthacchinnādayo dvattiṃsajane. Osāraṇaṃ apatto puggalo
analyzed: ti dosa vasena api vutta ttā te ti hatthacchinna ādayaḥ dvattiṃsa jane osāraṇam apatto puggalo

original: atthi, taṃ puggalaṃ saṅgho osāreti ceti yojanā. Osāretīti saṅghe paveseti.
analyzed: atthi tam puggalam saṅghaḥ osāreti ca iti yojanā osāreti iti saṅghe paveseti

original: 58. Alajjīnissayavatthukathā
analyzed: alajjī nissaya vatthu kathā

original: 120. “Alajjīnaṃ ovāda”nti pāṭhasesena yojite sāmyatthe sāmivacanampi yujjateva. Taṃ
analyzed: pāṭha sesena yojite sāmi atthe sāmi vacanam pi tam

original: nayaṃ adassetvā “upayogatthe sāmivacana”nti vuttaṃ. “Bhikkhūhi sabhāgata”nti iminā
analyzed: nayam a dassetvā upayoga tthe sāmi vacanan ti vuttam bhikkhūhi sabhā gatan ti iminā

original: bhikkhūhi samāno sīlādiguṇasaṅkhāto bhāgo imassāti bhikkhusabhāgo, tassa bhāvo bhikkhusabhāgatanti
analyzed: bhikkhūhi samānaḥ sīla ādi guṇa saṅkhātaḥ bhāgaḥ imassa ati bhikkhu sabhāgaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ bhikkhu sabhāga tat ti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. “Lajjibhāva”nti iminā bhāvapaccayassa sarūpaṃ dasseti. Navaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti lajji bhāvanti iminā bhāva paccayassa sarūpam dasseti nava ṭṭhānam ti

original: abhinavaṭṭhānaṃ. Gatena bhikkhunāti sambandho.

original: titthaṃ, laddhīti āha “titthaṃ vuccati laddhī”ti. Laddhi hi bahūnaṃ laddhikānaṃ otaraṇaṭṭhānattā

original: titthaṃ nāma. Aññanti sāsanikaladdhito aññaṃ. Etesanti paribbājakānaṃ. Itoti imasmā
analyzed: tittham nāma aññanti sāsanika laddhitaḥ aññam etesanti paribbājakānam itas ti imasmai

original: sāsanikaladdhito. Yanti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ. Tesanti aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ.
analyzed: sāsanika laddhitaḥ yanti yam dhamma jātam tesanti añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam

original: Te labhantīti ettha tasaddo manussavisayoti āha “te manussā”ti. Mūgasūkarāti ettha
analyzed: te labhanti iti ettha ta saddaḥ manussa visayoti āha te manussā ati mūga sūkarā ti ettha

original: thūlasarīrassa sūkarassa saddamattassāpi abhāvato mūgasūkaro nāmāti āha “thūlasarīrasūkarā”ti.
analyzed: thūla sarīrassa sūkarassa sadda mattassa api abhāvataḥ mūgasūkaraḥ nāma ati āha thūla sarīra sūkara iti

original: 135. Assāti bhikkhuno. Soti sampajānamusāvādo. Kinti kiṃ āpatti. Dukkaṭanti padassa
analyzed: assa ati bhikkhuno saḥ ti sampajāna musāvādaḥ kim ti kim āpatti dukkaṭam ti padassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ kammanti āsaṅkā bhaveyyāti āha “dukkaṭāpattī”ti. Sā ca kho dukkaṭāpatti
analyzed: dukkaṭam kammanti āsaṅkā bhaveyya ati āha dukkaṭa āpatti iti sā ca kho dukkaṭa āpatti

original: musāvādalakkhaṇena na hotīti yojanā. Kena hotīti āha “bhagavato pana vacanenā”ti.
analyzed: musāvāda lakkhaṇena na hoti iti yojanā kena hoti iti āha bhagavato pana vacanena ati

original: Vacanenāti ca “sampajānamusāvāde kiṃ hoti? Dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti vacanena. Akiriyasamuṭṭhānāti
analyzed: vacanena ati ca sampajāna musāvāde kim hoti dukkaṭam hoti iti vacanena akiriya samuṭṭhānā ati

original: āvi kattabbāya āpattiyā akaraṇena akiriyasamuṭṭhānā.
analyzed: āvi kattabbāya āpattiyāḥ akaraṇena akiriya samuṭṭhānā

original: Manujenāti manussena. Vācāti vācāya. Yakārassa hi lopo. Giranti saddaṃ. Pareti aññe
analyzed: manujena ati manussena vācā ati vācāya yakārassa hi lopaḥ giranti saddam parā iti aññe

original: puggale. Vācasikanti vācāto samuṭṭhitaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha yojanā – bhikkhu kenaci āsanne
analyzed: puggale vācasikanti vācātaḥ samuṭṭhitam ayam pana ittha yojanā bhikkhu kenaci āsanne

original: ṭhitena manujena vācāya anālapanto hoti, pare dūre ṭhite puggale sandhāya giraṃ mahāsaddaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitena manujena vācāya an ālapantaḥ hoti pare dūre ṭhite puggale sandhāya giram mahā saddam

original: no ca bhaṇeyya, evampi vācasikameva āpajjeyyāti.
analyzed: no ca bhaṇeyya evam pi vācasikam eva āpajjeyya ati

original: Antarāyikoti ettha karotyatthe ṇikapaccayoti āha “antarāyakaro”ti. “Kimatthāyā”ti
analyzed: antarāyiko ti ettha karoti atthe ṇika paccayo ti āha antarāya karoti kimatthāya ati

original: iminā kissāti ettha tadatthe catutthīti dasseti, hetvatthopi yujjateva. Sabbatthāti
analyzed: iminā kissa ati ettha tad atthe catutthī iti dasseti hetvatthaḥ pi yujjatā iva sabbattha ati

original: sabbesu “dutiyassa jhānassa adhigamāyā”tiādīsu. Itītiādi nigamanaṃ. Uddesato cāti
analyzed: sabbesu dutiyassa jhānassa adhigamāya atiādīsu iti itiādi nigamanam uddesato ca ati

original: “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho”tiādiuddesato ca. Niddesato cāti “pātimokkhanti ādimeta”ntiādiniddesato ca.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ ti ādi uddesato ca niddesato ca ati pātimokkha nti ādim etanti ādi niddesato ca

original: 136. Devasikanti ettha ṇikapaccayo vicchatthe hotīti āha “divase divase”ti. Tatiye
analyzed: devasikam ti ettha ṇika paccayaḥ vicchatthe hoti iti āha divase divase iti tatiye

original: ca sattame ca pakkheti ekassa utuno aṭṭhasu pakkhesu tatiye ca sattame ca pakkhe.
analyzed: ca sattame ca pakkhe iti ekassa utunaḥ aṭṭhasu pakkhesu tatiye ca sattame ca pakkhe

original: “Vacanato”ti padaṃ “vaṭṭatī”ti pade ñāpakahetu. Tathārūpe paccayeti tathārūpe vikaticārittasaṅkhāte
analyzed: vacanataḥ iti padam vaṭṭati iti pade ñāpaka hetu tathārūpe paccaya iti tathārūpe vikati cāritta saṅkhāte

original: paccaye. Anuvattitabbanti anumatiṃ vattitabbaṃ. Vacanatopīti pisaddo pubbe ñāpakahetuṃ
analyzed: paccaye anuvattitabbam ti anumatim vattitabbam vacanataḥ pi iti pi saddaḥ pubbe ñāpaka hetum

original: sampiṇḍeti. Etanti “yasmiṃ tasmiṃ cātuddase vā pannarase vā uddisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ.
analyzed: sampiṇḍa iti etat ti yasmin tasmin cātuddase vā pannarase vā uddisitum vaṭṭati iti vacanam

original: 71. Sīmānujānanakathā
analyzed: sīmā anujānana kathā

original: 138. Nimittā kittetabbāti nimittāni kittetabbāni. Nikārassa hi ākāro. Nimittaṃ katoti
analyzed: nimittā kittetabbā ati nimittāni kittetabbāni nikārassa hi ākāraḥ nimittam katoti

original: eso pabbato nimittaṃ katoti yojanā. Eseva nayo paratopi. “Eseva nayo”ti iminā “puratthimāya
analyzed: eso pabbataḥ nimittam kato ti yojanā esā iva nayo paratas pi esā iva nayo ti iminā puratthimāya

original: disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Pāsāṇo bhante, eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti atthaṃ atidisati. Eseva
analyzed: disāya kim nimittam pāsāṇaḥ bhante esaḥ pāsāṇaḥ nimittam ti attham atidisati esā iva

original: nayo sesesupi. Kevalaṃ pana vanaudakesu “etaṃ vanaṃ, etaṃ udaka”nti vattabbaṃ. Nadiyaṃ
analyzed: nayo sesesu pi kevalam pana vana audakesu etam vanam etam udakam ti vattabbam nadiyam

original: “esā nadī”ti vattabbā. Ettha panāti etissaṃ uttarāyaṃ anudisāyaṃ pana. Hīti phalajotako.
analyzed: esā nadī iti vattabbā ettha pana ati etissam uttarāyam anudisā ayam pana hi iti phala jotakaḥ

original: Tatthāti “nimittā kittetabbā”ti vacane. Sīmamaṇḍalanti sīmabimbaṃ. Sambandhantenāti
analyzed: tattha ati nimittā kittetabbā ati vacane sīma maṇḍalanti sīma bimbam

original: purimanimittena pacchimanimittaṃ sambandhantena. Iminā ekantarikādivasena nimittakittanaṃ
analyzed: purima nimittena pacchima nimittam eka antarikā ādi vasena nimitta kittanam

original: na vaṭṭati nimittenapi nimittānaṃ sambandhābhāvatoti dasseti. Purimanimittena pacchimanimittassa
analyzed: na vaṭṭati nimittena api nimittānam sambandha abhāvato ti dasseti purima nimittena pacchima nimittassa

original: sambandhe sati ajja ekaṃ nimittaṃ kittetvā sve ekaṃ nimittaṃ kittetvāti evaṃ kālantarepi
analyzed: sambandhe sati ajjaḥ ekam nimittam kittetvā sve ekam nimittam kittetvā ati evam kāla antare pi

original: nimittaṃ kittetvā sammanituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
analyzed: nimittam kittetvā sammanitum vaṭṭati iti vadanti

original: Pabbatoti ettha pabbaṃ vuccati phaḷu, taṃ etasmiṃ atthīti pabbato. Vālikarāsissa
analyzed: pabbataḥ ti ettha pabbam vuccati phaḷu tam etasmin atthi iti pabbataḥ vālika rāsissa

original: suddhapaṃsupabbatapasaṅgattā vuttaṃ “vālikarāsi pana na vaṭṭatī”ti. Itaropīti vālikarāsito
analyzed: suddha paṃsu pabbata pasaṅgattā vuttam vālika rāsi pana na vaṭṭati iti itaraḥ api iti vālika rāsitaḥ

original: aññopi tividho pabbato. Hatthippamāṇatoti aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanahatthipamāṇato. Catūsu
analyzed: aññaḥ api tividhaḥ pabbataḥ hatthi ppamāṇato ti aḍḍha aṭṭhama ratana hatthi pamāṇato catūsu

original: disāsūti vihārassa catūsu disāsu. Catūhi vā tīhi vāti ettha vāsaddena tato adhikānipi
analyzed: disāsu iti vihārassa catūsu disāsu catūhi vā tīhi vā ti ettha vā saddena tatas adhikāni pi

original: gahetabbāni. Ekena vā nimittenāti yojanā. Itoti pabbatanimittato. Tasmāti yasmā ekena
analyzed: gahetabbāni ekena vā nimittena ati yojanā itas ti pabbata nimittato tasmā ati yasmai ekena

original: nimittena na vaṭṭati, tasmā. Tanti pabbataṃ. Tasmāti ekasseva nimittassa kittitattā.
analyzed: nimittena na vaṭṭati tasmā pabbatam tasmā iti ekassa iva nimittassa kittita ttā

original: Yo pabbato atthi, taṃ pabbatanti yojanā. Antoti pabbatassa anto.
analyzed: yaḥ pabbataḥ atthi tam pabbatanti yojanā antaḥ ti pabbatassa antaḥ

original: Tatiyabhāgaṃ vāti ettha vāsaddena paṭhamabhāgopi ekadesopi gahetabbo. Tassāti tattakassa
analyzed: tatiya bhāgam vā ti ettha vā saddena paṭhama bhāgaḥ api ekadesaḥ api gahetabbaḥ tassa ti tattakassa

original: padesassa. Tatiyabhāgādito aparaṃ sabbapabbataṃ antokatvā sammataṃ dassento āha “sace”tiādi.
analyzed: padesassa tatiya bhāga āditas aparam sabba pabbatam antokatvā sammatam dassentaḥ āha sacā iti ādi

original: Pāsāṇanimitte evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Pasati ghanabhāvena bandhatīti
analyzed: pāsāṇa nimitte evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbo ti yojanā pasati ghana bhāvena bandhati iti

original: pāsāṇo. Ayaguḷopi pāsāṇasaṅkhameva gacchati tena tassa sadisattā. Ayaguḷopīti ettha
analyzed: pāsāṇaḥ ayaguḷaḥ api pāsāṇa saṅkham eva gacchati tena tassa sadisa ttā ayaguḷaḥ api iti ettha

original: pisaddena tambakaṃsavaṭṭalohasuvaṇṇarajatādayopi saṅgaṇhāti. Yo kocīti silāpavāḷamaṇiādīsu
analyzed: pi saddena tamba kaṃsa vaṭṭa loha suvaṇṇa rajata ādayaḥ api saṅgaṇhāti yaḥ kocī iti silāpavāḷamaṇi ādīsu

original: yo koci. Dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍaparimāṇatā saṇṭhānato gahetabbā, na tulitvā gaṇanavasena.
analyzed: yaḥ koci dvattiṃsa pala guḷa piṇḍa parimāṇa tā saṇṭhānataḥ gahetabbā na tulitvā gaṇana vasena

original: Khuddakataro pāsāṇoti yojanā. Yo piṭṭhipāsāṇo vā yo uṭṭhitapāsāṇo vāti yojanā kātabbā
analyzed: khuddakataro pāsāṇaḥ ti yojanā yo piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ vā yo uṭṭhita pāsāṇaḥ vā iti yojanā kātabbā

original: – uttaravākye tasaddassa aniyamaniddesavacanattā “pāsāṇasaṅkhaṃyevā”ti ettha evakārena
analyzed: uttara vākye ta saddassa aniyama niddesa vacana ttā ettha evakārena

original: “na pabbatasaṅkha”nti atthaṃ dasseti. Mahato piṭṭhipāsāṇassāti āyāmavitthārubbedhato
analyzed: na pabbata saṅkhanti attham dasseti mahataḥ piṭṭhi pāsāṇassa ati āyāma vitthāra ubbedhato

original: mahantassa piṭṭhipāsāṇassa sakkassa paṇḍukambalapiṭṭhipāsāṇassa viya. Tanti piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ.
analyzed: mahantassa piṭṭhi pāsāṇassa sakkassa paṇḍu kambala piṭṭhi pāsāṇassa viya tanti piṭṭhi pāsāṇam

original: Na vaṭṭatīti kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Hīti laddhadosajotako. Tanti piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ. Sīmāyāti
analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti kittetum na vaṭṭati hi iti laddha dosa jotakaḥ piṭṭhi pāsāṇam sīmā āyāti

original: sīmato. Vihāropīti na kevalaṃ nimittameva, vihāropi. Piṭṭhipāsāṇo na kittetabboti
analyzed: sīmataḥ vihāraḥ upi iti na kevalam nimittam eva vihāraḥ upi piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ na

original: sambandho. Kittetvāti ettha “piṭṭhipāsāṇa”nti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ kittetvā iti ettha piṭṭhi pāsāṇam ti yojetabbam

original: Vananimitte evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Vaniyati mayūrakokilādīhi sattehi
analyzed: vana nimitte evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbo ti yojanā mayūra kokila ādīhi sattehi

original: sambhajiyatīti vanaṃ, vananti sambhajanti etthāti vā vanaṃ. Taco eva sāro etesanti
analyzed: sambhajiyati iti vanam vananti sambhajanti ettha ati vā vanam tacaḥ u eva sāraḥ

original: tacasāro, tālanāḷikerādayo. Ādisaddena veṇuādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Anto sāro etesanti antosārā,
analyzed: taca sāraḥ tāla nāḷikera ādayo ādi saddena veṇu ādayo saṅgaṇhāti antaḥ sāraḥ etesanti antosārā

original: sākasālādayo. Ādisaddena khadirādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Antosāramissakānanti antosārehi
analyzed: sākasāla ādayaḥ ādi saddena khadira ādayaḥ saṅgaṇhāti antosāra missakānanti antosārehi

original: rukkhehi missakānaṃ. Rukkhānaṃ vananti ettha avayavaavayavibhāvena sambandho veditabbo.
analyzed: rukkhehi missakānam rukkhānam vananti ettha avayava avayavi bhāvena sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Iminā tiṇavanaṃ rukkhavananti ettha “tiṇānaṃ vana”nti vā “rukkhānaṃ vana”nti vā atthaṃ
analyzed: iminā tiṇa vanam rukkha vanam ti ettha tiṇānam vananti vā rukkhānam vananti vā attham

original: dasseti. Tiṇameva vanaṃ, rukkhoyeva vananti atthopi yujjateva. Cattāro vā pañca vā
analyzed: dasseti tiṇam eva vanam rukkho yā iva vananti cattāraḥ vā pañca vā

original: rukkhāti catupañcarukkhā, te mattaṃ pamāṇametthāti catupañcarukkhamattaṃ vanaṃ, tatoti
analyzed: rukkhā ati catu pañca rukkhā te mattam pamāṇam ettha ati catu pañca rukkha mattam vanam tatoti

original: catupañcarukkhamattato. Ekadesanti vanassa ekadesaṃ. Vanamajjheti vanassa vemajjhe,
analyzed: catu pañca rukkha mattataḥ vanassa eka desam vana majjheti vanassa vemajjhe

original: vanassūparīti attho. Rukkhantaresu eva hi vihāraṃ karonti. Ekadesanti vanassa ekadesaṃ.
analyzed: vanassu upari iti atthaḥ rukkha antaresu eva hi vihāram karonti vanassa eka desam

original: Tatthāti vane. “Ṭhitavana”nti padaṃ “kittetvā”ti pade avuttakammaṃ, “na kittetabba”nti pade vuttakammaṃ.
analyzed: tattha ati vane ṭhita vanam ti padam kittetvā ati pade avutta kammam na kittetabbam iti pade vutta kammam

original: Rukkhanimitte evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Rukkhiyati phalādikāmehi saṃvariyati
analyzed: rukkha nimitte evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ ti yojanā

original: rakkhiyatīti rukkho, mahiyaṃ ruhatīti vā rukkho. Jīvamānakoti lokavohāravasena mūlaṅkurādiharitasaṅkhātajīvamānako.
analyzed: rakkhiyati iti rukkhaḥ mahiyam ruhati iti vā rukkhaḥ jīvamānako ti loka vohāra vasena mūla aṅkura ādi harita saṅkhāta jīvamānakaḥ

original: Pariṇāhatoti visālabhāvato. Sūcidaṇḍakapamāṇoti sūciyā lekhaniyā daṇḍabhūtaveḷupamāṇo.
analyzed: pariṇāhataḥ uti visāla bhāvataḥ sūci daṇḍaka pamāṇaḥ iti sūciyā lekhaniyā daṇḍa bhūta veḷu pamāṇaḥ

original: So veḷu kaniṭṭhaṅgulipamāṇoti daṭṭhabbo. Tatoti aṭṭhaṅgulubbedhasūcidaṇḍakapamāṇapariṇāharukkhato.
analyzed: so kaniṭṭha aṅguli pamāṇo ti daṭṭhabbo tatas ti aṭṭha aṅgulu bbedha sūci daṇḍaka pamāṇa pariṇāha rukkhato

original: Vaṃsanaḷakasarāvādīsūti vaṃso ca naḷako ca sarāvo ca vaṃsanaḷakasarāvā, te ādayo
analyzed: vaṃsa naḷaka sarāva ādīsu iti vaṃsaḥ ca naḷakaḥ ca sarāvaḥ ca vaṃsa naḷaka sarāvā te ādayaḥ

original: yesaṃ kapālādīnanti vaṃsanaḷakasarāvādayo, tesu. Tatoti vaṃsādito. Taṃkhaṇampīti
analyzed: vaṃsa naḷaka sarāva ādayaḥ tesu tatas ti vaṃsa ādeḥ

original: tasmiṃ nimittakkhaṇepi. Akāraṇanti apamāṇaṃ. Etanti navamūlasākhāniggamanaṃ. Vattuṃ
analyzed: tasmin nimitta kkhaṇe pi akāraṇam ti apamāṇam etat niggamanam vattum

original: vaṭṭatīti sāmaññanāmenapi visesanāmenapi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Iminā pabbatādīsupi “pabbato”ti
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti sāmañña nāmena api visesa nāmena api vattum vaṭṭati iminā pabbata ādīsu pi pabbato ti

original: sāmaññanāmenapi “vaṅkapabbato vepullapabbato”ti visesanāmenapi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
analyzed: sāmañña nāmena api vaṅkapabbataḥ vepullapabbataḥ ti visesa nāmena api vattum vaṭṭati iti dasseti

original: Magganimitte evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Maggiyati pathikehi, maggamūḷhehi
analyzed: magga nimitte evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ iti yojanā pathikehi magga mūḷhehi

original: vā anvesiyatīti maggo. Yo yādiso jaṅghamaggo vā sakaṭamaggo vā vinivijjhitvā dve
analyzed: vā maggaḥ yaḥ yādisaḥ jaṅgha maggaḥ vā sakaṭa maggaḥ vā vinivijjhitvā dve

original: tīṇi gāmantarāni gacchati, so tādiso jaṅghamaggo vā sakaṭamaggo vā vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: tīṇi gāmantarāni gacchati saḥ tādisaḥ jaṅgha maggaḥ vā sakaṭa maggaḥ vā vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: Ukkamitvāti pakkamitvā. Yo jaṅghamaggo otarati, so na vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Avaḷañjāti
analyzed: ukkamitvā iti pakkamitvā yaḥ jaṅgha maggaḥ otarati saḥ na vaṭṭati iti yojanāḥ avaḷañjāti

original: aparibhogā. Gamanaṃ janetīti jaṅgho. Jaṇṇugopphakānaṃ majjhapadeso. Saha atthena
analyzed: a paribhogāḥ gamanam janeti iti jaṅghaḥ jaṇṇu gopphakānam majjha padesaḥ saha atthena

original: paṇiyadhanenāti sattho, jaṅghena vicaranto sattho jaṅghasattho. Sakati samattheti
analyzed: paṇiya dhanena ati satthaḥ jaṅghena vicarantaḥ satthaḥ jaṅgha sattho sakati

original: bhāraṃ vahitunti sakaṭo, tena vicaranto sattho sakaṭasattho. Jaṅghasattho ca sakaṭasattho
analyzed: bhāram vahitunti sakaṭaḥ tena vicaranto sattho sakaṭa satthaḥ jaṅgha sattho ca sakaṭa satthaḥ

original: ca jaṅghasakaṭasatthā, tehi. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Etanti nimittaṃ.
analyzed: ca tehi hi iti saccam yasmai vai etat ti nimittam

original: Koṇanti vihārakoṇaṃ. Gataṃ pana magganti yojanā. Parabhāgeti vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā
analyzed: vihāra koṇam gatam pana magganti yojanā parabhāgā iti vihāram parikkhipitvā

original: gacchantehi catūhi maggehi parabhāge. Dasasu nāmesūti satipaṭṭhānaṭṭhakathādīsu āgatesu
analyzed: gacchantehi catūhi maggehi parabhāge dasasu nāmesu iti sati paṭṭhāna aṭṭhakathā ādīsu āgatesu

analyzed: dasasu magga nāmesu yena kenacid nāmena ati iminā pabbata ādīsu pi pabbataḥ giri selaḥ addi

original: Vammikanimitte evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Upacikāhi vamiyati, sarabūgharagolikādayo

original: Nadīnimitte evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Nadati sandatīti nadī, nadanto eti

original: kappatīti dassento āha “sace”tiādi. Īsakanti ekausabha dviusabhādivasena manaṃ appamattaṃ.

original: Uddhaṃ vāti abhimukhatitthato upari vā. Adho vāti tato heṭṭhā vā. Gāvutamattabbhantareti
analyzed: uddham vāti abhimukha titthataḥ upari vā adhas vāti tatas heṭṭhā vā

original: gāvutapamāṇassa ṭhānassa abbhantare.
analyzed: gāvuta pamāṇassa ṭhānassa abbhantare

original: Sahanimittakittanavidhinā sammanitabbavidhiṃ dassento āha “imañca panā”tiādi. Dvīsu
analyzed: saha nimitta kittana vidhinā sammanitabba vidhim dassentaḥ āha iman ca pana atiādi dvīsu

original: tīresu ṭhātumasakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ “ekasmiṃ tīre ṭhatvā”ti. Tatoti nimittato. Attānanti
analyzed: tīresu vuttam ekasmin tīre ṭhatvā iti tatas iti nimittataḥ

original: nimittakittanaṃ vinayadharaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Parikkhipantenāti pariyāyantena. Tassāti
analyzed: nimitta kittanam vinaya dharam sandhāya vuttam parikkhipantena āti pariyāyantena tassa iti

original: tattakassa paricchedassa. Sammukhaṭṭhāneti adhosote naditīre ṭhitassa nimittassa
analyzed: tattakassa paricchedassa sammukha ṭṭhāne iti adhosote nadi tīre ṭhitassa nimittassa

original: sammukhaṭṭhāne. Tatoti nimittato. Tassāti tattakassa paricchedassa. Sammukhā naditīre
analyzed: sammukha ṭṭhāne tatas ti nimittato tassa ati tattakassa paricchedassa sammukhā nadi tīre

original: nimittaṃ atthīti sambandho. Saṅghaṭetabbanti sambandhitabbaṃ. Athāti nimittakittanato
analyzed: nimittam atthi iti sambandhaḥ saṅghaṭetabban ti sambandhitabbam atha ati nimitta kittanato

original: pacchā. “Sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvā”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ ekaṃ
analyzed: pacchā sabba nimittānam antar ṭhite bhikkhū hattha pāsa gate katvā idam sabbam ekam

original: gāmakhettaṃ byāpetvā sammanitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace sakalaṃ gāmakhettaṃ abyāpetvā
analyzed: gāma khettam byāpetvā sammanita bhāvam sandhāya vuttam sace sakalam gāma khettam a byāpetvā

original: ekadese sammanitaṃ hoti, nimittato bahi ṭhite bhikkhūpi hatthapāsagate katvā sammanitabbā.
analyzed: eka dese sammanitam hoti nimittataḥ bahi ṭhite bhikkhū api hattha pāsa gate katvā sammanitabbā

original: Kammanti sīmasammutikammaṃ. “Ṭhapetvā nadi”ntivacanassa kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “nadī
analyzed: kamman ti sīma sammuti kammam ṭhapetvā nadi nti vacanassa kāraṇam dassentaḥ āha nadī

original: pana baddhasīmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti.
analyzed: pana baddha sīma saṅkhyam na gacchati iti

original: Dīpako hotīti ettha dīpoti antaradīpo. So hi yasmā jalamajjhe dippati, yasmā ca dvidhā
analyzed: dīpakaḥ hoti iti ettha dīpo ti antaradīpo saḥ hi yasmai jala majjhe dippati yasmai ca dvidhā

original: āpo ettha sandati, tasmā dīpoti vuccati, soyeva khuddakaṭṭhena dīpako. Kakāro hi
analyzed: āpaḥ ettha sandati tasmā dīpo ti vuccati saḥ yā iva khudda kaṭṭhena dīpakaḥ kakāraḥ hi

original: khuddakatthavācako. Tanti dīpakaṃ. Attanāti vinayadharena. Orimante ca pārimante
analyzed: khudda kattha vācakaḥ dīpakam vinaya dharena orimante ca pārimante

original: cāti adhosote naditīre ṭhitassa nimittassa sammukhe orimante ca pārimante ca. Paratīre

analyzed: nimittam kittetvā iti sambandhaḥ kissa sammukha ṭṭhāne nimittan ti āha nadiyāḥ orima tīre

original: nimittassa sammukhaṭṭhāne”ti. Tatoti nimittato. Sammukhā nimittaṃ atthīti sambandho.
analyzed: nimittassa sammukha ṭṭhāne ti tatas ti nimittataḥ sammukhā nimittam atthi iti sambandhaḥ

original: Pārimante ca orimante cāti paratīre uparisote ṭhitassa nimittassa sammukhe pārimante
analyzed: pārimante ca orimante ca ati para tīre upari sote ṭhitassa nimittassa sammukhe pārimante

original: ca orimante ca. Paṭhamakittitanimittenāti orimatīre uparisote paṭhamaṃ kittitena
analyzed: ca orima ante ca paṭhama kittita nimittena ati orima tīre upari sote paṭhamam kittitena

original: nimittena. Ekā sīmā imassāti ekasīmo, dīpako. “Tīradvayañcā”ti padamapekkhitvā “ekasīma”nti
analyzed: nimittena ekā sīmā imassa ati eka sīmaḥ dīpakaḥ tīra dvayam ca ati padam apekkhitvā eka sīmanti

analyzed: sambandhitabbam vaccam an apekkhitvā eka sīmā tipi nicca aitthi liṅga vasena pāṭhaḥ atthi

original: Uddhaṃ vā adho vāti ettha vāsaddo aniyamavikappattho. Athāti tasmiṃ adhikatare satīti
analyzed: uddham vā adhas vā iti ettha vā saddo aniyama vikappa atthaḥ atha ati tasmin adhikatare sati iti

original: yojanā. Vihārasīmaparicchedanimittassa ujukamevāti sace dīpako adho adhikataro hoti,
analyzed: yojanā vihāra sīma pariccheda nimittassa ujukam eva ati sace dīpakaḥ adhas adhikataraḥ hoti

original: siṅgaṃ. Tañhi sikhaṃ matthakaṃ rāti gaṇhātīti sikharanti vuccati. Tatoti dīpakassa
analyzed: siṅgam tat hi sikham matthakam rāti gaṇhāti iti sikharanti vuccati tatoti dīpakassa

original: pārimantanimittato. Paratīranimittāni kittetvāti sambandho. Ayaṃ dīpakassa vihārasīmaparicchedato
analyzed: pārimanta nimittataḥ para tīra nimittāni sambandhaḥ ayam dīpakassa vihāra sīma paricchedato

original: adho adhikatare vinicchayo. Uddhaṃ adhikatarepi iminānusārena veditabboti so na dassito.
analyzed: adhas adhikatare vinicchayaḥ uddham adhikatare pi iminā anusārena veditabbo ti so na dassito

original: Pabbatasaṇṭhānāti pabbatena samaṃ ṭhānaṃ etissāti pabbatasaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: pabbata saṇṭhānā ti pabbatena samam ṭhānam etissa ati pabbata saṇṭhānā

original: Uddhampi adhopīti pisaddo samuccayattho. Ubhopi sikharānīti uddhaṃ sikharaṃ, adho
analyzed: uddham pi adhas pi iti pi saddo samuccaya ttho ubho pi sikharāni iti uddham sikharam adhas

original: sikharanti ubhopi sikharāni. Mudiṅgasaṇṭhānāti mūle ca agge ca tanukassa majjhe thūlassa
analyzed: sikharanti ubho pi sikharāni mudiṅga saṇṭhānā ti mūle ca agge ca tanukassa majjhe thūlassa

original: mudiṅgassa saṇṭhānā.
analyzed: mudiṅgassa saṇṭhānā

original: Sabbapaṭhamena nayenāti uddhaṃ adhikanayassa, adho adhikanayassa, uddhaṃadhoadhikanayassa
analyzed: sabba paṭhamena nayena ati uddham adhika nayassa adhas adhika nayassa uddham adhoadhika nayassa

original: cāti sabbesaṃ nayānaṃ paṭhamena vihārasīmadīpakānaṃ samena nayena. Paṇavasaṇṭhānāti

original: mūle ca agge ca thūlassa majjhetanukassa paṇavassa saṇṭhānā.
analyzed: mūle ca agge ca thūlassa majjhetanukassa paṇavassa saṇṭhānā

original: 72. Uposathāgārādikathā
analyzed: uposatha āgāra ādi kathā

original: 141. Anupariveṇiyanti ettha anusaddassa vicchatthaṃ, pariveṇasaddassa ca liṅgavipallāsabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ettha anu saddassa vicchattham pariveṇa saddassa ca liṅga vipallāsa bhāvam

original: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pariveṇe”ti. Pariveṇasaddo hi napuṃsakaliṅgo, idha
analyzed: dassetum vuttam tasmin tasmin pariveṇa iti pariveṇa saddaḥ hi napuṃsaka liṅgaḥ idha

original: pana liṅgavipallāsaṃ katvā itthiliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. “Saṅketaṃ akatvā”ti iminā asaṅketenāti
analyzed: pana liṅga vipallāsam katvā itthi liṅga vasena vuttam saṅketam a katvā ati iminā a saṅketena ati

analyzed: padassa kiriyā visesana ttam dīpeti kamma vācāya ati iminā samūhanitvā ati padassa karaṇam dasseti

original: 142. Yatoti ettha topaccayassa kāraṇatthe pavattabhāvaṃ dassento āha “yasmā”ti. “Hatthapāse”ti
analyzed: yatas iti ettha to paccayassa kāraṇa atthe pavatta bhāvam dassentaḥ āha yasmā iti hattha pāsa iti

original: iminā hatthapāsato bahi nisinne akatovassa uposatho hotīti dasseti. Assāti bhikkhuno.
analyzed: iminā hattha pāsataḥ bahi nisinne a katovassaḥ uposathaḥ hoti iti dasseti assa ati bhikkhuno

original: Vatthuvasenāti aṭṭhuppattivasena. Uposathassa pamukhassa abbhokāse vā māḷakādīsu
analyzed: vatthu vasena āti aṭṭhuppatti vasena uposathassa pamukhassa abbhokāse vā māḷaka ādīsu

original: vāti sambandho. Nimittupagā vā animittupagā vāti heṭṭhā aṭṭhasu nimittesu vuttā nimittupagā
analyzed: vā ati sambandhaḥ nimitta upagā vā animitta upagā vā ati heṭṭhā aṭṭhasu nimittesu vuttā nimitta upagā

original: vā animittupagā vā pabbatādayo vā aññe vā kittetabbā.
analyzed: vā a nimitta upagāḥ vā pabbata ādayaḥ vā aññe vā

original: Paṭhamataraṃ na āgacchati, dukkaṭanti uposathe ghosiyamāne paṭhamataraṃ na āgacchati,
analyzed: paṭhamataram naḥ āgacchati uposathe ghosiyamāne paṭhamataram naḥ āgacchati

original: dukkaṭaṃ. Vihārassa majjhe hotīti yojanā. Etthāti porāṇake āvāse. Tatthāti porāṇake
analyzed: dukkaṭam vihārassa majjhe hoti iti yojanā ettha ati porāṇake āvāse tattha ati porāṇake

original: āvāse. Asambādhoti saṅghassa nisajjaṭṭhānapahonako. Tatthāti pacchā uṭṭhite āvāse.
analyzed: āvāse asambādho ti saṅghassa nisajja ṭṭhāna pahonako tattha ati pacchā uṭṭhite āvāse

original: Sabbesaṃ nisajjaṭṭhānanti yojanā. Tatthāti therassa vihāre. Soti therassa vihāro.
analyzed: sabbesam nisajja ṭṭhānam ti yojanā tattha ati therassa vihāre saḥ ti therassa vihāro

original: Etthāti tumhākaṃ vihāre. Sabbesaṃ okāso natthīti sambandho. Tatthāti taṃ asukaṃ nāma
analyzed: ettha ati tumhākam vihāre sabbesam okāsaḥ natthi iti sambandho tattha ati tam asukam nāma

original: āvāsaṃ. “Vaṭṭatī”ti vattabbanti yojanā. Tassāti therassa.
analyzed: āvāsam vaṭṭati iti vattabbam ti yojanā tassa iti therassa

original: 74. Avippavāsasīmānujānanakathā
143. Andhakavindaṃ nāmāti tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ. Tanti andhakavindaṃ. Theroti mahākassapatthero.
analyzed: andhakavindam nāma ati tassa gāmassa nāmam andhakavindam thero ti mahākassapa thero

original: Tatoti andhakavindato. Iminā “andhakavindā”ti ettha nissakkatthe nissakkavacananti
analyzed: tato ti andhakavindataḥ iminā andhakavindā ati ettha nissakka atthe nissakka vacanan ti

original: dasseti. Uposathanti tadatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Uposathatthāyāti hi attho. Andhakavindā
analyzed: dassa iti uposatham ti tad atthe upayoga vacanam uposatha atthāya ati hi atthaḥ andhakavindā

original: rājagahaṃ āgamanassa kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “rājagahaṃ hī”tiādi. Tattha hīti yasmā.
analyzed: rājagaham āgamanassa kāraṇam dassentaḥ āha rājagaham hi itiādi tattha hi iti yasmā

original: Andhakavindā vihāraṃ anto katvā “aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā”ti vuttaṃ. Nesanti aṭṭhārasannaṃ
analyzed: andhakavindāḥ vihāram antar katvā aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā ti vuttam

original: mahāvihārānaṃ. Saṅghassa sāmaggidānatthanti ettha saṅghassa sāmaggidānaṃ attano uposathakiccaṃ
analyzed: mahāvihārānam saṅghassa sāmaggi dāna atthanti ettha saṅghassa sāmaggi dānam attano uposatha kiccaṃ

original: siddhaṃ. Tasmā pāḷiyaṃ “uposathaṃ āgacchanto”ti vuttaṃ. “Sippiniyaṃ nāmā”ti iminā
