original: nadiṃ tarantoti ettha nadiyā nāmaṃ dasseti. Manaṃ vūḷhoti ettha mananti nipāto īsakatthoti
analyzed: nadim taranto ti ettha nadiyāḥ nāmam dasseti manam vūḷhaḥ iti ettha mananti nipātaḥ īsaka ttho ti

original: dassento āha “īsaka”nti. “Appamatta”nti iminā “īsaka”ntipadassa atthaṃ dasseti. “Vūḷhabhāvo”ti
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha īsakanti appamattanti iminā īsakanti padassa attham dasseti vūḍha bhāvaḥ ti

original: iminā bhāvapaccayena vinā bhāvattho ñātabboti dasseti. Caṇḍenāti kharena. Tatthāti
analyzed: iminā bhāva paccayena vinā bhāva atthaḥ ñātabbaḥ iti dasseti caṇḍena ati kharena tattha ati

original: nadiyaṃ. Amanasikarontoti “caṇḍasota”nti ābhogaṃ akaronto. Na pana vūḷhoti na pana
analyzed: a manasikarontaḥ iti ābhogam a karontaḥ na pana vūḍhā iti na pana

original: mahāvūḷho. Udakabbhāhatānīti udakena abhiāhatāni. Assāti therassa. Allānīti tintāni.
analyzed: mahāvūḷhaḥ udakabbhāhatāni iti udakena abhiāhatāni assa ati therassa allāni iti tintāni

original: 144. Purimakammavācāti “sammatā sā sīmā saṅghena ticīvarena avippavāsā”ti pure vuttā
analyzed: purima kamma vācā ati sammatā sā sīmā saṅghena ti cīvarena a vippavāsā ati pure vuttā

original: kammavācā. Ayamevāti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”tipadaṃ pakkhipitvā anupaññattā
analyzed: kamma vācā ayam eva ati ṭhapetvā gāmam ca gāma upacāram ca atipadam pakkhipitvā anupaññattā

original: ayameva kammavācā. Ayanti pacchimakammavācā. Hi yasmā bhikkhunisaṅgho antogāme vasati,
analyzed: ayam eva kamma vācāḥ ayanti pacchima kamma vācāḥ hi yasmai bhikkhuni saṅghaḥ antogāme vasati

original: tasmā purimāyeva vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Yadi evanti yadi bhikkhunisaṅghassa ayaṃ pacchimakammavācā
analyzed: tasmā purimāya iva vaṭṭati iti yojanā yadi evam ti yadi bhikkhuni saṅghassa ayam pacchima kamma vācā

original: vaṭṭanaṃ siyā bhaveyya, evaṃ satīti yojanā. Soti bhikkhunisaṅgho. Etāya kammavācāyāti
analyzed: vaṭṭanam siyā bhaveyya evam sati iti yojanā saḥ ti bhikkhuni saṅghaḥ etāya kamma vācāya ati

original: pacchimakammavācāya. Na labheyyāti antogāme vasanattā ticīvaraparihāraṃ na labheyya.
analyzed: pacchima kamma vācāya na labheyya ati antogāme vasanattā ti cīvara parihāram na labheyya

original: Kiṃ na labhatiyevāti āha “atthi cassa parihāro”ti. Assāti bhikkhunisaṅghassa. Dvepi
analyzed: kim na labhatiyā iva ati āha atthi cassa parihāro ti assa ati bhikkhuni saṅghassa dve pi

original: Tassāti bhikkhūnaṃ sīmāya. Eseva nayoti bhikkhunīnaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharitvāpi antopavisitvāpi

original: bhikkhūnaṃ sīmāya sammane eseva nayo. Eteti bhikkhubhikkhuniyo. Sāmaññattā hi pulliṅgena
analyzed: bhikkhūnam sīmāya sammane esa iva nayaḥ etā iti bhikkhu bhikkhuniyaḥ sāmaññattāḥ hi pulliṅgena

original: vuttaṃ. Ettha cāti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”tipade ca. Saṅgaho veditabbo,
analyzed: vuttam ettha ca ati ṭhapetvā gāmañca ca ati pade ca saṅgahaḥ veditabbo

original: kasmā? Gāmena nigamanagarānaṃ ekalakkhaṇattā.
analyzed: kasmā gāmena nigama nagarānaṃ eka lakkhaṇa ttā

original: Parikkhepokāsoti parikkhepārahokāso. Tesūti gāmagāmūpacāresu. Parihāranti cīvaravippavāsaāpattiapanayanaṃ.
analyzed: parikkhepa ukāso ti parikkhepa āraha ukāso tesu iti gāma gāma upacāresu parihāram cīvara vippavāsa āpatti apanayanam

original: “Itī”tiādi nigamanaṃ. Etthāti samānasaṃvāsakaavippavāsasīmāsu. Attano dhammatāyāti
analyzed: iti itiādi nigamanam ettha ati samāna saṃvāsaka avippavāsa sīmāsu attanaḥ dhamma tāya ati

original: attano sabhāvena. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Tassāti avippavāsasīmāya.
analyzed: attano sabhāvena yattha ati yasmin ṭhāne hi iti saccam yasmai vā tassa ati a vippavāsa sīmāya

original: Visunti samānasaṃvāsakasīmato pāṭekkaṃ. Tatthāti dvīsu sīmāsu. Avippavāsāyāti avippavāsasīmāya.
analyzed: visum ti samāna saṃvāsaka sīmataḥ pāṭekkam tattha ati dvīsu sīmāsu avippavāsāya ati avippavāsa sīmāya

original: Tanti gāmaṃ. Sāti avippavāsasīmā. Sammatāya sīmāyāti avippavāsasīmāya sammatāya satiyāti
analyzed: tanti gāmam sā ati a vippavāsa sīmā sammatāya sīmāya ati a vippavāsa sīmāya sammatāya satiyā ati

original: sambandho. Sammatato pacchāti vā yojanā. Nivisatīti nivāsatthāya visati pavisati.
analyzed: sambandho pacchā ati vā yojanā nivisati iti nivāsa atthāya visati pavisati

original: Sopīti gāmopi. Sīmasaṅkhyaṃyevāti avippāsasīmavohārameva. Adhiṭṭhitatecīvarikā bhikkhū
analyzed: saḥ api iti gāmaḥ api sīma saṅkhyaṃ yeva ati avippāsa sīma vohāram eva adhiṭṭhita tecīvarikāḥ bhikkhū

original: parihāraṃ labhantīti adhippāyo. Yathā pacchā niviṭṭho gāmo sīmasaṅkhyaṃyeva gacchati,
analyzed: parihāram labhanti iti adhippāyaḥ yathā pacchā niviṭṭhaḥ gāmaḥ gacchati

original: evanti yojanā. “Pavisissāmā”ti gehāni katāni, “pavisissāmā”ti ālayopi atthīti yojanā.
analyzed: evanti yojanā pavisissāma ati gehāni katāni pavisissāma ati ālayaḥ api atthi iti yojanā

original: Ālayopīti apekkhopi. Apaviṭṭhāti gehāni apaviṭṭhā. Gehameva chaḍḍetvāti gehaṃ chaḍḍetvā

original: pāṭho, ayamevattho. Saṇṭhahantīti udakena samaṃ tiṭṭhanti. Soti padeso. Udakantatoti
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ ayam eva attho saṇṭhahanti iti udakena samam tiṭṭhanti saḥ ti padeso udakantato ti

original: udakakoṭito. Tatthāti samudde. Bādhatīti pīḷayati. Tesūti nāvāaṭṭakesu. Tanti piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ.

analyzed: ūmiyaḥ ti vīciyaḥ tāḥ hi paraṃparā vasena uggantvā sa viññāṇaka aviññāṇake miyanti hiṃsanti

original: anto pakkhipantīti vā ūmiyoti vuccanti. Tatthāti piṭṭhipāsāṇe. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā

original: vā. Udakeneva piṭṭhipāsāṇo ottharīyatīti yojanā. Soti dīpakapabbato. “Dūre”ti vatvā

original: Macche bandhantīti macchabandhāti vacanattho kātabbo. Anāgamanapatheti yattha gantvā

analyzed: tadaha iva paccāgantvā na āgamana pathike dese natthi āgamana patho ettha ati an āgamana patho

analyzed: gantvā hi puna maccha vadhānam gamana pariyantassa ati

original: Karontehipi kātabbanti sambandho. Yatthāti yasmiṃ sare. Ayanti ayaṃ saro, na jātassaro

original: 121. Pavāraṇābhedakathā

original: Samasamāti samena, samato vā samā samasamā, atirekasamāti attho. Kiñci ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ

analyzed: anena ati pādapuñchaniyam tat eva pādapuñchanikam sabbe eva ati soṇena saha asīti sahassa purisā

original: eva. Tassa cāti soṇassa ca. Pubbayogoti pubbūpāyo.
analyzed: eva tassa ca ati soṇassa ca pubba yogaḥ ti pubba upāyo

original: Asītigāmikasahassānīti ettha gāmesu vasantīti gāmikā, tesaṃ asītisahassāni asītigāmikasahassānīti
analyzed: asīti gāmika sahassāni iti ettha gāmesu vasanti iti gāmikā tesam asīti sahassāni asīti gāmika sahassāni iti

original: atthaṃ dassento āha “tesū”tiādi. Tattha “kulaputtāna”nti iminā vasantyatthe pavattassa
analyzed: attham dassentaḥ āha tesu itiādi tattha kula puttānam ti iminā vasanti atthe pavattassa

original: ṇikapaccayassa sarūpaṃ dasseti. “Asītisahassānī”ti iminā saddantaropi asītisahassasaddānaṃ
analyzed: ṇika paccayassa sarūpam dasseti asīti sahassāni iti iminā asīti sahassa saddānam

original: samāsabhāvaṃ dasseti. Kenacidevāti ettha “kenaci ivā”ti padavibhāgaṃ katvā dakāro
analyzed: samāsa bhāvam dasseti kenacid eva ati ettha kenaci iva ati pada vibhāgam katvā dakāraḥ

original: padasandhimatto, ivasaddo upamatthoti āha “kenaci karaṇīyena viyā”ti. Atha vā “na
analyzed: pada sandhi mattaḥ iva saddaḥ upamattho ti āha kenaci karaṇīyena viyāti atha vā na

original: panā”tiādinā evaphalassa dassitattā “kenaci evā”ti padacchedaṃ katvā evatthopi yujjatevāti
analyzed: pana ati ādinā eva phalassa dassita ttā kenaci eva ati padacchedam katvā eva tthaḥ api yujjatā iva ati

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Assāti bimbisārarañño. Tassāti soṇassa. Dassanāya aññatra kiñci karaṇīyaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam assa ati bimbisāra raññaḥ tassa ati soṇassa dassanāya aññatra kiñci karaṇīyam

original: na atthīti yojanā. Rājāti bimbisāro rājā, sannipātāpesīti sambandho. Diṭṭhadhammike
analyzed: na atthi iti yojanā rājā ati bimbisāraḥ rājā sannipāta apesi iti sambandhaḥ diṭṭhadhammike

original: attheti ettha diṭṭhadhammasaddo idhalokattho, ikasaddo hitatthe pavattoti āha “idhalokahite”ti.
analyzed: atthe ti ettha diṭṭhadhamma saddaḥ idha loka atthaḥ ika saddaḥ hita atthe pavatto ti āha idha loka hita iti

original: “Amhāka”nti iminā “so no bhagavā”ti ettha nosaddo amhasaddakāriyoti dasseti. Amhākaṃ
analyzed: amhākam ti iminā saḥ naḥ bhagavā ati ettha no saddaḥ amha sadda kāriyaḥ ti dasseti amhākam

original: so bhagavāti yojanā. Samparāyiketi paralokahite.
analyzed: saḥ bhagavā ati yojanā samparāyikā iti paraloka hite

original: “Jānāpemī”ti iminā “paṭivedemī”ti ettha vidadhātuyā ñāṇatthaṃ dasseti. Paṭikāya nimujjitvāti
analyzed: jānāpemi iti iminā paṭivedemi iti ettha vida dhātuyāḥ ñāṇa attham dasseti paṭikāya nimujjitvā iti

original: ettha paṭikāsaddo aḍḍhendupāsāṇavācakoti āha “aḍḍhacandapāsāṇe”ti. So hi paṭati aḍḍhabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ettha paṭikā saddo aḍḍha indu pāsāṇa vācakaḥ iti āha aḍḍha canda pāsāṇa iti saḥ hi paṭati aḍḍha bhāvam

original: gacchatīti paṭikāti vuccati. Paṭikāsaddoyaṃ attharaṇavisesepi vattati. Yassa dānīti
analyzed: gacchati iti paṭikā iti vuccati paṭikā saddaḥ yam attharaṇa visese pi vattati yassa dāni iti

original: ettha yasaddassa visayaṃ dassento āha “tesaṃ hitakaraṇīyatthassā”ti. Iminā ayaṃ yaṃsaddo
analyzed: ettha yaṃsaddassa visayam dassentaḥ āha tesam hita karaṇīya atthassa iti iminā ayam yaṃsaddaḥ

original: na taṃsaddāpekkhoti dasseti. Atha vā yassāti yo assa. Assa tesaṃ hitakaraṇīyatthassa
analyzed: na dassa iti atha vā yassa iti yaḥ assa assa tesam hita karaṇīya tthassa

original: yo kālo atthi, taṃ kālaṃ bhagavā jānātīti yojanā. Tesanti asītigāmikasahassānaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ kālaḥ atthi tam kālam bhagavā jānāti iti yojanā tesan ti asītigāmika sahassānam

original: Pacchāyāyanti ettha pakāro paccantatthavācakoti āha “vihārapaccante chāyāya”nti.
analyzed: pacchā āyāyanti ettha pakāro paccanta attha vācako ti āha vihāra paccante chāyāyanti

original: Sammanāharantīti saṃ punappunaṃ manasāgataṃ abhimukhaṃ harantīti atthaṃ dassento
analyzed: sammanā haranti iti sam punappunam manasā āgatam abhimukham haranti iti attham dassento

original: āha “punappunaṃ manasikarontī”ti. “Pasādavasenā”ti iminā “kodhavasenā”tiādīni paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: āha punappunam manasikaronti iti pasāda vasena ati iminā kodha vasena ati ādīni paṭikkhipati

original: “Puna visiṭṭhatara”nti iminā bhiyyoso mattāyāti nipātassa atthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: puna visiṭṭhataranti iminā bhiyyosaḥ mattāya iti nipātassa attham dasseti

original: Soṇassa pabbajjākathā
analyzed: soṇassa pabbajjā kathā

original: 243. “Makkhito”ti iminā phurati vipphārati byāpetīti phuṭoti vutte phuradhātuyā vipphāraṇaṃ
analyzed: makkhito ti iminā phurati vipphārati byāpeti iti phuṭaḥ ti vutte phura dhātuyāḥ vipphāraṇam

original: nāma makkhitatthoti dasseti. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne. Iminā gāvo āhananti etthāti gavāghātananti
analyzed: nāma makkhita attho ti dasseti yattha iti yasmin ṭhāne iminā gāvaḥ āhananti ettha ati

original: atthaṃ dassebhi. Tantissareti tantiyā guṇassa sare. Vādanakusaloti vādane kusalo.
analyzed: attham tanti ssareti tantiyāḥ guṇassa sare vādana kusalo ti vādane kusalaḥ

original: Kharamucchitāti kharena mucchitā. “Sarasampannā”ti iminā saro etissamatthīti saravatī,
analyzed: khara mucchitā iti kharena mucchitā sara sampannā iti iminā saraḥ saravatī

original: vīṇāti dasseti. Kammaññāti ettha kammasaddato khamatthe ññapaccayoti āha “kammakkhamā”ti.
analyzed: vīṇā ati dasseti kammaññā iti ettha kamma saddataḥ khama atthe ñña paccayaḥ ti āha kammakkhamā ti

original: Mandamucchanāti mandena mucchanā. Same guṇeti ettha samo nāma majjhimo, guṇo nāma
analyzed: manda mucchanā ati mandena mucchanā same guṇe iti ettha samaḥ nāma majjhimaḥ guṇaḥ nāma

original: mukhyato vīṇāya jiyā, upacārato saroti āha “majjhime sare”ti. Vīriyasamathanti ettha
analyzed: mukhyatas vīṇāya jiyā upacārato āha majjhime ettha

original: vīriyañca samatho cāti atthaṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “vīriyasampayuttaṃ samatha”nti. Iminā
analyzed: vīriyam ca samathaḥ ca ati attham paṭikkhipantaḥ āha vīriya sampayuttam samathan ti iminā

original: vīriyena sampayuttaṃ samathaṃ vīriyasamathanti dasseti. “Vīriyaṃ samathena yojehī”ti
analyzed: vīriyena sampayuttam samatham vīriya samathanti dasseti vīriyam samathena yojehi iti

original: iminā vīriyena samathaṃ yojehīti atthopi dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Indriyānañca samatanti
analyzed: iminā vīriyena samatham yojehi iti atthaḥ api dassito ti daṭṭhabbam

analyzed: ettha saddhā ādīni pañcindriyāni eva gahetabbāni na aññāni iti dassentaḥ āha saddhā ādīnam

original: indriyāna”nti. “Samabhāva”nti iminā tāpaccayo bhāvatthe hotīti dasseti. Tatthāti
analyzed: iminā tāpa ccayaḥ bhāva tthe hoti iti dasseti tattha ati

original: “indriyānaṃ samata”ntipāṭhe, saddhādīsu indriyesu vā. Tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhīti
analyzed: indriyānam sama tanti pāṭhe saddhā ādīsu indriyesu vā tattha ca nimittam gaṇhāhi iti

analyzed: ettha bhāvena bhāva lakkhaṇe tha paccayaḥ hoti iti āha tasmin samathe sati iti ādāse sati

original: uppajjitabbanti yojanā. Samathassa nimittaṃ samathanimittaṃ, indriyānaṃ samabhāvo.
analyzed: uppajjitabbanti yojanā samathassa nimittam samatha nimittam indriyānam sama bhāvaḥ

original: Eseva nayo sesesupi. Samathanimittādīni cattāri ekasesena vā sāmaññaniddesena vā

original: “nimitta”nti vuccati.

analyzed: āha arahā aham ti jānāpeyyanti cha ṭhānāni iti ettha ṭhāna saddo kāraṇa attho ti āha

analyzed: hi iti vitthāraḥ asammoho ti ettha ākāra attha vācakaḥ iti saddo pubba padesu pi yojetvā

original: dvandavākyaṃ dasseti.

original: Tesanti kilesānaṃ. Āneñjappattanti ettha iñjanaṃ kampanaṃ iñjaṃ, na iñjaṃ aneñjaṃ,

analyzed: tam eva āneñjam tam pattanti āneñjappattanti attham dassentaḥ āha acalana ppattanti

original: Vayañcāti casaddo avuttasampiṇḍanatthoti āha “vayampi uppādampī”ti.

analyzed: diguṇa ādi upāhana paṭikkhepa kathā

original: palāsasaddo paṇṇavācako. Paṭalaṃ nāma paṇṇaṃ viya hoti, tasmā “ekapaṭala”nti vuttaṃ.

original: Asītisakaṭavāheti ettha asīti padaṃ sakaṭapadena sambandhaṃ katvā asītisakaṭehi vahitabbeti

original: Sattannaṃ hatthīnaṃ samūho sattahatthikaṃ. Sattaanīkattā ekūnapaññāsahatthino honti.

original: Tesu satta hatthino, dvācattālīsa hatthiniyo honti. Dviguṇāti ettha guṇasaddo paṭalatthoti

original: āha “dvipaṭalā”ti. Guṇaṅguṇūpāhanāti ettha dviguṇatiguṇānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā pārisesato

original: ca likhitabbo ca. Idāni potthakesu pana ukāro na dissati.

original: 149. Sabbanīlikādipaṭikkhepakathā
analyzed: sabba nīlikā ādi paṭikkhepa kathā

original: 246. Sabbāva nīlikāti sabbāva upāhanāyo nīlikā, sabbaṭṭhānesu nīlametāsanti sabbanīlikātipi

original: Etāsūti sabbanīlikādīsu. Puñchitvāti parimajjitvā. Appamattakenāpīti pisaddo sambhāvane.

original: “Yāsaṃ vaddhāyeva nīlā”ti iminā nīlakā vaddhikā etāsanti nīlakavaddhikāti chaṭṭhībāhiratthasamāsaṃ
analyzed: yāsam vaddhāya iva nīlā ati iminā nīlakāḥ vaddhikāḥ etāsanti nīlaka vaddhikā ati chaṭṭhī bāhirattha samāsam

analyzed: dassā iti vaddhikā ati ca sā hi upāhana talataḥ vaddhayati iti vaddhikā ati ca upāhana talam

original: sakuṇaviseso. Kaṇṇikaṭṭhāneti dvinnaṃ vaddhikānaṃ ekato samāgamaṭṭhāne. “Meṇḍa…pe…
analyzed: sakuṇa visesaḥ kaṇṇika ṭṭhāne ti dvinnam vaddhikānam ekatas samāgama ṭṭhāne meṇḍape

original: katā”ti iminā meṇḍassa visāṇena sadisā vaddhikā etāsanti meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikāti vacanatthaṃ

original: dasseti. Tathevāti yathā meṇḍaajasiṅgasaṇṭhāne vaddhe yojetvā katā, tathevāti attho.

original: “Vicchikā…pe… katā”ti iminā vicchikāya aḷo vicchikāḷo, so viya vaddhikā etāsanti
analyzed: iminā

original: Tesu panāti khallakādīsu pana. Sati santesūti yojanā. Sīhacammena parikkhipitabbāti

original: 247. Omukkanti ettha avatyūpasaggassa viyogatthaṃ dassento āha “paṭimuñcitvā apanīta”nti. Purāṇaṃ guṇaṅguṇūpāhananti attho.

analyzed: ajjhārāme upāhana paṭikkhepa kathā

analyzed: pādataḥ nikkhantena khīla sadisena maṃsena pavattaḥ ābādhaḥ pāda khīla ābādhaḥ ti vacana attham dassentaḥ āha pādataḥ tiādi pādataḥ nikkhantanti sambandho

analyzed: yāna ādi paṭikkhepa kathā

original: Āgacchatīti samīpamāgacchati.
analyzed: āgacchati iti samīpam āgacchati

analyzed: labhati iti gilāna upaṭṭhākaḥ labhati

analyzed: tesu iti kusa cīra ādīsu

analyzed: aṭṭha cīvara mātikā kathā

original: Jambuyā lakkhito dīpo jambudīpo. Tambo lohito pāṇi hattho etesanti tambapāṇino. Vijayakumārādayo

original: 456. Kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vaciyā kataṃ kammaṃ vacīkammaṃ. Tattha kāyakammaṃ
analyzed: kāyena katam kammam kāya kammam vaciyā katam kammam vacī kammam tattha kāya kammam

original: “Kodhavasenā”ti iminā pemavasenāti atthaṃ nivatteti. Adhammiyānīti adhammena kattabbāni.

analyzed: āha asammodikāya ati kathāya ati iminā a sammodam janeti iti asammodikā ati katvā ṇika paccayassa

analyzed: bhaṇḍana kārakaḥ ayam janaḥ ti yojanā tattha ati bhaṇḍana kārakesu janesu aññam pi ekam

analyzed: ye ca tam upanayhanti iti ettha visayam dassetum vuttam

original: janā. Upanayhanti upanahanti bandhanti. Sanantanoti ettha sanantanasaddo purāṇapariyāyoti āha “porāṇo”ti.

original: gahetabbakālañca sattamītappurisasamāsañca dassento āha “kathetabbayuttakāle āgata”nti.
analyzed: gahetabba kālañca sattamī tappurisa samāsañca dassentaḥ āha kathetabba yutta kāle āgatam ti

original: Vacoti padaṃ na vacanapadhānaṃ, vacanavantapuggaloyeva padhānanti dassento āha “vadanto”ti.
analyzed: vaco ti padam na vacana padhānam padhānanti dassentaḥ āha vadanto ti

original: Ācerakamhi ca saketi ettha ācariyassa eso ācerako, sassa attano eso sakoti vacanatthaṃ
analyzed: ācerakamhi ca saka iti ettha ācariyassa eso ācerako sassa attano eso sakaḥ ti vacana attham

original: dassento āha “attano ācariyavāde”ti. Gāthābhāvato ācariyasaddassa ācerādeso kātabbo.
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha attanaḥ ācariya vāda iti gāthā bhāvataḥ ācariya saddassa kātabbo

original: “Vāde”ti iminā idamatthe pavattassa ṇikapaccayassa sarūpaṃ dasseti. Alaṃ pametunti
analyzed: vāde ti iminā idam atthe pavattassa ṇika paccayassa sarūpam dasseti alam pametum ti

original: ettha alaṃsaddo samatthattho, pamasaddotulanatthoti āha “tulayituṃ samattho”ti. Kathetaveti
analyzed: ettha alam saddo samattha ttho pama saddo tulana ttho ti āha tulayitum samatthaḥ iti kathetave iti

original: ettha tavesaddo aññattha yebhuyyena bhāvavācako, idha pana kammavācakoti āha “kathetabbe”ti.
analyzed: ettha tava saddaḥ aññattha yebhuyyena bhāva vācakaḥ idha pana kamma vācakaḥ iti āha kathetabba iti

original: Viraddhaṭṭhānakusaloti viraddhaṭṭhāne kusalo.
analyzed: viraddha ṭṭhāna kusalo ti viraddha ṭṭhāne kusalo

original: Ayaṃ gāthā vuttāti sambandho. Tanti kathetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ hetthatthoti ayaṃ eva ettha
analyzed: ayam gāthā vuttā iti sambandhaḥ kathetabbam ayam ha itthatthaḥ iti ayam eva ettha

original: gāthāyaṃ atthoti yojanā. “Gacchantī”ti iminā vajantīti ettha vajadhātuyā gatyatthaṃ
analyzed: gāthā ayam yojanā gacchanti iti iminā vajanti iti ettha vaja dhātuyā gati attham

original: dasseti. “Attano ācariyavāda”nti iminā “sakaṃ ādāya”nti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Ācariyavādo
analyzed: dasseti attanaḥ ācariya vādan ti iminā sakam ādāyanti padassa attham dasseti ācariya vādaḥ

original: hi ādātabbato gahetabbato ādāyanti vutto. Tadanurūpanti tassa vatthussa anurūpaṃ.
analyzed: hi ādātabbataḥ gahetabbataḥ ādāyanti vuttaḥ tad anurūpam ti tassa vatthussa anurūpam

original: Byākaramāno bhikkhūti sambandho. Aṭṭhahi dūtaṅgehīti “sotā ca hoti, sāvetā ca, uggahetā
analyzed: byākaramānaḥ bhikkhu iti sambandhaḥ aṭṭhahi dūtaṅgehi iti sotā ca hoti sāvetā ca uggahetā

original: ca, dhāretā ca, viññātā ca, viññāpetā, ca kusalo ca sahitāsahitassa, no ca kalahakārako”ti
analyzed: ca dhāretā ca viññātā ca viññāpetā ca kusalo ca sahita asahitassa no ca kalahakārako ti

original: evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi dūtassa aṅgehi. Kassa dūteyyakammanti āha “saṅghassā”ti. Dūtassa
analyzed: evam vuttehi aṭṭhahi dūtassa aṅgehi kassa dūteyya kamman ti āha saṅghassa ati dūtassa

original: etāni dūteyyāni, tāniyeva kammāni dūteyyakammāni, tesu. Idanti atthajākaṃ, vuttaṃ
analyzed: etāni dūteyyāni kammāni dūteyya kammāni tesu idam ti attha jākam vuttam

original: hotīti yojanā. Atha vā idanti ayamattho. Vuttaṃ hotīti vutto hoti. Pacchimanaye liṅgavipallāsoti
analyzed: hoti iti yojanā atha vā idam ti ayam atthaḥ vuttam hoti iti vuttaḥ hoti pacchima naye liṅga vipallāso ti

original: daṭṭhabbo. Ānetvā havanti pūjentīti āhavo dāyakā, tesaṃ āhūnaṃ. Ānetvā hunitabbaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ ānetvā havanti pūjenti iti āhavaḥ dāyakā tesam āhūnam ānetvā hunitabbam

original: pūjetabbanti āhuti, taṃ āhutiṃ. Saṅghassa kiccesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
analyzed: pūjetabbanti āhuti tam āhutim saṅghassa kiccesu iti niddhāraṇe bhummam tena vuttam

original: “tassa tassa kiccassā”ti. Karavacoti ettha “vacokaro”ti vattabbe gāthābhāvato padavipariyāyavasena
analyzed: tassa tassa kiccassa ati kara vacaḥ ti ettha vacokaroti vattabbe gāthā bhāvataḥ pada vipariyāya vasena

original: “karavaco”ti vuttoti āha “vacanaṃ karonto”ti. “Vacanakaraṇenā”ti iminā “na tena maññatī”ti
analyzed: kara vaco ti vutto ti āha vacanam karonto ti vacana karaṇena ati iminā na tena maññati iti

original: ettha tasaddassa visayaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: ettha visayam

original: Āpajjamāno bhikkhu āpatti hotīti yojanā. Tassā cāti ettha smāvacanassa ssādeso kātabbo.
analyzed: āpajjamānaḥ bhikkhu āpatti hoti iti yojanā tassā ca ati ettha smā vacanassa ssa ādesaḥ kātabbaḥ

original: Yathāti yenākārena, vinayakammākārenāti attho. Yesūti yattakesu vatthūsu. Ubhaye
analyzed: yathā iti yena ākārena vinaya kamma ākārena ati atthaḥ yesu iti yattakesu vatthūsu ubhaye

original: ete vibhaṅgāti sambandho. Assāti bhikkhussa. Āpattivuṭṭhānapadassāti padasaddo kāraṇattho,

analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ kucchitam pāpam vidati jānāti iti kovidaḥ iti vacanatthena kovidaḥ nāma ati dasseti

original: Ācaranto bhikkhu gacchatīti yojanā. “Vatta”nti iminā osāraṇaṃ tanti ettha tasaddassa
analyzed: ācarantaḥ bhikkhu gacchati iti yojanā vattanti iminā osāraṇam ettha ta saddassa

original: visayaṃ dasseti. “Yā”ti iminā etampīti ettha etasaddassa aniyamaniddesabhāvaṃ dasseti.

original: Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ kosambakakkhandhake.
analyzed: sabbattha āti sabbasmin kosambaka khandhake

original: Iti kosambakakkhandhakavaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti kosambaka khandhaka vaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā

analyzed: iti samantapāsādikāya vinaya saṃvaṇṇanāya

original: Mahāvaggavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: mahā vagga vaṇṇanāya

original: Yojanā samattā.
analyzed: yojanā samattā

original: Jādilañchitanāmena, nekānaṃ vācito mayā;
analyzed: vācitaḥ mayā

original: Mahāvaggakhandhakassa, samatto yojanānayoti.
analyzed: mahā vagga khandhakassa samattaḥ

analyzed: kammakkhandhakam

original: 1. Tajjanīyakammakathā
analyzed: tajjanīya kamma kathā

original: Adhammakammadvādasakakathā
analyzed: adhamma kamma dvādasaka kathā

original: Sukkapakkhesupīti paṭisedhavirahavasena sukkesu pakkhesupi.

analyzed: pabbajitānam ti iminā gihīnam ananulomika tam nivatteti sahasā ukita ādīhi iti ādi saddena

original: Tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhūnantiādi vuttanti sambandho. Ekekenāpīti tīsu aṅgesu ekekenāpi.
analyzed: tiṇṇam bhikkhave bhikkhūna nti ādi vuttanti sambandhaḥ ekekena api iti tīsu aṅgesu ekekena api

original: Iminā avayavavākyanibbattivasena kammārahabhāvaṃ dasseti. Hīti saccaṃ. Niyassassa
analyzed: iminā avayava vākya nibbatti vasena kamma araha bhāvam dasseti hi iti saccam niyassassa

analyzed: visesena abhiṇhā āpattika ttam aṅgam iti vuttan ti yojanā ettha ākāra vācakaḥ iti saddo

original: luttaniddiṭṭhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Eseva nayo anantarepi. Tajjīyati anena vinayakammenāti
analyzed: lutta niddiṭṭhaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam esa iva nayaḥ anantare pi tat jīyati anena vinaya kammena ati

original: tajjanīyaṃ, tameva kammaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ. “Nissāya te vatthabba”nti niyassīyati
analyzed: tad janīyam tam eva kammam tad janīya kammam nissāya te vatthabbanti niyassīyati

original: bālo bhajāpīyati anena vinayakammenāti niyassaṃ, divādigaṇikattā sakārassa dvebhāvo
analyzed: bālaḥ anena vinaya kammena ati niyassam sakārassa dve bhāvaḥ

original: hoti “nassaṃ vassa”ntiādīsu viya, niyassameva kammaṃ niyassakammaṃ. Gāmādito pabbājiyati

original: anena vinayakammenāti pabbājanīyaṃ, tameva kammaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ. Tīsūti bhaṇḍanakārakaabhiṇhāpattikakuladūsakavasena

original: tividhesu aṅgesu. Yena kenaci aṅgenāti sambandho. Yadi sabbāni kammāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: tividhesu aṅgesu yena kenacid aṅgena ati sambandhaḥ yadi sabbāni kammāni kātum vaṭṭati iti

original: yojanā. Evaṃ sati campeyyakkhandhake vuttaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ virujjhatīti sambandho.
analyzed: yojanā evam sati campeyya khandhake vuttam idam vacanam virujjhati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Vacanatthanānattatoti vacanassa ca atthassa ca nānābhāvato. Tamevatthaṃ vitthārento
analyzed: vacana attha nānattato ti vacanassa ca atthassa ca nānābhāvataḥ tam eva attham vitthārento

original: āha “tajjanīyakammārahassāti imassa hī”tiādi. Tattha “tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhave”tiādivacanassa
analyzed: āha imassa hi itiādi tattha tiṇṇam bhikkhave iti ādi vacanassa

original: aṅgasambhavo atthoti yojanā. Tasmāti yasmā na virujjhati, tasmā. Saṅghena kataṃ hotīti
analyzed: aṅga sambhavaḥ attho ti yojanā tasmā iti yasmai na virujjhati tasmai saṅghena katam hoti iti

original: sambandho. Iminā lakkhaṇena tajjanīyādikammārahassa tassa bhikkhussāti yojanā. Evaṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ iminā lakkhaṇena tajjanīya ādi kamma arahassa tassa bhikkhussa ati yojanā evam

original: kammasanniṭṭhānatthaṃ dassetvā aṅgasambhavatthaṃ dassento āha “yassa panā”tiādi.
analyzed: kamma sanniṭṭhāna attham dassetvā aṅga sambhava ttham dassentaḥ āha yassa pana atiādi

original: Tattha yassāti bhikkhussa, atthīti sambandho. Bhaṇḍanakārakādīsūtiādisaddena abhiṇhāpattikakuladūsakāni
analyzed: tattha yassa ti bhikkhussa atthi iti sambandhaḥ bhaṇḍana kāraka ādīsu iti ādi saddena abhiṇhāpattika kula dūsakāni

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho kareyyāti sambandho. Kammārahanti kammassa, kamme
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti ākaṅkhamānaḥ saṅghaḥ kareyya iti sambandhaḥ kamma ārahanti kammassa kamme

original: vā arahaṃ. Etthāti kammakkhandhake. Pubbenāti pubbe vuttena campeyyakkhandhakena.
analyzed: vā araham ettha ati kamma kkhandhake pubbena ati pubbe vuttena campeyya kkhandhakena

original: Aparanti apare vuttaṃ kammakkhandhakaṃ. Sametīti samaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: aparam ti apare vuttam kammakkhandhakam sameti iti samam gacchati

original: Tatthāti kammesu, tajjanīyakammeti sambandho, aṅgesu vā, bhaṇḍanakārakavasenāti sambandho.
analyzed: tattha ati kammesu tajjanīya kamma iti sambandhaḥ aṅgesu vā bhaṇḍana kāraka vasena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Atha khoti tathā vuttāpīti attho. Karontena kammavācāvācakenāti sambandho. Hīti phalajotako.
analyzed: atha kho ti tathā vuttā api iti attho karontena kamma vācā vācakena ati sambandhaḥ hi iti phala jotakaḥ

original: Bhūtena vatthunāti tacchena vatthunā. Aññassa kammassāti tajjanīyakammato aññassa
analyzed: bhūtena vatthunā ati tacchena vatthunā aññassa kammassa ati tajjanīya kammataḥ aññassa

original: kammassa. Kasmā bālassa abyattassa āpattibahulassa tajjanīyakammaṃ kātabbanti yojanā.

original: Idampīti tajjanīyakammampi. Sabbatthāti sabbesu kammesu.

original: bījaniyā paharitena pavattassa vātassa dānādino. Āsanābhihāranti ettha abhiharaṇaṃ

original: Kulaputtāti jātikulaputtā, ācārakulaputtā ca. Karonti, āpucchantiyevāti sambandho.

original: āha “aññamaññaṃ yo yo vuḍḍho”ti. Aññamaññañhi mithati saṅgamaṃ karotīti mithūti vuccati.

analyzed: an ādare sāmi vacanam ca gata kāla iti āgantukānam gata kāle

original: Yepīti āgantukāpi. Okkamitvāti osaritvā, pavisitvāti attho. Ayañcāti pārivāsiko ca,

original: jānātīti sambandho. Nesanti āgantukānaṃ. Yopīti āgantukopi. Assāti pārivāsikassa.

original: Aññātattāti āgatabhāvassa ajānitattā. “Abbhāna”nti padaṃ “karotī”ti pade kammaṃ,

original: “hotī”ti pade kattā. Adhikā rattiyoti āpattipaṭicchannarattito adhikā rattiyo. Ayanti

original: pārivāsikavattapaṭipadā. Apaṇṇakapaṭipadāti aviraddhapaṭipadā, ekaṃsapaṭipadāti attho.

original: Gacchantampi bhikkhunti sambandho. Sāvetunti suṇāpetuṃ. Visayāvisayenāti ārocetuṃ desādesena. Karavīkatissatthero āhāti sambandho.

original: “Uposathadivase”ti iminā uposatheti ettha uposathasaddassa pātimokkhuddesādayo atthe

original: Dūtenāpīti ettha anadhippetadūtaṃ paṭikkhipitvā adhippetadūtaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “anupasampannaṃ…pe… ārocāpetabba”nti.

original: Udakapātenāti chadanato udakaṃ patati etthāti udakapāto, tena. Pañcavaṇṇacchadanabaddhaṭṭhānesūti

original: Tasminti saṭṭhivassepi pārivāsike.
analyzed: tasmin ti pārivāsike

original: Ayaṃ panāti vakkhamāno pana. Etthāti “chamāyaṃ caṅkamante”ti pāṭhe. Caṅkamanteti

original: vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ hotīti dasseti. Ekassa santike ārocetvā nikkhipiyamāne kiṃ ūne

analyzed: vihāreya iva ratti pariggaho ti iminā parivasitabba bhāvam dasseti

original: Upacārasīmanti parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepaṃ, aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: upacāra sīmanti parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepam a parikkhittassa parikkhepa āraha ṭṭhānam

original: Esāti pārivāsiko bhikkhu. Assāti āgatassa bhikkhuno.
analyzed: esa ati pārivāsikaḥ bhikkhu assa ati āgatassa bhikkhuno

original: Tatoti āpattipaṭicchannadivasato. Kukkuccavinodanatthāyāti āpattipaṭicchannadivasena
analyzed: tatas ti āpatti paṭicchanna divasataḥ kukkucca vinodana atthāya iti āpatti paṭicchanna divasena

original: samaṃ parivasitabbaṃ nukho, na nukhoti kukkuccassa vinodanatthāya. Parivutthattāti
analyzed: samam parivasitabbam nukho na nukho ti kukkuccassa vinodana tthāya parivuttha ttā ati

original: parivasitattā. Soti parivuttho bhikkhu. Idanti dātabbamānattaṃ. Tanti paṭicchannamānattaṃ.
analyzed: parivasita ttā saḥ ti parivutthaḥ bhikkhu idam ti dātabba mānattam tam ti paṭicchanna mānattam

original: Chārattanti charattiyo samāhaṭāti chārattaṃ, samāhāre digu. “Charatta”nti vattabbe
analyzed: chārattanti charattiyaḥ chārattam samāhāre chārattanti vattabbe

original: sukhuccāraṇatthaṃ chakārassa dīghaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
analyzed: sukha uccāraṇa attham chakārassa dīgham katvā evam vuttam upayoga vacanam

original: Appaṭicchannāpattiṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Iminā heṭṭhā vuttaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ
analyzed: appaṭicchanna āpattim dātum vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ iminā heṭṭhā vuttam paṭicchanna mānattam

original: imasmiṃ paṭicchannamānatte samodhānetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Evaṃ santepi mūlamānattaṃ
analyzed: imasmin paṭicchanna mānatte samodhānetvā api dātum vaṭṭati iti dasseti evam sante pi mūlam ānattam

original: paṭicca paṭicchannamānattanti vuccati. Kathaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: paṭicca paṭicchannam ānattanti vuccati katham dātum vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: Assāti mānattaṃ yācantassa. Tadanurūpanti tassa yācanassa anurūpaṃ. Sace paṭicchannā
analyzed: assa ati mānattam yācantassa tad anurūpam ti tassa yācanassa anurūpam sace paṭicchannā

original: dveti ettha dveti nidassanamattaṃ tato atirekampi gahetabbattā. Sabbatthāti sabbesu
analyzed: dve iti ettha dve iti nidassana mattam tatas atirekam pi gahetabba ttā sabbattha ati sabbesu

original: ekabahūsu. Tadanurūpame vāti tassa mānattadānassa anurūpameva. Idha panāti paṭicchannamānatte
analyzed: eka bahūsu tat anurūpam e vāti tassa mānatta dānassa anurūpam eva idha panāti paṭicchanna mānatte

original: pana. Itītiādi nigamanaṃ. Yaṃ mānattaṃ diyyatīti yojanā. Etthāti paṭicchannamānatte.
analyzed: pana iti itiādi nigamanam yam mānattam diyyati iti yojanā etthā iti paṭicchanna mānatte

original: Avasesāti appaṭicchannaparivāsapaṭicchannaparivāsehi avasesā. Tatthāti avasesesu
analyzed: avasesā ti appaṭicchanna parivāsa paṭicchanna parivāsehi avasesā tattha ati avasesesu

original: dvīsu parivāsesu. Adhammikamānattacārāvasāne anuññātaparivāsoti sambandho. Kismiṃ
analyzed: dvīsu parivāsesu adhammika mānatta cāra avasāne anuññāta parivāsaḥ ti sambandho kismin

original: vatthusmiṃ anuññātoti āha “imasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti. Esāti suddhanto, dātabboti sambandho.
analyzed: vatthusmim anuññāto ti āha imasmim vatthusmin ti esā ati suddhantaḥ dātabbaḥ iti sambandho

original: Etanti jānanājānanaṃ.
analyzed: etat ti jānana a jānanam

original: Tatthāti dvīsu suddhantesu, cūḷasuddhantoti vuccatīti sambandho. Yoti bhikkhu, vadatīti sambandho. Ārocitadivasatoti āpattiārocitadivasato.
analyzed: tattha ati dvīsu suddhantesu cūḷasuddhanto ti vuccati iti sambandhaḥ yaḥ ti bhikkhu vadati iti sambandho ārocita divasato ti āpatti ārocita divasato

original: Tanti cūḷasuddhantaṃ, parivasantena parivasitabbanti sambandho. Aggahesīti parivāsaṃ
analyzed: tanti cūḷa suddhantam parivasantena parivasitabbanti sambandhaḥ aggahesi iti parivāsam

original: aggahesi. Aññanti gahitamāsato aññaṃ. “Parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthī”ti iminā parivāsagahaṇakiccampi
analyzed: aggahesi aññam ti gahita māsataḥ aññam parivāsa dāna kiccam na atthi iti iminā parivāsa gahaṇa kiccam pi

original: natthīti dasseti gaṇhantasseva dātabbattā, dentasseva gahetabbattā vā. Uddhampi ārohatīti
analyzed: natthi iti dasse ti gaṇhantassa iva dātabba ttā dentassa iva gahetabba ttā vā uddham pi ārohati iti

original: parivāsagahaṇakālato aññampi kālaṃ parivasitabbattā uddhampi ārohati. Heṭṭhāpi orohatīti
analyzed: parivāsa gahaṇa kālataḥ aññam pi kālam parivasitabba ttā uddham pi ārohati heṭṭhā api orohati iti

original: parivāsagahaṇakālato ūnampi kālaṃ parivasitabbattā heṭṭhāpi orohati. Idanti ārohanorohanaṃ.
analyzed: parivāsa gahaṇa kālataḥ ūnam pi kālam heṭṭhā api orohati idam ti ārohana urohanam

original: Tassāti suddhantaparivāsassa. Ekameva paṭicca dve, tisso, sambahulā vā bhavantīti
analyzed: tassa ati suddhanta parivāsassa ekam eva paṭicca dve tisso sambahulāḥ vā bhavanti iti

original: āha “ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato”ti.
analyzed: āha ekam vinā sambahulānam

original: Evaṃ cūḷasuddhantaṃ dassetvā mahāsuddhantaṃ dassento āha “yo panā”tiādi. Tanti mahāsuddhantaṃ.
analyzed: evam cūḷa suddhantam dassetvā mahā suddhantam dassentaḥ āha yaḥ pana atiādi mahā suddhantam

original: Yāva yattako upasampadadivaso hoti, tāva tattakaṃ kālanti yojanā. Uddhaṃ nārohatīti
analyzed: yāva yattakaḥ upasampada divasaḥ tāva tattakam yojanāḥ uddham na ārohati iti

original: uddhaṃ ārohanakālassa abhāvato uddhaṃ na ārohati. Etthāti suddhantaparivāse. Ayaṃ
analyzed: uddham ārohana kālassa abhāvataḥ uddham na ārohati ettha ati suddhanta parivāse ayam

original: suddhantaparivāso nāmāti nigamanaṃ.
analyzed: suddhanta parivāsaḥ nāma ati nigamanam

original: Tatthāti tividhesu samodhānaparivāsesu. “Odhunitvā samodahitvā dātabbaparivāso”ti
analyzed: tattha ati tividhesu samodhāna parivāsesu odhunitvā samodahitvā dātabba parivāso ti

original: iminā odhunitvā samodhānetvā dātabbo parivāso odhānasamodhānoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti,
analyzed: iminā odhunitvā samodhānetvā dātabbo parivāsaḥ odhāna samodhāno ti vacana attham dasseti

original: “parivāso”ti iminā taddhitaṇapaccayassa sarūpaṃ dasseti. Ettha ca avadhuniyate, avadhunitabbanti
analyzed: parivāsaḥ iti iminā taddhi taṇa paccayassa sarūpam dasseti ettha ca avadhuniyate avadhunitabbanti

original: vā odhānaṃ, saṃ ekato odahīyate sampiṇḍīyate, udahiyati sampiṇḍiyatīti vā samodhānanti
analyzed: vai odhānam sam ekatas odahīyate sampiṇḍīyate udahiyati sampiṇḍiyati iti vā

original: avayavavacanattho kātabbo. “Makkhetvā”ti iminā dhudhātuyā pappoṭanadhaṃsanadhovanāni
analyzed: avayava vacana atthaḥ kātabbaḥ makkhetvā ati iminā dhu dhātuyā pappoṭana dhaṃsana dhovanāni

original: dasseti. Soti odhānasamodhāno, āgatoti sambandho.
analyzed: dasseti saḥ ti odhāna samodhānaḥ āgataḥ iti sambandho

original: Etthāti odhānasamodhāne. Yoti bhikkhu, paṭicchādetīti sambandho. Parivasanto vā mānattāraho
analyzed: ettha ati odhāna samodhāne yaḥ ti bhikkhu paṭicchādeti iti sambandho parivasantaḥ vā mānatta āraho

original: vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho vā yo bhikkhūti yojanā. “Purimāya āpattiyā”ti
analyzed: vā mānattam carantaḥ vā abbhānārahaḥ vā yaḥ bhikkhu iti yojanā purimāya āpattiyā ti

original: padaṃ “samā vā”ti pade sahādiyogo. “Ūnatarā”tipade vibhattiapādānaṃ, anumeyyavisayaapādānaṃ
analyzed: padam samāḥ vāti pade saha ādi yogaḥ ūnatara atipade vibhatti apādānam anumeyya visaya apādānam

original: vā. “Adivase katvā”ti iminā odhunitvāti ettha dhudhātuyā yathāvuttattheyeva dasseti.
analyzed: vā a divase katvā iti iminā odhunitvā iti ettha dhu dhātuyā yathā vutta tthā iva dasseti

original: Ūnakapakkhapaṭicchannāti pakkhato ūnakena paṭicchannā. Etenupāyenāti pakkhe vuttena etena upāyena.
analyzed: ūnaka pakkha paṭicchannā ati pakkhataḥ ūnakena paṭicchannā etena upāyena ati pakkhe vuttena etena upāyena

original: Tatthāti mūlāpattito atirekapaṭicchanne. Āvi kārāpetvāti mūlāpattito antarāpattiyā
analyzed: tattha ati mūlāpattitaḥ atireka paṭicchanne āvi mūlāpattitaḥ antarāpattiyā

original: paṭicchannabhāvaṃ āvi kārāpetvā. Etthāti āpattipaṭicchanne. Pamāṇanti kāraṇaṃ. Yāti
analyzed: paṭicchanna bhāvam ettha ati āpatti paṭicchanne kāraṇam yāti

original: āpatti. Tatthāti mūlabhāvena kattabbāyaṃ mūliāpattiyaṃ. Itaranti mūlibhāvena kattabbaṃ
analyzed: āpatti tattha ati mūla bhāvena kattabbāyam mūli āpattiyam itaran ti mūli bhāvena kattabbam

original: mūlāpattiṃ. Samodhāyāti samodahitvā. Pakkhipitvāti attho.
analyzed: mūlāpattim samodhāya ati samodahitvā pakkhipitvā ati attho

original: Ekā vā yā āpatti sabbacirapaṭicchannā hotīti yojanā. Sabbacirapaṭicchannāyoti sabbāsaṃ
analyzed: ekā vā yā āpatti sabba cira paṭicchannā hoti iti yojanā sabba cira paṭicchannāya iti sabbāsam

original: āpattīnaṃ cirena paṭicchannāyo. Tāsanti āpattīnaṃ. Agghenāti paricchedena. Agghasaddo
analyzed: āpattīnam cirena tāsanti āpattīnam agghena ati paricchedena aggha saddaḥ

original: hettha paricchedatthavācako. Abhidhāne (abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ 1048 gāthāyaṃ) vuttaṃ
analyzed: ha ittha pariccheda ttha vācakaḥ abhidhāne abhidhāna ppadīpikāyam gāthāyam vuttam

original: “aggho mulye ca pūjane”ti. Ettha “mulye cā”ti padassa mūlaparicchedeti attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: mulye ca pūjane iti ettha mulye ca ati padassa mūla paricchede iti atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Tamevatthaṃ dassento āha “tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasenā”ti. Imehi padehi agghena rattiparicchedena
analyzed: tam eva attham dassentaḥ āha tāsam ratti pariccheda vasena ati imehi padehi agghena ratti paricchedena

original: samodhānetvā dātabbo parivāso agghasamodhānoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Ettha ca “sabbacirapaṭicchannāyo”ti
analyzed: samodhānetvā dātabbaḥ parivāsaḥ aggha samodhāno ti vacana attham dasseti ettha ca sabba cira paṭicchannāya ti

original: vuttattā kiñcāpi koṭiatthavācako tatiyakkharena pāṭho yutto viya dissati. Tathāpi
analyzed: vutta ttā kiñcā api koṭi attha vācakaḥ tatiya kkharena pāṭhaḥ yuttaḥ viya dissati tathā api

original: so pāṭho na gahetabbo. Kasmā? Bahūsu pāḷipotthakesu, aṭṭhakathāpotthakesu ca alikhitattā.
analyzed: saḥ pāṭhaḥ na gahetabbaḥ kasmā bahūsu pāḷi potthakesu aṭṭhakathā potthakesu ca a likhita ttā

original: Bahūsu hi porāṇapotthakesu catutthakkharena pāṭhoyeva likhito, tasmā so pāṭhoyeva
analyzed: bahūsu hi porāṇa potthakesu catuttha kkharena pāṭhaḥ yā iva likhitaḥ tasmā saḥ pāṭhaḥ yā iva

original: gahetabbo, na aññoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Soti agghasamodhāno. Āgatoyevāti sambandho.
analyzed: gahetabbaḥ na aññaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam saḥ ti aggha samodhānaḥ āgataḥ yeva iti sambandho

original: Yassa panāti bhikkhussa, paṭicchannāti sambandho. Sabbanti sakalaṃ. Āpattisahassagāthāya –
analyzed: yassa pana ati bhikkhussa paṭicchannā ati sambandhaḥ sabbanti sakalam āpattisahassagāthāya

original: Dasasataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādayitvānāti yojanā. Iminā nayenapi agghasamodhānoti
analyzed: dasa satam āpattiyaḥ ratti satam yojanā iminā nayena api

original: ettha agghasaddassa catutthakkharena pāṭhassa yuttabhāvo veditabbo. Agghena dasarattiparicchedena
analyzed: ettha aggha saddassa catuttha kkharena pāṭhassa yutta bhāvaḥ veditabbaḥ agghena dasa ratti paricchedena

original: samodhāya dātabbo agghasamodhāno.
analyzed: samodhāya dātabbaḥ aggha samodhāno

original: Yo parivāso nānāvatthukāyo āpattiyo ekato katvā diyyati, ayaṃ parivāso missakasamodhāno
analyzed: yaḥ parivāsaḥ nānā vatthu kāyaḥ āpattiyaḥ ekatas katvā diyyati ayam parivāsaḥ missaka samodhāno

original: nāmāti yojanā. Ettha vatthuvasena missakā āpattiyo samodhānetvā dātabbo parivāso
analyzed: nāma ati yojanā ettha vatthu vasena missakāḥ āpattiyaḥ samodhānetvā dātabbaḥ parivāso

original: missakasamodhānoti vacanattho kātabbo. Tatrāti missakasamodhāne. Tadanurūpāyāti tassa
analyzed: missaka samodhānaḥ ti vacana atthaḥ kātabbaḥ tatra ati missaka samodhāne tad anurūpāya ati tassa

original: yācanassa anurūpāya.
analyzed: yācanassa anurūpāya

original: Ettha cāti missakasamodhāne ca, kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
analyzed: ettha ca ati missaka samodhāne ca kātum vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ

original: “Pakkhamānattañca …pe… kathayissāmā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa vacanassa okāsoti
analyzed: pakkha mānattam ca pe kathayissāma ati yam vacanam vuttam tassa vacanassa okāsaḥ ti

original: yojanā. Taṃ panāti pakkhamānattaṃ pana. “Aḍḍhamāsameva dātabba”nti iminā pakkhameva
analyzed: yojanā tam pana ati pakkha mānattam pana aḍḍha māsam eva dātabbanti iminā pakkham eva

original: dātabbaṃ mānattaṃ pakkhamānattanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Hīti saccaṃ. Taṃ panāti pakkhamānattaṃ
analyzed: dātabbam mānattam pakkha mānattam ti vacana attham dasseti hi iti saccam tam pana ati pakkha mānattam

original: pana, dātabbanti sambandho. Attano sīmanti attano vihārasīmaṃ, mahāsīmanti attho.
analyzed: pana dātabbanti sambandhaḥ attanaḥ sīmanti attanaḥ vihāra sīmam mahā sīmanti attho

original: Sodhetvāti sabbāsaṃ hatthapāsanayanavasena, chandārahānaṃ chandanayanavasena, sīmato
analyzed: sodhetvā ati sabbāsam hattha pāsa nayana vasena chandāra hānam chanda nayana vasena sīmato

original: bahikaraṇavasena ca sodhetvā. Catuvaggagaṇanti catuvaggasaṅghaṃ. Gaṇoti cettha saṅghoyevādhippeto.
analyzed: bahi karaṇa vasena ca sodhetvā catuvagga gaṇanti catuvagga saṅgham gaṇoti ca ittha saṅghaḥ yā iva adhippetaḥ

original: Tatrāti “yojanā kātabbā”ti vacane. Mukhamattadassananti upāyamattadassanaṃ, ādimattadassanaṃ
analyzed: tatra ati yojanā kātabbā ati vacane mukha matta dassananti upāya matta dassanam ādi matta dassanam

original: vā. “Āpannāya bhikkhuniyā”ti padaṃ “evamassa vacanīyo”ti pade kattā, “yācāpetvā”ti
analyzed: vā āpannāya bhikkhuniyā iti padam evam assa vacanīyaḥ iti pade kattā yācāpetvā ati

original: pade kāritakammaṃ. “Byattāya bhikkhuniyā”ti padaṃ “ñāpetabbo”ti pade kāritakattā,
analyzed: pade kārita kammam byattāya bhikkhuniyā ati padam ñāpetabbaḥ uti pade kārita kattā

original: “saṅgho”ti padaṃ tattheva kāritakammaṃ. “Etaṃ kāraṇa”nti dhātukammaṃ ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ iti padam tattha iva kārita kammam etam kāraṇam ti dhātu kammam ajjhāharitabbam

original: Tabbapaccayena kāritakammameva vuttaṃ. Ñāpetabbākāraṃ dassento āha “suṇātu me”tiādi.
analyzed: tabba paccayena kārita kammam eva vuttam ñāpetabba ākāram dassentaḥ āha suṇātu mā itiādi

original: Nikkhittavattanti karaṇatthe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Nikkhittavattenāti hi attho. Tatthevāti
analyzed: nikkhittavattanti karaṇa atthe ca itam upayoga vacanam nikkhittavattena ati hi atthaḥ tattha eva ati

original: māḷakasīmāyameva. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Assāti mānattacārikāya bhikkhuniyā. Tatrāti
analyzed: māḷakasīmā ayam eva hi iti saccam yasmai vai assa ati mānatta cārikāya bhikkhuniyā tatra ati

original: tasmā kattabbavinayakammabhāvatoti attho. Noti amhākaṃ, santikanti sambandho. Catūhi
analyzed: tasmā kattabba vinaya kamma bhāvato ti atthaḥ no ti amhākam santikam ti sambandhaḥ catūhi

original: pakatattabhikkhunīhi nisīditabbanti sambandho. Gāmūpacārato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti
analyzed: pakatatta bhikkhunīhi nisīditabbanti sambandhaḥ gāma upacārataḥ dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā ati

original: idaṃ bhikkhunīvihārūpacārātikkamaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vihārūpacāratopīti bhikkhuvihārūpacāratopi.
analyzed: idam bhikkhunī vihāra upacāra atikkamam sandhāya vuttam vihāra upacārataḥ pi iti bhikkhu vihāra upacārataḥ pi

original: Tatthāti bhikkhunīnaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ. Kurundimahāpaccarīsu pana vuttanti sambandho.
analyzed: tattha iti bhikkhunīnam nisinna ṭṭhānam kurundi mahāpaccarīsu pana vuttan ti sambandho

original: Vihārassa cāti bhikkhuvihārassa ca. Gāmassa upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatīti na vuttanti
analyzed: vihārassa ca ati bhikkhu vihārassa ca gāmassa upacāram muñcitum vaṭṭati iti na vuttam ti

original: yojanā. Tasmā gāmūpacārepi nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: yojanā tasmā nisīditum vaṭṭati iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Tāya bhikkhuniyā ārocetabbanti sambandho.
analyzed: tāya bhikkhuniyā ārocetabbanti sambandho

original: Tatthevāti bhikkhunīnaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhāneyeva. Ṭhānanti bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Etīti āgacchati. Pagevāti pātoyeva. Tāyāti mānattacāriniyā.
analyzed: tattha iva ati bhikkhunīnam nisīdana ṭṭhāne iya iva ṭhānanti bhikkhūnam ṭhānam eti iti āgacchati pageva ati tāya iti mānatta cāriniyā

original: Anikkhittavattāya pana bhikkhuniyāti sambandho. Ajānanapaccayāti ajānanakāraṇā. Tanti
analyzed: a nikkhittavattāya pana bhikkhuniyā iti sambandhaḥ a jānana paccayā ti a jānana kāraṇā tanti

original: Tatoti visabhāgakaraṇato paraṃ gahetabboti sambandho. Sabbāpi tā salākāyoti yojanā.
analyzed: tatas iti visabhāga karaṇato param gahetabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ sabbā api tā salākāyaḥ iti yojanā

original: Katvāti pakkhipanaṃ katvā. Vuttanayenāti “alajjussannāyā”tiādinā vuttanayena. “Yāvatatiya”nti
analyzed: katvā ti pakkhipanam katvā vutta nayena ati alajju ssannāya āti ādinā vutta nayena yāvatatiyam

original: iminā paccukkaḍḍhitabbanti ettha punappunaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhitabbanti atthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: iminā paccukkaḍḍhitabban ti ettha punappunam uddham kaḍḍhitabban ti attham dasseti

original: Atirekajāteti adhammavādīhi atirekato jāte satīti sambandho. Yāvatatiyampīti pisaddo
analyzed: atireka jāta iti adhamma vādīhi atirekataḥ jāte sati iti sambandhaḥ pi saddaḥ

original: tato ūne ekadvevāre pana kā nāma kathāti dasseti.
analyzed: tatas ūne eka dve vāre pana kā nāma kathā ati dasseti

original: Sakaṇṇajappake pana evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Sace saṅghatthero gaṇhātīti
analyzed: sa kaṇṇajappake pana evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ ti yojanā sace saṅgha ttheraḥ gaṇhāti iti

original: sambandho. Soti saṅghatthero. Vayoanuppattāti pacchimavayaṃ anuppattā. Etanti adhammavādisalākaṃ.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ saḥ ti saṅgha ttheraḥ vayaḥ anuppattā ti pacchima vayam anuppattā etat ti adhamma vādi salākam

original: Assāti saṅghattherassa. Itarā salākāti adhammavādisalākāhi aññā dhammavādisalākā.
analyzed: assa ati saṅghattherassa itarā salākā ati adhamma vādi salākāhi aññā dhamma vādi salākā

original: Soti saṅghatthero. Tanti dhammavādisalākaṃ. Tatoti neva avabujjhanakāraṇā. Vuttanayamevāti
analyzed: saḥ iti saṅgha ttheraḥ tat dhamma vādi salākam tatas iti na iva avabujjhana kāraṇā vutta nayam eva ati

original: gūḷhake vuttanayameva. Vivaṭo attho imassāti vivaṭattho.
analyzed: gūḷhake vutta nayam eva vivaṭaḥ attho imassa ati vivaṭa atthaḥ

original: Tassapāpiyasikāvinayakathā
analyzed: tassa pāpiyasikā vinaya kathā

original: 238. Pārājikasāmantaṃ nāmāti pārājikassa āsannaṃ nāma. Adinnādānādīsūti ādisaddena
analyzed: pārājika sāmantam nāma ati pārājikassa āsannam nāma adinnādāna ādīsu iti ādi saddena

original: manussaviggaha uttarimanussadhammapārājike saṅgaṇhāti. Nibbeṭhayamānanti veṭhanarahitaṃ,
analyzed: manussa viggahe uttari manussa dhammapārājike saṅgaṇhāti nibbeṭhayamānam ti veṭhana rahitam

original: tamenaṃ bhikkhunti sambandho. Iminā nibbeṭhentanti ettha antasaddo mānasaddapariyāyoti
analyzed: tam enam bhikkhunti sambandhaḥ iminā ettha anta saddaḥ māna sadda pariyāyaḥ ti

original: dasseti. Ativeṭhetīti ettha kehi ativeṭhetīti āha “iṅghāyasmātiādivacanehī”ti. Tenāti
analyzed: dasseti ativeṭheti iti ettha kehi ativeṭheti iti āha tena ati

original: codakena. Manti mamaṃ. Āhāti cuditako āha. Etassāti avajānanapaṭijānanādikārakassa
analyzed: codakena āha iti cuditakaḥ āha etassa ati avajānana paṭijānana ādi kārakassa

original: pāpiyassa puggalassa. Sīlavā bhavissatīti pāpiyo puggalo sace sīlavā bhavissati.
analyzed: pāpiyassa puggalassa sīlavā bhavissati iti pāpiyaḥ puggalo sace sīlavā bhavissati

original: Paṭippassaddhinti pāpiyabhāvato paṭippassambhanaṃ. No ceti sīlavā no bhavissati ce.
analyzed: paṭippassaddhinti pāpiya bhāvataḥ paṭippassambhanam no ce iti sīlavā no bhavissati ce

original: Tathā nāsitoti tena tassa pāpiyasikakammakaraṇena nāsaṃ gato bhavissati. Sabbatthāti
analyzed: tathā nāsitaḥ ti tena tassa pāpiyasika kamma karaṇena nāsam gataḥ bhavissati sabbattha ati

original: sabbasmiṃ samathakkhandhake.
analyzed: sabbasmin samatha khandhake

original: Iti samathakkhandhakavaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti samatha khandhaka vaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā

original: 5. Khuddakavatthukkhandhakaṃ
Khuddakavatthukathā
analyzed: khuddaka vatthu kathā

original: 243. Khuddakavatthukkhandhake muṭṭhikamallāti muṭṭhikena mathanti aññamaññaṃ hiṃsantīti
analyzed: khuddaka vatthu khandhake muṭṭhika mallā ati muṭṭhikena mathanti aññam aññam hiṃsanti iti

original: muṭṭhikamallā. Iminā pāḷiyaṃ padassa heṭṭhupariyaṃ dasseti. Gāmamudavāti ettha chavirāgamaṇḍanānuyuttena
analyzed: muṭṭhika mallāḥ iminā pāḷiyam padassa heṭṭhu pariyam dasseti ettha chavi rāga maṇḍana anuyuttena

original: mudo modanaṃ etesamatthīti mudavā, gāme vasantā mudavā gāmamudavāti dassento āha
analyzed: mudaḥ modanam etesam atthi iti mudavā gāme vasantā mudavā gāma mudavā ti dassentaḥ āha

original: “chavirāgamaṇḍanānuyuttā nāgarikamanussā”ti. “Vaṇṇavā ahesu”ntiādīsu viya vacanaṃ
analyzed: chavi rāga maṇḍana anuyuttāḥ nāgarika manussāḥ ti vaṇṇavā ahesun ti ādīsu viya vacanam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Thambheti ettha na yattha katthaci thambho hoti, atha kho nhānatitthe
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam thambhe ti ettha na yattha katthaci thambhaḥ hoti atha kho nhāna titthe

original: nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitathambhoyevāti āha “nhānatitthe nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitatthambhe”ti.
analyzed: nikhaṇitvā ṭhapita thambhaḥ yā iva ati āha nhāna titthe nikhaṇitvā ṭhapita tthambha iti

original: Iṭṭhakāsilādārukuṭṭānanti iṭṭhakākuṭṭasilākuṭṭadārukuṭṭānaṃ. Aṭṭhapadākārenāti aṭṭhapadaphalakākārena.
analyzed: iṭṭhakā silā dāru kuṭṭānam ti iṭṭhakā kuṭṭa silā kuṭṭa dāru kuṭṭānam aṭṭhapada ākārena ati aṭṭhapada phalaka ākārena

original: Rājiyoti lekhāyo. Tatthāti aṭṭāne, ākiritvāti sambandho. Gandhabbahatthakoti gandhabbānaṃ
analyzed: rājiyo ti lekhāyo tattha ati aṭṭāne ākiritvā iti sambandhaḥ gandhabba hatthako ti gandhabbānam

original: vīṇāhattho viyāti gandhabbahatthako. Dārūhi katattā vuttaṃ “dārumayahatthenā”ti.
analyzed: vīṇā hatthaḥ viyāti gandhabba hatthakaḥ dārūhi kata ttā vuttam dāru maya hatthena ati

original: Tenāti gandhabbahatthena, gahetvāti sambandho. Kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇānīti evaṃnāmakassa
analyzed: tena ati gandhabba hatthena gahetvā iti sambandhaḥ kuruvindaka pāsāṇa cuṇṇāni iti evaṃnāmakassa

original: pāsāṇassa cuṇṇāni. Tanti kataguḷikakalāpakaṃ, gahetvāti sambandho. Viggayhāti aññamaññassa
analyzed: pāsāṇassa cuṇṇāni tanti kata guḷika kalāpakam gahetvā iti sambandhaḥ viggayha ati aññamaññassa

original: sarīre daḷhaṃ gahetvāti dassento āha “aññamaññaṃ sarīrena sarīra”nti. Makaradantaketi
analyzed: sarīre daḷham gahetvā iti dassentaḥ āha aññam aññam sarīrena sarīram makaradantaka iti

original: makaranāmakassa macchassa dantasadise dante. Mallakamūlasaṇṭhānenāti kheḷapaṭiggahapādasaṇṭhānena.
analyzed: makara nāmakassa macchassa danta sadise dante mallaka mūla saṇṭhānena ati kheḷa paṭiggaha pāda saṇṭhānena

original: Gilānassāpīti pisaddo agilānassa pagevāti dasseti.
analyzed: gilānassa api iti pi saddaḥ agilānassa pageva ati dasseti

original: 244. Danteti makaradante. Akataṃ mallakaṃ akatamallakaṃ. Kapālakhaṇḍaṃ vāti vāsaddo
analyzed: danta iti makara dante akatam mallakam akatamallakam kapāla khaṇḍam vāti

original: samuccayattho. Kāsaphullavirahitattā vatthavaṭṭi ukkāsikā nāma. Natthi kāsaṃ phullametissāti
analyzed: samuccaya tthaḥ kāsa phulla virahita ttā vattha vaṭṭi ukkāsikā nāma natthi kāsam phullam etissa ati

original: ukkāsā, sā eva ukkāsikā. Yassa kassacīti gilānāgilānassa vā jarādubbalataruṇabalavassa
analyzed: ukkāsā sā eva ukkāsikā yassa kassaci iti gilāna a gilānassa vā jarā dubbala taruṇa balavassa

original: vā. Piṭṭhinti piṭṭhiyaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Pāṇitalassa puthuṭṭhānaṃ puthupāṇi, tena
analyzed: vā piṭṭhinti piṭṭhiyam ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ pāṇi talassa puthuṭṭhānam puthu pāṇi tena

original: kataṃ puthupāṇikaṃ, hatthaparikammaṃ, tena vuttaṃ “hatthaparikammaṃ vuccatī”ti. Sabbesanti
analyzed: katam puthu pāṇikam hattha parikammam tena vuttam hattha parikammam vuccati iti sabbesanti

original: nhāyantānaṃ vā anhāyantānaṃ vā sabbesaṃ.
analyzed: nhāyantānam vā a nhāyantānam vā sabbesam

original: 245. Kaṇṇatoti kaṇṇacchiddato. Muttolambakādivallisadisattā vallikā nāma. Palambakasuttanti
analyzed: kaṇṇataḥ ti vallikā nāma

original: parimuñcitvā lambiyati anenāti palambakaṃ, tameva suttaṃ palambakasuttaṃ. Valayanti niyuraṃ.
analyzed: parimuñcitvā lambiyati anena ati palambakam tam eva suttam palambaka suttam valayanti niyuram

original: 246. Dvīhi māsehi niyuttaṃ dumāsikaṃ. Dve aṅgulāni etassāti duvaṅgulaṃ, keso. Ubhayenapīti
analyzed: dvīhi māsehi niyuttam du māsikam dve aṅgulāni etassa ati duvaṅgulam kesaḥ ubhayena api iti

original: dumāsikaduvaṅgulasaṅkhātena ubhayenapi. Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedova vuttoti yojanā.
analyzed: ubhayena api ayam pi vuttaḥ iti yojanā

original: Tatoti dumāsikaduvaṅgulato.
analyzed: tataḥ iti

original: Osaṇṭhentīti ettha olikhitvā samaṃ patiṭṭhāpentīti dassento āha “olikhitvā sannisīdāpentī”ti.
analyzed: osaṇṭhenti iti ettha olikhitvā samam patiṭṭhāpenti iti dassentaḥ āha olikhitvā sannisīdāpenti iti

original: Dantamayādīsūti ādisaddena aṭṭhimayādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Hatthaphaṇenāti hatthasaṅkhātena
analyzed: danta maya ādīsu iti ādi saddena aṭṭhi maya ādayo saṅgaṇhāti hattha phaṇena ati hattha saṅkhātena

original: phaṇena. Cikkhallenāti cikkhallasadisena niyyāsena. Udakatelenāti ettha udakañca
analyzed: phaṇena cikkhallena ati cikkhalla sadisena niyyāsena udaka telena ati ettha udakam ca

original: telañcāti ca udakasaṅkhātena telenāti ca atthaṃ nivattento āha “udakamissakena telenā”ti.
analyzed: telañca iti ca udaka saṅkhātena telena ati ca attham nivattentaḥ āha udaka missakena telena ati

original: Iminā udakena missakaṃ telaṃ udakatelanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Uṭṭhalometi uṭṭhitalome.
analyzed: iminā udakena missakam telam udaka telam ti vacana attham dasseti uṭṭha loma iti uṭṭhita lome

original: Hatthaṃ temetvāti hatthaṃ udakatelena temetvā. Uṇhābhitattarajokiṇṇasirānampīti uṇhena
analyzed: hattham temetvā iti hattham udaka telena temetvā uṇha abhitatta rajaḥ kiṇṇa sirā nampī iti uṇhena

original: abhitatto ca rajehi okiṇṇasiro ca uṇhābhitattarajokiṇṇasirā, atha vā uṇhena abhitatto
analyzed: abhitattaḥ ca rajehi okiṇṇa siro ca uṇha abhitatta raja ukiṇṇa sirā atha vā uṇhena abhitattaḥ

original: siro etesanti uṇhābhitattasirā, rajehi okiṇṇo siro etesanti rajokiṇṇasirā, uṇhābhitattasirā

original: ca rajokiṇṇasirā ca uṇhābhitattarajokiṇṇasirā, pubbapade uttarapadalopo, tesampi.
analyzed: ca rajaḥ kiṇṇa sirā ca uṇha abhitatta rajaḥ kiṇṇa sirā pubba pade uttara pada lopo tesam pi

original: Allahatthenāti addahatthena, ayameva vā pāṭho.
analyzed: allahatthena ati addahatthena ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ

original: 247. Yesu kaṃsapattādīsu mukhanimittaṃ paññāyati, sabbāni tāni kaṃsapattādīnipīti
analyzed: yesu kaṃsa patta ādīsu mukha nimittam paññāyati sabbāni tāni kaṃsa patta ādīni pi iti

original: yojanā. Yattha katthacīti yasmiṃ kasmiṃci ādāse vā udakapatte vāti sambandho. Sañchavi
analyzed: yojanā yattha katthaci iti yasmin kasmiṃci ādāse vā udaka patte vā ati sambandho

original: nu khoti sañjātā chavi nu kho, ahaṃ jiṇṇo amhi nu kho, noti yojanā.
analyzed: nu kho ti sañjātā nu kho aham jiṇṇaḥ amhi nu kho no ti yojanā

original: Mukhaṃ ālimpantīti ettha kehi ālimpantīti āha “vippasannachavirāgakarehi mukhalepanehī”ti.
analyzed: mukham ālimpanti iti ettha kehi ālimpanti iti āha vippasanna chavi rāga karehi mukha lepanehi iti

original: “Manosilāyā”ti iminā manosilā eva manosilikāti dasseti. Tānīti lañchanāni. Haritālādīhipīti
analyzed: manosilāya iti iminā manosilā eva manosilikā ati dasseti tāni iti lañchanāni

original: pisaddena na kevalaṃ manosilikāya eva, atha kho haritālādīhipīti dasseti.
analyzed: pi saddena na kevalam manaḥ silikāya eva atha kho dasseti

original: 248. Na bhikkhave naccaṃ vātiādīsu evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Niccāpentassa
analyzed: na bhikkhave naccam vā ti ādīsu evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ iti yojanā

original: vāti parehi naccāpentassa vā. Sādhugītanti sundaraṃ aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ gītaṃ,
analyzed: vāti parehi vā sādhu gītanti sundaram anicca tā ādi paṭisaṃyuttam gītaṃ

original: sajjanānaṃ vā. Dantagītampi na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Yanti gītaṃ. Pubbabhāgeti gāyanato
