original: pubbabhāge. Gāyāpentassāpīti parehi vā gāyāpentassāpi. Yaṃ panāti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
analyzed: pubba bhāge gāyāpentassa api iti parehi vā gāyāpentassa api yam pana ati kiriyā parāmasanam

original: Yaṃ paharati, tattha paharaṇe anāpattīti yojanā. Sabbanti akhilaṃ naccagītavāditaṃ.
analyzed: yam paharati tattha paharaṇe anāpatti iti yojanā akhilam nacca gīta vāditam

original: Passatoti passantassa ca suṇantassa ca. Savanampi hi ekasesena vā sāmaññaniddesena
analyzed: passatoti passantassa ca suṇantassa ca savanam pi hi ekasesena vā sāmañña niddesena

original: vā passaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Vihāratoti anaccaagītaavāditaṭṭhānavihārato. Vihāranti
analyzed: vā passanena iva saṅgahitam vihārato ti anacca a gīta a vādita ṭṭhāna vihārataḥ

original: naccagītavāditaṭṭhānavihāraṃ. Asanasālāyāti gāme ṭhitāya asanasālāya.
analyzed: nacca gīta vādita ṭṭhāna vihāram asana sālāya ati gāme ṭhitāya asana sālāya

original: 249. Sarakiriyanti sarassa kiriyaṃ. Iminā sarakuttinti ettha sarassa karaṇaṃ sarakuttīti
analyzed: sarakiriyanti sarassa kiriyam iminā ettha sarassa karaṇam sarakuttī iti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Aladdhaṃ samādhinti sambandho. Pacchimā janatāti ettha samūhiṃ
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti aladdham samādhinti sambandho pacchimā janatā ati ettha

original: avayavaṃ vinā samūhassa avayavino abhāvā tāpaccayo svatthopi hotīti āha “pacchimo
analyzed: avayavam vinā samūhassa avayavino abhāvā tā paccayo su atthaḥ pi hoti iti āha pacchimaḥ

original: jano”ti. Taṃ taṃ vattanti suttantavattādiṃ taṃ taṃ vattaṃ. Akkharāni vināsetvāti
analyzed: janoti tam tam vattanti suttanta vatta ādim tam tam vattam akkharāni vināsetvā ati

original: aññathā vattabbāni akkharāni aññathā vadanena ca dīghādīni rassādivadanena ca vināsetvā.
analyzed: aññathā vattabbāni akkharāni aññathā vadanena ca dīgha ādīni rassa ādi vadanena ca vināsetvā

original: Dhamme panāti ettha saddo pana visesajotako. Gītato visesova veditabboti hi attho.
analyzed: dhamme pana ati ettha saddo pana visesa jotakaḥ gītataḥ visesaḥ uva veditabbaḥ ti hi attho

original: Suttantavattanti suttantassa uccāraṇaṃ vattaṃ. Eseva nayo “jātakavattaṃ gāthāvatta”nti
analyzed: suttanta vattanti suttantassa uccāraṇam vattam esa eva nayaḥ jātaka vattam gāthā vattanti

original: etthāpi. Tanti vattaṃ. Yadi pana taṃ vināsetvā atidīghaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, evaṃ sati
analyzed: ettha api tanti vattam yadi pana tam vināsetvā ati dīgham kātum na vaṭṭati evam sati

original: yathā suttantavattādīni honti, tathā kathaṃ dassetabbānīti āha “caturassena vattenā”tiādi.
analyzed: yathā suttanta vatta ādīni honti tathā katham dassetabbāni iti āha catur assena vattena atiādi

original: Tattha caturassena vattenāti paripuṇṇena uccāraṇavattena. Parimaṇḍalānīti samantato
analyzed: tattha catur assena vattena ati paripuṇṇena uccāraṇa vattena parimaṇḍalāni iti samantataḥ

original: maṇḍalāni bimbāni puṇṇānīti attho. “Sarena bhaṇita”nti iminā sarabhaññanti ettha
analyzed: maṇḍalāni bimbāni puṇṇāni iti sarena bhaṇitanti iminā ettha

original: sarena bhaṇitabbanti sarabhaññanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Sarabhaññe kira atthīti sambandho.
analyzed: sarena bhaṇitabbanti sarabhaññanti vacana attham dasseti sarabhaññe kira atthi iti sambandhaḥ

original: Taraṅgavatthādīnaṃ uccāraṇavidhānāni etarahi natthi. Dvattiṃsavattānīti ca saṅkhyāmattameva
analyzed: uccāraṇa vidhānāni etarahi natthi dvattiṃsa vattāni iti ca saṅkhyā mattam eva

original: atthi, na saṅkhyeyyaṃ. Tasmā ṭīkāsu “taraṅgavattādīnaṃ uccāraṇavidhānāni naṭṭhapayogānī”ti
analyzed: atthi na saṅkhyeyyam tasmā ṭīkāsu taraṅgavat tā ādīnam uccāraṇa vidhānāni naṭṭha payogāni iti

original: vuttaṃ. Atthīti saṃvijjanti. Ayañhi atthisaddo nipāto. Tesūti dvattiṃsavattesu. Yanti
analyzed: vuttam atthi iti saṃvijjanti ayam hi atthi saddaḥ nipāto tesu iti dvattiṃsa vattesu yanti

original: vattaṃ. Uccāraṇavidhānāni naṭṭhapayogānipi tesaṃ sabbesaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ dassento
analyzed: vattam uccāraṇa vidhānāni naṭṭha payogāni pi tesam sabbesam sāmañña lakkhaṇam dassento

original: āha “sabbesa”ntiādi. Tattha sabbesanti dvattiṃsavattānaṃ, lakkhaṇanti sambandho.
analyzed: āha sabbesantiādi tattha sabbesanti dvattiṃsa vattānam lakkhaṇam ti sambandho

original: “Avināsetvā”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto āha “vikāraṃ akatvā”ti. Tattha vikārakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: a vināsetvā iti vatvā tam evattham pākaṭam karontaḥ āha vikāram a katvā iti tattha vikāra karaṇam

original: nāma yattakāhi mattāhi akkharaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tato adhikamattāyuttaṃ katvā kathanaṃ,
analyzed: nāma yattakāhi mattāhi akkharam paripuṇṇam hoti tatas adhika mattā yuttam katvā kathanam

original: tathā akatvā samaṇasāruppena caturassena nayena pavattanaṃyeva lakkhaṇanti attho.
analyzed: tathā a katvā samaṇa sāruppena caturassena nayena pavattanaṃya iva lakkhaṇanti attho

original: Bāhiralomiṃ uṇṇinti ettha “bāhiralomi”nti padaṃ bhāvanapuṃsakanti āha “uṇṇalomāni
analyzed: bāhiralomim uṇṇinti ettha bāhiralominti padam bhāva napuṃsakanti āha uṇṇa lomāni

original: bahi katvā”ti. “Uṇṇapāvāra”nti iminā uṇṇīti ettha uttarapadalopaṃ dasseti. Atha vā
analyzed: bahi katvā iti iminā uṇṇī iti ettha uttara pada lopam dasseti atha vā

original: pāvārapadena uṇṇā etassa atthīti uṇṇīti katvā taddhitapaccayassa sarūpaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: pāvāra padena uṇṇā etassa atthi iti uṇṇī iti katvā taddhita paccayassa sarūpam dasseti

original: “Tathā dhārentassa dukkaṭa”nti vacanassa atthāpattinayaṃ dassento āha “lomāni anto
analyzed: tathā dhārentassa dukkaṭa nti vacanassa attha āpatti nayam dassentaḥ āha lomāni antar

original: katvā pārupituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
analyzed: katvā pārupitum vaṭṭati iti

original: 251. Aṅgajātaṃ chindantassevāti aṅgajātameva chindantassāti yojanā. Atha vā aṅgajātaṃ chindantassa thullaccayamevāti yojanā. Ahikīṭadaṭṭhādīsu nimittabhūtesu chindantassāti yojanā.
analyzed: aṅga jātam chindantassa iva ati aṅga jātam eva chindantassa ati yojanā atha vā aṅga jātam chindantassa thullaccayam eva ati yojanā ahi kīṭa daṭṭha ādīsu nimitta bhūtesu chindantassa ati yojanā

original: 252. Uppannā hotīti paṭilābhavasena uppannā hoti. Uppannabhāvaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto āha
analyzed: uppannā hoti iti paṭilābha vasena uppannā hoti uppanna bhāvam pākaṭam karontaḥ āha

original: “so”tiādi. Tattha soti rājagahako seṭṭhi, kīḷatīti sambandho. Tassāti seṭṭhissa.
analyzed: tattha saḥ ti rājagahako seṭṭhi kīḷati iti sambandho tassa ati seṭṭhissa

original: Idaṃ padaṃ “jāle”ti pade sāmyatthachaṭṭhī, “uppannā hotī”ti pade sampadānaṃ. Tanti
analyzed: idam padam jālā iti pade sāmi attha chaṭṭhī uppannā hoti iti pade sampadānam tanti

original: candanagaṇṭhiṃ. Assāti seṭṭhissa. Idaṃ padaṃ “purisā”ti pade sāmyatthachaṭṭhī, “adaṃsū”ti
analyzed: candana gaṇṭhim assa ati seṭṭhissa idam padam purisa ati pade sāmi attha chaṭṭhī adaṃsu iti

original: pade sampadānaṃ. Vikubbaniddhīti vividhaṃ, vikāraṃ vā kubbanavasena pavattā iddhi.
analyzed: pade sampadānam vikubban iddhi iti vividham vikāram vā kubbana vasena pavattā

original: Adhiṭṭhāniddhīti adhiṭṭhānavasena pavattā iddhi.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāniddhi iti adhiṭṭhāna vasena pavattā iddhi

original: Gihī upanāmentīti sambandho. Byañjanaṃ katvāti byañjanaṃ pakkhipanaṃ katvā. Tanti
analyzed: gihī upanāmenti iti sambandhaḥ byañjanam katvā iti byañjanam pakkhipanam katvā tanti

original: suvaṇṇataṭṭikādiṃ. Āmasitumpīti pisaddo pageva paṭiggaṇhitunti dasseti. Saṅghikaparibhogena
analyzed: suvaṇṇa taṭṭikā ādim āmasitum pi iti pi saddaḥ pagā iva paṭiggaṇhitun ti dasseti saṅghika paribhogena

original: vāti vāsaddo panasaddattho. Saṅghikaparibhogena panāti hi attho. Gihivikaṭāni vāti
analyzed: vā ati vā saddo pana sadda attho saṅghika paribhogena pana ati hi attho gihi vikaṭāni vā ati

original: vāsaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Gihivikaṭāni bhājanānipi vaṭṭantīti hi attho. Kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohānaṃ
analyzed: vā saddaḥ sampiṇḍana atthaḥ gihi vikaṭāni bhājanāni pi vaṭṭanti iti hi atthaḥ kaṃsaloha vaṭṭalohānam

original: sabhāgattā vuttaṃ “kaṃsa…pe… saṅgahito”ti.
analyzed: sabhā gattā vuttam kaṃsape saṅgahito ti

original: 253. “Likhitu”nti etaṃ vuttanti yojanā. Pakatimaṇḍalanti ettha kiṃ makaradantamattampi acchinnamaṇḍalanti āha “makaradantacchinnakamaṇḍalamevā”ti.
analyzed: likhitum ti etam vuttanti yojanā pakati maṇḍalanti ettha kim acchinna maṇḍalanti āha makara danta chinnaka maṇḍalam eva ati

original: 254. Paharitvāti āvaṭṭanato aññamaññaṃ paharitvā. Tayo patte uparupari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: paharitvā ti āvaṭṭanato aññamaññam paharitvā tayo patte upara upari ṭhapetum vaṭṭati iti

original: sambandho. Bhūmiādhārako nāma bhūmiyā āsanno dantādīhi kato valayādhārako. Dāruādhārako
analyzed: sambandhaḥ bhūmi ādhārakaḥ nāma bhūmiyā āsannaḥ kataḥ valaya ādhārakaḥ dāru ādhārakaḥ

original: nāma ekadārunā kato ādhārako. Daṇḍādhārako nāma catudaṇḍato paṭṭhāya bahūhi daṇḍehi
analyzed: nāma eka dārunā kataḥ ādhārakaḥ daṇḍādhārakaḥ nāma catu daṇḍataḥ paṭṭhāya bahūhi daṇḍehi

original: kato ādhārako. Tatthāti bhamakoṭisadisadāru ādhārakatidaṇḍakādhāresu. Gahetvā evāti
analyzed: kataḥ ādhārako tattha ati ādhāraka tidaṇḍaka ādhāresu gahetvā eva ati

original: pattaṃ gahetvā eva, ekameva ṭhapetabbaṃ iti vuttanti yojanā.
analyzed: pattam gahetvā eva ekam eva ṭhapetabbam iti vuttam ti yojanā

original: Tatthevāti miḍḍhanteyeva. Vitthiṇṇāyāti vitthārāya. Bāhirapasseti kuṭṭassa bāhirapasse. Katāyāti kuṭṭassa thirabhāvatthaṃ katāya. Etthāti paribhaṇḍante.
analyzed: tattha iva ati vitthiṇṇāya ati vitthārāya bāhira passe iti kuṭṭassa bāhira passe katāya ati kuṭṭassa thira bhāva attham katāya ettha iti paribhaṇḍante

original: Yaṃ vatthaṃ pattharitvā patto ṭhapiyatīti vatthaṃ coḷakaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Tasmiṃ panāti
analyzed: yam vattham pattharitvā pattaḥ ṭhapiyati iti vattham coḷakam nāma ati yojanā tasmin panāti

original: coḷake pana. Yatthāti yassaṃ vālikāyaṃ. Na dussatīti patto na dussati. Pattamāḷakanti
analyzed: coḷake pana yatthā ati yassam vālikāyam na dussati iti pattaḥ na dussati patta māḷakam

original: pattassa ṭhapanatthāya kataṃ aṭṭaṃ. Bhaṇḍakukkhaḷikāti pattādibhaṇḍakānaṃ pakkhipanā
analyzed: pattassa ṭhapana thāya katam aṭṭam bhaṇḍakukkhaḷikā ti patta ādi bhaṇḍakānam pakkhipanā

original: ukkhaḷikā. Yattha katthacīti bhittikhīlādike yasmiṃ kasmiṃci. Laggentassāti pattaṃ
analyzed: ukkhaḷikā yattha katthaci iti bhitti khīla ādike yasmin kasmiṃci pattaṃ

original: thavikāya laggentassa. Nisīdanasayanatthaṃ vā kataṃ hotūti yojanā. Aññenāti pattato
analyzed: thavikāya nisīdana sayana attham vā katam hotu uti yojanā aññena ati pattataḥ

original: aññena. Aṭṭakachannenāti aṭṭapatirūpena, aṭṭakasadisenāti attho. Tatthāti aṭṭakachannena
analyzed: aññena aṭṭaka channena āti aṭṭa pati rūpena aṭṭaka sadisena ati tattha ati aṭṭaka channena

original: ṭhapite mañcapīṭhe. Aṃse baddhiyati anenāti aṃsabaddho, soyeva aṃsabaddhako, tena
analyzed: ṭhapite mañca pīṭhe aṃse anena ati aṃsabaddhaḥ tena

original: laggetvāti sambandho. Chatte ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Bhattena pūro bhattapūro,
analyzed: laggetvā iti sambandhaḥ chatte ṭhapetum na vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ bhattena pūraḥ bhatta pūraḥ

original: patto. Bandhitvā ṭhapite chatte vā aṭṭakaṃ katvā ṭhapite chatte vāti yojanā. Yo koci
analyzed: pattas bandhitvā ṭhapite chatte vā aṭṭakam katvā ṭhapite chatte vā ati yojanā yaḥ koci

original: bhattapūropi tucchapattopīti sambandho.
analyzed: bhattapūraḥ api tuccha pattaḥ api iti sambandhaḥ

original: 255. Yassāti bhikkhuno. Hatthe patto atthi, so eva bhikkhu pattahattho na hoti, apica
analyzed: yassa ati bhikkhuno hatthe pattaḥ atthi saḥ eva bhikkhu patta hatthaḥ na hoti apica

original: kho pana hatthe vā piṭṭhipāde vā yattha katthaci sarīrāvayave pattasmiṃ satīti yojanā.
analyzed: kho pana hatthe vā piṭṭhi pāde vā yattha katthaci sarīra avayave pattasmim sati iti yojanā

original: Eseva nayo anantaravākyepi. Imehi vākyehi “pattahattho”ti ca “kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetu”nti
analyzed: eṣa iva nayaḥ anantara vākye pi imehi vākyehi ca kavāṭam paṇāmetum ti

original: ca upalakkhaṇamattamevāti dasseti. Sūciṃ vā avāpuritunti sambandho. Kuñcikāya vāti
analyzed: ca upalakkhaṇa mattam evā ti dasseti sūcim vā avāpuritum iti sambandhaḥ kuñcikāya vā ati

original: vāsaddo “sarīrāvayavenā”ti padaṃ apekkhati.
analyzed: vāsaddaḥ sarīra avayavena ati padam apekkhati

original: Lābukaṭāhanti lambatīti lābu, lābuyā kaṭāhaṃ lābukaṭāhaṃ. “Tāvakālika”nti iminā ekavārameva
analyzed: lābu kaṭāhanti lambati iti lābu kaṭāham lābu kaṭāham eka vāram eva

original: tena āmisaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitvā chaḍḍetabbanti dasseti. Ghaṭikapālanti bhājanakapālaṃ.
analyzed: tena āmisam gahetvā paribhuñjitvā chaḍḍetabbanti dasseti ghaṭi kapālam ti bhājana kapālam

original: Abhuṃ meti avaḍḍhi mayhaṃ, uppajjitthāti attho. “Abhu me”ti vattabbe niggahitāgamavasena
analyzed: abhum mā iti mayham uppajjittha ati atthaḥ mā iti vattabbe niggahita āgama vasena

original: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Utrāsavacananti utrāsena vacanakāraṇaṃ padaṃ. Dinnakamevāti parehi dinnakameva āmisanti sambandho.
analyzed: evam vuttam utrāsa vacanam iti utrāsena vacana kāraṇam padam dinnakam eva ati parehi dinnakam eva āmisam iti sambandhaḥ

original: Cambetvāti mukhena cambetvā. Apaviddhāmisānīti chaḍḍitāni āmisāni. Etesūti calakādīsu.
analyzed: cambetvā iti mukhena cambetvā apaviddha āmisāni iti chaḍḍitāni āmisāni etesu iti calaka ādīsu

original: Anucchiṭṭhaṃ suddhapattanti natthi ucchiṭṭho etthāti anucchiṭṭho, suddhapatto, taṃ.
analyzed: an ucchiṭṭham suddha pattanti na atthi ucchiṭṭhaḥ ettha ati an ucchiṭṭhaḥ suddha patto tam

original: Ucchiṭṭhahatthenāti ucchiṭṭho ettha atthīti ucchiṭṭho, soyeva hattho ucchiṭṭhahattho,
analyzed: ucchiṭṭha hatthena ati ucchiṭṭhaḥ ettha atthi iti ucchiṭṭhaḥ saḥ yā iva hatthaḥ ucchiṭṭha hatthaḥ

original: tena. Vāmahatthena āsiñcitvāti sambandho. Etthāti suddhapatte. Ettāvatāpīti ettakena
analyzed: tena vāma hatthena āsiñcitvā iti sambandhaḥ ettha ati suddha patte ettāvatā api iti ettakena

original: ekaudakageṇḍusagahaṇamattenāpi. Soti suddhapatto. Hatthaṃ panāti ucchiṭṭhahatthampi.
analyzed: eka audaka geṇḍu sagahaṇa mattena api saḥ ti suddha pattaḥ hattham panāti ucchiṭṭha hattham pi

original: Panasaddo hettha sampiṇḍanattho. Yaṃ aṭṭhiṃ vā yaṃ calakaṃ vāti yojanā. Tatthāti
analyzed: pana saddaḥ ha ittha sampiṇḍana atthaḥ yam aṭṭhim vā yam calakam vā ati yojanā tattha ati

original: macchamaṃsaphalādīsu. Tanti aṭṭhicalakaṃ. Yaṃ panāti aṭṭhicalakādiṃ pana, paṭikhāditukāmoti
analyzed: maccha maṃsa phala ādīsu aṭṭhicalakam yam ati aṭṭhicalaka ādim pana paṭikhāditu kāmaḥ iti

original: sambandho, puna khāditukāmoti attho. Tatthevāti patte eva. Katvāti ṭhapanaṃ katvā.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ puna khāditu kāmaḥ ti atthaḥ tattha iva ati patte eva katvā iti ṭhapanam katvā

original: Yaṃ kiñci aṭṭhikaṇṭakādinti sambandho.
analyzed: yam kiñci aṭṭhikaṇṭaka ādin ti sambandhaḥ

original: 256. Satthakaveṭhanakanti satthakassa veṭhanakaraṇaṃ. Pipphalikaṃ vā daṇḍasatthakaṃ
analyzed: satthaka veṭhanakanti satthakassa veṭhana karaṇam pipphalikam vā daṇḍa satthakam

original: nāmāti yojanā. Pipphāleti etāyāti pipphali, sāyeva pipphalikaṃ. Aññampīti pipphalikato
analyzed: nāma ati yojanā pipphālā iti etāya ati pipphali sāya iva pipphalikam aññam pi iti pipphalikato

original: aññampi. Yaṃkiñci daṇḍaṃ yojetvā katasatthakaṃ vā daṇḍasatthakaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Iminā
analyzed: aññam pi yaṃ kiñci daṇḍam yojetvā kata satthakam vā daṇḍasatthakam nāma ati yojanā iminā

original: daṇḍena yojitaṃ satthakaṃ daṇḍasatthakanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: daṇḍena yojitam satthakam daṇḍa satthakam ti vacana attham dasseti

original: Malaggahitāti ayamalaggahitā. Kiṇṇenāti madirādibījena kiṇṇena. Tenāti pāsāṇacuṇṇasaṅkhātena
analyzed: ma lagga hitā ati ayam alagga hitā kiṇṇena ati madirā ādi bījena kiṇṇena tena ati pāsāṇa cuṇṇa saṅkhātena

original: saritakena. Makkhetunti sūciṃ makkhetuṃ. Makkhitamadhusitthakaṃ taṃ saritakaṃ paribhijjatīti
analyzed: saritakena makkhetunti sūcim makkhetum makkhita madhu sitthakam tam saritakam paribhijjati iti

original: yojanā. Madhusitthakapilotikanti madhusitthakena makkhitaṃ pilotikaṃ. Tatthāti nisseṇiyaṃ.
analyzed: yojanā madhu sitthaka pilotikam ti madhu sitthakena makkhitam pilotikam tattha ati nisseṇiyam

original: Yāya rajjuyā kathine bandhanti, sā rajju kathinarajju nāmāti yojanā. Tatthāti dīghassa
analyzed: yāya rajjuyā kathine bandhanti sā rajju kathinarajju nāma ati yojanā tattha ati dīghassa

original: bhikkhuno pamāṇena kate kathine. Daṇḍaketi kathinadaṇḍakamhi. Tassāti dīghassa bhikkhuno
analyzed: bhikkhuno pamāṇena kate kathine daṇḍake iti kathina daṇḍakamhi tassa ati dīghassa bhikkhuno

original: pamāṇena katassa kathinassa. Itarassa bhikkhunoti dīghabhikkhuto itarassa rassabhikkhuno.
analyzed: pamāṇena katassa kathinassa itarassa bhikkhuno ti dīgha bhikkhutaḥ itarassa rassa bhikkhuno

original: Daṇḍakathinapamāṇena katassa kaṭasārakassāti yojanā. “Duguṇakaraṇa”nti iminā pidalakanti
analyzed: katassa kaṭasārakassa ati yojanā duguṇa karaṇanti iminā pidalakanti

original: duguṇakaraṇasaṅkhātassa kiriyāvisesassa nāmanti dasseti. Vinandhanarajjunti visesena
analyzed: duguṇa karaṇa saṅkhātassa kiriyā visesassa nāmanti dasseti vinandhana rajjunti visesena

original: nahiyati bandhiyati etāyāti vinandhanā, sāyeva rajju vinandhanarajju, tamevatthaṃ
analyzed: nahiyati bandhiyati etāyāti vinandhanā sāyā iva rajju vinandhana rajju tamevattham

original: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “vinandhituṃ rajju”nti. Vinandhanasuttakanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: dassetum vuttam vinandhitum rajjun ti vinandhana suttakan ti ettha api esā iva nayo

original: Tena suttakenāti vinandhanasuttakena. Tatthāti khuddakanisseṇiyaṃ kāci suttantarikāyoti
analyzed: tena suttakena ati vinandhana suttakena tattha ati khuddaka nisseṇiyam kāci

original: sambandho. Pamāṇasaññākaraṇanti suttantarikapamāṇassa saññākaraṇaṃ. Kāḷasuttena saññākaraṇaṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ pamāṇa saññākaraṇanti sutta antarika pamāṇassa saññākaraṇam kāḷa suttena saññākaraṇam

original: viya haliddisuttena saññākaraṇanti yojanā. Aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhantīti ettha “paṭiggaṇhantī”ti
analyzed: viya haliddi suttena saññā karaṇanti yojanā aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhanti iti ettha paṭiggaṇhanti iti

original: padassa “aṅguliyā”ti karaṇasseva vuttattā kammassa avuttattā tassa kammaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: padassa aṅguliyā iti karaṇassa iva vutta ttā kammassa a vutta ttā tassa kammam dassetuṃ

original: vuttaṃ “sūcimukha”nti. Aṅgulikosakanti aṅgulikañcukaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam sūci mukhanti aṅguli kosakam aṅguli kañcukam

original: 257. Pāticaṅkoṭakādinti ettha pāti nāma paṭiggahasaṇṭhānena kato sūciādibhaṇḍaṭṭhapano
analyzed: pāti caṅkoṭaka ādin ti ettha pāti nāma paṭiggaha saṇṭhānena kato sūci ādi bhaṇḍa ṭhapano

original: bhājanaviseso. Ākiritvāti pakkhipitvā. Odhunitvāti papphoṭetvā. Ghanadaṇḍakanti nirantaradaṇḍakaṃ.
analyzed: bhājana visesaḥ ākiritvā ti pakkhipitvā odhunitvā ati papphoṭetvā ghana daṇḍakam ti nirantara daṇḍakam

original: Antokatvāti kathinassa antokatvā.
analyzed: antokatvā ati kathinassa antokatvā

original: 258. Vinandhitvāti coḷakena vinandhitvā.
analyzed: vinandhitvā iti coḷakena vinandhitvā

original: 259. Aparissāvanakasseva bhikkhunoti yojanā. Yo pana yācatīti sambandho. Majjhedaṇḍaketi
analyzed: a parissāvanakassa iva bhikkhuno ti yojanā yaḥ pana yācati iti sambandhaḥ majjhedaṇḍaka iti

original: daṇḍakassa majjhe. Udakanti akappiyaudakaṃ. Tanti udakaṃ. Yanti parissāvanaṃ. Udakaṃ
analyzed: daṇḍakassa majjhe udakanti akappiya odakam tanti udakam yanti parissāvanam udakaṃ

original: parisuddhaṃ hutvā savati gacchati pavattati anenāti parissāvanaṃ. Yaṃ udake ottharitvā
analyzed: parisuddham hutvā savati gacchati pavattati anena ati parissāvanam yam udake ottharitvā

original: ghaṭena udakaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ ottharakaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Tamevatthaṃ vitthārento āha
analyzed: ghaṭena udakam gaṇhanti tam ottharakam nāma ati yojanā tam eva attham vitthārentaḥ āha

original: “taṃ hī”tiādi. Tanti parissāvanaṃ, bandhitvāti sambandho. Tesūti catūsu khāṇukesu.
analyzed: tam hi itiādi tanti parissāvanam bandhitvā iti sambandhaḥ tesu iti catūsu khāṇukesu

original: Sabbapariyanteti sabbaparissāvanassa pariyante mocetvāti sambandho. Ottharitvāti
analyzed: sabba pariyante ti sabba parissāvanassa pariyante mocetvā iti sambandhaḥ ottharitvā iti

original: ogāhetvā. Cīvarakuṭikāti cīvarena katā kuṭikā, sā makasānaṃ parittāṇatthaṃ katattā
analyzed: ogāhetvā cīvara kuṭikā ati cīvarena katā kuṭikā sā makasānam parittāṇattham katattā

original: makasakuṭikāti vuccati.
analyzed: makasa kuṭikā ati vuccati

original: 260. Semhādidosussannakāyāti semhādidosehi ussannakāyā. Aggaḷatthambhoti kavāṭatthambho.
analyzed: semha ādi dosa ussanna kāyā ati semha ādi dosehi ussanna kāyā aggaḷa tthambho ti kavāṭa tthambho

original: Yatthāti aggaḷatthambhe. Tatthāti dvārabāhāya. Tatthāti aggaḷapāsake. Dhūmo nikkhamati
analyzed: yatthā ati aggaḷa tthambhe tatthā ati dvāra bāhāya tatthā ati aggaḷa pāsake dhūmaḥ nikkhamati

original: etenāti dhūmanetto, chiddo. Tena vuttaṃ “dhūmanikkhamanachidda”nti. “Gandhehī”ti
analyzed: etena ati dhūma netto chiddo tena vuttam dhūma nikkhamana chiddanti gandhehi iti

original: iminā “vāsetu”nti padassa karaṇaṃ dasseti. “Udakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhāna”nti iminā udakaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: iminā vāsetum ti padassa karaṇam dasseti udaka ṭṭhapana ṭṭhānan ti iminā udaka ṭṭhānan ti

original: ettha udakassa ṭhapanaṃ ṭhānaṃ udakaṭṭhānanti majjhepadalopasamāsaṃ dasseti. Tatthāti
analyzed: ettha udakassa ṭhapanam ṭhānam udaka ṭṭhānam ti majjhe pada lopa samāsam dasseti tattha iti

original: udakaṭṭhāne. Koṭṭhakoti ettha na yattha katthaci, yassa kassaci vā koṭṭhako hoti,
analyzed: udakaṭṭhāne koṭṭhakaḥ ti ettha na yattha katthaci yassa kassaci vā koṭṭhakaḥ hoti

original: api ca kho pana dvāre eva, dvārasseva vā koṭṭhakoti āha “dvārakoṭṭhako”ti.
analyzed: api ca kho pana dvāre eva dvārassa iva vā koṭṭhakā iti āha dvāra koṭṭhakā iti

original: 261. Parikammanti piṭṭhiādiparikammaṃ. Paṭicchādiyati imāyāti paṭicchādi, vatthameva
analyzed: parikammanti piṭṭhi ādi parikammam paṭicchādiyati imāya ati paṭicchādi vattham eva

original: paṭicchādi vatthapaṭicchādi. Udakaṃ na hotīti ettha pānodakaṃ nivattento āha “nhānodakaṃ na hotī”ti.
analyzed: paṭicchādi vattha paṭicchādi udakam na hoti iti ettha pāna udakam nivattentaḥ āha nhāna udakam na hoti iti

original: 262. Paṇṇikānaṃ tulaṃ viya udakaubbāhanakatulanti yojanā. Dīghavarattādīhītiādisaddena
analyzed: paṇṇikānam tulam viya udaka obbāhanaka tulanti yojanā

original: rajju ādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Arahatthaghaṭiyantaṃ nāma cakkasaṇṭhānaṃ anekāraṃ are are
analyzed: rajju ādayaḥ saṅgaṇhāti arahatthaghaṭiyantam nāma cakka saṇṭhānam aneka aram are

original: ghaṭāni bandhitvā ekena vā dvīhi vā paribbhamiyamānaṃ yantaṃ. Arasaṅkhātesu hatthesu
analyzed: ghaṭāni bandhitvā ekena vā dvīhi vā paribbhamiyamānam yantam ara saṅkhātesu hatthesu

original: ghaṭā bandhitabbā etthāti arahatthaghaṭi, tameva yantaṃ arahatthaghaṭiyantaṃ. Cammabhājananti
analyzed: ghaṭāḥ bandhitabbāḥ ettha ati arahattha ghaṭi tam eva yantam arahattha ghaṭi yantam camma bhājananti

original: cammamayaṃ bhājanaṃ. Aparikkhittā hotīti candanikā apākārā hoti. Udakapuñjanaṃ vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: camma mayam bhājanam a parikkhittā hoti iti candanikā apākārā hoti udaka puñjanam vaṭṭati iti

original: sambandho. Tasminti udakapuñjane. “Udakapuñjanī”tipi pāṭho. Evaṃ sati tāya udakapuñjaniyāti
analyzed: tasmin ti udaka puñjane pāṭhaḥ evam sati

original: attho. Paccuddharitunti apanetuṃ.
analyzed: attho paccuddharitunti apanetum

original: 263. Ā samantato viddhaṃ pakkhapāsakametthāti āviddhapakkhapāsakaṃ. Maṇḍaleti kaṇṇikamaṇḍalamhi.
analyzed: ā samantataḥ viddham pakkha pāsakam ettha ati āviddha pakkha pāsakam maṇḍale iti kaṇṇika maṇḍalamhi

original: Kataṃ kūṭañca chadanañca etthāti katakūṭacchadanaṃ, jantāgharaṃ, tassa. Etanti “nillekhajantāghara”nti
analyzed: katam kūṭam ca chadanam ca ettha ati kata kūṭa chadanam jantāgharam tassa etat nillekha jantāgharanti

original: etaṃ nāmaṃ. “Cattāro māse”ti iminā “catumāsa”nti digusamāsassa vākyaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: etam nāmam cattāraḥ māsāḥ iti iminā vākyam dasseti

original: 264. Namatakanti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanamatakato visesaṃ dassento āha “eḷakalomehī”tiādi.
analyzed: namatakam ti ettha heṭṭhā vutta namatakataḥ visesam dassentaḥ āha eḷaka lomehi itiādi

original: Avāyimanti vāyitvā na kataṃ. Cammakhaṇḍaparihārenāti cammakhaṇḍaṃ viya adhiṭṭhānavikappanaapanayanena,
analyzed: avāyiman ti vāyitvā na katam camma khaṇḍa parihārena ati camma khaṇḍam viya adhiṭṭhāna vikappana apanayanena

original: paribhuñjitabbanti attho. Peḷāyāti aṭṭhaṃsādiākārena katāya mañjūsāya. Etanti “āsittakūpadhāna”nti
analyzed: paribhuñjitabbanti attho peḷāya ati aṭṭhaṃsa ādi ākārena katāya mañjūsāya etat ti āsittaka upadhānam ti

original: etaṃ nāmaṃ. Dārumayāpīti pisaddo na tambaloharajatamayā evāti dasseti. Etthevāti
analyzed: etam nāmam dāru mayā api iti pisaddaḥ na tamba loha rajata mayāḥ evā ati dasseti ettha iva ati

original: maḷorikāyameva. Ādhārakasaṅkhepagamanatoti ādhārake saṅkhepaṃ gamanato. Hīti saccaṃ,
analyzed: maḷorikā ayam eva ādhāraka saṅkhepa gamanataḥ ti ādhārake saṅkhepam gamanataḥ hi iti saccam

original: yasmā vā. Pubbe pattarakkhanatthaṃ ādhārako anuññāto, idāni bhuñjanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: yasmai vā pubbe patta rakkhana attham ādhārakaḥ anuññātaḥ idāni bhuñjana ttham ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Eko bhikkhu gacchatīti sambandho. Sesakanti gahetabbaphalapūvehi sesakaṃ. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ bhikkhu gacchati iti sambandhaḥ sesakam ti gahetabba phala pūvehi sesakam tasmin

original: khaṇeti tasmiṃ bhuñjanakkhaṇe.
analyzed: khaṇa iti tasmin bhuñjana khaṇe

original: 265. Ekekenapi aṅgenāti pisaddo sambhāvanattho, tato pana adhikehi aṅgehi pagevāti
analyzed: ekekena api aṅgena ati pi saddo sambhāvanā atthaḥ tatas pana adhikehi aṅgehi pageva ati

original: hi attho. Samannāgatassa upāsakassa nikkujjitunti sambandho. Tassāti upāsakassa.
analyzed: hi atthaḥ samannāgatassa upāsakassa nikkujjitun ti sambandhaḥ tassa ati upāsakassa

original: Na gahetabboti saṅghena na gahetabbo. Asukassa upāsakassāti sambandho. Ukkujjanakāleti
analyzed: na gahetabbo ti saṅghena na gahetabbaḥ asukassa upāsakassa ati sambandhaḥ ukkujjana kāle iti

original: pattassa ukkujjanakāle. Yācāpetvāti pattanikujjitena upāsakena yācāpetvā. Hatthapāsanti
analyzed: pattassa ukkujjana kāle yācāpetvā ati patta nikujjitena upāsakena yācāpetvā hattha pāsanti

original: saṅghassa hatthapāsaṃ.
analyzed: saṅghassa hattha pāsam

original: 268. Purakkhatvāti ettha purasaddassa aggatthabhāvañca karasaddassa khādesabhāvañca
analyzed: ettha pura saddassa agga ttha bhāvañca kara saddassa kha ādesa bhāvañca

original: dassento āha “aggato katvā”ti. Soti bodhirājakumāro, santharīti sambandho. Lacchāmīti
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha aggatas katvā iti saḥ ti bodhi rāja kumāraḥ santharī iti sambandhaḥ lacchāmi iti

original: labhissāmi, esa bodhirājakumāro puttalābhāya abhabboti yojanā. Akkamane dosaṃ dassento
analyzed: labhissāmi esa bodhirāja kumāro putta lābhāya abhabbaḥ ti yojanā akkamane dosam dassento

original: āha “yadī”tiādi. Pacchāti akkamanato pacchā. Ayanti bhagavā. Idanti kāraṇaṃ. Tāvāti
analyzed: āha yadi itiādi pacchā ati pacchā ayanti bhagavā idam ti kāraṇam tāva ati

original: sikkhāpadapaññattito, sikkhāpadapaññattiyā vā paṭhamaṃ. Paribhavatoti gihīnaṃ paribhavato.
analyzed: sikkhāpada paññattitaḥ sikkhāpada paññattiyāḥ vā paṭhamam paribhavato ti gihīnam paribhavato

original: Maṅgalatthāyāti arogādikassa maṅgalassa atthāya. Dhotapādakanti ettha dhotehi pādehi
analyzed: maṅgala atthāya ati aroga ādikassa maṅgalassa atthāya dhota pādakam ti ettha dhotehi pādehi

original: akkamanaṭṭhāne attharitaṃ dhotapādakanti vacanatthaṃ dassento āha “dhotapādakaṃ nāmā”tiādi.
analyzed: akkamana ṭṭhāne attharitam dhotapādakan ti vacana attham dassentaḥ āha dhotapādakam nāma atiādi

original: Tattha “paccattharaṇaṃ atthata”nti iminā “dhotapādaka”nti ettha ṇikapaccayassa attharitatthe
analyzed: tattha paccattharaṇam iminā dhota pādakam ti ettha ṇika paccayassa attharita atthe

original: pavattabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: pavatta bhāvam dasseti

original: 269. Padumakaṇṇikākāranti padumakaṇṇikasaṇṭhānaṃ. Kataṃ pādaghaṃsanaṃ katakaṃ nāmāti
analyzed: paduma kaṇṇikā kāranti paduma kaṇṇika saṇṭhānam katam pāda ghaṃsanam katakam nāma ati

original: yojanā. Tanti katakaṃ, paṭikkhittamevāti sambandho. Potthakesu taṃsaddo galitoti
analyzed: yojanā tanti katakam paṭikkhittam eva ati sambandho potthakesu taṃ saddaḥ galito ti

original: daṭṭhabbo. Bāhullikānuyogattāti paccayabahulabhāvāya anuyogattā. Pāsāṇapheṇakopīti
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ bāhullika anuyoga ttā ati paccaya bahula bhāvāya anuyoga ttā pāsāṇa pheṇaka upi iti

original: pāsāṇaabbudampi. Bījanīti caturassabījanī. Tanti vidhūpanaṃ, kataṃ hotūti sambandho.
analyzed: bījanī iti caturassa bījanī tanti vidhūpanam katam hotu iti sambandhaḥ

original: Idhāpi taṃsaddo galito. Veḷudantavilīvehi vā morapiñchehi vā cammavikatīhi vā kataṃ
analyzed: idha api taṃsaddaḥ galitaḥ veḷu danta vilīvehi vā mora piñchehi vā camma vikatīhi vā katam

original: hotūti yojanā. Sabbaṃ vidhūpananti sambandho. Pāḷiyaṃ tālavaṇṭanti saha vaṇṭena kataṃ
analyzed: hotu iti yojanā sabbam vidhūpananti sambandhaḥ pāḷiyam tālavaṇṭanti saha vaṇṭena katam

original: tālaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ, tālasaddena taṃmayā maṇḍalabījanī gahetabbā vikārīvikārabhāvena
analyzed: tālam tāla vaṇṭam tāla saddena taṃ mayā maṇḍala bījanī gahetabbā vikārī vikāra bhāvena

original: sambandhattā. Makasabījanīti makasānaṃ palāyanakabījanī, dantamayavisāṇamayadaṇḍakāpi
analyzed: makasabījanī iti makasānam palāyanakabījanī danta maya visāṇa maya daṇḍakā api

original: makasabījanī vaṭṭatīti yojanā. “Vākamayabījaniyā”ti padaṃ “saṅgahitā”ti pade ādhāro, karaṇaṃ vā.
analyzed: makasa bījanī vaṭṭati iti yojanā vāka maya bījaniyā ati padam karaṇam vā

original: 270. Yassāti bhikkhussa cakkhuṃ vā dubbalaṃ hotīti yojanā. Aññoti kāyaḍāhādīhi ābādhehi
analyzed: yassa ti bhikkhussa cakkhum vā dubbalam hoti iti yojanā aññaḥ ti kāya ḍāha ādīhi ābādhehi

original: añño, koci ābādho vā uppajjatīti yojanā. “Vasse panā”ti padaṃ “cīvaraguttattha”nti
analyzed: aññaḥ koci ābādhaḥ vā uppajjati iti yojanā vasse panāti padam

original: pade eva sambandhitabbaṃ. Cīvaraguttatthanti cīvarassa vassatemanato guttatthaṃ,
analyzed: pade eva sambandhitabbam cīvara guttattham ti cīvarassa vassa temanataḥ guttattham

original: vāḷamigacorabhayesu santesūti sambandho. Tālapaṇṇādinā ekena paṇṇena kataṃ chattaṃ
analyzed: vāḷa miga cora bhayesu santesu iti sambandhaḥ tāla paṇṇa ādinā ekena paṇṇena katam chattam

original: ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ. Sabbatthevāti sabbesu eva gāmāraññesu.
analyzed: eka paṇṇa chattam sabbattha iva ati sabbesu eva gāma araññesu

original: “Asi assā”ti iminā asissāti padassa anavakāsavidhiṃ dasseti. Asīti khaggo. Assāti
analyzed: asi assa ati iminā asissa ati padassa anavakāsa vidhim dasseti asi iti khaggaḥ assa ati

original: corassa, asīti sambandho. Vijjotalatīti ettha alapaccayo rūpasiddhimattovāti āha
analyzed: corassa asi iti sambandhaḥ ettha ala paccayaḥ āha

original: “vijjotatī”ti. “Catuhatthoyevā”ti iminā pamāṇayuttoti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Tatoti
analyzed: vijjotati iti iminā pamāṇa yutto ti padassa attham dasseti tatas ti

original: catuhatthato. Sabbesanti gilānāgilānānaṃ. “Sakkā panā”ti padaṃ “na vaṭṭatī”ti pade
analyzed: catuhatthataḥ sabbesanti gilāna a gilānānam sakkā pana ati padam na vaṭṭati iti pade

original: kattā, “dātabbā”ti pade kammaṃ. Sammannitvāva dātabbā, na vinā sammutiyāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: kattā dātabbā ati pade kammam sammannitvā ava dātabbā na vinā sammutiyā ti adhippāyaḥ

original: 273. Āgatanti udariyato nikkhamitvā āgataṃ. Uggāranti galato uggāraṃ bhojananti sambandho. Sandhāretvāti patiṭṭhāpetvā. Asandhāritameva hutvāti sambandho.
analyzed: āgatanti udariyataḥ nikkhamitvā āgatam uggāranti galataḥ uggāram bhojananti sambandho sandhāretvā iti patiṭṭhāpetvā a sandhāritam eva hutvā iti sambandho

original: Yanti khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ, patitanti sambandho. Tanti khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ, gahetvā paribhuñjitunti sambandho. Idanti vacanaṃ.
analyzed: khādanīya bhojanīyam sambandho khādanīya bhojanīyam gahetvā vacanam

original: 274. Kubbaṃ karissāmīti ettha kariyati uccāriyatīti kubbanti vutte saddoti āha “saddaṃ
analyzed: kubbam karissāmi iti ettha kariyati uccāriyati iti kubbanti vutte saddo iti āha saddam

original: karissāmī”ti. Saddanti “ayaṃ maṃ bhikkhu vippakarotī”ti uccāsaddaṃ. Nakhādīhītiādisaddena
analyzed: karissāmi iti ayam mama bhikkhu vippakaroti iti uccā saddam nakha ādīhi iti ādi saddena

original: mukhakuṭṭe saṅgaṇhāti. Anurakkhanatthanti anudayena pālanatthaṃ. Nakhacchedananti
analyzed: mukhakuṭṭe saṅgaṇhāti anurakkhana tham ti anudayena pālana tham nakha chedanam ti

original: nakhaṃ chindati anenāti nakhacchedanaṃ, satthakādi. Vīsatimaṭṭhanti ettha vīsatiyā
analyzed: nakham chindati anena ati nakha chedanam satthaka ādi vīsatim aṭṭhanti ettha vīsatiyā

original: nakhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ vīsatimaṭṭhanti dassento āha “vīsatipi nakhe”tiādi. Likhitamaṭṭheti
analyzed: nakhānam maṭṭham vīsatim aṭṭhanti dassentaḥ āha vīsati pi nakha iti ādi likhita maṭṭha iti

original: likhite hutvā maṭṭhe. Kārāpentīti nahāpite kārāpenti. Nakhatoti nakhato vā nakhantarato
analyzed: likhite hutvā maṭṭhe kārāpenti iti nahāpite kārāpenti nakhatas uti nakhataḥ vā nakhantarataḥ

original: vā. Apakaḍḍhitunti kaḍḍhitvā apanetuṃ.
analyzed: vā apakaḍḍhitum ti kaḍḍhitvā apanetum

original: 275. Khurakosakanti khurassa ṭhapanakaṃ. Kattariyāti kantiyati chindiyati imāyāti
analyzed: khurakosakanti khurassa ṭhapanakam kattariyāti kantiyati chindiyati

original: kattari, ayomayo eko upakaraṇaviseso, tāya. “Chedāpentī”ti iminā kappāpentīti ettha
analyzed: kattari ayaḥ mayaḥ ekaḥ upakaraṇa viseso tāya chedāpenti iti iminā kappāpenti iti ettha

original: kappasaddassa vidhyatthaṃ adhippāyena dasseti. Massuṃ vaḍḍhāpentīti ettha massuṃ
analyzed: kappa saddassa vidhi attham adhippāyena dasseti massum vaḍḍhāpenti iti ettha massum

original: vaḍḍhetvā ruhāpentīti atthaṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “massuṃ dīghaṃ kārāpentī”ti. Eḷakamassūti
analyzed: vaḍḍhetvā ruhāpenti iti attham paṭikkhipantaḥ āha massum dīgham kārāpenti iti eḷaka massu iti

original: eḷakassa viya massūti eḷakamassu. “Golomika”nti vuccatīti sambandho. “Catukoṇa”nti
analyzed: eḷakassa viya massu uti eḷaka massu golomikanti vuccati iti sambandho catu koṇam ti

original: iminā caturassanti ettha aṃsasaddo koṇatthoti dasseti. Caturassanti ettha hi “caturaṃsa”nti
analyzed: iminā catur assanti ettha aṃsa saddo koṇa atthaḥ ti dasseti catur assanti ettha hi catur aṃsanti

original: vattabbe niggahitassa lopaṃ katvā parassa sakārassa dvebhāvaṃ katvā “caturassa”nti
analyzed: vattabbe niggahitassa lopam katvā parassa sakārassa dve bhāvam katvā

original: vuttaṃ. Lomasaṃharaṇanti lomānaṃ apanayanaṃ. Lomarājiṭṭhapananti lomalekhāṭhapanaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam loma saṃharaṇam ti lomānam apanayanam loma rāji ṭhapanam ti loma lekhā ṭhapanam

original: Sabbatthāti sabbesu, massukappanādīsūti sambandho. Gaṇḍavaṇarudhiābādhapaccayāti
analyzed: sabbattha āti sabbesu massu kappana ādīsu iti sambandhaḥ gaṇḍa vaṇa rudhi ābādha paccayā ti

original: gaṇḍo ca vaṇo ca rudhi ca gaṇḍavaṇarudhayo, teyeva ābādhā gaṇḍavaṇarudhiābādhā, tesaṃ
analyzed: gaṇḍaḥ ca vaṇaḥ ca rudhi ca gaṇḍa vaṇa rudhayaḥ teyā iva ābādhā gaṇḍa vaṇa rudhi ābādhā tesam

original: paccayā. Vaṇoti mahanto vaṇo. Rudhīti khuddako vaṇo. Sakkharādīhīti sakkharamadhusitthakehi.

analyzed: iminā kalāpena bahu rajjūnam samūhena kattabbanti kalāpukam ti vacana attham dasseti

original: Vāraṇo hi kuṃ bhūmiṃ jarāpetīti kuñjaroti ca kuñje nikuñje ramatīti kuñjaroti ca

analyzed: sata valikanti ettha sata saddassa aneka attha vācaka tam dasseti vāma dakkhiṇa passesu

original: vā”ti iminā purimanivatthaṃ kaṭito paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā nivatthaṃ nāmāti dasseti.

analyzed: antaravāsakassa koṇe tathā ati iminā ekam vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa

original: Ubho kaṇṇeti heṭṭhā ṭhite ubho kaṇṇe upari ca ṭhite ubho kaṇṇe. Tanti parimaṇḍalapārupanaṃ.

analyzed: vacana attham dasseti

original: 282. “Cakkhūnaṃ hita”nti iminā acakkhussanti ettha ssapaccayo cakkhusaddato hitatthe hotīti dasseti. Pamāṇaṅgulenāti vaḍḍhakīnaṃ pamāṇayuttena aṅgulena.

original: pisaddo sambhāvanattho. Nīcaṃ pana rukkhaṃ pagevāti hi attho.

original: 285. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇāti ettha kariyati uccāriyatīti karaṇo, saddo, vācāyeva karaṇo

original: Vedaṃ viyāti sutiṃ viya. Vācanāmagganti vācanāya upāyaṃ. Sakāti sammāsambuddhasaṅkhātassa

original: eva dhammo bhāsito, tasmā sā māgadhanirutti sakā nāmāti vuccati. Niruttīti atthaṃ

original: sabbavohāro labbhati. Idha pana “sakāyā”ti vuttattā māgadhavohāro eva. Tena vuttaṃ

original: pavattā mūlabhāsābhūtā māgadhaniruttiyeva.
analyzed: pavattā mūla bhāsā bhūtā māgadha niruttiyā iva

original: 286. Lokāyataṃ nāma titthiyasatthanti sambandho. Imināva kāraṇenāti “seto kāko, kasmā? Aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā. Ratto bako, kasmā? Lohitassa rattattā” iti iminā eva kāraṇena.
analyzed: lokāyatam nāma titthiya satthanti sambandho iminā ava kāraṇena ati seto kāko kasmā seta ttā ratto bako kasmā lohitassa ratta ttā iti iminā eva kāraṇena

original: 288. Antarā ahosīti ettha antarasaddo byavadhānatthoti āha “antaritā ahosi paṭicchannā”ti. Tena saddena dhammakathā byavadhānā ahosīti attho.
analyzed: antarā ahosi iti ettha antara saddaḥ byavadhāna atthaḥ ti āha antaritā ahosi paṭicchannā iti tena saddena dhamma kathā byavadhānā ahosi iti attho

original: 289. Ābādhappaccayāti ettha ābādhassa bhesajjasaṅkhāto paccayo ābādhapaccayoti dassento āha “yassā”tiādi. Iminā ābādhoyeva paccayo ābādhapaccayoti atthaṃ paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: ābādha ppaccayā ti ettha ābādhassa bhesajja saṅkhāto paccayaḥ ābādha paccayo ti dassentaḥ āha yassa ati ādi iminā ābādhaḥ yeva paccayaḥ ābādha paccayo ti attham paṭikkhipati

original: 293. Dukkaṭavatthu nāma akappiyavohārādinā mālāvaccharopanādi, pācittiyavatthu nāma
analyzed: dukkaṭa vatthu nāma akappiya vohāra ādinā mālā vaccha ropana ādi pācittiya vatthu nāma

original: mālāvaccharopanādiatthāya pathavīkhaṇanādi. Paharaṇīti paharati imāyāti paharaṇī.

original: Etanti “paharaṇī”ti etaṃ nāmaṃ. Yassa kassaci āvudhasaṅkhātassa lohabhaṇḍassāti sambandho.

original: Tanti āvudhasaṅkhātaṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ. Vuttamevāti “katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāra”ntiādinā

original: 6. Senāsanakkhandhakaṃ
analyzed: senāsana kkhandhakam

original: Vihārānujānanakathā

original: suvaṇṇavaṅkachadanena chāditaṃ gehaṃ. Iṭṭhakāguhāti iṭṭhakāya katā guhā. Eseva nayo

original: 295. Anumodanagāthāsu evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Utuvisabhāgavasenāti sītauṇhānaṃ

analyzed: yojetabbam vihāra dānam leṇa attham ca sukha attham ca hoti iti hi atthaḥ idam ti ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: Tesaṃ annañcāti ettha “tesa”nti padaṃ “anucchaviya”nti pāṭhasesena yojetabbanti dassento

original: Muñcapabbajamayanti muñjena ca pabbajena ca kataṃ.

original: “vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā hī”tiādi. Hīti yasmā. Tatrāti aññasmiṃ ṭhāne. Tenāti sambādhaasampajjanakāraṇā.

original: Tatthāti vihāre, vasanto sukhaṃ vasissatīti sambandho. Uddesatthikoti uddesaṃ atthiko,
analyzed: tattha ati vihāre vasantaḥ sukham vasissati iti sambandhaḥ uddesa atthikaḥ ti uddesam atthikaḥ

original: uddesena vā. Kammaṭṭhānasappāyatanti kammaṭṭhānena, kammaṭṭhānassa vā sappāyabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: uddesena vā kammaṭṭhāna sappāya tanti kammaṭṭhānena kammaṭṭhānassa vā sappāya bhāvam

original: Tatthāti aññavihāraṃ. Gacchantena ghaṭṭetabboti sambandho. Ghaṭṭetabbākāraṃ dassento
analyzed: tattha ati añña vihāram gacchantena ghaṭṭetabbo ti sambandhaḥ ghaṭṭetabba ākāram dassento

original: āha “na tatthā”tiādi. Tattha tatthāti sakaṭṭhāne. Kiṃ na vattabbāti āha “tumhe”tiādi.
analyzed: āha na tattha atiādi tattha tattha ati saka ṭṭhāne kim na vattabbā ati āha tumhā itiādi

original: Salākabhattādīni vā yāgukhajjakādīni vā natthi na vijjantīti yojanā. Uposathāgārassa
analyzed: salāka bhatta ādīni vā yāgu khajjaka ādīni vā natthi na vijjanti iti yojanā uposatha āgārassa

original: parikkhāroti sambandho. Tumhākaṃ vihārassa idaṃ tāḷañceva imaṃ sūciñca sampaṭicchathāti
analyzed: parikkhāro ti sambandho tumhākam vihārassa idam tāḷam ca iva imam sūciñca sampaṭicchatha ati

original: yojanā. Gamiyavattanti gamikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ. “Daharehī”ti padaṃ “ukkhipāpetvā”ti
analyzed: yojanā gamiya vattanti gamikānam bhikkhūnam vattam daharehi iti padam ukkhipāpetvā ati

original: ca “gāhāpetvā”ti ca padadvaye kāritakammaṃ, “pattacīvarabhaṇḍikāyo”ti padaṃ “ukkhipāpetvā”ti
analyzed: ca gāhāpetvā iti ca pada dvaye kārita kammam patta cīvara bhaṇḍikāyaḥ iti padam ukkhipāpetvā iti

original: pade dhātukammaṃ, “telanāḷikattaradaṇḍādīnī”ti padaṃ “gāhāpetvā”ti pade dhātukammameva.
analyzed: pade dhātu kammam tela nāḷi kattaradaṇḍa ādīni iti padam gāhāpetvā iti pade dhātu kammam eva

original: Attānaṃ dassentenāti attānaṃ manussānaṃ pakāsentena. Vitakkanti paccayabāhullikavitakkaṃ.
analyzed: attānam dassentena ati attānam manussānam pakāsentena vitakkam ti paccaya bāhullika vitakkam

original: “Saparivāra”nti padaṃ “gacchantañcā”ti pade kiriyāvisesanaṃ. Evañhi sati saparivāraṃ
analyzed: sa parivāram ti padam gacchantam ca ati pade kiriyā visesanam evam hi sati sa parivāram

original: gacchantañcāti sambandho. “Na”nti pade pana kārakavisesanaṃ. Evañhi sati saparivāraṃ
analyzed: gacchantam ca ati sambandhaḥ pade pana kāraka visesanam evam hi sati sa parivāram

original: naṃ bhikkhunti sambandho. “Disvā”ti pade ca kiriyāvisesanameva. Evañhi sati gacchantañca
analyzed: nam bhikkhun ti sambandhaḥ disvā iti pade ca kiriyā visesanam eva evam hi sati gacchantam ca

original: naṃ bhikkhuṃ saparivāraṃ disvāti sambandho. Manussā vadantīti sambandho. Tesūti manussesu.
analyzed: nam bhikkhum sa parivāram disvā iti sambandhaḥ manussāḥ vadanti iti sambandhaḥ tesu iti manussesu

original: Eko paṇḍitamanussoti sambandho. Ayaṃ kālo vassūpanāyikakālo nāmāti yojanā. Yatthāti
analyzed: ekaḥ paṇḍita manussaḥ ti sambandhaḥ ayam kālaḥ vassūpanāyika kālaḥ nāma ati yojanā yattha iti

original: ṭhāne. Tassāti ekassa paṇḍitamanussassa, vacananti sambandho. Te manussā yācantīti
analyzed: ṭhāne tassa ati ekassa paṇḍita manussassa vacananti sambandhaḥ te manussāḥ yācanti iti

original: sambandho. Aññatthāti aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Mejjanti aññamaññaṃ sinehantīti mittā. Sukhadukkhesu
analyzed: sambandhaḥ aññattha ati aññam ṭhānam mejjanti aññam aññam sinehanti iti mittā sukha dukkhesu

original: amā saha vattantīti amaccā. Mittāyeva amaccāti mittāmaccā, te. Sammantayitvāti samaṃ,
analyzed: amā saha vattanti iti amaccā mittāya iva amaccā ati mitta amaccā te sammantayitvā ati samam

original: sammā vā mantayitvā. Idhevāti gāme eva, vihāre eva vā. Kasmā sādituṃ vaṭṭati, nanu
analyzed: sammā vā mantayitvā idhā iva ati gāme eva vihāre eva vā kasmai sāditum vaṭṭati nanu

original: sabbametaṃ akappiyañca sāvajjañcāti āha “sabbañhetaṃ kappiyañceva anavajjañcā”ti.
analyzed: sabbam etam akappiyam ca sa avajjam ca ati āha sabbam ha etam kappiyam ca iva anavajjam ca ati

original: Hi yasmā etaṃ sabbaṃ kappiyañca anavajjañca, tasmā sabbaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: hi yasmai etam sabbam kappiyam ca anavajjam ca tasmai sabbam sāditum vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttanti sambandho. Ubhayampīti mahāaṭṭhakathākurundīsu vuttavacanavasena
analyzed: kurundiyam pana vuttanti sambandhaḥ ubhayam pi iti mahā aṭṭhakathā kurundīsu vutta vacana vasena

original: ubhayampi etaṃ vacananti sambandho.
analyzed: etam sambandhaḥ

original: Āvāsikavattaṃ vitthārento āha “paṭikacceva hī”tiādi. Tattha paṭikaccevāti āgantukānaṃ
analyzed: āvāsika vattam vitthārentaḥ āha paṭikaccā iva hi itiādi tattha paṭikaccā iva ati āgantukānam

original: āgatato paṭhamameva. Padhānagharavihāramaggoti padhānagharamaggo ca vihāramaggo ca.
analyzed: āgatataḥ paṭhamam eva padhāna ghara vihāra maggo ti padhāna ghara maggo ca vihāra maggo ca

original: Muddavedikāyāti cetiyassa hammiyavedikāya. Kasmā idampi sabbaṃ kātabbanti āha “vassaṃ
analyzed: mudda vedikāya ati cetiyassa hammiya vedikāya kasmai idam pi sabbam kātabbanti āha vassam

original: vasitukāmā hī”tiādi. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Vassaṃ vasitukāmā sukhaṃ vasissantīti
analyzed: vasitu kāmā hi itiādi hi iti saccam yasmai vā vassam vasitu kāmā sukham vasissanti iti

original: sambandho. Kataparikammehi āvāsikehīti sambandho. Yato kulato pakatiyā labbhati,
analyzed: sambandhaḥ kata parikammehi āvāsikehi iti sambandhaḥ yatas kulataḥ pakatiyā labbhati

original: tasmiṃ kule vassāvāsikaṃ pucchitabbanti yojanā. Na dinnapubbanti pubbe na dinnaṃ.
analyzed: tasmim kule vassāvāsikam pucchitabbanti yojanā na dinna pubbanti pubbe na dinnam

original: Hīti yasmā. Upaddutāti upagantvā, bhusaṃ vā pīḷitā. Tatthāti manussesu. Yeti manussā.
analyzed: hi iti yasmai upaddutā ati upagantvā bhusam vā pīḷitā tattha ati manussesu ye iti manussā

original: Vassāvāsike gāhiteti vassāvāsike senāsane gāhāpiyamāne. Gāhitabhikkhūnanti gāhāpitabhikkhūnaṃ.
analyzed: vassāvāsike gāhitā iti vassāvāsike senāsane gāhāpiyamāne gāhita bhikkhūnam ti gāhāpita bhikkhūnam

original: Vassāvāsikanti vassaṃ āvasantānaṃ dātabbaṃ cīvaraṃ. Gāhaṇakāloti gāhāpanakālo. Upakaṭṭhoti
analyzed: vassāvāsikam ti vassam āvasantānam dātabbam cīvaram gāhaṇa kālo ti gāhāpana kālo upakaṭṭhaḥ ti

original: āsanno. Chātakādīhīti ādisaddena rogādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Yanti cīvaraṃ. Tatoti cīvarato.
analyzed: āsannaḥ chātaka ādīhi iti ādi saddena roga ādayo saṅgaṇhāti yanti cīvaram tatas ti cīvarataḥ

original: Tanti vacanaṃ. Tadanurūpenāti tesaṃ manussānaṃ vacanassānurūpena. Tesaṃ tesanti manussānaṃ,
analyzed: tat ti vacanam tad anurūpena ati tesam manussānam tesam tesanti manussānam

original: vassāvāsikaṃ cīvaranti sambandho.
analyzed: vassāvāsikam cīvaranti sambandhaḥ

original: Yassāti bhikkhuno. Soti bhikkhu. Iti vadantīti yojanā. Tanti cīvaraṃ. Paṭikkammāti
analyzed: yassa iti bhikkhuno saḥ ti bhikkhu iti vadanti iti yojanā cīvaram paṭikkamma ati

original: paṭikkamitvā. Vihārato apasakkitvāti attho. Tatrāti gāme. Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvāti
analyzed: paṭikkamitvā vihārataḥ apasakkitvā ati attho tatra ati gāme upa nikkhepam ṭhapetvā ati

original: kappiyavatthuṃ vā akappiyavatthuṃ vā ārāmikādīnaṃ hatthe upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā. Vihāreti
analyzed: kappiya vatthum vā akappiya vatthum vā ārāmika ādīnam hatthe upanikkhepam ṭhapetvā vihāreti

original: vihārassa, vihāre vassaṃ vasantassa vā. Apucchitvāpīti pisaddena “pucchitvāpī”ti
analyzed: vihārassa vihāre vassam vasantassa vā a pucchitvā api iti pisaddena pucchitvā api iti

original: atthaṃ dasseti. Tesantikulānaṃ. Vattanti jagganādivattaṃ. Tesanti kulānaṃ. Āgatañca
analyzed: attham dasseti tesanti kulānam vattanti jaggana ādi vattam tesanti kulānam āgatam ca

original: tanti taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ āgatañca vadantīti sambandho. Tenāti paṃsukūlikena. Dātuṃ
analyzed: tanti tam paṃsukūlikam āgatam ca vadanti iti tena ati paṃsukūlikena dātum

original: na icchantīti saṅghassa ācikkhantepi saṅghassa dātuṃ na icchanti. Sabhāgo bhikkhūti
analyzed: na icchanti iti saṅghassa ācikkhante api saṅghassa dātum na icchanti sabhāgaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: attanā sabhāgo bhikkhu. Etanti vassāvāsikaṃ. Paṃsukūlikassa na vaṭṭati, kasmā? Gahapaticīvarattā.
analyzed: attanā sabhāgaḥ bhikkhu vassāvāsikam paṃsukūlikassa na vaṭṭati kasmā gahapati cīvara ttā

original: Itītiādi nigamanaṃ. Saddhādeyyeti saddhāya dātabbe vassāvāsikalābhavisaye.
analyzed: iti itiādi nigamanam saddhā deyyā iti saddhāya dātabbe vassāvāsika lābha visaye

original: Tatruppādeti tasmiṃ vihāre uppajjanakalābhavisaye. Bhaṇḍapaṭicchādananti paṭicchādanacīvarabhaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: tatra uppāda iti tasmin vihāre uppajjanaka lābha visaye bhaṇḍa paṭicchādanam ti paṭicchādana cīvara bhaṇḍam

original: Cīvarabhaṇḍameva hi yasmā anena sarīraṃ paṭicchādiyati, tasmā bhaṇḍapaṭicchādananti
analyzed: cīvara bhaṇḍam eva hi yasmai anena sarīram tasmai

original: vuccati. Gāhethāti bhikkhūhi gāhāpetha. Gāhetabbanti bhikkhūhi gāhāpetabbaṃ. Vatthu
analyzed: vuccati gāhetha ati bhikkhūhi gāhāpetha gāhetabbanti bhikkhūhi gāhāpetabbam vatthu

original: panāti sāṭakato aññaṃ kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā vatthu pana. Kasmā vaṭṭatiyeva, nanu
analyzed: pana ati sāṭakataḥ aññam kappiyam vā akappiyam vā vatthu pana kasmā vaṭṭatiyā iva nanu

original: akappiyavatthu na vaṭṭatīti āha “kappiyakārakānañhi”tiādi. Tattha hi yasmā anuññātaṃ,
analyzed: akappiya vatthu na vaṭṭati iti āha tattha hi yasmai anuññātam

original: tasmā vaṭṭatiyevāti yojanā. Dinnavatthuto uppannanti sambandho.
analyzed: tasmā vaṭṭatiyā iva ati yojanā dinna vatthutaḥ uppannan ti sambandhaḥ

original: Yanti vatthu dinnanti sambandho. Etthāti kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe dinnavatthūsu. Tanti
analyzed: vatthu dinnanti sambandhaḥ ettha ati kappiya kārakānam hatthe dinna vatthūsu tanti

original: vatthu upanāmentehīti sambandho. Garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, garubhaṇḍattā aññesu paccayesu
analyzed: vatthu sambandho garu bhaṇḍam hoti garu bhaṇḍa ttā aññesu paccayesu

original: na upanāmetabbanti adhippāyo. Puggalavasenevāti “bhikkhū cīvarena kilamanti, ettakaṃ
analyzed: na upanāmetabbanti adhippāyaḥ puggala vasena iva ati bhikkhū cīvarena kilamanti ettakam

original: nāma taṇḍulabhāgaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ ruccati saṅghassā”tiādinā puggalaṃ parāmasitvā
analyzed: nāma taṇḍula bhāgam bhikkhūnam cīvaram kātum ruccati saṅghassa ati ādinā puggalam parāmasitvā

original: puggalavaseneva. Saṅghavasenāti “saṅgho cīvarena kilamatī”tiādinā saṅghavasena na
analyzed: puggala vasena iva saṅgha vasena ati saṅghaḥ cīvarena kilamati iti ādinā saṅgha vasena na

original: kātabbanti sambandho. Evaṃ puggalavasena apalokanakammassa akattabbataṃ dassetvā
analyzed: kātabbam ti sambandhaḥ evam puggala vasena apalokana kammassa a kattabba tam dassetvā

original: idāni vatthuvasena tasseva akattabbataṃ dassento āha “jātarūparajatavasenāpī”tiādi.
analyzed: idāni vatthu vasena tassa iva akattabba tam dassentaḥ āha jātarūpa rajata vasena api itiādi

original: Kappiyabhaṇḍavasenāti cīvarataṇḍulehi avasesassa kappiyabhaṇḍassa vasena. Cīvarataṇḍulānañhi
analyzed: kappiya bhaṇḍa vasena ati cīvara taṇḍulehi avasesassa kappiya bhaṇḍassa vasena

original: visuṃ gahitattā “kappiyabhaṇḍavasenā”ti ettha tehi avaseso kappiyabhaṇḍova gahetabbo.
analyzed: visum gahita ttā kappiya bhaṇḍa vasena ati ettha tehi avasesaḥ kappiya bhaṇḍaḥ uva gahetabbo

original: Taṃ panāti apalokanakammaṃ pana. Kattabbākāraṃ dassento āha “idānī”tiādi. Subhikkhanti
analyzed: tam pana ati apalokana kammam pana kattabba ākāram dassentaḥ āha idāni itiādi subhikkhanti

original: samiddhabhikkhaṃ. Sulabhapiṇḍanti sukhena labhapiṇḍaṃ. Dvīhi padehi aññamaññassa
analyzed: samiddha bhikkham sulabha piṇḍanti sukhena labha piṇḍam dvīhi padehi aññamaññassa

original: kāraṇaṃ dasseti, subhikkhattā sulabhapiṇḍaṃ, sulabhapiṇḍattā subhikkhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kāraṇam dasseti subhikkha ttā sulabha piṇḍam sulabha piṇḍa ttā subhikkham ti vuttam hoti

original: Evaṃ cīvarapaccayaṃ sallakkhetvā senāsanaṃ sallakkhetabbanti sambandho. Kāleti gāhāpanassa
analyzed: evam cīvara paccayam sallakkhetvā senāsanam sallakkhetabbanti sambandhaḥ kāle iti gāhāpanassa

original: kāle. Vuttanti mahāaṭṭhakathāya vuttaṃ. Kasmā dve sammannitabbā, nanu ekampi sammannituṃ
analyzed: kāle vuttanti mahā aṭṭhakathāya vuttam kasmā dve sammannitabbā nanu ekam pi sammannitum

original: vaṭṭatīti āha “evañhī”tiādi. Tattha hi yasmā gāhessati, tasmā dve sammannitabbāti
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti āha evam hi itiādi tattha hi yasmai gāhessati tasmai dve sammannitabbā ati

original: yojanā. Ekena hi sammutiladdhena sakkā paraṃ gāhāpetuṃ, attanā pana attano pāpetuṃ
analyzed: yojanā ekena hi sammuti laddhena sakkā param gāhāpetum attanā pana attano

original: na sakkā, tasmā dvīsu sammatesu navako vuḍḍhassa, vuḍḍho ca navakassāti ubho aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: na sakkā tasmai dvīsu sammatesu navakaḥ vuḍḍhassa vuḍḍhaḥ ca navakassa ati ubho aññamaññam

original: gāhessantīti adhippāyo. Sammannitabbāti ekato sammannitabbā. Aṭṭhapi soḷasapīti ettha
analyzed: gāhessanti iti adhippāyaḥ sammannitabbā ti ekatas sammannitabbā aṭṭha api soḷasa api iti ettha

original: pisaddena tato adhikampi ekato sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Sattasatikakkhandhake
analyzed: pi saddena tatas adhikam pi ekatas sammannitum vaṭṭati iti dīpeti sattasatika khandhake

original: ubbāhikasammutiyaṃ aṭṭhapi janā ekatova sammatāti vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ. Niggahakammameva
analyzed: ubbāhika sammutiyam aṭṭha api janāḥ ekatas va sammatā ati vacanam ca ittha sādhakam niggaha kammam eva

original: hi saṅgho saṅghassa na karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesanti aṭṭhasoḷasajanānaṃ, sammuti vaṭṭatiyevāti
analyzed: hi saṅghaḥ saṅghassa na karoti iti daṭṭhabbam tesan ti aṭṭha soḷasa janānam sammuti vaṭṭatiyā iva ati

original: sambandho. Kinti sallakkhetabbanti āha “cetiyaghara”ntiādi.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ kinti sallakkhetabbanti āha cetiya ghara ntiādi

original: Āsanagharanti paṭimāgharaṃ. Maggapokkharaṇīnaṃ samīpe katā sālāyo upacāravasena vuccanti
analyzed: āsana gharam ti paṭimā gharam magga pokkharaṇīnam samīpe katā sā ālāyaḥ upacāra vasena vuccanti

original: “maggo”ti ca “pokkharaṇī”ti ca. Tā hi sālāyo upacārasīmabbhantaragate gāmābhimukhamagge
analyzed: maggo ti ca pokkharaṇī iti ca tā hi upacāra sīma abbhantara gate gāma abhimukha magge

original: ca antoupacārasīmāyaṃ khaṇitā yattha katthaci pokkharaṇiyo ca karīyanti, iti sallakkhetabbanti
analyzed: ca antar upacāra sīmā ayam khaṇitā yattha katthaci pokkharaṇiyaḥ ca iti sallakkhetabbanti

original: yojanā. Asenāsanaṃ dassetvā senāsanaṃ dassento āha “vihāro”tiādi. Rukkhamūlanti channakavāṭabaddharukkhamūlaṃ.
analyzed: yojanāḥ asenāsanam dassetvā senāsanam dassentaḥ āha vihāra utiādi rukkha mūlanti channa kavāṭa baddha rukkha mūlam

original: Eseva nayo veḷugumbepi. Gāhentena ca gāhetabbānīti sambandho. Saṅghikoti tatruppādo.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ veḷu gumbe pi gāhentena ca gāhetabbāni iti sambandhaḥ saṅghikaḥ ti tatruppādaḥ

original: Tesūti dvīsu cīvarapaccayesu. Yanti cīvarapaccayaṃ. Tassāti cīvarapaccayassa. Ṭhitikatoti
analyzed: tesu iti dvīsu cīvara paccayesu yanti cīvara paccayam tassa ati cīvara paccayassa ṭhiti kato ti

original: pabandhavasena ṭhitaṭṭhānato. Itaroti paṭhamaṃ gahitacīvarapaccayato itaro.
analyzed: pabandha vasena ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ itaro ti paṭhamam gahita cīvara paccayato itaro

original: Appatāyāti appabhāvato, gāhiyamāneti sambandho. Pariveṇagghenāti pariveṇaparicchedena.
analyzed: appa tāya ati appa bhāvataḥ gāhiyamānā iti sambandho pariveṇagghena ati pariveṇa paricchedena

original: Labhantīti pariveṇasāmikā bhikkhū labhanti. Tanti pariveṇaṃ. Vijaṭetvāti vijaṭaṃ
analyzed: labhanti iti pariveṇa sāmikāḥ bhikkhū labhanti pariveṇam vijaṭetvā ati vijaṭam

original: katvā, dve vā tayo vā koṭṭhāse katvāti attho. Pakkhipitvāti bhāgakoṭṭhāsaṃ pakkhipitvā.
analyzed: katvā dve vā tayaḥ vā koṭṭhāse katvā ati attho pakkhipitvā ati bhāga koṭṭhāsam pakkhipitvā

original: Na evaṃ kātabbanti yathā mahāsumatthero āha, tathā na kātabbanti attho. Akātabbakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: na evam kātabbanti yathā mahāsuma theraḥ āha tathā na kātabbanti atthaḥ akātabba kāraṇam

original: dassento āha “manussā hī”tiādi. Tatthāti pariveṇe, pavisitabbaṃ iti āhāti yojanā.
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha manussā hi itiādi tattha ati pariveṇe pavisitabbam iti āha ati yojanā

original: Etthāti etasmiṃ gāhaṇaṭṭhāne. Paṭikkosatīti paṭisedheti. Paṭikkosanākāraṃ dassento

original: Upanandavatthukathā

original: gaṇhātīti pādagaṇhano, soyeva pādagaṇhanako. Pādo nāmāti “pādagaṇhanako”ti ettha

original: pādo nāma. Yo lohavārako magadhanāḷiyā pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti, so lohavārako pādo
analyzed: pādaḥ nāma yaḥ loha vārakaḥ magadha nāḷiyā pañca nāḷi mattam gaṇhāti saḥ loha vārakaḥ pādaḥ

original: nāmāti yojanā. Iminā pamāṇassa nāmaṃ pamāṇavante upacārato vohāranayaṃ dasseti. Tatoti
analyzed: nāma ati yojanā iminā pamāṇassa nāmam pamāṇavante upacārataḥ vohāra nayam dasseti tatas ti

original: pañcanāḷimattagaṇhanakavārakato. Imānīti lohakumbhīādīni.
analyzed: imāni iti lohakumbhī ādīni

original: Bhiṅgāra …pe… kaṭacchuādīnīti bhiṅgāro ca paṭiggaho ca uḷuṅko ca dabbi ca kaṭacchu
analyzed: bhiṅgāra pe kaṭacchu ādīni iti bhiṅgāro ca paṭiggahaḥ ca uḷuṅko ca dabbi ca kaṭacchu

analyzed: ca pāti ca taṭṭako ca sarako ca samuggo ca aṅgārakapallaḥ ca dhūmakaṭacchu ca bhiṅgārape

original: dhūmakaṭacchuyo, tā ādi yesaṃ tānīti bhiṅgāra…pe… kaṭacchuādīni. Ādisaddena aññāni
analyzed: tāḥ ādi yesam tāni iti bhiṅgārape kaṭacchu ādīni ādi saddena aññāni

original: upakaraṇāni gahetabbāni. Bhājanīyānīti bhājetabbāni. Kaṃsalohādītiādisaddena vaṭṭalohaṃ
analyzed: upakaraṇāni gahetabbāni bhājanīyāni iti bhājetabbāni kaṃsa loha ādi iti ādi saddena vaṭṭa loham

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Vaṭṭalohaṃ nāma pītalohaṃ. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Pārihāriyanti saṅghikaparibhogaṃ
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti vaṭṭa loham nāma pīta loham hi iti saccam yasmai vā saṅghika paribhogam

original: pariharitvā apanetvā puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjanaṃ, “attasantaka”nti vā pariggahena
analyzed: pariharitvā apanetvā puggalika paribhogena paribhuñjanam atta santakam ti vā pariggahena

original: haritvā bhuñjanaṃ na vaṭṭati. Gihivikaṭanīhārenevāti “gihivikaṭa”nti abhinīhāreneva.
analyzed: haritvā bhuñjanam na vaṭṭati gihi vikaṭa nīhārena iva ati gihi vikaṭanti abhinīhārena iva

original: Aññasmimpi kappiyalohabhaṇḍe pariyāpannā añjanīti yojanā. Atha vā kappiyalohabhaṇḍeti
analyzed: aññasmim pi kappiya loha bhaṇḍe pariyāpannā añjanī iti yojanā atha vā kappiya loha bhaṇḍā iti

original: niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ, “añjanī”tiādinā sambandhitabbaṃ. Sūcīti cīvarādisibbanakā sūci.
analyzed: niddhāraṇe bhummam añjanī iti ādinā sambandhitabbam sūcī iti cīvara ādi sibbanakā sūci

original: Paṇṇasūcīti paṇṇe likhanā sūci. Aññampīti añjaniādito aññampi. Dhūmanettañca phālañca
analyzed: paṇṇa sūci iti paṇṇe likhanā sūci aññam pi iti añjani āditaḥ aññam pi dhūma nettam ca phālam ca

original: dīparukkho ca dīpakapallako ca olambakadīpo ca dhūmanetta…pe… olambakadīpā. Itthipurisatiracchānagatasaṅkhātāni

original: rūpāni etesu atthīti itthipurisatiracchānagatarūpakāni. Dhūmanetta…pe… olambakadīpā
analyzed: rūpāni etesu atthi iti itthi purisa tiracchāna gata rūpakāni dhūma nettape olambaka dīpā

original: ca te itthipurisatiracchānagatarūpakāni ceti dhūmanetta…pe… rūpakāni, visesanaparanipāto.
analyzed: ca te itthi purisa tiracchāna gata rūpakāni ca iti dhūma nettape rūpakāni visesana para nipātaḥ

original: Tāni vā aññāni vā bhitticchadanakavāṭādīsu upanetabbāni lohabhaṇḍānīti sambandho.

original: Lohakhilakanti lohamayaṃ āṇiṃ. Pariharitvāti “attano santaka”nti pariggahena haritvā,
analyzed: lohakhilakam ti loha mayam āṇim pariharitvā ati attanaḥ santakam ti pariggahena haritvā

original: saṅghikaparibhogagihivikaṭāni vā apanetvā. Khīrapāsāṇamayānīti khīravaṇṇena pāsāṇena katāni.

original: Suvaṇṇañca rajatañca hārakūṭañca jātiphalikañca suvaṇṇa…pe… jātiphalikāni, tehi katāni

original: bhājanāni suvaṇṇa…pe… bhājanāni. Sabbanti suvaṇṇarajatādisabbaṃ. Vaṭṭatīti saṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: bhājanāni suvaṇṇape bhājanāni sabbanti suvaṇṇa rajata ādi sabbam vaṭṭati iti saṅgha gaṇa puggalānam vaṭṭati

original: Vāsiādīsu evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā, niddhāraṇe vā bhummaṃ. Yāya vāsiyā

original: na sakkāti sambandho. Tatoti vāsito. Mahattarīsaddo mahantapariyāyo anipphannapāṭipadiko.
analyzed: na sakkā ati sambandho tatoti vāsitaḥ mahattarī saddaḥ mahanta pariyāyaḥ a nipphanna pāṭipadiko

original: Mahattarī vāsīti sambandho. Vejjānanti bhisakkānaṃ. Sirāvedhanapharasupīti pisaddena
analyzed: mahattarī vāsī iti sambandhaḥ bhisakkānam sirāvedhana phara supi iti pi saddena

original: tato mahantaṃ pana pagevāti dasseti. Yā pana kuṭhārī āvudhasaṅkhepena katāti sambandho.
analyzed: tatas mahantam pana pagā iva ati dasseti yā pana kuṭhārī āvudha saṅkhepena katā iti sambandhaḥ

original: Atha vā āvudhasaṅkhepena katā yā pana kuṭhārī atthīti yojanā. Anāmāsāti anāmasitabbā,
analyzed: atha vā āvudha saṅkhepena katā yā pana kuṭhārī atthi iti yojanā anāmāsā ati a āmasitabbā

original: anāmāsārahāti attho. Caturaṅgulamattopīti pisaddo tato adhiko pana pagevāti dasseti.
analyzed: attho catur aṅgula mattaḥ pi iti pisaddo tatas adhikaḥ pana pagā iva ati dasseti

original: Nikhaṇitvā khādatīti nikhādanaṃ. Caturassaṃ mukhametassāti caturassamukhaṃ. Doṇisadisaṃ
analyzed: nikhaṇitvā khādati iti nikhādanam catur assam mukham etassa ati catur assa mukham doṇi sadisam

original: mukhametassāti doṇimukhaṃ. Sammuñcanidaṇḍavedhanampi nikhādanaṃ daṇḍabaddhaṃ hoti
analyzed: mukham etassa ati doṇi mukham sammuñca nidaṇḍa vedhanam pi nikhādanam daṇḍa baddham hoti

original: ceti yojanā. Daṇḍena bandhitabbanti daṇḍabaddhaṃ, daṇḍaṃ baddhametassāti vā daṇḍabaddhaṃ.
analyzed: ca iti yojanā daṇḍena bandhitabbanti daṇḍa baddham daṇḍam baddham etassa ati vā daṇḍa baddham

original: “Adaṇḍaka”nti vatvā tassevatthaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “phalamattamevā”ti. Natthi daṇḍametassāti
analyzed: adaṇḍakam ti vatvā tassa iva attham dassetum vuttam phalam attam eva ati natthi daṇḍam etassa ati

original: adaṇḍakaṃ. Yanti nikhādanaṃ. Pariharitunti puggalikabhāvena pariggahetvā harituṃ,
analyzed: a daṇḍakam yanti nikhādanam pariharitum ti puggalika bhāvena pariggahetvā haritum

original: saṅghikabhāvaṃ apanetuṃ vā. Sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahitaṃ lakkhaṇahāranayena
analyzed: saṅghika bhāvam apanetum vā sikharam pi nikhādanena iva saṅgahitam lakkhaṇa hāra nayena

original: samānakiccabhāvato. Sikharanti yena paribbhamitvā chindanti, yehi manussehi dinnānīti
analyzed: samāna kicca bhāvataḥ sikharanti yena paribbhamitvā chindanti yehi manussehi dinnāni iti

original: sambandho. Teti manussā, vadantīti sambandho. Noti amhākaṃ. Pākatiketi pakatiyā ṭhite,
analyzed: sambandhaḥ te iti manussāḥ vadanti iti sambandhaḥ no ti amhākam pākatikā iti pakatiyā ṭhite

original: yathā paṭhamaṃ ṭhitā honti, tathā karissāmāti attho. Sace āharantīti sace āyācanaṃ

original: akatvā haranti. Anāharantāpīti puna anāharantāpi.
analyzed: a katvā haranti an āharanta api iti punar

original: Kammāro ca taṭṭakāro ca cundakāro ca naḷakāro ca maṇikāro ca pattabandhako ca kammāra…pe…
analyzed: kammāro ca taṭṭakāro ca cundakāro ca naḷakāro ca maṇikāro ca pattabandhako ca kammārape

analyzed: pattabandhakā tesam adhikaraṇī ca muṭṭhiko ca saṇḍāso ca tulā ca

analyzed: tulā saṅghe dinna kālato ti saṅghassa dinna kālato tipum chindati anena ati tipu chedanam

original: tameva satthakaṃ tipucchedanasatthakaṃ. Mahākattariñca mahāsaṇḍāsañca mahāpipphilikañca
analyzed: tam eva satthakam tipucchedana satthakam mahā kattarin ca mahā saṇḍāsan ca mahā pipphilikan ca

original: ṭhapetvāti yojanā. Kasmā ṭhapitānīti āha “mahākattariādīni garubhaṇḍānī”ti. Tattha
analyzed: ṭhapetvā iti yojanā kasmā ṭhapitāni iti āha mahākattari ādīni garubhaṇḍāni iti

analyzed: mahākattari ādīni tasmai ṭhapetvā mahākattari nti ādi mayā vuttanti yojanā

original: Valliādīsu evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Vettavalliādikāti vettasaṅkhātavalliādikā. Aḍḍhabahuppamāṇāti ettha –

original: “Byāmo sahakarā bāhu, dvepassadvayavitthatā”ti. –
analyzed: saha karā

original: Abhidhāne (abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ 269 gāthāyaṃ) vuttattā bāhu nāma idha byāmova adhippeto.
analyzed: abhidhāne abhidhāna ppadīpikāyam gāthāyam vutta ttā bāhu nāma idha byāmaḥ uva adhippeto

original: Tasmā dvīsu passesu vitthatānaṃ byāmasaṅkhātānaṃ sahakarānaṃ dvinnaṃ bāhūnaṃ aḍḍhoti

original: vallīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthajātakāti tissaṃ saṅghassa bhūmiyaṃ jātakā. Rakkhitagopitāti
analyzed: vallī iti vuttam hoti tattha jātakā ti tissam saṅghassa bhūmiyam jātakā rakkhita gopitā ti

analyzed: saṅghena sayam rakkhitā parehi gopitā iminā a rakkhita a gopitā garu bhaṇḍam na hoti iti

original: dasseti. Sāti valli. Atirekā hotīti sambandho. Upanetunti taṃ valliṃ upanetuṃ. Suttañca
analyzed: dasseti sā ati valli atirekā hoti iti sambandhaḥ upanetum ti tam vallim upanetum suttam ca

original: makacivākañca nāḷikerahīrañca cammañca sutta…pe… cammāni, tehi katā sutta…pe… cammamayā.
analyzed: maka civākañca nāḷikera hīrañca cammañca suttape cammāni tehi katā suttape camma mayā

original: Rajjukā vā yottāni vā garubhaṇḍaṃ hotīti sambandho. Ekavaṭṭā vā dvivaṭṭā vāti ettha
analyzed: rajjukā vā yottāni vā garu bhaṇḍam hoti iti sambandhaḥ eka vaṭṭā vā dvi vaṭṭā vā ati ettha

original: vāsaddena tivaṭṭādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ suttañca avaṭṭetvā dinnā makacivākanāḷikerahīrā cāti yojanā.
analyzed: vā saddena tivaṭṭa ādim saṅgaṇhāti avaṭṭetvā dinnam suttam ca avaṭṭetvā dinnā maka civāka nāḷikera hīrā ca ati yojanā

original: Yo koci veḷūti sambandho. Sopīti veḷupi vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Pisaddena valliṃ apekkhati.
analyzed: yaḥ koci veḷū ti sambandhaḥ saḥ api iti veḷupi vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ pi saddena vallim apekkhati

original: Idametthāti idaṃ sabbaṃ ettha veḷumhi, veḷūsu vā idanti sambandho. Samakaṃ vāti gahitaveḷunā
analyzed: idam ettha ati idam sabbam ettha veḷumhi veḷūsu vā idam iti sambandhaḥ samakam vā ati gahita veḷunā

original: samappamāṇaṃ vā. Atirekaṃ vāti tato atirekaṃ vā. Taṃagghanakanti tassa veḷuno agghanārahaṃ.
analyzed: sama ppamāṇam vā atirekam vā ati tatas atirekam vā taṃagghanakam ti tassa veḷunaḥ agghana araham

original: Phātikammanti vaḍḍhikammaṃ. Tatthevāti gaṇhanaṭṭhāneva. Gamanakāleti gaṇhanaṭṭhānato
analyzed: phātikammanti vaḍḍhi kammam tattha eva āti gaṇhana ṭhāna iva gamana kāle iti gaṇhana ṭṭhānataḥ

original: aññattha gamanakāle. “Pahiṇitvā dātabbo”ti iminā sayaṃ vā āgantvā dātabboti atthopi
analyzed: aññattha gamana kāle pahiṇitvā dātabbaḥ ti iminā sayam vā āgantvā dātabbaḥ ti atthaḥ api

original: lakkhaṇahāranayena gahetabbo samānakiccattā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa hāra nayena gahetabbo samāna kicca ttā

original: Muñjapabbajasaddena muñjapabbajatiṇānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ gahitattā tiṇasaddena tāni
analyzed: muñja pabbaja saddena muñja pabbaja tiṇānam pāḷiyam visum gahita ttā tiṇa saddena tāni

original: ṭhapetvā pārisesañāyena avasesatiṇameva gahetabbanti dassento āha “muñjaṃ pabbajañca
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pārisesa ñāyena avasesa tiṇam eva gahetabbanti dassentaḥ āha muñjam pabbajam ca

original: ṭhapetvā”tiādi. Samānaphalattā lakkhaṇahāranayena paṇṇampi tiṇeneva saṅgahitanti
analyzed: ṭhapetvā atiādi samāna phalattā lakkhaṇa hāra nayena paṇṇam pi tiṇena iva saṅgahitan ti

original: dassento āha “yatthā”tiādi. Tattha yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne, itīti evaṃ. Tiṇañca garubhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha yattha atiādi tattha yattha ati yasmin ṭhāne iti iti evam tiṇam ca garubhaṇḍam

original: hotīti sambandho. Tatthajātakaṃ vāti tasmiṃ saṅghārāme jātakaṃ vā. Bahārāmeti saṅghārāmato
analyzed: hoti iti sambandho tattha jātakam vā ati tasmin saṅgha ārāme jātakam vā bahārāma iti saṅgha ārāmataḥ

original: bahi. Tampīti tiṇampi. Pisaddena valliveḷū apekkhati. Aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopīti dīghato
analyzed: bahi tam pi iti tiṇam pi pi saddena valli veḷū apekkhati aṭṭha aṅgula ppamāṇaḥ api iti dīghataḥ

original: aṭṭhaṅgulapamāṇopi. Rittapotthakoti alikhitattā tuccho makacivatthādikopi paṇṇamayopi
analyzed: aṭṭha aṅgula pamāṇaḥ api tucchaḥ maka civattha ādikaḥ api paṇṇa mayaḥ api

original: potthako. Idañca paṇṇapasaṅgena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: potthakaḥ idam ca paṇṇa pasaṅgena vuttam

original: Pañcavaṇṇā vāti nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhavasena pañcavaṇṇanā vā. Tampīti mattikampi. Pisaddena valliveḷutiṇāni apekkhati.
analyzed: pañca vaṇṇā vā ati nīla pīta lohita udāta mañjiṭṭha vasena pañca vaṇṇanā vā tampi iti mattikampi pi saddena valli veḷu tiṇāni apekkhati

original: Dārubhaṇḍe evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Rakkhitagopito yo koci dārubhaṇḍako atthīti yojanā. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttoti sambandho.
analyzed: dāru bhaṇḍe evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbo ti yojanā rakkhita gopitaḥ yaḥ koci dāru bhaṇḍakaḥ atthi iti yojanā mahā aṭṭhakathā ayam pana vuttaḥ ti sambandho

original: Tatrāti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, “tena kho pana samayenā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vā. Imesūti āsandikādīsu.
analyzed: tatra ati mahā aṭṭhakathāyam tena kho pana samayena ati pāḷiyam vā imesu uti āsandika ādīsu

original: Etthāti pīṭhesu, palālapīṭhenāti sambandho. Byagghacammaonaddhanti byagghacammena
analyzed: ettha ati pīṭhesu palāla pīṭhena ati sambandhaḥ byaggha cammaonaddhanti byaggha cammena

original: avanaddhaṃ. Vāḷarūpaparikkhittanti vāḷarūpehi parivāritaṃ. Ratanaparisibbitanti ratanasuttena samantato sibbitaṃ.
analyzed: avanaddham vāḷarūpa parikkhittanti vāḷarūpehi parivāritam ratana parisibbitanti ratana suttena samantataḥ sibbitam

original: Etesupīti vaṅkaphalakādīsupi. “Saṅkhathālakaṃ pana bhājanīya”nti pāṭhassānantaraṃ
analyzed: etesu pi iti vaṅka phalaka ādīsu pi saṅkhathālakam pana

original: “tathā”ti pāṭho atthi, so ettha na yujjati, parato pana “yena kenaci kataṃ garubhaṇḍamevā”ti
analyzed: tathā iti pāṭhaḥ atthi saḥ ettha na yujjati paratas pana yena kenacid katam garu bhaṇḍam eva ati

original: pāṭhassānantaraṃ yujjati. Tattha hi yathā yena kenaci kataṃ garubhaṇḍameva hoti,

original: Gahetvā āgatā te manussāti yojanā. Tesanti mahātherādīnaṃ. Daharasāmaṇerehīti daharehi sāmaṇerehi, laddhesūti sambandho.
