original: Tatthāti uddesabhatte. Puratoti mahātherānaṃ purato. Patteti saṅghuddesapatte, agāhiteyevāti sambandho. Āhaṭampi uddesabhattanti sambandho.
analyzed: tattha ati uddesa bhatte puratas ti mahā therānam puratas pattā iti saṅgha uddesa patte agāhitā iya iva ati sambandhaḥ āhaṭam pi uddesa bhattam iti sambandhaḥ

original: Eko vadatīti sambandho. Soti manusso, bhaṇatīti sambandho. Yathā te ruccati, tathā
analyzed: ekaḥ vadati iti sambandhaḥ saḥ ti manussaḥ bhaṇati iti sambandhaḥ yathā te ruccati tathā

original: vatvā āharāti yojanā. Vissaṭṭhadūto nāmāti attano ruciṃ vissajjitvā tassa ruciyā
analyzed: vatvā āharāti yojanā vissaṭṭha dūtaḥ nāma ati attanaḥ rucim vissajjitvā tassa ruciyā

original: vissaṭṭho dūto nāma. Paṭipāṭipattaṃ vāti saṅghato paṭipāṭiyā laddhaṃ pattaṃ vā, idaṃ
analyzed: vissaṭṭhaḥ dūtaḥ nāma paṭipāṭi pattam vāti saṅghataḥ paṭipāṭiyā laddham pattam vā idam

original: nimantanabhattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ icchatīti vissaṭṭhadūto yaṃ icchati. Soti bālo,
analyzed: nimantana bhattam sandhāya vuttam yam icchati iti vissaṭṭha dūtaḥ yam icchati saḥ ti bālaḥ

original: na vattabboti sambandho. Pucchāsabhāgena vadeyyāti sambandho. Tatoti vadanakāraṇā.
analyzed: na vattabbo ti sambandho pucchā sabhāgena vadeyya ati sambandho tatas ti vadana kāraṇā

original: Kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāmāti aññehi uddesabhattehi missetvā ujukaṭṭhitikāya pavattitvā kūṭena
analyzed: kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāma ati aññehi uddesa bhattehi missetvā ujuka ṭṭhitikāya pavattitvā kūṭena

original: pavattā ṭhitikā nāma hoti. Tamevatthaṃ vitthārento āha “rañño vā hī”tiādi. Ekacārikabhattānīti
analyzed: pavattā ṭhitikā nāma hoti tam eva attham vitthārentaḥ āha raññaḥ vā hi itiādi ekacārika bhattāni iti

original: pati ekaṃ katvā caritabbāni bhakkhitabbānīti ekacārikāni, aññehi uddesabhattehi amissetvā
analyzed: pati ekam katvā caritabbāni bhakkhitabbāni iti ekacārikāni aññehi uddesabhattehi a missetvā

original: pati ekaṃ katvā bhakkhitabbānīti vuttaṃ hoti, tāniyeva bhattāni ekacārikabhattāni.
analyzed: ekam katvā bhakkhitabbāni iti vuttam hoti tāniyeva bhattāni ekacārika bhattāni

original: Ekacce bhikkhū gatāti sambandho. Tesūti ekaccesu bhikkhūsu. Taṅkhaṇaṃyevāti tasmiṃ
analyzed: ekacce bhikkhū gatā ati sambandhaḥ tesu iti ekaccesu bhikkhūsu taṅkhaṇam yeva ati tasmin

original: nisinnakkhaṇeyeva. Puna taṅkhaṇaṃyevāti tasmiṃ gāhaṇakkhaṇeyeva. “Paṇītabhatta”nti
analyzed: nisinna kkhaṇe yeva puna taṅkhaṇaṃyeva ati tasmin gāhaṇa kkhaṇe yeva paṇīta bhattanti

original: vutte “kativassato paṭṭhāyā”ti vadanti, “ettakavassato nāmā”ti vutteti yojanā. Gāhiteti
analyzed: vutte kati vassataḥ paṭṭhāya iti vadanti ettaka vassataḥ nāma ati vuttā iti yojanā gāhitā iti

original: ṭhitikaṃ ajānantehi āgantukehi patte gāhite. Āgatehipi ṭhitikaṃ jānanakabhikkhūhīti
analyzed: ṭhitikam a jānantehi āgantukehi patte gāhite āgatehi pi ṭhitikam jānanaka bhikkhūhi iti

original: sambandho. Eseva nayo paratopi. Bhikkhūyeva āgacchantūti pattaṃ aggahetvā bhikkhūyeva
analyzed: sambandhaḥ esa iva nayaḥ paratas pi bhikkhūya iva āgacchantu iti pattam aggahetvā bhikkhūya iva

original: āgacchantūti adhippāyo.
analyzed: āgacchantu iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Neti ṭhitikaṃ ajānante āgantuke. Rājā bhojetvāti rājā attano gehe bhojetvā. Nesanti
analyzed: na iti ṭhitikam a jānante āgantuke rājā bhojetvā ati rājā attanaḥ gehe bhojetvā na isanti

original: āgantukānaṃ, pattepīti sambandho. Yaṃ āhaṭanti yaṃ bhattaṃ abhuñjitvā āhaṭaṃ. Taṃ
analyzed: āgantukānam patte pi iti sambandhaḥ yam āhaṭanti yam bhattam a bhuñjitvā āhaṭam tam

original: na gāhetabbanti taṃ bhattaṃ ṭhitikāya na gāhetabbaṃ thokattā. Nesanti āgantukānaṃ.
analyzed: na gāhetabbanti tam bhattam ṭhitikāya na gāhetabbam thokattā na īsanti āgantukānam

original: Gīvā hotīti iṇaṃ hoti. Iṇaṃ nāma paṭidātabbasabhāvo hoti, tasmā paṭidātabbanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: gīvā hoti iti iṇam hoti iṇam nāma paṭidātabba sabhāvaḥ hoti tasmā paṭidātabbanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Etthāti ṭhitikaṃ ajānitvā bhuttaṭṭhāne. Tāva nisīditabbanti tāva āgametvā nisīditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ati ṭhitikam a jānitvā bhutta ṭṭhāne tāva nisīditabbanti tāva āgametvā nisīditabbaṃ

original: Pattaṭṭhānena gāhaṇampi gīvāsadisoti purimatherassa mati bhaveyya. Evañhi sati dvinnaṃ
analyzed: patta ṭṭhānena gāhaṇam pi gīvā sadisaḥ ti purima therassa mati bhaveyya evam hi sati dvinnam

original: therānaṃ vādo sadisoyeva.
analyzed: vādaḥ

original: Eko piṇḍapātoti sambandho. Tathārūpoti ticīvaraparivāro satagghanako. Ayanti piṇḍapāto. Iti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu.
analyzed: ekaḥ piṇḍapāto ti sambandho tathārūpo ti ti cīvara parivāro sata ghanakaḥ ayanti piṇḍapāto iti vuttam aṭṭhakathāsu

original: Eko bhikkhūti sambandho. Antarābhaṭṭhakoti uddesabhattassa antare vemajjhe bhassati
analyzed: ekaḥ bhikkhu iti sambandhaḥ antarābhaṭṭhako ti uddesa bhattassa antare vemajjhe bhassati

original: galatīti antarābhaṭṭhako. Paripuṇṇavasso yo pana sāmaṇeroti yojanā. Tassa upasampajjitasāmaṇerassa
analyzed: galati iti antarābhaṭṭhakaḥ paripuṇṇa vassaḥ yaḥ pana sāmaṇeraḥ ti yojanā tassa upasampajjita sāmaṇerassa

original: ṭhitikā atikkantāti sambandho. Soti uddesabhattapatto bhikkhu. Samīpeti attano samīpe.
analyzed: ṭhitikā atikkantā ati sambandho saḥ ti uddesa bhatta patto bhikkhu samīpe ti attanaḥ samīpe

original: Tañce theyyāya harantīti taṃ pattaṃ pattahārakā theyyāya haranti ce. Gīvā hotīti
analyzed: tam ce theyyāya haranti iti tam pattam patta hārakāḥ theyyāya haranti ce gīvā hoti iti

original: pattadāpakassa gīvā hoti. So bhikkhūti samīpe nisinno so bhikkhu. Assāti pattadāpakassa.
analyzed: patta dāpakassa gīvā hoti so bhikkhu iti samīpe nisinnaḥ saḥ bhikkhu assa ati patta dāpakassa

original: “Aya”nti potthakesu pāṭho atthi, so na sundaro. Tatoti uddesabhattagharato. “Suhaṭo”ti
analyzed: ayanti potthakesu pāṭhaḥ atthi saḥ na sundaraḥ uddesa bhatta gharato su haṭaḥ iti

original: vacanassa atthaṃ dassento āha “bhattassa dinnattā gīvā na hotī”ti.
analyzed: vacanassa attham dassentaḥ āha bhattassa dinnattā gīvā na hoti iti

original: Sādiyanakoti uddesabhattasādiyanako, hotīti sambandho. Dasahipi pattehi bhattaṃ āharāpetvāti
analyzed: sādiyanakaḥ ti uddesa bhatta sādiyanakaḥ hoti iti sambandhaḥ dasahi api pattehi bhattam āharāpetvā ati

original: yojanā. Bhikkhudattiyaṃ nāmāti bhikkhunā dattiyaṃ nāma. So bhikkhūti sādiyanako so
analyzed: yojanā bhikkhudattiyam nāma ati bhikkhunā dattiyam nāma saḥ bhikkhu iti sādiyanakaḥ so

original: bhikkhu. Te bhikkhūti piṇḍapātike te bhikkhū. Etha bhante mayhaṃ sahāyā hotha iti
analyzed: bhikkhu te bhikkhū iti piṇḍapātike te bhikkhū etha bhante mayham sahāyāḥ hotha iti

original: vatvāti sambandho. Tassāti upāsakassa. Tatthāti upāsakassa ghare. Tassevāti sādiyanakasseva.
analyzed: vatvā iti sambandhaḥ tassa ati upāsakassa tattha ati upāsakassa ghare tassa iva ati sādiyanakassa iva

original: Itareti navapiṇḍapātikā. Nesanti dasannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ. Tassa bhikkhunoti sādiyanakassa
analyzed: itare iti nava piṇḍapātikāḥ na īsanti dasannam bhikkhūnam tassa bhikkhuno ti sādiyanakassa

original: bhikkhuno. Bhuttāvīnanti bhuttavantānaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhunaḥ bhuttāvīnam ti bhuttavantānam

original: Teti navapiṇḍapātikā, vuttā gacchantīti sambandho. Tatthāti upāsakassa ghare. Tatrāti
analyzed: tā iti nava piṇḍapātikāḥ vuttāḥ gacchanti iti sambandhaḥ tattha ati upāsakassa ghare tatra ati

original: dasasu bhikkhūsu. Madhurena sarena anumodanaṃ karontassa ekassa dhammakathaṃ sutvāti
analyzed: dasasu bhikkhūsu madhurena sarena anumodanam karontassa ekassa dhamma katham sutvā ati

original: yojanā. Akatabhāgo nāmāti pubbe na kariyitthāti akato, soyeva bhāgo koṭṭhāsoti akatabhāgo,
analyzed: yojanā akatabhāgaḥ nāma ati pubbe na kariyittha ati akataḥ saḥ yeva bhāgo koṭṭhāso ti akatabhāgo

original: āgantukabhāgo nāmāti attho.
analyzed: āgantuka bhāgaḥ nāma ati attho

original: Eko upāsako detīti sambandho. Imanti khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ. Pattasāmikassa dātabbanti
analyzed: ekaḥ upāsakaḥ deti iti sambandhaḥ imanti khādanīya bhojanīyam patta sāmikassa dātabbanti

original: yojanā. Ṭhapetvāti pakatiyā ṭhapetvā. “Sabbo saṅgho bhuñjatū”ti vatvā ca kiñci avatvā
analyzed: yojanā ṭhapetvā ti pakatiyā ṭhapetvā sabbo saṅghaḥ bhuñjatu iti vatvā ca kiñci a vatvā

original: ca gatepi paṭhamameva “sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ pattaṃ dethā”ti vuttattā bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca gate api paṭhamam eva sabbam saṅghikam pattam detha ati vutta ttā bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbam

original: Pātiyā āharitvāti sambandho. Ekekaṃ ālopanti ekekassa bhikkhussa ekekaṃ ālopaṃ. Acchatīti
analyzed: pātiyāḥ āharitvā iti sambandhaḥ ekekam ālopam ti ekekassa bhikkhussa ekekam ālopam acchati iti

original: vasati. Kassa teti kassa atthāya tayā, ānītanti yojanā. “Ekena bhikkhunā”ti padaṃ
analyzed: vasati kassa te ti kassa atthāya tayā ānītanti yojanā ekena bhikkhunā ati padam

original: “gāhetabba”nti pade kāritakammaṃ, “bhatta”nti dhātukammaṃ tabbapaccayo vadati.
analyzed: gāhetabbanti pade kārita kammam bhattanti dhātu kammam tabba paccayaḥ vadati

original: Kiṃ āharīyatīti avatvāti kiṃ vatthu tayā āharītīti upāsakaṃ apucchitvā. “Kiṃ āharissasī”tipi
analyzed: kim āharīyati iti a vatvā ati kim vatthu tayā āharīti iti upāsakam a pucchitvā kim āharissasi iti pi

original: pāṭho, kiṃ vatthuṃ tvaṃ āharissasīti attho. Saparivārāya yāguyā ca mahagghānaṃ phalānañca
analyzed: kim vatthum tvam āharissasi iti sa parivārāya ca

original: paṇītānaṃ khajjakānañca tathā āveṇikā ṭhitikā kātabbāti yojanā. Ekā eva ṭhitikāti
analyzed: paṇītānam khajjakānam ca tathā āveṇikā ṭhitikā kātabbā ati yojanā ekā eva ṭhitikā ati

original: samānā eva ṭhitikā. Tathā phāṇitassāti ettha tathāsaddena “ekā eva ṭhitikā vaṭṭatī”ti padaṃ atidisati.
analyzed: samānā eva ṭhitikā tathā phāṇitassa ati ettha tathā saddena ekā eva ṭhitikā vaṭṭati iti padam atidisati

original: Iti uddesabhattakathāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti yojanā samattā

original: Nimantanabhattakathā
analyzed: nimantana bhatta kathā

original: Nimantanaṃ puggalikaṃ saṅghikañcāti duvidhaṃ. Tattha puggalikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “puggalikaṃ
analyzed: nimantanam puggalikam saṅghikam ca ati duvidham tattha puggalikam sandhāya vuttam puggalikam

original: ce sayameva issaro”ti. “Ettake bhikkhū saṅghato uddisathā”tiādīni avatvā “ettakānaṃ
analyzed: ce sayam eva issaroti ettake bhikkhū saṅghataḥ uddisatha atiādīni avatvā ettakānam

original: bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ nimantanaṃ nāma. Etthāti
analyzed: bhikkhūnam bhattam gaṇhatha ati nimantetvā dinnam saṅghikam nimantanam nāma ettha ati

original: nimantane. Piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭatīti “bhikkha”nti kappiyavohārena vuttattā piṇḍapātikānampi
analyzed: nimantane piṇḍapātikānam pi vaṭṭati iti bhikkhanti kappiya vohārena vutta ttā piṇḍapātikānam pi

original: vaṭṭati. Paṭipāṭiyāti saṅghato laddhapaṭipāṭiyā. Āgatamanusso vadatīti sambandho.
analyzed: vaṭṭati paṭipāṭiyā ati saṅghataḥ laddha paṭipāṭiyā āgata manussaḥ vadati iti sambandho

original: Vicchinditvāti “tumhe ca gacchathā”ti vacanaṃ vicchinditvā.
analyzed: vicchinditvā ati tumhe ca gacchatha ati vacanam vicchinditvā

original: Nimantanabhattagharatoti nimantanabhattassa dinnagharato. Eko āharatīti sambandho. Pūretvāti bhattassa pūretvā. Tanti bhattaṃ. Idhāpīti nimantanepi.
analyzed: nimantana bhatta gharataḥ ti nimantana bhattassa dinna gharataḥ ekaḥ āharati iti sambandho pūretvā iti bhattassa pūretvā bhattam idha api iti nimantane pi

original: Tatoti vadanakāraṇā. “So bhikkhū”ti padaṃ “assā”ti pade pakatikattā, “jigucchanīyo”ti
analyzed: tatas ti vadana kāraṇā so bhikkhu iti padam assa ati pade pakatikattā jigucchanīyaḥ ti

original: padaṃ tattheva vikatikattā. Assāti bhaveyya, hoti vā. “Pattatthāya āgatomhī”ti vadantassa
analyzed: padam tattha iva vikatikattā assa ati bhaveyya hoti vā pattatthāya āgataḥ mhi iti vadantassa

original: tassa patto dātabboti yojanā. Bhattāharaṇakapattanti bhattaṃ āharati anenāti bhattāharaṇako,
analyzed: tassa pattaḥ dātabbaḥ iti yojanā bhatta āharaṇaka pattam ti bhattam āharati anena ati bhattāharaṇakaḥ

original: soyeva patto bhattāharaṇakapatto, taṃ. Paṭipāṭibhattanti paṭipāṭiyā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ yā iva pattaḥ bhatta āharaṇaka patto tam paṭipāṭi bhattam ti paṭipāṭiyā laddham bhattam

original: Ālopabhattaṭṭhitikatoti ekekaālopena laddhassa bhattassa ṭhitikato. Ālopasaṅkhepenāti
analyzed: ālopa bhatta ṭṭhitikato ti ekeka ālopena laddhassa bhattassa ṭhitikato ālopa saṅkhepena ati

original: ekekasmiṃ ālope taṃsaṃkhipanena. Ayaṃ nayo uddesabhattato viseso. Kassa te ābhatanti
analyzed: eka ekasmin ālope tad saṃkhipanena ayam nayaḥ uddesa bhattataḥ visesaḥ kassa te

analyzed: kassa atthāya tayā ābhatanti yojanā saṅghassa me bhattanti saṅghassa atthāya mayā

original: bhattaṃ ābhataṃ. Therānaṃ me bhattanti therānaṃ mayā bhattaṃ ābhataṃ.
analyzed: bhattam ābhatam therānam me therānam mayā bhattam ābhatam

original: Upāsako pahiṇātīti sambandho. Ime tayo janāti saṅghatthero ca ganthadhutaṅgavasena
analyzed: upāsakaḥ pahiṇāti iti sambandhaḥ ime tayaḥ ca gantha dhutaṅga vasena

original: abhiññāto ca bhattuddesako cāti ime tayo janā. Pucchitunti “kiṃ saṅghato gaṇhāmi,
analyzed: abhiññāto ca bhattuddesako ca ati ime tayo janā pucchitunti kim saṅghataḥ gaṇhāmi

original: udāhu ye jānāmi, tehi saddhiṃ āgacchāmī”ti pucchituṃ. Āruhiyitthāti ārūḷhā. Attanavamehīti
analyzed: udāhu ye jānāmi tehi saddhim āgacchāmi iti pucchitum āruhiyittha ati ārūḍhāḥ atta navamehi iti

original: attā navamo etesanti attanavamā, tehi bhikkhūhīti sambandho. Hīti yasmā. Ete bhikkhūti
analyzed: attā navamaḥ etesanti atta navamā tehi bhikkhūhi iti sambandhaḥ hi iti yasmai ete bhikkhū ti

original: saṅghattherādayo tayo ete bhikkhū. Tenāti ganthadhutaṅgādīhi anabhiññātena bhikkhunā
analyzed: saṅgha thera ādayaḥ tayo ete bhikkhū tena ati gantha dhutaṅga ādīhi anabhiññātena bhikkhunā

original: paṭipajjitabbanti sambandho. Nissitake vā, ye bhikkhū jānātha, te bhikkhū vā gahetvāti
analyzed: paṭipajjitabbanti sambandhaḥ nissitake vā ye bhikkhū jānātha te bhikkhū vā gahetvā ati

original: yojanā. Attanā añño gāmo gantabboti sambandho. Soyeva gāmoti nimantanagāmoyeva.
analyzed: yojanā attanā aññaḥ gāmaḥ gantabbo ti sambandho saḥ yā iva gāmaḥ ti nimantana gāmaḥ yā iva

original: Tatrāti asanasālāyaṃ. Ussavādīsūti chaṇādīsu. Ādisaddena aññena kenaci kāraṇena manussānaṃ
analyzed: tatra ati asana sālāyam ussava ādīsu iti chaṇa ādīsu ādi saddena aññena kenacid kāraṇena manussānam

original: bahusannipātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tadāti tasmiṃ nimantanakāle. Sannipātaṭṭhānatoti bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: bahu sannipātam saṅgaṇhāti tadā ti tasmin nimantana kāle sannipāta ṭṭhānato ti bhikkhūnam

original: sannipātaṭṭhānato. Yathāsattīti sattiyā anurūpaṃ, sattiṃ anatikkamitvāti attho. Ettha
analyzed: sannipāta ṭṭhānataḥ yathāsatti iti sattiyāḥ anurūpam sattim an atikkamitvā iti atthaḥ ettha

original: ca sattisaddassa kuntasaṅkhātassa satthassapi vācakattā taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “yathābala”nti.
analyzed: ca satti saddassa kunta saṅkhātassa satthassa api vācaka ttā tam paṭikkhipantaḥ āha yathābalam ti

original: Saṅghatthero vā āgacchantīti sambandho. Bahukattāramapekkhitvā “āgacchantī”ti bahuvacanavasena
analyzed: saṅgha ttheraḥ vā āgacchanti iti sambandhaḥ bahu kattāram apekkhitvā āgacchanti iti bahuvacana vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Ekavāranti ekasmiṃ divase, āgamanadivaseti attho. Paṭibaddhakālatoti tattheva
analyzed: vuttam eka vāram ti ekasmin divase āgamana divase ti attho paṭibaddha kālato ti tattha eva

original: sakaṭṭhāne vāsassa nibaddhakālato. Dutiyavāreti dutiyadivase. Abhinavaāgantukāvāti
analyzed: saka ṭṭhāne vāsassa nibaddha kālataḥ dutiya vāra iti dutiya divase abhinava āgantuka avāti

original: anāgamanapubbā abhinavā āgantukāva. Tatrāti tasmiṃ pattaṭṭhāne. Tesanti abhinavaāgantukānaṃ.
analyzed: an āgamana pubbāḥ abhinavāḥ āgantukāḥ ava tatra ati tasmin patta ṭṭhāne tesanti abhinava āgantukānam

original: Etthāti anāgatapubbaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: ettha āti anāgata pubbaṭṭhāne

original: Sabbatthāti sabbesu sakaṭṭhānaāgantukaṭṭhānesu. Tenāti atilābhinā bhikkhunā. Avisesetvāti visesamakatvā.
analyzed: sabbattha āti sabbesu saka ṭṭhāna āgantuka ṭṭhānesu tena ati ati lābhinā bhikkhunā avisesetvā ati visesam a katvā

original: Salākabhattakathā
analyzed: salākabhatta kathā

original: Salākabhattaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbanti yojanā. “Vacanato”ti padaṃ “dātabbā”ti pade
analyzed: salākabhattam pana evam veditabbanti yojanā vacanato ti padam dātabbā ati pade

original: ñāpakahetu. Salākāya vāti kusadaṇḍe vā. Asukassa nāmāti asukassa nāma upāsakassa.
analyzed: ñāpaka hetu salākāya vā ati kusa daṇḍe vā asukassa nāma ati asukassa nāma upāsakassa

original: Upanibandhitvāti likhitvā, chinditvāti attho. “Opuñjitvā”ti padassa atthaṃ dassento
analyzed: upanibandhitvā ti likhitvā chinditvā ati atthaḥ opuñjitvā iti padassa attham dassento

original: āha “punappunaṃ heṭṭhupariyavasena āloḷetvā”ti. Bhattuddesakena dātabbāti sambandho.
analyzed: āha punappunam heṭṭhu pariya vasena āloḷetvā iti bhattuddesakena dātabbā ati sambandho

original: Na bahukāti appakā. Gāmavasenapīti yebhuyyena samānalābhagāmavasenapi. Pisaddena
analyzed: na bahukā ati appakā gāma vasena api iti yebhuyyena samāna lābha gāma vasena api pi saddena

original: kulaṃ apekkhati. Gāhentena gāhitānevāti sambandho. Saṭṭhisalākabhattāni hontīti yojanā.
analyzed: kulam apekkhati gāhentena gāhitān eva ati sambandhaḥ saṭṭhi salāka bhattāni honti iti yojanā

original: Tesanti dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ salākabhattānaṃ.
analyzed: tesanti dvinnam tiṇṇam salākabhattānam

original: Tanti bahusalākabhattagāmaṃ. Taṃ panāti ekasalākabhattaṃ pana. Etesūti bhikkhūsu.
analyzed: tam ti bahu salāka bhatta gāmam tam pana ati eka salāka bhattam pana etesu iti bhikkhūsu

original: Niggahenāti dūrattā anicchantassapi ekassa niggahena. Tanti salākabhattaṃ. Orimagāmeti
analyzed: niggahena ati dūrattā an icchantassa api ekassa niggahena tanti salākabhattam

original: orabhāge ṭhite gāme. Gāhitasaññāyāti gāhitā iti saññāya. Puna vihāraṃ āgantvāti puna
analyzed: ora bhāge ṭhite gāme gāhita saññāya ati gāhitāḥ iti saññāya puna vihāram āgantvā ati puna

original: vihāraṃ anāgantvā orimagāme salākabhattāni paṭhamaṃ gahetvā pacchā vihāraṃ āgantvā
analyzed: vihāram an āgantvā orima gāme salākabhattāni paṭhamam gahetvā pacchā vihāram āgantvā

original: attano pāpetvā bhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati. Kasmā puna vihāro āgantabbo, nanu agāhitopi attano
analyzed: attano pāpetvā bhuñjitum pi vaṭṭati kasmā puna vihāraḥ āgantabbaḥ nanu a gāhitaḥ api attano

original: pattattā gahetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “na hī”tiādi. Hi yasmā bahisīmāya saṅghalābho
analyzed: patta ttā gahetvā bhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti āha na hi itiādi hi yasmai bahi sīmāya saṅgha lābhaḥ

original: gāhetuṃ na labbhati, tasmā vihāro āgantabboti yojanā. Ekabāhavasena vāti ekāya gharapāḷisaṅkhātāya
analyzed: gāhetum na labbhati tasmai vihāro āgantabbo ti yojanā eka bāha vasena vāti ekāya ghara pāḷi saṅkhātāya

original: bāhāyavasena vā. Vīthiādīsu cāti vīthibāhakulesu ca, niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Yatthāti
analyzed: vā vīthi ādīsu ca ati vīthi bāha kulesu ca niddhāraṇe bhummam yattha ati

original: yasmiṃ ṭhāne. Salākāsu asati asantāsūti yojanā. Uddisitvāpīti “asukagāmassa salākabhattāni
analyzed: yasmin ṭhāne salākāsu asati asantāsu iti yojanā uddisitvā api iti asuka gāmassa salāka bhattāni

original: tuyhaṃ pāpuṇantī”ti gāmādīni uddisitvāpi.
analyzed: tuyham pāpuṇanti iti gāma ādīni uddisitvā api

original: Tamevatthaṃ vitthārento āha “tena hī”tiādi. Tattha tenāti salākadāyakena bhikkhunā. Gāhetabbanti sambandho. Vāragāmeti atidūrattā vārena gantabbe gāme. Tatrāti taṃ gāmaṃ.
analyzed: tam eva attham vitthārentaḥ āha tena hi itiādi tattha tena ati salāka dāyakena bhikkhunā gāhetabbanti sambandhaḥ vāra gāma iti ati dūrattā vārena gantabbe gāme tatra ati tam gāmam

original: Atirekagāvuteti gāvutato atireke ṭhāne. Taṃdivasanti tasmiṃ salākabhattagahaṇadivase.
analyzed: atireka gāvuta iti gāvutataḥ atireke ṭhāne tasmin salāka bhatta gahaṇa divase

original: Yo na gacchati, tassa na dātabbāti yojanā. Hīti yasmā. Tīṇi pana divasānīti accantasaṃyoge
analyzed: yaḥ na gacchati tassa na dātabbā ati yojanā hi iti yasmā tīṇi pana divasāni iti

original: cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Tanti orimavāragāmasalākaṃ. Daṇḍakammaṃ pana kinti gāḷhaṃ kātabbanti
analyzed: upayoga vacanam daṇḍa kammam pana kinti gāḷham kātabbanti

original: āha “saṭṭhito vā paṇṇāsato vā na parihāpetabba”nti. Vihāravāroti vihārassa rakkhanatthāya
analyzed: āha saṭṭhitaḥ vā paṇṇāsataḥ vā na parihāpetabbanti vihāravāro ti vihārassa rakkhana tthāya

original: vāro. Vihāravārikassāti vihāraṃ vārena, vāraṃ gahetvā vā rakkhatīti vihāravāriko,
analyzed: vāraḥ vihāra vārikassa ati vihāram vārena vāram gahetvā vā rakkhati iti vihāra vārikaḥ

original: tassa dātabbāti sambandho. Vihāragopakāti vihāraṃ gopentīti vihāragopakā. Aññathattanti
analyzed: tassa dātabbā ati sambandhaḥ vihāra gopakā ati vihāram gopenti iti vihāra gopakāḥ aññathattam

original: pasādaññathattaṃ. Aññesu kulesu dātabbāti aññesaṃ kulānaṃ yāguādayo dātabbā.
analyzed: aññesu kulesu dātabbā ati aññesam kulānam yāgu ādayaḥ dātabbā

original: Vāraṃ gāhetvāti aññehi vāraṃ gāhāpetvā. Nesanti vihāravārikānaṃ. Salākāti pakatikattāraṃ
analyzed: vāram gāhetvā ati aññehi vāram gāhāpetvā na isanti vihāra vārikānam salākā ati pakati kattāram

original: apekkhitvā “bhavantī”ti bahuvacanavasena vuttaṃ. Phātikammamevāti vihārarakkhanatthāya
analyzed: apekkhitvā bhavanti iti bahuvacana vasena vuttam phāti kammam eva ati vihāra rakkhana atthāya

original: saṅghena dātabbaphātikammameva. Aññampīti pisaddena na kevalaṃ phātikammameva, aññampīti
analyzed: saṅghena dātabba phāti kammam eva aññam pi iti pi saddena na kevalam phāti kammam eva aññam pi iti

original: dasseti. Atirekauttaribhaṅgassāti atirekaṃ uttaribhaṅgametassāti atirekauttaribhaṅgaṃ, tassa.
analyzed: dassa iti atireka ottari bhaṅgassa ati atirekam uttari bhaṅgam etassa ati atireka ottari bhaṅgam tassa

original: Salākā laddhāti salākā eva laddhā. Taṃdivasanti tasmiṃ salākaladdhadivase. Ekassevāti ekekasseva. Vijaṭetvāti tāni dve tīṇi ekacārikabhattāni vijaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ katvā.
analyzed: salākā laddhā ati salākā eva laddhā taṃ divasanti tasmin salāka laddha divase ekassa iva ati ekekassa iva vijaṭetvā ati tāni dve tīṇi ekacārika bhattāni vijaṭam nigumbam katvā

original: Ekasambhogāti ekato sambhogā. Gāhentena dātunti sambandho. Sammukhībhūtassāti upacārasīmāyaṃ
analyzed: eka sambhogā iti ekatas sambhogāḥ gāhentena dātunti sambandhaḥ sammukhībhūtassa ati upacāra sīmā ayam

original: ṭhitassa yassa kassaci, pāpetvāti yojanā. Rasasalākanti ucchusalākaṃ. “Rasālasalāka”ntipi
analyzed: ṭhitassa yassa kassaci pāpetvā ati yojanā rasa salākanti ucchu salākam

original: pāṭho, ayamevattho. Khuddakavihāre gāhetabbavidhānaṃ dassetvā mahāāvāse taṃ dassento
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ ayam eva atthaḥ khuddaka vihāre gāhetabba vidhānam dassetvā mahā āvāse tam dassento

original: āha “mahāāvāse”tiādi.
analyzed: āha mahāāvāsa itiādi

original: “Takkasalākampi …pe… dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ khuddakavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tena
analyzed: takkasalākam pi pe dātum vaṭṭati iti idam khuddaka vihāram sandhāya vuttam tena

original: vuttaṃ “mahāāvāse”tiādi. Bhesajjādisalākāyoti ettha ādisaddena gandhamālāsalākāyo
analyzed: vuttam mahā āvāse tiādi bhesajja ādi salākāyaḥ ti ettha ādi saddena gandha mālā salākāyaḥ

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Etthāti salākāsu. Aggabhikkhamattanti aggato dātabbaṃ bhikkhāmattaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti ettha ati salākāsu agga bhikkha mattam ti aggataḥ dātabbam bhikkhā mattam

original: Tādisāni bhattānīti aggabhikkhāmattasabhāvāni bhattāni. No ceti tādisāni bhattāni
analyzed: tādisāni bhattāni iti agga bhikkhā matta sabhāvāni bhattāni no ca iti tādisāni bhattāni

original: bahūni no ce honti. Laddhā vā aladdhā vāti labhitvā vā alabhitvā vā.
analyzed: bahūni na u ced honti laddhā vā a laddhā vā ati labhitvā vā a labhitvā vā

original: Salākāsu gāhitāsūti aññāsu salākāsu gāhitāsu. Samīpe ṭhitassāti hatthaṃ apasāretvā
analyzed: salākāsu gāhitāsu iti aññāsu salākāsu gāhitāsu samīpe ṭhitassa ati hattham apasāretvā

original: samīpe ṭhitassa. Assāti bhikkhussa. Ayaṃ salākāti “ayaṃ tassa salākā”ti ṭhapetuṃ
analyzed: samīpe ṭhitassa assa ati bhikkhussa ayam salākā ati ayam tassa salākā ati ṭhapetuṃ

original: vaṭṭati. Adhammikāti katikā adhammayuttā. Anāgatassa dethāti anāgatassa bhikkhussa salākaṃ detha.
analyzed: vaṭṭati adhammikā ati katikā adhamma yuttā anāgatassa detha ati anāgatassa bhikkhussa salākam detha

original: Soti bhattuddesako, vadeyyāti sambandho. Mayā mayhaṃ pāpitanti sambandho. Tatthāti
analyzed: saḥ ti bhattuddesakaḥ vadeyya ati sambandhaḥ mayā mayham pāpitanti sambandho tattha ati

original: gāme. Bhuñjeyyātha iti vadeyya, vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Tatthevāti asanasālāyameva. Tatrāti
analyzed: gāme bhuñjeyyātha iti vadeyya vaṭṭati iti yojanā tattha iva ati tatra ati

original: tasmiṃ gāme. Vihāraṃ ānetvāti vihāraṃ salākabhattaṃ ānetvā. Salākaggāhaṇakāleti salākāya
analyzed: tasmin gāme vihāram ānetvā ati vihāram salāka bhattam ānetvā salāka ggāhaṇa kāle iti salākāya

original: bhikkhūhi gāhāpanakāle.
analyzed: bhikkhūhi gāhāpana kāle

original: Tatthāti tasmiṃ disābhāge. Aññenāti attanā aññena, laddhā hotīti sambandho. Tena panāti gamikato itarena. Tasminti gamike. Upacārasīmaṃ anatikkanteyevāti yojanā.
analyzed: tattha ati tasmin disā bhāge aññena ati attanā aññena laddhā hoti iti sambandho tena pana ati gamikataḥ itarena tasmin ti gamike upacāra sīmam an atikkantā iya iva ati yojanā

original: Tatthāti chaḍḍitavihāre. Tesūti āvāsikesu bhikkhūsu, gatesūti sambandho. Sovāti āgantuko eva. Yo pana gacchatīti sambandho. Tanti salākabhattaṃ, na pāpuṇātīti sambandho.
analyzed: tattha ati chaḍḍita vihāre tesu iti āvāsikesu bhikkhūsu gatesu iti sambandho saḥ vā ati āgantukaḥ eva yaḥ pana gacchati iti sambandho tat ti salāka bhattam na pāpuṇāti iti sambandho

original: Puññenāti puññasmā. Tā ca kho panāti salākāyo pana. Pacchiṃ panāti salākapacchiṃ
analyzed: puññena ati puññasmā tā ca kho pana ati salākāyaḥ pana pacchim pana ati salāka pacchim

original: pana. Tatthāti pacchiyaṃ. Ettovāti ākiraṇaṭṭhānatova. Ekanti ekaṃ salākaṃ. Vattabbanti
analyzed: pana tattha ati pacchiyam ettas vā ti ākiraṇa ṭṭhānataḥ vā ekam ti ekam salākam vattabbanti

original: salākadāyakena vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: salāka dāyakena vattabbam

original: Bhikkhū gatāti sambandho. Tatthāti aññasmiṃ vihāre. Mahātheropi gacchatīti sambandho.
analyzed: bhikkhū gatā iti sambandhaḥ tattha ati aññasmin vihāre mahā theraḥ api gacchati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Gatavihāre abhuñjitvāva gocaragāmaṃ anuppattehi bhikkhūhi pattā na dātabbāti yojanā.
analyzed: gata vihāre a bhuñjitvā ava gocaragāmam an uppattehi bhikkhūhi pattā na dātabbā ati yojanā

original: Vihāraṭṭhakaṃ bhattanti vihāre ṭhitaṃ bhattaṃ.
analyzed: vihāraṭṭhakam bhattanti vihāre ṭhitam bhattam

original: Pakkhikabhattādikathā
analyzed: pakkhika bhatta ādi kathā

original: Yanti bhattaṃ diyyatīti sambandho. Cātuddasīpañcaddasīpañcamīaṭṭhamīti abhilakkhitesūti
analyzed: yanti bhattam diyyati iti sambandho cātuddasī pañcaddasī pañcamī aṭṭhamī ti abhilakkhitesu iti

original: yojanā. Kammappasutehīti kammūpacayehi. Imehi pāṭhehi pakkhesu dātabbaṃ pakkhikanti
analyzed: yojanā kamma ppasutehi iti kamma upacayehi imehi pāṭhehi pakkhesu dātabbam pakkhikanti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Tanti pakkhikabhattaṃ. “Hotī”ti pade vuttakattā, “gāhetvā”ti
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti tanti pakkhika bhattam hoti iti pade vuttaka ttā gāhetvā ati

original: pade dhātukammaṃ, “bhuñjitabba”nti pade vuttakammaṃ. Sabbesanti bhikkhūnaṃ. Yesanti
analyzed: pade dhātu kammam bhuñjitabbanti pade vutta kammam sabbesanti bhikkhūnam yesanti

original: bhikkhūnaṃ. Mandāti appā. Tanti salākabhattaṃ. Paṇītaṃ dentīti paṇītaṃ katvā denti.
analyzed: bhikkhūnam salāka bhattam paṇītam denti iti paṇītam katvā denti

original: Lūkhabhattanti asiniddhabhattaṃ.
analyzed: lūkha bhattanti asi niddha bhattam

original: Yaṃ bhattaṃ attanā bhuñjati, tadeva diyyatīti yojanā. Iminā uposathe dātabbaṃ uposathikanti
analyzed: yam bhattam attanā bhuñjati tat eva diyyati iti yojanā iminā uposathe dātabbam uposathikanti

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Uposatheti uposathadivase. Ettha ca pañcaddasiyaṃ sace dāyakā
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti uposatha iti uposatha divase ettha ca pañcaddasiyam sace dāyakā

original: “pakkhika”nti vatvā denti, pakkhikaṃ nāma. Atha “uposathika”nti vatvā denti, uposathikaṃ
analyzed: pakkhikanti vatvā denti pakkhikam nāma atha uposathikanti vatvā denti uposathikam

original: nāmāti viseso. Pāṭipadeti pāṭipadadivase. Uposathakammenāti uposathakammena hetubhūtena.
analyzed: nāma ati viseso pāṭipada iti pāṭipada divase uposatha kammena ati uposatha kammena hetu bhūtena

original: “Pāṭipade diyyanakadāna”nti iminā pāṭipade dātabbaṃ pāṭipadikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: pāṭipade diyyanaka dānam ti iminā pāṭipade dātabbam pāṭipadikam ti vacana attham dasseti

original: Tampi ubhayanti uposathikapāṭipadikavasena ubhayampi taṃ bhattaṃ. Iti imānīti ettha
analyzed: tam pi uposathika pāṭipadika vasena ubhayam pi tam iti imāni iti ettha

original: imasaddena itisaddassa imasaddatthabhāvo dassito hoti. Sattapi bhattānīti imasmiṃ
analyzed: ima saddena iti saddassa ima sadda attha bhāvaḥ dassitaḥ hoti bhattāni iti imasmin

original: senāsanakkhandhake āgatāni saṅghabhattādīni sattapi bhattāni.
analyzed: senāsana kkhandhake āgatāni saṅgha bhatta ādīni satta pi bhattāni

original: Aparānipi cattāri bhattānīti sambandho. Tatthāti catūsu bhattesu. “Āgantukānaṃ dinna”ntiādinā
analyzed: aparāni pi cattāri bhattāni iti sambandhaḥ tattha ati catūsu bhattesu āgantukānam dinna nti ādinā

original: āgantukabhattanti padassa catutthīmajjhelopasamāsaṃ dasseti. Aññattha pana “āgantukassa
analyzed: āgantuka bhattanti padassa catutthīm ajjhelopa samāsam dasseti aññattha pana āgantukassa

original: atthāya ābhata”ntiādinā chaṭṭhīmajjhelopasamāsaṃ dasseti. Etthāti catūsu bhattesu.
analyzed: atthāya ābhata nti ādinā chaṭṭhīm ajjhelopa samāsam dasseti ettha iti catūsu bhattesu

original: Sabbesanti bhikkhūnaṃ. Eko āgantuko nisīdatīti sambandho. Tenāti paṭhamaāgantukena.
analyzed: sabbesanti bhikkhūnam ekaḥ āgantukaḥ nisīdati iti sambandhaḥ tena ati paṭhama āgantukena

original: Yoti āgantuko. Āgantvāpīti pisaddo garahattho, pacchā pana pagevāti attho. Tena gaṇhitabbanti yojanā. “Āgatadivaseyevā”ti iminā na dutiyadivasādīsu bhuñjitabbanti dasseti.
analyzed: yaḥ ti āgantukaḥ āgantvā api iti pi saddo garaha attho pacchā pana pagā iva ati attho tena gaṇhitabbanti yojanā āgata divasā idāni eva ati iminā na dutiya divasa ādīsu bhuñjitabbanti dasseti

original: Katthacīti kiñci ṭhānaṃ. Tanti āgantukabhattaṃ. Nibandhāpitanti niccaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Asanasālāyanti antogāme asanasālāyaṃ. Asatīti asantesu.
analyzed: katthaci iti kiñci ṭhānam tanti āgantuka bhattam nibandhāpitanti niccam ṭhapitam asanasālāyanti antogāme asanasālāyam asati iti asantesu

original: Āvāsikopīti pisaddo na gamikoyevāti dasseti. Yathā āgantukabhattaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā
analyzed: āvāsikaḥ api iti pi saddaḥ na dasseti yathā āgantuka bhattam dve vā tīṇi vā

original: satta vā divasāni labbhati, evaṃ idaṃ gamiyabhattaṃ na labbhatīti yojanā. Panthanti

original: maggaṃ. Rundhantīti pidahanti. Udakaṃ vā rundhatīti sambandho. Ete upaddaveti corādayo

analyzed: atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ tad attham adhippāyena dassentaḥ āha rājā amhe jānāti itiādi pahaṭṭha kaṇṇavālo ti

analyzed: paṭikuṭiyā uva osakkī iti ettha tathāgatassa paṭimukham kuṭena gamanam etassa ati paṭikuṭiyaḥ

original: 18 dakārantadhātu) vuttesu atthesu idha dassanatthoti dasseti. Na lakkhitabboti aññehi

original: 347. “Sutāti sotā”ti iminā pāḷiyā dvidhābhāvaṃ dasseti. “Nissandeho”ti iminā asandiddhoti ettha dihadhātuṃ dasseti, disadhātuṃ nivatteti.

original: Ettāvatāti ettakena anussāvanasalākaggāhamattena. Na pana saṅgho bhinno hoti, anussāvetvā salākaṃ gāhetvā āveṇikaṃ saṅghakamme kateyeva saṅgho bhinno hotīti adhippāyo.

analyzed: yojanā viraddha ttā ati virādhita ttā tam attham vitthārentaḥ āha tena hi itiādi tattha

original: Idaṃ padaṃ “suttantadesanā jātakakathā”ti dvīhipi padehi yojetabbaṃ. Idanti phalasamāpattisamāpajjanādi.

original: cāriyatthaṃ pakkamanaṃ.
analyzed: cāriyattham pakkamanam

original: Evaṃ dvinnaṃ pariyāyānaṃ vasena āciṇṇānāciṇṇadukassa visesaṃ dassetvā idāni paññattadukassa

original: Nāḷimajjhagatanti sassanāḷassa majjhe gataṃ. Gaṇṭhinti phaḷuṃ. “Kaṇḍa”ntipi pāṭho, daṇḍanti attho. Yenāti pāṇakena. Ayañhi yaṃsaddo taṃsaddānapekkhoti daṭṭhabbo.

original: Antorattabhāvoti antolohitabhāvo. Etamatthanti etaṃ vakkhamānaṃ atthaṃ. Āḷiyāti āvaraṇāya.

original: Yanti udakaṃ. Tampīti udakampi. Pisaddo abaddhāya ṭhitaṃ kiñci udakaṃ apekkhati.

original: Bhikkhunīupasampadānujānanakathā

analyzed: etissā ti etissā bhikkhuniyā tat ti kammam aññasmin ti aññasmim kamme aññam ti ropitabba kammataḥ aññam kammam

analyzed: kaddama udakena ati kaddamena āluḍitena udakena iva kaddama ādīsu pi iti pīsaddaḥ yena

original: kenacī”ti ettha yojetabbo. Yena kenacipīti hi attho. Sannipatitvāti bhikkhunisaṅghena
analyzed: kenaci iti ettha yojetabbaḥ yena kenacid pi iti hi atthaḥ sannipatitvā ti bhikkhuni saṅghena

original: Avandiyoti na vandetabbo, vandituṃ na arahoti attho. Tatoti tikkhattuṃ sāvetabbato.
analyzed: a vandiyaḥ ti na vandetabbaḥ vanditum na araho ti attho tatas ti tikkhattum sāvetabbato

original: Tatoti vattabbakālato. Soti apasādanīyaṃ dassento bhikkhu. Etthāti bhikkhunikkhandhake.

analyzed: saddhim sampayojenti iti ettha kamma karaṇe dassentaḥ āha purise asat dhammena ati ettha

analyzed: gihi dārikāyaḥ iti gihi bhūtāḥ dārikāyaḥ bandhanti viyāti yojanā ghana paṭṭakena ati

analyzed: katam kāyabandhanam eka pariyakanti dassentaḥ āha eka vāram parikkhipanakanti tattha

original: iminā pāḷiyaṃ “katenā”ti pāṭhasesaṃ dasseti. Setavatthapaṭṭenāti setavatthena katena

original: Aṭṭhillenāti addena aṭṭhinā. “Gojaṅghaṭṭhike”ti iminā aṭṭhino sambandhaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: aṭṭhillena ati addena aṭṭhinā gojaṅghaṭṭhikā iti iminā aṭṭhinaḥ sambandham dasseti

analyzed: gaṇḍa ppadese iti kapola ppadese sa āloke tiṭṭhanti iti ettha saṃvijjati ālokaḥ ettha ati sa ālokam ti

analyzed: accaya dānam tesam ruhati tesam yeva santakaḥ hoti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 420. Purāṇamallīti ettha mallassa bhariyā mallī, purāṇe mallī purāṇamallīti dassento
analyzed: purāṇamallī iti ettha mallassa bhariyā mallī purāṇe mallī purāṇamallī iti dassento

original: iminā sarūpaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: iminā sarūpam dasseti

original: 430. Dūtenapi upasampādetunti ettha kiṃ sabbathā dūtena upasampadā vaṭṭatīti āha
analyzed: dūtena api upasampādetun ti ettha kim sabbathā dūtena upasampadā vaṭṭati iti āha

analyzed: nava kammam pi iti pi saddaḥ udosita aupassaye apekkhati

analyzed: ekāra ādesaḥ dassitaḥ taṃdassanena ca kaccāyane kaccāyane sutte sabba nāmataḥ smiṃvacanassa

original: ekārādesanisedhanaṃ aniccanti dasseti.
analyzed: aniccanti dasseti

original: 434. “Yadeva sā vibbhantā”ti iminā dassetīti sambandho. “Yasmā”ti iminā yadevāti
analyzed: yat eva sā vibbhantā ati iminā dassā iti iti sambandhaḥ yasmā iti iminā yat eva ati

original: ettha yaṃsaddassa kāraṇatthaṃ dasseti. Odātāni vatthāni nivatthāti sambandho. “Tasmāyevā”ti

original: iminā tadevāti padassa kāraṇatthameva dasseti. “Na sikkhāpaccakkhānenā”ti iminā evatthaphalaṃ
analyzed: iminā tat eva ati padassa kāraṇa attham eva dasseti na sikkhā paccakkhānena ati iminā evattha phalam

original: dasseti. Sā puna upasampadaṃ na labhatīti sā vibbhantā bhikkhunī puna upasampadaṃ na labhati.
analyzed: dasseti sā puna upasampadam na labhati iti sā vibbhantā bhikkhunī puna upasampadam na labhati

original: Pabbajjampi na labhatīti titthāyatanasaṅkantā bhikkhunī pabbajjampi na labhati, pageva upasampadaṃ.

original: Pāde sambāhantāti bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde sambāhantā. Keseti bhikkhunīnaṃ kese. Tatrāti
analyzed: pāde sambāhantā ati bhikkhunīnam pāde sambāhantā kese iti bhikkhunīnam kese tatra ati

original: “kukkuccayantā na sādiyantī”ti vacane. Eke ācariyā vadantīti sambandho. Sārattā hontīti
analyzed: kukkuccayantāḥ na sādiyanti iti vacane eke ācariyāḥ vadanti iti sambandho sārattāḥ honti iti

original: yojanā. Etthāti purisānaṃ abhivādanādīsu. Idanti purisānaṃ abhivādanādi, “anuññāta”nti
analyzed: yojanā ettha ati purisānam abhivādana ādīsu idam ti purisānam abhivādana ādi anuññātanti

original: pade vuttakammaṃ “vaṭṭatī”ti pade vuttakattā. Atha vā odissa anuññātaṃ idaṃ purisānaṃ

original: abhivādanādi vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Evañhi sati “odissa anuññāta”nti padaṃ hetuantogadhavisesanaṃ,
analyzed: abhivādana ādi vaṭṭati iti yojanā evam hi sati odissa anuññāta nti padam hetu anta ogadha visesanam

original: odissa anuññātattā vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Tanti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttavacanaṃ. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā.
analyzed: odissa anuññāta ttā vaṭṭati iti adhippāyaḥ tat ti aṭṭhakathāsu vutta vacanam hi iti saccam yasmai vā

original: 435. Pallaṅkena nisīdantīti ettha āsanapallaṅkaṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
analyzed: pallaṅkena nisīdanti iti ettha āsana pallaṅkam paṭikkhipantaḥ āha pallaṅkam ābhujitvā

original: nisīdantī”ti. Tattha ābhujitvāti ābandhitvā. Kūpoti vaccakūpo. Uparīti kūpato upari.
analyzed: nisīdanti iti tattha ābhujitvā ati ābandhitvā kūpaḥ upari iti kūpataḥ upari

original: “Sabbadisāsu paññāyatī”ti iminā paṭicchannameva atthi, na upari channanti dasseti.
analyzed: sabba disāsu paññāyati iti iminā paṭicchannam eva atthi na upari channanti dasseti

original: 436. Kuṇḍakanti kaṇaṃ. Etthāti bhikkhunikkhandhake.

analyzed: ti paccayaḥ bhāva tthe pi hoti iti dasseti vinā ati etehi āpatti kkhandhehi vinā iminā virati iti

original: ettha vityūpasaggassa atthaṃ dasseti. Paccekanti pati ekaṃ, paṭisaddo vicchatthajotako,
analyzed: ettha attham dasseti paccekam ti ekam paṭisaddaḥ

original: visuṃ visunti attho. Iminā paṭiviratīti ettha paṭityūpasaggassa atthaṃ dasseti. Virati
analyzed: visum visum ti atthaḥ iminā paṭivirati iti ettha attham dasseti virati

original: paṭiviratīti etthāpi tipaccayo bhāvatthepi veditabbo. Veranti anatthakarattā viramitabbanti
analyzed: paṭivirati iti ettha api ti paccayaḥ bhāva atthe pi veditabbaḥ veranti anatthakara ttā viramitabbanti

original: viraṃ, tadeva veraṃ, rāgādiakusaladhammā. Te hi verahetuttā veranti vuccanti. Etāyāti
analyzed: viram tat eva veram rāga ādi akusala dhammā te hi vera hetuttā veranti vuccanti etāya ati

original: viratiyā. Iminā akiriyāti ettha ririyapaccayo karaṇatthe hotīti dasseti. Yaṃ āpattikkhandhakaraṇanti
analyzed: viratiyā iminā a kiriyā ti ettha ririya paccayaḥ karaṇa atthe hoti iti dasseti yam āpatti kkhandha karaṇan ti

original: yojanā. Tassāti āpattikkhandhakaraṇassa. Paṭipakkhatoti viruddhabhāvato. Iminā akaraṇanti
analyzed: yojanā tassa ati āpatti kkhandha karaṇassa paṭipakkhataḥ ti viruddha bhāvataḥ iminā akaraṇanti

original: ettha akāro viruddhatthoti dasseti. Āpattikkhandhaajjhāpattiyāti āpattikkhandhānaṃ
analyzed: ettha akāraḥ viruddha atthaḥ ti dasseti āpatti khandha ajjhāpattiyā ti āpatti khandhānam

original: atikkamitvā āpajjanassa. “Velanato”ti iminā velatīti velā, velanaṃ vā velāti vacanatthe
analyzed: atikkamitvā āpajjanassa velanato ti iminā velati iti velā velanam vā velā ati vacana atthe

original: dasseti. Niyyānanti maggaṃ. Maggo hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena yāti gacchatīti
analyzed: dasseti niyyānam ti maggam maggaḥ hi nibbānam ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena yāti gacchati iti

original: niyyānanti vuccati. “Bandhatī”ti iminā sidhātuyā bandhanatthaṃ dasseti. “Nivāretī”ti
analyzed: niyyānanti vuccati bandhati iti iminā si dhātuyāḥ bandhana attham dasseti nivāreti iti

original: iminā bandhadhātuyā adhippāyatthaṃ. Etanti “setū”ti nāmaṃ. Taṃ setunti āpattikkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: iminā bandha dhātuyāḥ adhippāya ttham etam ti setu uti nāmam tam setum ti āpatti kkhandha saṅkhātam

original: taṃ setuṃ. Ettha kesuci potthakesu “so setū”ti ca “etāya paññattiyā”ti ca pāṭho atthi, so apāṭhoyeva.
analyzed: tam setum ettha kesuci potthakesu saḥ setu uti ca etāya paññattiyā ati ca pāṭhaḥ atthi saḥ a pāṭhaḥ yeva

original: Buddhe agāravādīsu evaṃ vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā. Yoti yo koci, na gacchatītiādīsu
analyzed: buddhe agāra vādīsu evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbo ti yojanā yaḥ ti yaḥ koci na gacchati itiādīsu

original: sambandho. Dharamāneti tiṭṭhamāne, saṃvijjamāneti attho. Upaṭṭhānanti upaṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sambandhaḥ dharamāne iti tiṭṭhamāne saṃvijjamāne iti atthaḥ upaṭṭhānam ti upaṭṭhāna ṭhānam

original: upaṭṭhānatthaṃ vā. Etassāti yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā. Dhammassavananti
analyzed: upaṭṭhāna attham vā etassa ati yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā dhamma ssavananti

original: dhammassavanaṭṭhānaṃ, dhammassavanatthaṃ vā. Dhammassavanagganti dhammassavanaṃ gaṇhanti
analyzed: dhammassavanaṭṭhānam dhammassavanattham vā dhammassavanaggam dhammassavanam gaṇhanti

original: etthāti dhammassavanaggo, dhammasavanamaṇḍapo. Atha vā dhammassavanaṃ gaṇhātīti dhammassavanaggo,
analyzed: ettha ati dhammassavana ggaḥ dhamma savana maṇḍapaḥ atha vā dhammassavanam gaṇhāti iti dhammassavana ggaḥ

original: dhammassavanaṭṭhāne samāgamajano, taṃ dhammassavanaggaṃ. Cittīkāranti apacāyanākāraṃ.
analyzed: dhammassavana ṭṭhāne samāgama janaḥ tam dhammassavana ggam cittīkāranti apacāyanā ākāram

original: Vikkhitto vā anādaro vā hutvā nisīdatīti yojanā. Kāyapāgabbiyanti bhusaṃ garati aññe
analyzed: vikkhittaḥ vā anādaraḥ vā hutvā nisīdati iti yojanā bhusam garati aññe

original: pīḷeti anenāti pagabbo, atimāno, oṭṭhajo tatiyakkharo. Pagabbassa bhāvo pāgabbiyaṃ,
analyzed: pīḍeti anena ati pagabbaḥ atimānaḥ oṭṭhajaḥ tatiyakkharaḥ pagabbassa bhāvaḥ pāgabbiyam

original: kāyena pāgabbiyaṃ kāyapāgabbiyaṃ, kāyānācāraṃ. Tisso sikkhāti adhisīlasikkhādikā
analyzed: kāyena pāgabbiyam kāya pāgabbiyam kāya anācāram tissaḥ sikkhāti adhi sīla sikkhā ādikā

original: tisso sikkhā. Pamajjanaṃ pamādo, sativippavāsoti āha “pamāde ca sativippavāse”ti.
analyzed: tissaḥ sikkhā pamajjanam pamādaḥ sati vippavāsaḥ ti āha pamāde ca sati vippavāse iti

original: Āmisapaṭisandhāranti āmisena attano, paresañca antarassa paṭisandahanaṃ āmisapaṭisandhāro,
analyzed: āmisa paṭisandhāram ti āmisena attanaḥ paresam ca antarassa paṭisandahanaṃ āmisa paṭisandhāraḥ

original: tathā dhammapaṭisandhāro.
analyzed: tathā dhamma paṭisandhāro

original: 272. Sattharipi agāravotiādīnaṃ atthoti sambandho. “Anīcavuttī”tiādinā appatissoti
padassa adhippāyatthaṃ dasseti, saddattho panevaṃ veditabbo, paṭimukhaṃ ādarena satthuvacanaṃ
analyzed: padassa adhippāya ttham dasseti sadda atthaḥ pana ivam veditabbaḥ paṭimukham ādarena satthu vacanam

original: asuṇanto appatisso nāmāti. Ajjhattaṃ vāti ettha niyakajjhattādīsu catūsu niyakajjhattabhāvañca
analyzed: a suṇantaḥ appatissaḥ nāma ati ajjhattam vā ati ettha niyaka jjhatta ādīsu catūsu niyaka jjhatta bhāvañca

original: sattamīvibhattiyā amādesabhāvañca dassento āha “attano santāne vā”ti. “Attano pakkhe
analyzed: sattamī vibhattiyāḥ am ādesa bhāvañca dassentaḥ āha attano santāne vā ati attano pakkhe

original: vā”ti iminā attano cittasantāneti atthaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tatra tumheti ettha tasaddassa
analyzed: vā ti iminā citta santāne iti attham paṭikkhipati tatra tumha iti ettha ta saddassa

original: visayaṃ dassento āha “tasmiṃ ajjhattabahiddhābhede”ti. Saparasantāneti attaparasantāne.
analyzed: visayam dassentaḥ āha tasmin ajjhatta bahiddhā bhede iti sa para santāne iti atta para santāne

original: Pahānāyāti ettha hādhātuyā karaṇañca āyasaddassa tadatthabhāvañca dassento āha “mettābhāvanādīhi
analyzed: pahānāya iti ettha hā dhātuyā karaṇam ca āya saddassa tad atthabhāvañca dassentaḥ āha mettā bhāvanā ādīhi

original: nayehi pahānattha”nti. Mettābhāvanādīhītiādisaddena karuṇābhāvanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: nayehi mettā bhāvanā ādīhi iti ādi saddena karuṇā bhāvanā ādim saṅgaṇhāti

original: Tanti vivādamūlaṃ. “Appavattibhāvāyā”ti iminā anavassavāyāti ettha avapubba sudhātuyā
analyzed: tanti vivāda mūlam appavatti bhāvāya ati iminā anavassavāya ati ettha

original: pavattanatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: pavattana attham dasseti

original: Sandiṭṭhiparāmāsīti ettha sassa attano idaṃ saṃ, saṃ diṭṭhiṃ parato āmasatīti sandiṭṭhiparāmāsīti
analyzed: sandiṭṭhi parāmāsī iti ettha sassa attanaḥ idam saṃ saṃ diṭṭhim paratas āmasati iti sandiṭṭhi parāmāsī iti

original: dassento āha “sakameva diṭṭhiṃ parāmasatī”ti. “Ya”ntiādinā parāmasanākāraṃ dasseti.

original: Ādhānaggāhīti ettha ābhuso ṭhiyate ādhānanti vacanatthena ādhānasaddo daḷhapariyāyoti
analyzed: ādhāna ggāhi iti ettha ṭhiyate ādhānam ti vacana atthena ādhāna saddaḥ daḷha pariyāyaḥ ti

original: āha “daḷhaggāhī”ti. Daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti daḷhaggāhī.
analyzed: āha daḷhaggāhī iti daḷham gaṇhāti iti daḷhaggāhī

original: 273. Anuvādamūlaniddeso kiñcāpi samānoti yojanā. Atha khoti tathā samānopi, ayamettha
analyzed: anuvāda mūla niddeso kiñcā api samāno ti yojanā atha kho ti tathā samānaḥ api ayam ettha

original: visesoti sambandho. Vivadantānaṃ puggalānanti yojanā. Tathā vivadantāti tenākārena
analyzed: visesaḥ iti sambandhaḥ vivadantānam puggalānam ti yojanā tathā vivadantā ati tena ākārena

original: vivadantā, anuvadantīti sambandho. “Asukaṃ nāma vipattiṃ āpanno”ti vuttamevatthaṃ
analyzed: vivadantāḥ anuvadanti iti sambandhaḥ asukam nāma vipattim āpannaḥ ti vuttam evattham

original: āpattiyā sallakkhetvā dassento āha “pārājikaṃ āpannosī”tiādi. Etthāti anuvādamūle.
analyzed: āpattiyā sallakkhetvā dassentaḥ āha pārājikam āpannaḥ asi itiādi ettha ati anuvāda mūle

original: Visesoti vivādamūlato viseso. Vivadantānaṃ kodhūpanāhādīni vivādamūlāni, anuvadantānaṃ
analyzed: visesaḥ ti vivāda mūlataḥ visesaḥ vivadantānam kodhūpanāha ādīni vivāda mūlāni anuvadantānam

original: anuvādamūlānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: anuvāda mūlāni iti vuttam hoti

original: 274. Mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāmāti ettha mettā etassatthīti mettaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, mettacittasahagataṃ
analyzed: mettam kāya kammam nāma ati ettha mettā etassa atthi iti mettam kāya kammam metta citta sahagatam

original: kāyakammanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “mettacittena kataṃ kāyakamma”nti. Sammukhaparammukhānaṃ
analyzed: kāya kammanti vuttam hoti tena vuttam metta cittena katam kāya kammanti sammukha parammukhānam

original: vitthāraṃ dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tattha tatthāti tesu sammukhaparammukhesu.
analyzed: vitthāram dassentaḥ āha tattha atiādi tattha tattha ati tesu sammukha parammukhesu

original: Kāyakammaṃ nāmāti mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Therānaṃ dānaiti sambandho. Ubhayehipīti
analyzed: kāyakammam nāma ati mettam kāyakammam nāma therānam dāna eti sambandhaḥ ubhayehi pi iti

original: navakattherehipi. Tesūti navakattheresu. Avamaññanti avamānaṃ. Attano dunnikkhittānaṃ
analyzed: navaka ttherehi pi tesu iti navaka ttheresu avamaññanti avamānam attanaḥ dunnikkhittānam

analyzed: paṭisāmanam viya paṭisāmananti yojanā mettā kāya kamma saṅkhāto ti iminā ayam pi dhammo ti

original: ettha dhammasarūpaṃ dasseti. Pisaddo upari vakkhamāne dhamme apekkhati. “Saritabbo”ti
analyzed: ettha dhamma sarūpam dasseti pi saddaḥ upari vakkhamāne dhamme apekkhati saritabbaḥ ti

original: iminā anīyasaddo kammavācakoti dasseti. Satijanakoti sabrahmacārīnaṃ satijanako.
analyzed: iminā anīya saddo kamma vācako ti dasseti sati janako ti sabrahmacārīnam sati janako

original: Tassa padassa adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “yo na”ntiādi. Tattha yoti puggalo. Nanti mettaṃ
analyzed: tassa padassa adhippāyam dassentaḥ āha yaḥ nanti ādi tattha yaḥ ti puggalaḥ mettam

original: kāyakammaṃ. Taṃ puggalaṃ anussarantīti sambandho. Yesanti sabrahmacārīnaṃ. Teti sabrahmacārino.
analyzed: kāya kammam tam puggalam anussaranti iti sambandhaḥ yesanti sabrahmacārīnam te iti sabrahmacārinaḥ

original: Pasannacittā hutvāti sambandho. “Piyaṃ karotī”ti iminā piyakaraṇoti padassa piyaṃ
analyzed: pasanna cittā hutvā iti sambandhaḥ piyam karoti iti iminā piya karaṇā ti padassa piyam

original: karotīti piyakaraṇoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti. Eseva nayo garukaraṇoti etthāpi. “Saṅgahetabbabhāvāyā”ti
analyzed: karoti iti piya karaṇo ti vacana attham dasseti esa eva nayaḥ garu karaṇo ti ettha api saṅgahetabba bhāvāya ati

original: iminā saṅgahāyāti padassa bhāvappadhānakammaniddesabhāvaṃ dasseti. Saṅgahetabboti
analyzed: iminā saṅgahāya iti padassa bhāva ppadhāna kamma niddesa bhāvam dasseti saṅgahetabbaḥ ti

original: saṅgaho, tadatthāya. Tehīti sabrahmacārīhi. “Samaggabhāvāyā”ti iminā samaggassa bhāvo
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ tad atthāya tehi iti sabrahmacārīhi samagga bhāvāya ati iminā samaggassa bhāvaḥ

original: sāmaggīti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: sāmaggī iti vacana attham dasseti

original: Paggayha vacananti paggahetvā vacanaṃ. Vihāreti ādhāre bhummaṃ, there asanteti yojanā.
analyzed: paggayha vacananti paggahetvā vacanam vihāre iti ādhāre bhummam there asanta iti yojanā

original: Tanti theraṃ kadā āgamissati nukhoti yojanā. Mamāyanavacananti mamāyanākārena pavattaṃ

original: vacanaṃ. Mettāsinehasiniddhānīti mettāsaṅkhātena sinehena sinehitāni. Nayanānīti
analyzed: vacanam mettā sineha siniddhāni iti mettā saṅkhātena sinehena sinehitāni nayanāni iti

original: cakkhūni. “Appābādho”ti iminā arogoti padasseva atthaṃ dasseti. Niccābādhena vā arogo,
analyzed: cakkhūni appa ābādho ti iminā arogo ti padassa iva attham dasseti nicca ābādhena vā arogo

analyzed: vā arogo citta ābādhena appa ābādho samannāharaṇanti punappunam manasikaraṇam

original: Na puggalaṃ paṭivibhajitvā bhuñjatīti yojanā. Tadatthaṃ vitthārento āha “yo hī”tiādi.
analyzed: na puggalam paṭivibhajitvā bhuñjati iti yojanā tad attham vitthārentaḥ āha yaḥ hi itiādi

original: Tattha yoti puggalo, bhuñjatīti sambandho. “Ettakaṃ…pe… bhuñjissāmī”ti iminā āmisapaṭivibhattabhogibhāvaṃ
analyzed: tattha yaḥ ti puggalaḥ bhuñjati iti sambandhaḥ bhuñjissāmi iti iminā āmisa paṭivibhatta bhogi bhāvam

original: dasseti. “Ettakaṃ vā asukassa ca…pe… bhuñjissāmī”ti iminā puggalapaṭivibhattabhogibhāvaṃ
analyzed: dasseti ettakam vā asukassa cape bhuñjissāmi iti iminā puggala paṭivibhatta bhogi bhāvam

original: dasseti. Ayanti puggalo. Ābhatanti gāmādito ānītaṃ. Adātumpīti pisaddena dātumpi
analyzed: dassa iti ayanti puggalaḥ ābhatanti gāma āditaḥ ānītam a dātum pi iti pi saddena dātum pi

analyzed: vaṭṭati iti dasse ti dānam hi nāma na kassaci vāritam sabbesanti dussīla sīlavantānam

original: Vuttanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Viceyyāti vicinitvā. Dātumpīti pisaddena avicinitvā
analyzed: vuttanti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam viceyya ati vicinitvā dātum pi iti pi saddena a vicinitvā

analyzed: sāmaññataḥ dātum pi vaṭṭati iti sampiṇḍa iti nanu evam sati puggala vibhāgaḥ kataḥ nāma hoti

original: kasmā viceyya dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “na hī”tiādi. Hīti yasmā. Eteti gilānādayo. Idaṃ

analyzed: padam vicinitvā ati pade kammam dentena ati pade sampadānam hi iti saccam iti ayanti

original: iti manasikatvā ayaṃ sāraṇīyadhammapūrako.

original: Akhaṇḍānītiādīsu paṭhamaṃ tāva khaṇḍachiddasabalakammāsāni dassetvā tesaṃ paṭipakkhavasena
analyzed: akhaṇḍāni iti ādīsu paṭhamam tāva khaṇḍa chidda sabala kammāsāni dassetvā tesam paṭipakkha vasena

original: akhaṇḍādīni dassento āha “yassā”tiādi. Tattha yassāti bhikkhussa, sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnanti

original: sambandho. Sattasu āpattikkhandhesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ, sikkhāpadanti sambandho. Āpattiñhi
analyzed: sambandhaḥ sattasu āpatti kkhandhesu iti ādhāre bhummam sikkhāpadan ti sambandhaḥ āpattim hi

original: paṭicca sikkhāpadassa paññattattā āpatti tassa visayo hoti. Ādimhi vā ante vāti sikkhāpadānaṃ
analyzed: paṭicca sikkhāpadassa paññatta ttā āpatti tassa visayaḥ hoti ādimhi vā ante vā ati sikkhāpadānaṃ

original: ādimhi vā ante vā. Vāsaddo aniyamavikappattho. Sikkhāpade bhinne āpattisambhavato
analyzed: ādimhi vā ante vā vā saddo aniyama vikappa attho sikkhāpade bhinne āpatti sambhavato

original: vuttaṃ “sikkhāpadaṃ bhinna”nti. Khaṇḍaṃ nāmāti chinnaṃ nāma. Vemajjheti sikkhāpadānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam sikkhāpadam bhinnanti khaṇḍam nāma ati chinnam nāma vemajjhe iti sikkhāpadānam

original: vemajjhe. Bhinnanti sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ. Chiddaṃ nāmāti vivaraṃ nāma. Dve tīṇi sikkhāpadānīti
analyzed: vemajjhe bhinnanti sikkhāpadam bhinnam chiddam nāma ati vivaram nāma dve tīṇi sikkhāpadāni iti

original: sambandho. Sabalaṃ nāmāti citraṃ nāma. Bhinnānīti sikkhāpadāni bhinnāni. Kammāsaṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ sabalam nāma ati citram nāma bhinnāni iti sikkhāpadāni bhinnāni kammāsam

original: nāmāti vicitraṃ nāma. Ettha ca ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekena visabhāgavaṇṇena citraṃ sabalaṃ
analyzed: nāma ati vicitram nāma ettha ca ekasmin ṭhāne ekena visa bhāga vaṇṇena citram sa balam

original: vuttesu pañcadasadhammesu. Tenāti adhammacodakena, coditoti sambandho. Pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakkhandhake

original: vutte sacce ca akuppe ca atiṭṭhantopi adhammacuditakoyeva nāma, so pana dhammacodakena
analyzed: vutte sacce ca akuppe ca a tiṭṭhantaḥ pi adhammacuditako yā iva nāma so pana dhamma codakena

original: coditeyeva kuppanto adhammacuditako nāma, adhammacodakena codite pana kuppantopi
analyzed: coditeya iva kuppantaḥ adhammacuditakaḥ nāma adhamma codakena codite pana kuppantaḥ api

original: adhammacuditako nāma na hoti, tasmā idha na vutto. “Samannāgato”ti iminā niyatā etassa
analyzed: adhammacuditakaḥ nāma na hoti tasmai idha na vutto samannāgato ti iminā niyatā etassa

original: santīti niyatoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: santi iti niyato ti vacana attham dasseti

original: Āpajjituṃ bhabbāti bhabbāpattikā. Kenaci kammena akatopi anukkhittakoyeva nāma, so
analyzed: āpajjitum bhabbā ati bhabba āpattikā kenacid kammena a kataḥ api an ukkhitta ko yā iva nāma so

original: pana ukkhittakoti saṅkābhāvato idha na vutto. Ayanti tajjanīyādikammakato bhikkhu.
analyzed: pana ukkhittakaḥ ti saṅkā bhāvataḥ idha na vuttaḥ ayanti tajjanīya ādi kamma kataḥ bhikkhu

original: Hīti yasmā, na kopetīti sambandho. Liṅgadaṇḍakammasaṃvāsanāsanāhīti liṅganāsanena
analyzed: hi iti yasmai na kopeti iti sambandhaḥ liṅga daṇḍa kamma saṃvāsa nāsanā hi iti liṅgana āsanena

original: ca daṇḍakammanāsanena ca saṃvāsanāsanena ca. Yenāti bhikkhunā. Soti nānāsaṃvāsako.
analyzed: ca daṇḍa kammanā āsanena ca saṃvāsanā āsanena ca yena ati bhikkhunā saḥ ti nānā saṃvāsako

original: Dvinnaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakānaṃ viseso heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Ṭhapanaṃ jānitabbanti ettha kiṃ
analyzed: dvinnam nānā saṃvāsakānam visesaḥ heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva ṭhapanam jānitabban ti ettha kim

original: ṭhapanaṃ nāmāti āha “pātimokkhaṭṭhapana”nti.
analyzed: ṭhapanam nāma ati āha pātimokkha ṭṭhapananti

original: Iti ekakavāravaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti ekaka vāra vaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā

original: Ekuttarikanayo dukavāravaṇṇanā
322. Dukesu acittakā āpattīti sambandho. Bhūtārocanāpattīti pācittiyāpatti. Abhūtārocanāpattīti
analyzed: dukesu acittakā āpatti iti sambandhaḥ bhūta ārocanā āpatti iti pācittiya āpatti abhūta ārocanā āpatti iti

original: pārājikathullaccayāpatti. Padasodhammādikātiādisaddena uttarichapañcavācā saṅgahitā.
analyzed: pārājika thullaccaya āpatti pada sodhamma ādikā ati ādi saddena uttari cha pañca vācā saṅgahitā

original: Mañcapīṭhādīnantiādisaddena bhisiādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Anāpucchāgamanādīsūti ādisaddena
analyzed: mañca pīṭha ādīn anti ādi saddena bhisi ādayo saṅgaṇhāti anāpucchā gamana ādīsu iti ādi saddena

original: anuddharitvā gamanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sapuggaloti so attasaṅkhāto puggalo sapuggalo. Parapuggaloti
analyzed: an uddharitvā gamanam saṅgaṇhāti sa puggalo ti saḥ atta saṅkhāto puggalo sa puggalo para puggalo ti

original: paro puggalo parapuggalo. Garukanti saṅghādisesaṃ. Lahukanti pācittiyaṃ. Puna garukanti
analyzed: paraḥ puggalaḥ para puggalaḥ garukanti saṅgha ādisesam lahukanti pācittiyam puna garukanti

original: pārājikaṃ. Puna lahukanti pācittiyameva.
analyzed: pārājikam puna lahukam ti pācittiyam eva

original: Aṅgulimattampīti pisaddena kesaggamattampīti atthaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Tanti mañcapīṭhaṃ. Gamiyo āpajjati nāmāti sambandho.
analyzed: aṅguli mattam pi iti pisaddena kesagga mattam pi iti attham sampiṇḍeti tanti mañca pīṭham gamiyaḥ āpajjati nāma ati sambandhaḥ

original: “Ādiyanto āpajjati nāmā”tiādinā atthāpatti ādiyanto āpajjatīti pāḷiyaṃ ādiyanto hutvā
analyzed: ādiyantaḥ āpajjati nāma ati ādinā atthāpatti ādiyantaḥ āpajjati iti pāḷiyam ādiyantaḥ hutvā

original: āpajjati āpatti atthīti yojanānayaṃ dasseti. Evañhi sati “āpajjatī”ti ākhyātapadaṃ
analyzed: āpajjati āpatti atthi iti yojanā nayam dasseti evam hi sati āpajjati iti ākhyāta padam

original: “atthī”ti kiriyantaraṃ apekkhitvā kattā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā ādiyanto puggalo
analyzed: atthi iti kiriya antaram apekkhitvā kattā hoti iti daṭṭhabbam atha vā ādiyantaḥ puggalo

original: yaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, sā āpatti atthīti yojanā. Eseva nayo aññesupi. Mūgabbatādīnīti
analyzed: yam āpattim āpajjati sā āpatti atthi iti yojanā esā iva nayaḥ aññesu pi mūgabbata ādīni iti

original: ādisaddena govatakukkuravatādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Pārivāsikādayo āpajjantīti sambandho.
analyzed: ādi saddena govata kukkuravata ādīni saṅgaṇhāti pārivāsika ādayaḥ āpajjanti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Tajjanīyādikammakatā vā puggalāti yojanā. Asamādiyantā āpajjantīti asamādiyantā hutvā
analyzed: tajjanīya ādi kammakatāḥ vā yojanāḥ a samādiyantāḥ āpajjanti iti a samādiyantāḥ hutvā

original: āpajjanti. Teti puggale. Karonto āpajjati nāmāti karonto hutvā āpajjati nāmāti yojanā.
analyzed: āpajjanti te iti puggale karontaḥ āpajjati nāma ati karontaḥ hutvā āpajjati nāma ati yojanā

original: Evaṃ dento āpajjati nāmātiādīsupi.
analyzed: evam dentaḥ āpajjati nāma ati ādīsu pi

original: Ekarattachārattasattāhadasāhamāsātikkamesūti “ekarattampi ticīvarena vippavaseyyā”ti
analyzed: eka ratta chāratta satta aha dasa aha māsa atikkamesu uti eka rattam pi ti cīvarena vippavaseyya ati

original: ca “chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabba”nti ca “sattāhaparamaṃ
analyzed: ca chāratta paramam tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbanti ca satta aha paramam

original: sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabba”nti ca “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba”nti
analyzed: sannidhi kārakam paribhuñjitabbanti ca dasa aha paramam atireka cīvaram dhāretabbanti

original: ca “māsaparamaṃ nikkhipitabba”nti ca vuttakālātikkamesu.
analyzed: ca māsa paramam nikkhipitabban ti ca vutta kāla atikkamesu

original: Imaṃ pana āpattiṃ āpajjati nāmāti sambandho.
analyzed: imam pana āpattim āpajjati nāma ati sambandhaḥ

original: Yasmiṃ pakkhe nisinnoti yasmiṃ pakkhe sayaṃ nisinno. Tesanti attano pakkhe nisinnānaṃ,
analyzed: yasmin pakkhe nisinnaḥ ti yasmin pakkhe sayam nisinnaḥ tesanti attanaḥ pakkhe nisinnānam

original: nānāsaṃvāsakanti sambandho. Yesanti sakapakkhe nisinnānaṃ. Kammaṃ kopetīti nānāsaṃvāsakattā
analyzed: nānā saṃvāsakanti sambandhaḥ yesanti saka pakkhe nisinnānam kammam kopeti iti nānā saṃvāsaka ttā

original: kammaṃ kopeti. Itaresanti parapakkhe nisinnānaṃ. Hatthapāsaṃ anāgatattā kammaṃ kopetīti
analyzed: kammam kopeti itaresan ti para pakkhe nisinnānam hattha pāsam anāgata ttā kammam kopeti iti

original: yojanā. “Eseva nayo”ti vuttavacanaṃ vitthārento āha “yesaṃ hī”tiādi. Yesanti sakapakkhe
analyzed: yojanā esā iva nayo ti vutta vacanam vitthārentaḥ āha yesam hi itiādi yesanti saka pakkhe

original: vā parapakkhe vā nisinnānaṃ yesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ. Soti bhikkhu. Āpajjitabbatoti āpajjitabbabhāvato.
analyzed: vā parapakkhe vā nisinnānam yesam bhikkhūnam saḥ ti bhikkhu āpajjitabbataḥ āpajjitabba bhāvataḥ

original: Iminā puggalena chahi samuṭṭhānehi āpajjitabbāti āpattiyoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: iminā puggalena chahi samuṭṭhānehi āpajjitabbā ati āpattiyaḥ ti vacana attham dasseti

original: Kammena vā salākaggāhena vāti ettha uddeso kamme lakkhaṇahāranayena saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: kammena vā salākaggāhena vā ti ettha uddesaḥ kamme lakkhaṇa hāra nayena saṅgaham gacchati

original: vohārānussāvanā salākaggāheti dassento āha “uddeso ceva…pe… eka”nti. Pubbabhāgāti
analyzed: vohāra anussāvanā salākaggāhā iti dassentaḥ āha uddesaḥ ekanti pubbabhāgā ti

original: saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāge pavattā. Pamāṇanti saṅghabhedassa kāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgha bhedassa pubba bhāge pavattā pamāṇam ti saṅgha bhedassa kāraṇam

original: Addhānahīno nāmāti ettha addhānasaddo kālapariyāyoti āha “ūnavīsativasso”ti. Theyyasaṃvāsakādayotiādisaddena
analyzed: addhānahīnaḥ nāma ati ettha addhāna saddo kāla pariyāyo ti āha ūnavīsati vassaḥ ti theyya saṃvāsaka ādayaḥ iti ādi saddena

original: titthiyapakkantakabhikkhunīdūsakapañcānantariyā saṅgahetabbā. Aṭṭha abhabbapuggalā
analyzed: titthiya pakkantaka bhikkhunī dūsaka pañcānantariyā saṅgahetabbā aṭṭha abhabba puggalā

original: karaṇadukkaṭakā nāma hontīti yojanā. Ettha kattabbanti karaṇaṃ, kammaṃ, duṭṭhu kattabbanti
analyzed: karaṇa dukkaṭakāḥ nāma honti iti yojanā ettha kattabbanti karaṇam kammam duṭṭhu kattabbanti

original: dukkaṭaṃ, kammameva. Karaṇaṃ dukkaṭametassāti karaṇadukkaṭako. Visesanaparanipāto
analyzed: dukkaṭam kammam eva karaṇam dukkaṭam etassa ati karaṇadukkaṭakaḥ visesana para nipātaḥ

original: “agyāhito”tiādīsu viya. Tadevatthaṃ dassento āha “dukkaṭakiriyā”tiādi. No ca yācatīti
analyzed: agyāhitaḥ itiādīsu viya tad eva attham dassentaḥ āha dukkaṭa kiriyā atiādi no ca yācati iti

original: ettha yācadhātuyā padhānakammaṃ dassento āha “upasampada”nti, “saṅgha”nti apadhānakammamānetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ettha yāca dhātuyā padhāna kammam dassentaḥ āha saṅghanti apadhāna kammam ānetabbam

original: Tepiṭakoti tipiṭakaṃ vācuggatavasena dhārako. Āṇāyapīti pisaddo “matenapī”ti atthaṃ
analyzed: tepiṭakaḥ ti piṭakam vācuggata vasena dhārakaḥ āṇāya pi iti pi saddaḥ matena pi iti attham

original: sampiṇḍeti. Yācantassevāti nissayaṃ ācariyaṃ yācantasseva. Yaṃ vatthuṃ ajjhācaranto
analyzed: sampiṇḍeti yācantassa iva ati nissayam ācariyam yācantassa iva yam vatthum ajjhācarantaḥ

original: āpattiṃ āpajjati, taṃ vatthu sātisāraṃ nāmāti yojanā.
analyzed: āpattim āpajjati tam vatthu sa atisāram nāma ati yojanā

original: Upaghātikāti ettha upahanantīti upaghātā, teyeva upaghātikāti dassento āha “upaghātā”ti.
analyzed: upaghātikā ati ettha upahananti iti upaghātā teyeva upaghātikā ati dassentaḥ āha upaghātā ti

original: Tatthāti dvīsu upaghātikesu. Dve venayikāti ettha vinayena siddhā venayikāti dassento
analyzed: tattha ati dvīsu upaghātikesu dve venayikā ati ettha vinayena siddhā venayikā ati dassento

original: āha “vinayasiddhā”ti. “Dve atthā”ti iminā ṇikasaddassa sarūpaṃ dasseti. Paññattānulomaṃ
analyzed: āha vinaya siddhā ti dve atthā ti iminā ṇika saddassa sarūpam dasseti paññatta anulomam

original: nāma daṭṭhabbanti sambandho. Paccayaghātoti paccayassa ghāto. Iminā setughātoti ettha
analyzed: nāma daṭṭhabbanti sambandho paccaya ghāto ti paccayassa ghāto iminā setu ghāto ti ettha

original: setusaddo paccayavācakoti dasseti. Cittassāpīti pisaddo pageva kāyavācānanti dasseti.
analyzed: setu saddo paccaya vācako ti dasseti cittassa api iti pi saddo pagā iva kāya vācānam ti dasseti

original: Itipīti pisaddo dutiyatthasampiṇḍano. “Pamāṇenā”ti iminā mattakāritāti ettha mattasaddo
analyzed: iti pi saddaḥ pamāṇena ati iminā matta kāritā ati ettha matta saddaḥ

original: pamāṇatthoti dasseti. “Karaṇa”nti iminā kāritāti taddhitabhāvaṃ kitabhāvena dasseti
analyzed: pamāṇa atthaḥ ti dasseti karaṇam ti iminā kāritā ati taddhita bhāvam kita bhāvena dasseti

original: sabhāgattā. Kāyadvārikanti kāyadvāre pavattaṃ āpattiṃ. Iminā āpajjatīti padassa kammaṃ
analyzed: sabhā gattā kāyadvārikanti kāyadvāre pavattam āpattim iminā āpajjati iti padassa kammaṃ

original: dasseti. Kāyeneva vuṭṭhātīti kāyasāmaggiyā dānattā kāyeneva vuṭṭhāti. Sīsamakkhanādīti
analyzed: dasseti kāyena iva vuṭṭhāti iti kāyasāmaggiyā dāna ttā kāyena iva vuṭṭhāti sīsa makkhana ādi iti

original: ādisaddena pādamakkhanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: ādi saddena pāda makkhana ādim saṅgaṇhāti

original: Tanti bhāraṃ. “Nittharituṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhatī”ti iminā vahanākāraṃ dasseti. Thero samānoti
analyzed: tanti bhāram nittharitum vīriyam ārabhati iti iminā vahana ākāram dasseti theraḥ samānoti

original: yojanā. Navahanākāraṃ dassento āha “anujānāmī”tiādi. “Kukkuccāyitvā karotī”ti iminā
analyzed: yojanā nava hana ākāram dassentaḥ āha anujānāmi itiādi kukkuccāyitvā karoti iti iminā

original: kukkuccasaddassa nāmadhātuṃ dasseti. “Divā ca ratto cā”ti iminā abhiṇhaṃ āsavavaḍḍhanaṃ
analyzed: kukkucca saddassa nāmadhātum dasseti divā ca ratto ca ati iminā abhiṇham āsava vaḍḍhanam

original: dasseti. Tattha tatthāti tesu tesu vibhaṅgakkhandhakesu.
analyzed: dasseti tattha tattha ati tesu tesu vibhaṅga kkhandhakesu

original: Iti dukavāravaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti duka vāra vaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā

original: Ekuttarikanayo tikavāravaṇṇanā
323. Tikesu bhagavati tiṭṭhante yaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, sā āpatti atthīti yojanā. Sabbatthāti
analyzed: tikesu bhagavati tiṭṭhante yam āpattim āpajjati sā āpatti atthi iti yojanā sabbattha ati

original: sabbesu padesu. Vitthāraṃ dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tattha tatthāti tikesu, vitthāro
analyzed: sabbesu padesu vitthāram dassentaḥ āha tattha atiādi tattha tattha ati tikesu vitthāraḥ

original: evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Lohituppādāpattīti anulomapārājikāpatti. “Āvusovādenā”ti
analyzed: evam veditabbaḥ ti yojanā lohituppāda āpatti iti anuloma pārājika āpatti āvuso vādena ati

original: “āvuso”ti vohārena. Voti tumhehi.
analyzed: āvuso iti vohārena tumhehi

original: Kāleti purebhattakāle. Vikāleti pacchābhattakāle. Avasesaṃ āpattinti sambandho. Dasavassomhīti
analyzed: kāle iti purebhatta kāle vikāle iti pacchābhatta kāle avasesam āpattinti sambandhaḥ

original: ahaṃ dasavasso amhi. Navoti pañcavassaaparipuṇṇo. Majjhimoti pañcavassato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: aham dasa vassaḥ amhi navaḥ ti pañca vassa a paripuṇṇo majjhimaḥ ti pañca vassataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: yāva dasavassaaparipuṇṇo. Kusalacitto āpajjatīti kusalacitto hutvā āpajjati. Abyākatacittoti
analyzed: yāva dasa vassa aparipuṇṇaḥ kusala cittaḥ āpajjati iti kusala cittaḥ hutvā āpajjati abyākata cittaḥ ti

original: supantassa bhavaṅgacittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yanti āpattiṃ. Sabbanti āpattiṃ, āpajjatīti
analyzed: supantassa bhavaṅga cittam sandhāya vuttam yanti āpattim sabbanti āpattim āpajjati iti

original: sambandho. Dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī hutvā āpajjatīti yojanā. Yanti āpattiṃ.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ dukkha vedanā samaṅgī hutvā āpajjati iti yojanāḥ yanti āpattim

original: Tayo paṭikkhepāti ettha paṭikkhepassa sāmikaṃ dassento āha “buddhassa bhagavato”ti.
analyzed: tayo paṭikkhepā ti ettha paṭikkhepassa sāmikam dassentaḥ āha buddhassa bhagavataḥ ti

original: Kilesasallekhanakapaṭipattiyāti kilesaṃ sallikhati tanuṃ karotīti kilesasallekhanakā,
analyzed: kilesa sallekhanaka paṭipattiyā ati kilesam sallikhati tanum karoti iti kilesa sallekhanakā

original: sāyeva paṭipatti kilesasallekhanakapaṭipatti, tāya.
analyzed: sāya iva paṭipatti kilesa sallekhanaka paṭipatti tāya

original: Parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento bāloti sambandho. Parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento paṇḍito cāti sambandho. Avasesaṃ āpattinti yojanā. Kāḷeti kāḷapakkhe. Juṇheti juṇhapakkhe.
analyzed: parisam upaṭṭhāpento bālo iti sambandho parisam upaṭṭhāpento paṇḍito ca ati sambandho avasesam āpattiṃ ti yojanā kāḷeti kāḷa pakkhe juṇheti juṇha pakkhe

original: Kattikapuṇṇamāsiyāti pacchimakattikapuṇṇamāsiyā. Kurundiyaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Suvuttakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: kattika puṇṇamāsiyā ti pacchima kattika puṇṇamāsiyā kurundiyam vuttanti sambandhaḥ su vutta kāraṇam

original: dassento āha “cātumāsa”ntiādi. Hīti yasmā, pariyesanto ca nivāsento ca bhikkhūti yojanā.
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha hi iti yasmā pariyesantaḥ ca nivāsentaḥ ca bhikkhu iti yojanā

original: Vatthunti methunadhammādivatthuṃ.
analyzed: vatthum ti methuna dhamma ādi vatthum

original: Paṭicchādeti etāyāti paṭicchādīti karaṇatthopi yujjati. Vitthāraṃ dassento āha “dvāraṃ
analyzed: paṭicchāda iti paṭicchādī iti karaṇa atthaḥ api yujjati vitthāram dassentaḥ āha dvāram

original: pidahitvā”tiādi. Etadevāti parikammameva. Ubhayatthāti ubhayesu jantāgharapaṭicchādiudakapaṭicchādīsu.
analyzed: pidahitvā atiādi etat eva ati parikammam eva ubhayattha iti ubhayesu jantā ghara paṭicchādi udaka paṭicchādīsu

original: Sabbanti akhilaṃ parikammādiṃ. Niyyantīti nilīyitvā yanti. Iminā vahantīti ettha
analyzed: sabbanti akhilam parikamma ādim niyyanti iti nilīyitvā yanti iminā vahanti iti ettha

original: vahadhātu gatyatthoti dasseti. Abbhamahikādhūmarajarāhuvimuttanti abbhena ca mahikāya

analyzed: pañcakesu pañca puggalāḥ yojanā pañca

original: “Lapita”nti iminā durābhaṭṭhanti ettha bhāsadhātuyā kathanatthaṃ dasseti. Yanti vacanaṃ.
