original: Kiñca bhiyyoti tato atirekaṃ kathetabbavacanaṃ kiñcāti attho. Saṃkiliṭṭhañca yaṃ
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas ti tatas atirekam kathetabba vacanam kiñca ati attho saṃkiliṭṭham ca yam

original: padanti ettha cakāro pisaddattho “pada”nti ettha yojetabbo, yaṃsaddo kāraṇatthoti
analyzed: ettha cakāraḥ pi sadda attho padanti ettha yojetabbaḥ yaṃsaddo kāraṇa ttho ti

original: āha “saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ yasmā tampi pada”nti. Tampi padanti tampi vacanaṃ. Padasaddo hi
analyzed: āha saṃkiliṭṭham yasmā tampi tampi padanti tampi vacanam pada saddaḥ hi

original: vacanavācako. Tampi vacanaṃ yasmā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ hotīti yojanā. Kathaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: vacana vācakaḥ vacanam yasmā saṃkiliṭṭham hoti iti yojanā katham saṃkiliṭṭham

original: hotīti yojanā. “Yasmā”ti padena yaṃsaddo kāraṇatthoti dasseti. Nanti padaṃ. “Etaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti yojanā yasmā iti padena yaṃsaddo kāraṇa attho ti dasseti na ti padam etam

original: iti vuccatī”ti saṃvaṇṇetabbapadaṃ. “Dubbhāsitanti etaṃ vuccatī”ti saṃvaṇṇanāpadaṃ.
analyzed: iti vuccati iti saṃvaṇṇetabba padam dubbhāsitam ti etam vuccati iti saṃvaṇṇanā padam

original: Etanti etaṃ padaṃ, etaṃ vacananti attho.
analyzed: etam ti etam padam etam vacananti attho

original: Etthāti sekhiyagāthāya. Idanti āpattīnaṃ nibbacanadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ, vuttanti sambandho. Kassa dīpanatthaṃ vuttanti āha “saṅgahitassa atthassa dīpanattha”nti.
analyzed: ettha ati sekhiya gāthāya idam ti āpattīnam nibbacana dīpakam vacanam vuttanti sambandhaḥ kassa dīpana attham vuttanti āha saṅgahitassa atthassa dīpana attham ti

original: Tatthāti “channamativassatī”tiādivacane. Gehanti pakatigehaṃ. Idaṃ pana gehanti yojanā.
analyzed: tattha ati channam ativassati iti ādi vacane gehanti pakati geham idam pana gehanti yojanā

original: Vitthārento āha “mūlāpattiñhī”tiādi. “Avivaṭa”nti vatvā tassatthaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: vitthārentaḥ āha mūla āpattim hi itiādi a vivaṭanti vatvā tassa attham dassetum vuttam

original: “succhanna”nti. Vivaṭanti acchannaṃ. Nātivassanabhāvaṃ vitthārento āha “mūlāpattiñhī”tiādi.
analyzed: su channanti vivaṭanti acchannam na ativassana bhāvam vitthārentaḥ āha mūla āpattim hi itiādi

original: Vivaranto bhikkhu nāpajjatīti sambandho. Suddhanteti suddhakoṭṭhāse. “Tasmā”ti ca
analyzed: vivarantaḥ bhikkhu na āpajjati iti sambandhaḥ suddha anta iti suddha koṭṭhāse tasmā iti ca

original: “tenā”ti ca yebhuyyena atthato ekaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “tena kāraṇenā”ti. Evañcetaṃ vivaṭanti
analyzed: tena ati ca yebhuyyena atthataḥ ekam tasmai vuttam tena kāraṇena ati evam ca itam vivaṭanti

original: evaṃ etaṃ channaṃ ce vivaṭanti yojanā.
analyzed: evam etam channam yojanā

original: Paripātiyamānānanti abhibhūyamānānaṃ. “Rukkhādigahanaṃ arañña”nti iminā pavananti
analyzed: paripātiyamānānam ti abhibhūyamānānam rukkha ādi gahanam araññanti iminā pavananti

original: padassa araññapariyāyataṃ dasseti. Gatisaddassa bhavabhedādiatthaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
analyzed: padassa arañña pariyāya tam dasseti gati saddassa bhava bheda ādi attham paṭikkhipitvā

original: paṭissaraṇatthe hotīti dassento āha “paṭissaraṇaṃ hotī”ti. Tanti pavanaṃ. Teti migā.
analyzed: paṭissaraṇa atthe hoti iti dassentaḥ āha paṭissaraṇam hoti iti tanti pavanam teti migā

original: “Assasantī”ti padena “passasantī”ti atthopi gahetabbo avinābhāvato, ānāpānaṃ karontīti
analyzed: assasanti iti padena passasanti iti atthaḥ api gahetabbaḥ avinābhāvataḥ āna apānam karonti iti

original: attho. Ākāsoti ajaṭākāso. Pakkhīnanti vihaṅgamānaṃ. “Sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammāna”nti
analyzed: atthaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ajaṭa ākāsaḥ pakkhīnam ti vihaṅgamānam sabbesam saṅkhata dhammānam ti

original: iminā dhammānanti ettha saṅkhatadhammoyeva gahetabboti dasseti. “Vināsovā”ti iminā
analyzed: iminā dhammānan ti ettha gahetabbaḥ ti dasseti vināsaḥ uvā ti iminā

original: vibhavasaddo vināsavācakoti dasseti. Tesanti sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ. Gatīti
analyzed: vibhava saddaḥ vināsa vācakaḥ ti dasseti tesam ti sabbesam pi saṅkhata dhammānam gatī ti

original: patiṭṭhā. Kasmā vibhavo dhammānaṃ gati hotīti āha “na hī”tiādi. Hīti yasmā. Teti
analyzed: patiṭṭhā kasmā vibhavaḥ dhammānam gati hoti iti āha na hi itiādi hi iti yasmā te iti

original: sabbepi saṅkhatadhammā. Vināsanti vibhavaṃ. Sucirampīti asītivassādikālampi. Nibbānaṃ
analyzed: sabbe pi saṅkhata dhammāḥ vinā asanti vibhavam su ciram pi iti asīti vassa ādi kālam pi nibbānam

original: arahato gatīti saṃvaṇṇetabbapadaṃ. “Khīṇāsavassā”ti iminā arahatoti padassa atthaṃ
analyzed: arahataḥ gatī iti saṃvaṇṇetabba padam khīṇāsavassa ati iminā arahataḥ iti padassa attham

original: dasseti. “Anupādisesanibbānadhātū”ti iminā “nibbāna”nti padassa idha adhippetanibbānaṃ
analyzed: dasseti anupādisesa nibbāna dhātū ti iminā nibbānam ti padassa idha adhippeta nibbānam

original: dasseti. Gāthāya te te atthā saṃgahetvā gaṇiyanti etthāti gāthāsaṅgaṇikaṃ.
analyzed: dassa iti gāthāya te te atthā saṃgahetvā gaṇiyanti ettha ati gāthāsaṅgaṇikam

original: Iti paṭhamagāthāsaṅgaṇikavaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti paṭhama gāthā saṅgaṇika vaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā

original: Adhikaraṇabhedaṃ
analyzed: adhikaraṇa bhedam

original: Ukkoṭanabhedādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: ukkoṭana bheda ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 340. Adhikaraṇabhede evamattho veditabboti yojanā. Dassetuṃ āhāti sambandho. Dve
analyzed: adhikaraṇa bhede evam atthaḥ veditabba iti yojanā dassetum āha iti sambandhaḥ dve

original: samatheti ettha dvinnaṃ samathānaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento āha “sammukhāvinayañca yebhuyyasikañcā”ti.
analyzed: samatha iti ettha dvinnam samathānam sarūpam dassentaḥ āha sammukha avinayam ca yebhuyyasikam ca ati

original: “Paṭisedhetī”ti iminā ukkoṭetīti ettha kuṭadhātuyā chedanatthaṃ atthato dasseti.
analyzed: paṭisedheti iti iminā ukkoṭeti iti ettha kuṭa dhātuyā chedana attham atthataḥ dasseti

original: Chedanaṃ nāma atthato samathapaṭisedhananti attho.
analyzed: chedanam nāma atthato samatha paṭisedhanan ti attho

original: 341. Dvādasasu ukkoṭesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Akataṃ kammantiādayoti ettha ādisaddena
analyzed: dvādasasu ukkoṭesu iti niddhāraṇe bhummam akatam ettha ādi saddena

original: “dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ, puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti dve ukkoṭā saṅgahetabbā. Anihataṃ kammantiādayoti
analyzed: dukkaṭam kammam puna kātabbam kammanti dve ukkoṭā saṅgahetabbāḥ anihatam

original: ettha ādisaddena “dunnihataṃ, puna nihanitabba”nti dve ukkoṭā saṅgahetabbā. Avinicchitantiādayoti
analyzed: ettha ādi saddena dunnihatam puna nihanitabbanti dve ukkoṭā saṅgahetabbāḥ avinicchita nti ādayaḥ ti

original: ettha ādisaddena “duvinicchitaṃ, puna vinicchitabba”nti dve ukkoṭā saṅgahetabbā.
analyzed: ettha ādi saddena du vinicchitam puna vinicchitabbanti dve ukkoṭā saṅgahetabbā

original: Avūpasantantiādayoti ettha ādisaddena “duvūpasantaṃ, puna vūpasametabba”nti dve ukkoṭā
analyzed: ettha ādi saddena du vūpasantam puna vūpasametabbanti dve ukkoṭā

original: saṅgahetabbā. Apicāti sāmaññato pana.
analyzed: saṅgahetabbāḥ api ca ati sāmaññato pana

original: Tattha jātakanti ettha tasaddassa visayaṃ dassento āha “yasmiṃvihāre”ti. Yasmiṃvihāre
analyzed: tattha jātakam ti ettha visayam dassentaḥ āha yasmin vihāre iti yasmin vihāre

original: uppannaṃ hotīti sambandho. Aññamaññassa attesu, attānaṃ vā paṭipakkhaṃ atthayanti
analyzed: uppannam hoti iti sambandhaḥ aññamaññassa attesu attānam vā paṭipakkham atthayanti

original: icchantīti attapaccatthikā. Pāḷimuttakavinicchayenevāti pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi samathehi
analyzed: icchanti iti atta paccatthikā pāḷi muttaka vinicchayena iva ati pāḷiyam āgatehi samathehi

original: muttakena dhammadesanāmattavinicchayeneva. Idanti adhikaraṇaṃ. Yenāpi vinicchayenāti
analyzed: muttakena dhamma desanā matta vinicchayena iva idan ti adhikaraṇam yena api vinicchayena ati

original: pāḷimuttakena yenāpi vinicchayena.
analyzed: pāḷimuttakena yena api vinicchayena

original: Aññoti nevāsikehi añño vinayadharo pucchatīti sambandho. Tehi cāti nevāsikehi ca.
analyzed: aññaḥ ti nevāsikehi aññaḥ vinaya dharo pucchati iti sambandho tehi ca ati nevāsikehi ca

original: Etassāti vinayadharassa. Ayanti vinayadharo. Tatthāti taṃ gāmaṃ. Aññamaññaṃ vā saññāpentīti
analyzed: etassa ati vinaya dharassa tattha ati tam gāmam aññam aññam vā saññāpenti iti

original: attapaccatthikā aññamaññaṃ vā saññāpenti. Te bhikkhūti te attapaccatthikā bhikkhū.
analyzed: atta paccatthikāḥ aññam aññam vā saññāpenti te bhikkhū ti te atta paccatthikāḥ bhikkhū

original: Nijjhāpentīti saññāpenti. Ukkoṭeti yoti yo ukkoṭeti. Eteti attapaccatthike bhikkhū,
analyzed: nijjhāpenti iti saññāpenti ukkoṭeti yaḥ ti yaḥ ukkoṭeti ete iti atta paccatthike bhikkhū

original: disvāti sambandho. Tatthāti gāmaṃ. Tatthevāti antarāmagge eva.
analyzed: disvā iti sambandho tattha ati gāmam tattha iva iti antara āmagge eva

original: Tatthevāti gāmameva. Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne. Tattha gatanti taṃ gāmaṃ gataṃ.
analyzed: tattha iva ati gāmam eva tattha iva ati tasmiṃyā iva ṭhāne tattha gatanti tam gāmam gatan

original: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā pācittiyameva atidisati.
analyzed: esā iva iminā pācittiyam eva atidisati

original: Saṅghena…pe… adhikaraṇe vadantopīti sambandho. Yaṃ panetaṃ āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotīti
analyzed: adhikaraṇe vadantaḥ api iti sambandhaḥ yam pana itam āpatti vuṭṭhānam nāma hoti iti

original: yojanā. Etanti āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ. Vadantopīti pisaddo na kevalaṃ tiṇavatthārakaṃ ukkoṭentoyeva
analyzed: yojanā etat ti āpatti vuṭṭhānam vadantaḥ api iti pi saddaḥ na kevalam tiṇavatthārakam ukkoṭentaḥ yeva

original: ukkoṭeti nāma, atha kho vadantopīti dasseti.
analyzed: ukkoṭa iti nāma atha kho vadantaḥ api iti dasseti

original: Chandāgatiṃ gacchantotiādīsu agatigamanākāraṃ dassento āha “vinayadharo hutvā”tiādi.
analyzed: chanda agatim gacchantaḥ itiādīsu agati gamana ākāram dassentaḥ āha vinayadharaḥ hutvā itiādi

original: Atthāya ukkoṭentoti sambandho. Tassāti anatthaṃ carantassa. Mando pana ukkoṭeti nāmāti
analyzed: atthāya ukkoṭento ti sambandhaḥ tassa ti anattham carantassa mandaḥ pana ukkoṭeti nāma ati

original: sambandho. Eko balavanissito ca hotīti sambandho. Gahanamicchādiṭṭhinti gahanasadisaṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ ekaḥ balava nissito ca hoti iti sambandhaḥ gahanam icchā diṭṭhinti gahana sadisam

original: micchādiṭṭhiṃ pavanasadisaṃ micchādiṭṭhinti attho. Balavante cāti ettha casaddo sabbakammesu
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhim pavana sadisam micchādiṭṭhim ti atthaḥ balavante ca ati ettha casaddaḥ sabba kammesu

original: yojetabbo. Nissitattāti ekassa nissitattā. Balavanissito cāti etthāpi ca saddo sabbakattūsu
analyzed: yojetabbaḥ nissita ttā ati ekassa nissita ttā balava nissitaḥ ca ati ettha api ca saddo sabba kattūsu

original: yojetabbo. Tassāti visamādinissitassa.
analyzed: yojetabbo tassa ti visama ādi nissitassa

original: Soti sāmaṇero. Maṅkubhūtātthāti maṅkū hutvā bhūtā, maṅkuṃ vā pattā attha bhavathāti
analyzed: saḥ uti sāmaṇeraḥ maṅku bhūtā attha ati maṅkū hutvā bhūtāḥ maṅkum vā pattāḥ attha bhavatha ati

original: attho. Teti parājayabhikkhū. Tassāti sāmaṇerassa. Soti sāmaṇero. Teti parājayabhikkhū.
analyzed: attho te iti parājaya bhikkhū tassa ati sāmaṇerassa saḥ iti sāmaṇeraḥ te iti parājaya bhikkhū

original: Tanti sāmaṇeraṃ. Soti daharo. Tatoti sannipātakāraṇā. Hiyyoti anantarātītāhe. Itīti
analyzed: sāmaṇeram saḥ iti daharaḥ sannipāta kāraṇā anantara atīta ahe iti iti

original: evaṃ vadeti. Soti daharo. Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti yojanā. Gacchāti gacchāhi.
analyzed: evam vadeti saḥ ti daharaḥ idam sikkhāpadam paññattanti yojanā gacchāti gacchāhi

original: Itīti evaṃ vattabboti yojanā.
analyzed: iti iti evam vattabbā iti yojanā

original: Saṅghena saddhiṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitvā pariveṇagataṃ ekaṃ bhikkhunti yojanā.
analyzed: saṅghena saddhim adhikaraṇam vinicchinitvā pariveṇa gatam ekam bhikkhunti yojanā

original: Kissāti kena kāraṇena. Evaṃ iminākārena vinicchitabbaṃ nanūti yojanā. Soti vinicchayakārako
analyzed: kissa ati kena kāraṇena evam iminā ākārena vinicchitabbam nanu uti yojanā saḥ iti vinicchaya kārakaḥ

original: bhikkhu. Chandadāyako suviññeyyoyeva.
analyzed: bhikkhu chanda dāyako

original: Adhikaraṇanidānādivaṇṇanā
342. Kiṃnidānantiādīsu chasu padesu samāsabhāvaṃ dassento āha “kiṃnidānamassā”tiādi.
analyzed: kiṃnidāna ntiādīsu chasu padesu samāsa bhāvam dassentaḥ āha kiṃnidānam assa atiādi

original: Assāti vivādādhikaraṇassa. “Kiṃnidāna”nti padānaṃ satipi samāsabhāve byañjanantapakatikattā
analyzed: assa ati vivāda adhikaraṇassa kiṃnidānam ti padānam satipi samāsa bhāve

original: “ki”nti niggahitantabhāvena uccāraṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sabbānetānīti sabbāni nidānantiādīni
analyzed: kim ti niggahita anta bhāvena uccāraṇam kātabbam sabbānetāni iti sabbāni nidāna nti ādīni

original: etāni padāni. Vevacanānīti ekasmiṃyeva “kāraṇa”nti atthe vividhāni vacanāni vivacanāni,
analyzed: etāni padāni vevacanāni iti atthe vividhāni vacanāni vivacanāni

original: tāniyeva vevacanāni. Atha vā vividhaṃ vacanametassatthassāti vivacanaṃ, kāraṇasaṅkhāto
analyzed: tāni yā iva vevacanāni atha vā vividham vacanam etassa atthassa ati vivacanam kāraṇa saṅkhātaḥ

original: attho, abhidheyyaabhidhānabhāvena sambandhattā vivacanassa etāni vevacanāni, padāni.
analyzed: atthaḥ abhidheyya abhidhāna bhāvena vivacanassa etāni vevacanāni padāni

original: “Aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthusaṅkhāto”ti iminā vivādasarūpaṃ dasseti. Vivādanti aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthusaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa bheda kara vatthu saṅkhātaḥ ti iminā vivāda sarūpam dasseti vivādanti aṭṭhārasa bheda kara vatthu saṅkhātam

original: vivādaṃ. Etanti “vivādanidāna”nti etaṃ vacanaṃ. Assāti anuvādādhikaraṇassa. Idampīti
analyzed: vivādam etat ti vivāda nidānam ti etam vacanam assa ati anuvāda adhikaraṇassa idam pi iti

original: “anuvādanidāna”nti vacanampi. Assāti āpattādhikaraṇassa. Etanti “āpattinidāna”nti
analyzed: anuvāda nidānam ti vacanam pi assa ati āpatta adhikaraṇassa etat ti āpatti nidānam ti

original: vacanaṃ. Kiccameva byañjanavaḍḍhanavasena kiccayanti vuttaṃ. Assāti kiccādhikaraṇassa.
analyzed: vacanam kiccam eva byañjana vaḍḍhana vasena kiccayanti vuttam assa ati kicca adhikaraṇassa

original: Samanubhāsanādīnaṃ uppajjanakakiccānanti sambandho. Etanti “kiccayanidāna”nti vacanaṃ.
analyzed: samanubhāsana ādīnam sambandhaḥ etat ti vacanam

original: Ekapadayojanāti ekena “nidāna”nti padena yojanā. Sabbapadānīti sabbāni samudayādīni padāni.
analyzed: eka pada yojanā ati ekena nidānam ti padena yojanā sabba padāni iti sabbāni samudaya ādīni padāni

original: Navannanti jātivasena channaṃ hetūnaṃ navasu antogadhattā tikavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Byañjanamattanti
analyzed: jāti vasena channam hetūnam navasu tika vasena itam vuttam byañjana mattam ti

original: hetupaccayavasena byañjanameva. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Etthāti tatiyapucchāvissajjane.
analyzed: hetu paccaya vasena byañjanam eva hi iti saccam yasmai vai ettha ati tatiya pucchā vissajjane

original: 343. Dvādasa mūlānīti ettha dvādasannaṃ mūlānaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento āha “kodhaupanāhayugaḷakādīnī”tiādi.
analyzed: dvādasa mūlāni iti ettha dvādasannam mūlānam sarūpam dassentaḥ āha kodha aupanāha yugaḷaka ādīni itiādi

original: Ettha ādisaddena makkhapaḷāsayugaḷa issāmacchariyayugaḷa māyāsāṭheyyayugaḷa pāpicchamicchādiṭṭhiyugaḷa
analyzed: ettha ādi saddena makkha paḷāsa yugaḷa issā macchariya yugaḷa māyā sāṭheyya yugaḷa

original: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggiyugaḷavasena pañca yugaḷāni saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: sandiṭṭhi parāmāsi ādhāna ggāhi duppaṭinissaggi yugaḷa vasena pañca yugaḷāni saṅgaṇhāti

original: Ajjhattasantānappavattānīti niyakajjhattasantāne pavattāni.
analyzed: ajjhatta santāna pavattāni iti niyaka jjhatta santāne pavattāni

original: Aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūnaṃ samuṭṭhānabhāvaṃ nibbacanena pakāsento āha “taṃ hī”tiādi.
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa bheda kara vatthūnam samuṭṭhāna bhāvam nibbacanena pakāsentaḥ āha tam hi itiādi

original: Tanti anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, samuṭṭhātīti sambandho. Ettha ca “etesū”ti iminā adhikaraṇabhāvaṃ
analyzed: anuvāda adhikaraṇam samuṭṭhāti iti sambandhaḥ ettha ca etesu iti iminā adhikaraṇa bhāvam

original: dasseti. “Etehī”ti iminā karaṇabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāti kāraṇena. Assāti vivādādhikaraṇassa.

original: 362-3. Sacce ca akuppe cāti padhānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ dassento āha “patiṭṭhātabba”nti.
analyzed: sacce ca akuppe ca ati padhānam sambandha ṭṭhānam dassentaḥ āha patiṭṭhātabbam ti

original: “Ya”ntiādinā sacce patiṭṭhātabbabhāvaṃ dasseti. Yanti kammaṃ. “Na cā”tiādinā akuppe

original: patiṭṭhātabbabhāvaṃ dasseti. Otiṇṇañcāti vinicchayaṃ otiṇṇañca. “Vacana”nti iminā

original: otiṇṇānotiṇṇasarūpaṃ dasseti. Tatrāti purimavacanāpekkhaṃ. “Otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabba”nti
analyzed: otiṇṇa anotiṇṇa sarūpam dasseti tatra ati purima vacana apekkham otiṇṇa anotiṇṇam jānitabbanti

analyzed: vā codakassa pamāṇam cuditakassa pamāṇam ti dhamma cuditakaḥ nu kho no ti cuditakassa

original: Anuvijjako vattabboti sambandho. Yena dhammenātiādīsu dhammādīnaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento
analyzed: anuvijjakaḥ vattabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ yena dhammena ati ādīsu dhamma ādīnam sarūpam dassento

analyzed: paññāya abhāvato ti iminā dummedho ti ettha du saddo abhāva attho medhā saddo paññā pariyāyo ti

original: Ubhopeteti ubhopi ete āmisapuggalanissaye. Dhammoti sāsanadhammo. Itīti ayamattho.

analyzed: agati agantabba vaṇṇanā

403. Kathine khandhaketi kathinakkhandhake. Pubbeti kathinakkhandhake.

analyzed: eka apahārena iminā sahajāta saddassa attham dasseti

original: Evaṃ pucchitvāti sambandho. Yanti dhammajātaṃ. Idāni āhāti sambandho. Yassāti payogādikassa.
analyzed: evam pucchitvā iti sambandhaḥ yanti dhamma jātam idāni āha ati sambandhaḥ yassa ati payoga ādikassa

original: Tadevāti dhammajātameva. Tassāti “pubbakaraṇaṃ payogassā”tiādivacanassa attho evaṃ
analyzed: tat eva ati dhamma jātam eva tassa ati pubba karaṇam payogassa ati ādi vacanassa atthaḥ evam

original: veditabboti yojanā. “Payogassa katame dhammā”tiādi yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha vissajjanaṃ
analyzed: veditabbaḥ iti yojanā payogassa katame dhammā atiādi yam vacanam vuttam tattha vissajjanam

original: mayā vuccateti yojanā. Iminā pāḷiyaṃ ajjhāharitvā yojetabbabhāvaṃ dasseti. Catūhi
analyzed: mayā vuccate iti yojanā iminā pāḷiyam ajjhāharitvā yojetabba bhāvam dasseti catūhi

original: paccayehi paccayākāraṃ vitthārento āha “payogassa hī”tiādi. Payogassa pubbakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: paccayehi paccaya ākāram vitthārentaḥ āha payogassa hi itiādi payogassa pubba karaṇam

original: paccayo hotīti sambandho. Uddiṭṭhadhammesūti “anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā uddiṭṭhesu

original: dhammesu purejātapaccayo panesāti sambandho. Atha vā uddiṭṭhadhammesūti pubbakaraṇavasena
analyzed: dhammesu purejāta paccayo pana esa ati sambandho atha vā uddiṭṭha dhammesu iti pubba karaṇa vasena

original: uddiṭṭhesu dhovanādidhammesu ekadhammampīti sambandho. Na labhatīti udakāharaṇādipayogassa
analyzed: uddiṭṭhesu dhovana ādi dhammesu eka dhammam pi iti sambandhaḥ na labhati iti udaka āharaṇa ādi payogassa

original: pubbe na labhati. Ayanti udakāharaṇādipayogo. Pacchājātapaccayaṃ pana labhatīti udakāharaṇādipayogo
analyzed: pubbe na labhati ayanti udaka āharaṇa ādi payogo pacchājāta paccayam pana labhati iti udaka āharaṇa ādi payogo

original: pacchājātapaccayaṃ labhati. Kasmā labhatīti āha “pacchā uppajjanakassa hī”tiādi.
analyzed: pacchājāta paccayam labhati kasmai labhati iti āha pacchā uppajjanakassa hi itiādi

original: Pacchāti payogassa, payogato vā paraṃ. Hi yasmā kayirati, tasmā labhatīti yojanā.
analyzed: payogassa payogataḥ vā param hi tasmai labhati iti yojanā

original: Sahajātapaccayaṃ pana na labhatīti sambandho. Mātikāpalibodhānisaṃsasaṅkhāteti aṭṭhamātikādvepalibodhapañcānisaṃsasaṅkhāte.
analyzed: sahajāta paccayam pana na labhati iti sambandhaḥ mātikā pali bodha anisaṃsa saṅkhāte iti aṭṭha mātikā dvepali bodha pañca anisaṃsa saṅkhāte

original: Aññoti pannarasahi dhammehi añño. Payogādīsūtiādisaddena pubbakaraṇapaccuddhāraadhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: aññaḥ ti pannarasahi dhammehi aññaḥ payoga ādīsu iti ādi saddena pubba karaṇa paccuddhāra adhiṭṭhānāni

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Etenupāyenāti etena yathāvuttaupāyena.
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti etena upāyena ati etena yathāvutta opāyena

original: Pubbakaraṇanidānādivibhāgavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pubbakaraṇa nidāna ādi vibhāga vaṇṇanā

original: 406-7. Dvikkhattuṃ pucchitattā “pucchādvaya”nti vuttaṃ. Hetupaccayānaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento
analyzed: dvi kkhattum pucchita ttā pucchā dvayan ti vuttam hetu paccayānam sarūpam dassento

original: āha “cha cīvarānī”ti. Kasmā veditabbānīti āha “pubbapayogādīnañhī”tiādi. Hīti yasmā.

original: Tāniyevāti cha cīvarāni eva. Evasaddo pacchāpi yojetabbo, tāni evāti attho. Hīti
analyzed: tāni yeva ati cha cīvarāni eva eva saddo pacchā api yojetabbo tāni eva ati atthaḥ hi iti

analyzed: saccam pubba karaṇa ādīni na atthi iti yojanā

original: 408. “Imāya saṅghāṭiyā”tiādinā vacībhedākāraṃ dasseti. Kathinatthārakena yasmā paccuddhāro
analyzed: imāya saṅghāṭiyā iti ādinā vacī bheda ākāram dasseti yasmā paccuddhāraḥ

original: ca adhiṭṭhānañca karīyati, tasmā kiriyāti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “paccuddhāro ceva adhiṭṭhānañcā”ti.
analyzed: ca adhiṭṭhānañca tasmā kiriyā ati vuccati tena vuttam paccuddhāro ca iva adhiṭṭhānam ca ati

original: 411. Vatthuvipannādīnaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento āha “akappiyadussaṃ hotī”tiādi. Vināsaṃ, vikāraṃ vā pajjatīti vipannaṃ, vatthumeva vipannaṃ vatthuvipannaṃ.
analyzed: vatthu vipanna ādīnam sarūpam dassentaḥ āha akappiya dussam hoti itiādi vināsam vikāram vā pajjati iti vipannam vatthum eva vipannam vatthu vipannam

original: Kathinādijānitabbavibhāgavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kathina ādi jānitabba vibhāga vaṇṇanā

original: 412. Tesaññeva dhammānanti ettha dhammānaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento āha “yesu rūpādidhammesū”ti.
analyzed: tesan eva dhammānan ti ettha dhammānam sarūpam dassentaḥ āha yesu rūpa ādi dhammesu iti

original: Tattha rūpādidhammesūti vaṇṇagandhādīsu suddhaṭṭhakarūpakalāpadhammesu. Satīti santesu.
analyzed: tattha rūpa ādi dhammesu iti vaṇṇa gandha ādīsu suddhaṭṭhaka rūpa kalāpa dhammesu sati iti santesu

original: Tesanti rūpādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ. “Samodhāna”nti iminā saṅgahoti padassa atthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: tesan ti rūpa ādīnam dhammānam samodhānam ti iminā saṅgaho ti padassa attham dasseti

original: “Missībhāvo”ti iminā samavāyoti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Avayavadhammānaṃ saṃ ekabhāvassa
analyzed: missībhāvaḥ ti iminā samavāyaḥ ti padassa attham dasseti avayava dhammānam saṃ eka bhāvassa

original: gahaṇaṃ saṅgaho. Avayavadhammānaṃ samaṃ ayanaṃ pavattanaṃ samavāyo. Bahūsu dhammesūti
analyzed: gahaṇam saṅgahaḥ avayava dhammānam samam ayanam pavattanam samavāyaḥ bahūsu dhammesu iti

original: bahūsu paramatthapaññattidhammesu. Nāmamattanti nāmapaññattimattaṃ. Pubbeti kathinakkhandhake.
analyzed: bahūsu paramattha paññatti dhammesu nāma mattam ti nāma paññatti mattam pubba iti kathina khandhake

original: “Kāraṇehī”ti iminā ākārasaddo kāraṇatthoti dasseti. Yanti vacanaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇehi iti iminā ākāra saddo kāraṇa attho ti dasseti vacanam

original: 416. Uppajjantīti kathinuddhārā uppajjanti. Kinti kiṃ atthajātaṃ. Sabbepi kathinuddhārāti
analyzed: uppajjanti iti kathinuddhārāḥ uppajjanti kinti kim attha jātam sabbe pi kathinuddhārā ti

original: sambandho. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā. Etthāti kathinuddhāresu. Purimā dveti antarubbhārasahubbhāravasena
analyzed: sambandhaḥ hi iti saccam yasmai vā ettha ati kathin uddhāresu purimā dve iti antar ubbhāra sahubbhāra vasena

original: purimā dve. Etesañcāti purimānaṃ dvinnañca. Itareti avasesā kathinuddhārā. Tesupīti
analyzed: purimā dve etesam ca ati purimānam itarā iti avasesā tesu pi iti

original: itaresu kathinuddhāresu. Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ kathinavinicchaye.
analyzed: itaresu kathin uddhāresu sabbattha ati sabbasmin kathina vinicchaye

original: Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya
analyzed: iti samantapāsādikāya vinaya saṃvaṇṇanāya

original: Paññattivaggavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: paññatti vagga vaṇṇanāya

original: Yojanā samattā.
analyzed: yojanā samattā

original: Upālipañcakaṃ
analyzed: upāli pañcakam

original: Anissitavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: anissita vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 417. Upālipañhesu “kati hi nu kho bhante”ti pucchāya sambandho natthīti kassaci maññanaṃ
analyzed: upāli pañhesu kati hi nu kho bhante ti pucchāya sambandho na atthi iti kassaci maññanam

original: nivārento āha “aya sambandho”ti. Theroti upālitthero, pucchīti sambandho. Imesanti

original: pañcakānaṃ tantinti sambandho. Kesaṃ atthāya tantiṃ ṭhapessāmīti āha “nissāya vasanakārīnaṃ
analyzed: pañcakānam tantim ti sambandhaḥ kesam atthāya tantim ṭhapessāmi iti āha nissāya vasana kārīnam

original: atthāyā”ti. Vasanakārīnaṃ bhikkhūnanti sambandho. Tesanti pañhānaṃ.
analyzed: atthāya ati vasana kārīnam bhikkhūnam ti sambandhaḥ tesan ti pañhānam

original: Āpanno kammakatoti ettha “āpanno”ti padaṃ “kammakato”ti padassa kāraṇadassananti
analyzed: āpanno kamma kato ti ettha āpanno ti padam kamma kato ti padassa kāraṇa dassanan ti

original: āha “āpattiṃ āpanno, tappaccayāva saṅghena kammaṃ kataṃ hotī”ti. Tappaccayāvāti taṃāpattiāpannasaṅkhātā kāraṇā eva.
analyzed: āha āpattim āpannaḥ tad paccayā ava saṅghena kammam katam hoti iti tad paccayā ava ati taṃ āpatti āpanna saṅkhātā kāraṇā eva

original: Nappaṭippassambhanavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: nappaṭippassambhana vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 420. Ayanti kammakato bhikkhu, na vattatīti sambandho. Anulomavatteti katakammassa anulome vatte. Assāti bhikkhussa. Sarajjukoti saha kammasaṅkhātāya rajjuyāti sarajjuko.
analyzed: ayanti kamma kataḥ bhikkhu na vattati iti sambandhaḥ anuloma vatteti kata kammassa anulome vatte assa ati bhikkhussa sa rajjuko ti saha kamma saṅkhātāya rajjuyā ati sa rajjukaḥ

original: 421. Samaggehi bhikkhūhīti sambandho. Hīti saccaṃ. Accayaṃ desāpetvāti aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: samaggehi bhikkhūhi iti sambandhaḥ hi iti saccam accayam desāpetvā iti aññamaññam

original: dosaṃ desāpetvā. Tiṇavatthārakasamathaṃ vāti vāsaddo atthantaravikappo. Tatra ceti
analyzed: dosam desāpetvā tiṇavatthāraka samatham vāti vā saddaḥ atthantara vikappaḥ tatra ca iti

original: ettha tasaddo kammavisayo, cesaddo sacepariyāyoti āha “sace tādise kamme”ti. Diṭṭhāvikammampi

original: katvāti diṭṭhāvikammaṃ katvāpīti yojanā. Pisaddena akatvāpīti sampiṇḍeti. Yatra panāti

original: kamme pana. Tatthāti kamme. Pakkamitabbanti saṅgāmāvacarena pakkamitabbaṃ.
analyzed: kamme pana tattha ati kamme pakkamitabbanti saṅgāma avacarena pakkamitabbam

original: 422. Ussitamantīti ettha ussitaṃ mantī ussitamantīti dassento āha “lobha…pe… bhāsitā”ti.
analyzed: ussita mantī iti ettha ussitam mantī ussita mantī iti dassentaḥ āha lobhape bhāsitā ati

original: Tattha “lobhadosa mohamānussannaṃ vāca”nti iminā ussitapadassa atthaṃ dasseti. “Bhāsitā”ti
analyzed: tattha iminā ussita padassa attham dasseti bhāsitā ati

original: iminā “mantī”ti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Nissitajappīti ettha aññanissitaṃ jappametassāti
analyzed: iminā manti iti padassa attham dasseti nissita jappī iti ettha añña nissitam jappam etassa ati

original: nissitajappīti dassento āha “attano”tiādi. Ettha jappanti vacanaṃ. Jappa vacaneti
analyzed: nissita jappī iti dassentaḥ āha attanā utiādi ettha jappanti vacanam jappa vacana iti

original: hi dhātupāṭhesu vuttaṃ. Ussadayuttanti lobhādiussadayuttaṃ, vacananti sambandho.
analyzed: hi dhātu pāṭhesu vuttam ussada yuttan ti lobha ādi ussada yuttam vacanan ti sambandhaḥ

original: Evamaññanti evaṃ attanā aññaṃ. Kathānusandhivacaneti codakacuditakānaṃ kathāya anusandhivacane.
analyzed: evam aññam ti evam attanā aññam kathā anusandhi vacanā iti codaka cuditakānam kathāya anusandhi vacane

original: Ettha “vacane”ti iminā “bhāsānusandhī”ti ettha bhāsasaddo vacanapariyāyoti dasseti.
analyzed: ettha vacana iti iminā bhāsa anusandhi iti ettha bhāsa saddaḥ vacana pariyāyaḥ ti dasseti

original: Ussāretīti uddhaṃ gamāpeti. Iminā ussādeti upari gamāpetīti ussādetāti vacanatthaṃ
analyzed: ussāreti iti uddham gamāpeti iminā ussādeti upari gamāpeti iti ussādeta ati vacana ttham

original: dasseti. Ettha hi dakārarakārā sadisatthā. Te hi dve akkharā kadāci katthaci sadisatthā
analyzed: dassa iti ettha hi dakāra rakārā sadisa atthā te hi dve akkharā kadāci katthaci sadisa atthā

original: honti. Avasāretīti hīnabhāvaṃ gamāpeti. Iminā avasādeti adhobhāvaṃ gamāpetīti avasādetāti
analyzed: honti avasāreti iti hīna bhāvam gamāpa iti avasādeti adhas bhāvam gamāpa iti iti avasādeta ati

original: vacanatthaṃ dasseti. “Apasādetā”tipi pāṭho, upasaggamattameva nānaṃ. Samphañca bahuṃ
analyzed: vacana attham dasseti pāṭhaḥ upasagga mattam eva nānam bahum

original: bhāsatīti ettha samphasaddo niratthakakathāvacanoti āha “niratthakakatha”nti. Niratthakakathā
analyzed: bhāsati iti ettha sampha saddaḥ niratthaka kathā vacanaḥ ti āha niratthaka kathanti niratthaka kathā

original: hi yasmā saṃ hitasukhaṃ phalati vināseti, tasmā samphanti vuccati. Phā dhātūti ca
analyzed: hi yasmai sam hita sukham phalati tasmai vuccati ca

original: phaladhātūti ca dhātupāṭhesu (saddanītidhātumālāyaṃ 16 lakārantadhātu) vuttaṃ.
analyzed: phala dhātū iti ca dhātu pāṭhesu saddanīti dhātu mālā ayam lakāra anta dhātu vuttam

original: Bhāre anāropiteti “tava bhāro”ti saṅghena bhāre anāropite. Ajjhottharitvāti abhibhavitvā.
analyzed: bhāre an āropitā iti tava bhārā uti saṅghena bhāre an āropite ajjhottharitvā ati abhibhavitvā

original: Iminā pasayha pavattāti ettha pasayhasaddassa abhibhavanatthaṃ dasseti. Anadhikāreti
analyzed: iminā pasayha pavattā ti ettha pasayha saddassa abhibhavana attham dasseti anadhikāra iti

original: anadhipaccaṭṭhāne. “Kathetā”ti iminā vatudhātuyā kathanatthaṃ dasseti. Anokāsakammaṃ
analyzed: an adhipacca ṭṭhāne katheta iti iminā vatu dhātuyā kathana attham dasseti an okāsa kammam

original: kāretvāti ettha nakārassa ayuttayogabhāvato yuttaṭṭhānaṃ dassento āha “okāsakammaṃ
analyzed: kāretvā iti ettha nakārassa ayutta yoga bhāvataḥ yutta ṭṭhānam dassentaḥ āha okāsa kammam

original: akāretvā”ti. Yassāti yā assa. Assa bhikkhuno attano yā diṭṭhi atthīti yojanā, athavā
analyzed: a kāretvā iti yassa ati yā assa assa bhikkhuno attanaḥ yā diṭṭhi atthi iti yojanā athavā

original: attano yā diṭṭhi bhaveyyāti yojanā. Tanti diṭṭhiṃ. “Kathetā”ti iminā byākatāti ettha
analyzed: yā diṭṭhi bhaveyya ati yojanā diṭṭhim katheta ati iminā byākatā ati ettha

original: vi ā pubbakaradhātuyā kathanatthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: vi ā pubba kara dhātuyā kathana attham dasseti

original: Vohāravaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vohāra vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 424. “Neva desanāya na vuṭṭhānenā”ti idaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dosānurūpanti vatthusaṅkhātassa dosassa anurūpaṃ.
analyzed: na iva desanāya na vuṭṭhānena ati idam pārājika āpattim sandhāya vuttam dosa anurūpam ti vatthu saṅkhātassa dosassa anurūpam

original: Payogaṃ na jānātīti ettha sace payogo mūlena visadiso hutvā bhinno hoti, evaṃ sati
analyzed: payogam na jānāti iti ettha sace payogaḥ mūlena visadisaḥ hutvā bhinnaḥ hoti evam sati

original: mūlapayoganti na vattabbanti āha “adhikaraṇānaṃ hī”tiādi. Hīti saccaṃ, yasmā vā.
analyzed: mūla payogam ti na vattabbanti āha adhikaraṇānam hi itiādi hi iti saccam yasmai vā

original: Mūlameva payogā nāma honti, na aññanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: mūlam eva payogāḥ nāma honti na aññanti adhippāyo

analyzed: kātabbanti na jānāti iti kātabbam iti kammassa karaṇam na jānāti iti yojanā vatthu iti

analyzed: bhaṇḍana kalaha ādi vatthu niyassa ādīnam vatthu iti sambandhaḥ catunnam ti tajjanīya niyassa pabbājanīya paṭisāraṇīya vasena

original: catunnaṃ. Yācatīti saṅghaṃ kammassa vūpasamaṃ yācati.
analyzed: catunnam yācati iti saṅgham kammassa vūpasamam yācati

original: Vatthunti ettha āpattikkhandhānameva vatthunti āha “sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhāna”nti.
analyzed: vatthum ti ettha āpatti kkhandhānam eva vatthum ti āha sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam ti

original: Padesapaññattisabbatthapaññattisādhāraṇapaññattiasādhāraṇapaññattiekatopañña- ttiubhatopaññattivasena
analyzed: padesa paññatti sabbattha paññatti sādhāraṇa paññatti asādhāraṇa paññatti ekatopaññatti ubhatopaññatti vasena

original: paṭinivattitvā ābhassanaṃ gaḷanaṃ cutaṃ padapaccābhaṭṭhanti atthaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: paṭinivattitvā ābhassanam gaḷanam cutam pada paccābhaṭṭhanti attham dasseti

original: Vinayeti ettha na kevalaṃ pāḷiyaṃyeva, atha kho aṭṭhakathāyampīti āha “vinayapāḷiyañceva aṭṭhakathāyañcā”ti.
analyzed: vinaya iti ettha na kevalam pāḷiyam yā iva atha kho aṭṭhakathāyam pi iti āha vinaya pāḷiyam ca iva aṭṭhakathāyam ca ati

original: Ñattiṃ na jānātīti ettha ñattibhedaṃ dassento āha “saṅkhepato”tiādi. Tatthāti duvidhāsu
analyzed: ñattim na jānāti iti ettha ñatti bhedam dassentaḥ āha saṅkhepato tiādi tattha ati duvidhāsu

original: ñattīsu. Kammañattīti anussāvanakammassa ṭhāne ṭhitā ñatti. Anussāvanakammaṃ natthi,

original: sayameva anussāvanakammaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti attho. Kammapādañattīti anussāvanakammassa

original: pādabhūtā mūlabhūtā ñatti. Navasu ṭhānesūti osāraṇādīsu navasu ṭhānesū. Dvīsu ṭhānesūti
analyzed: pāda bhūtāḥ mūla bhūtāḥ navasu ṭhānesu iti osāraṇā ādīsu navasu ṭhānesu dvīsu ṭhānesu iti

original: ñattidutiyañatticatutthavasena dvīsu ṭhānesu, kammapādañattiyā karaṇaṃ na jānātīti
analyzed: ñatti dutiya ñatti catuttha vasena dvīsu ṭhānesu kamma pāda ñattiyā karaṇam na jānāti iti

analyzed: sambandhaḥ yvā ayam catubbidhaḥ samathaḥ iti yojanā catubbidham samatham ñattiyā ati

original: sāmyatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamatīti sambandho. Tassāti adhikaraṇassa.

original: Taṃ vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti sambandho.
analyzed: tam vūpasamam na jānāti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Iti
analyzed: iti

Yojanā samattā.

analyzed: diṭṭhā vikamma vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 425. Diṭṭhāvikammavagge diṭṭhāvikammāti ettha āvi karīyate āvikammaṃ, diṭṭhīnaṃ āvikammaṃ

analyzed: adesanāgāminī nāma atthataḥ garukanti āha garuka āpattiyā ati lahukāya pi iti pi saddaḥ

original: Yathā …pe… hotīti yathā āvikate catūhi pañcahi ekībhūtehi āvikatā hotīti yojanā.

original: eva vattatīti dasseti. Tena vuttaṃ “manasaṅkhātena mānasenā”ti. Iminā manabhūtaṃ

analyzed: mānasam manas mānasam ti vacana attham dasseti

analyzed: a vippavāsa sīmāya āti mahā sīmāya ṭhitassa api santike iti sambandhaḥ pi saddena khaṇḍa sīmāya

analyzed: ṭhitassa api iti attham sampiṇḍeti

analyzed: na pariyattanti na samattham iminā ettha alaṃsaddaḥ pariyatta tthaḥ uva

original: nārahabhūsanavāraṇatthoti dasseti. Idhāpīti pañcakepi. Pisaddena purimapañcakaṃ apekkhati.
analyzed: na araha bhūsana vāraṇa attho ti dasseti idha api iti pañcake pi pi saddena purima pañcakam apekkhati

original: 432. Mandattā momūhattāti ettha ttapaccayassa bhāvatthe, pañcamīvibhattiyā ca kāraṇatthe
analyzed: mandattā momūhattā ati ettha tta paccayassa bhāva tthe pañcamī vibhattiyā ca kāraṇa tthe

original: Musāvādavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: musāvāda vagga vaṇṇanā

analyzed: dhamma padhānam dhamma adhiṭṭhānam sandhāya pārājikam gacchati iti pārājika gāmī iti

original: anena, gamāpetīti vā pārājikagāmī”ti karaṇahetukattuvasenapi vattabbaṃ. Vitthāraṃ

original: Adassanenāti ettha kassa adassanenāti āha “vinayadharassā”ti. Vitthāraṃ dassento
analyzed: adassanena ati ettha kassa adassanena ati āha vinaya dharassa ati vitthāram dassento

original: āha “kappiyākappiyesu hī”tiādi. Tanti vinayadharaṃ. Assavanenāti ettha kesaṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: āha kappiya akappiyesu hi itiādi tanti vinaya dharam assavanena ati ettha kesam vacanam

analyzed: assavanena ati āha eka vihāre pi itiādi eka vihāre pi iti vinayadharena eka vihāre pi pi saddena

original: Na atthapaṭisambhidāpattoti ettha attho nāma aṭṭhakathāyevādhippetāti āha “aṭṭhakathāyā”ti.

original: yuttīhi. Mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvañca bahussutabhāvañca tumhe jānāthāti yojanā.

original: Karontena bhikkhunā upalakkhetabboti sambandho.
analyzed: karontena bhikkhunā upalakkhetabbaḥ iti sambandho

original: “Sithila…pe… pabhedo”ti yvāyaṃ byañjanappabhedo vutto, ayaṃ byañjanappabhedoti yojanā.
analyzed: pabhedo ti yvā ayam byañjana ppabhedaḥ vuttaḥ ayam byañjana ppabhedaḥ iti yojanā

original: Gāthāyaṃ dasadhāti dasappakārena. Byañjanabuddhiyāti vaddhetīti buddhi, byañjanameva

original: padena “byañjanabuddhī”ti samāsapadassa antare dasadhāsaddassa lopaṃ dasseti “kammajaṃ
analyzed: padena byañjana buddhī iti samāsa padassa antare lopam dassa iti kamma jam

original: evā”tiādīsu viya. Ettha hi evasaddena kammena eva jātaṃ kammajanti samāsaṃ katvā
analyzed: eva ati ādīsu viya ettha hi eva saddena kammena eva jātam kamma janti samāsam katvā

original: samāsamajjhe evasaddalopaṃ dasseti. Pabhedoti viseso. Ayaṃ panettha yojanā – sithilañca

original: Yaṃ akkharaṃ saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati, tampi garukaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Saṃyogo paro

original: vuccati, tampi lahukaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Yaṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ, taṃ niggahitaṃ

analyzed: āha a vissajjetvā iti yam sambandhitvā vuccati tam sambandham nāma ati yojanā yam

original: taṃ vimuttaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Aniggahetvāti aniggahaṃ nāma atthato vissajjananti āha “vissajjetvā”ti.

original: takārassa thakārakaraṇañca sithilassa dhanitakaraṇañca atidisati, tathā “pattakallaṃ

original: Itīti evaṃ. Sithile kattabbe dhanitaṃ karotīti sambandho. Cattāri byañjanānīti cattāri
analyzed: iti iti evam sithile kattabbe dhanitam karoti iti sambandho cattāri byañjanāni iti cattāri

original: hotīti āha “sace panā”tiādi. Na kuppatīti na nassati. Kasmā pana kammavācā na kuppati,

original: nanu kammaṃ kopentī kammavācā kuppatīti āha “imāni hī”tiādi. Hi yasmā na kopenti,

original: tasmā kammavācā na kuppatīti yojanā.
analyzed: tasmā kamma vācā na kuppati iti yojanā

original: suttantikā, kaccāyanādayo, suttantikā ca te therā ceti suttantikattherā. Na vaṭṭatīti

analyzed: paṭhamaṃ yeva anussāvana kammam katvā iti yojanā paṭhamaṃ yeva ati hi padam pubba apara apekkham iti itiādi nigamanam

original: Yā sammatā hoti, ayaṃ atimahatī nāmāti yojanā. Kesaggamattenāpīti pisaddo tato atirekena

original: akhaṇḍanimittadassanena pākaṭaṃ karonto āha “puratthimāyā”tiādi. Pubbakittitanti
analyzed: akhaṇḍa nimitta dassanena pākaṭam karontaḥ āha puratthimāya itiādi

analyzed: tattha iva ati uttarāya eva disāya aparā api iti pi saddaḥ dutiya ttha sampiṇḍana tthaḥ

analyzed: tassa ca asamāna bhāvataḥ tesam visum visum sambandham dassentaḥ āha attanaḥ sīmāya

analyzed: tam pi iti kamma ppatta chanda araha lakkhaṇam pi vuttam eva ati sambandho tattha ati cattāro

original: dasseti. Tehīti catūhi pakatattehi. Etīti āgacchati. Avasesāti catūhi pakatattehi
analyzed: dasseti tehi iti catūhi pakatattehi eti iti āgacchati avasesā ati catūhi pakatattehi

analyzed: avasesāḥ yassa pana ati puggalassa pana kamma araho ti kammassa araho

original: 489. Etthāti paṇḍakādīnaṃ avatthubhāvadassanaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: ettha iti paṇḍaka ādīnam avatthu bhāva dassana ṭhāne

original: Apalokanakammakathā
analyzed: apalokana kamma kathā

original: 495-6. Tatthāti catūsu kammesu. Etthāti osāraṇādipāṭhe. Padasiliṭṭhatāyāti loke padānaṃ

original: atthi, sā nissāraṇāti yojanā. “Micchādiṭṭhiko hotī”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ dassetuṃ

original: “antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ. Micchādiṭṭhi hi liṅganāsanāya kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgataḥ ti vuttam micchādiṭṭhi hi liṅganā āsanāya kāraṇam

original: hoti. Soti sāmaṇero, “nissajjāpetabbo”ti pade kāritakammaṃ, vuttakammaṃ vā. Taṃ laddhinti
analyzed: hoti saḥ ti sāmaṇeraḥ nissajjāpetabbaḥ ti pade kārita kammam vutta kammam vā tam

original: dhātukammaṃ, avuttakammaṃ vā. Kinti kātabbanti āha “evañca pana kammaṃ kātabba”nti.
analyzed: dhātu kammam avutta kammam vā kinti kātabbanti āha evam ca pana kammam kātabbanti

original: Kātabbākāraṃ dassento āha “saṅghaṃ bhante”tiādi. Yaṃ sahaseyyaṃ labhantīti yojanā.
analyzed: kātabba ākāram dassentaḥ āha saṅgham bhante tiādi yam sahaseyyam labhanti iti yojanā

original: Tassāti sahaseyyassa. Alābhāyāti alābhatthāya. “Cara pire vinassā”ti iminā nissāraṇākāraṃ
analyzed: tassa ati sahaseyyassa alābhāya ati alābha atthāya cara vinassa ati iminā nissāraṇa ākāram

original: dasseti. Attho panassa heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
analyzed: dasseti attho pana assa heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva

original: Soti samaṇero, osāretabboti sambandho.
analyzed: saḥ ti samaṇero osāretabbo ti sambandho

original: Svāyanti so ayaṃ sāmaṇero, accayaṃ desetīti sambandho. Soratoti sundaraladdhiyaṃ

original: rato, duladdhito vā suṭṭhu orato. Yathā pureti yathā pubbe ruccati, tathāti yojanā.
analyzed: rataḥ duladdhitaḥ vā suṭṭhu orataḥ yathā purā iti yathā pubbe ruccati tathā iti yojanā

original: Kāyasambhogasāmaggidānanti kāyena ca sambhogena ca sāmaggiyā dānaṃ.
analyzed: kāya sambhoga sāmaggi dānam ati kāyena ca sambhogena ca sāmaggiyā dānam

original: Evantiādi nigamanaṃ. Yasmā pana brahmadaṇḍo pañcasatikakkhandhake channasseva paññatto,
analyzed: evam ti ādi nigamanam yasmā pana brahmadaṇḍaḥ pañcasatika khandhake channassa iva paññatto

original: tasmā tasseva dātabboti āha “na kevala”ntiādi. Esāti brahmadaṇḍo, aññopi yo bhikkhu
analyzed: tasmā tassa iva dātabbaḥ iti āha na kevala ntiādi esā ati brahmadaṇḍaḥ aññaḥ api yaḥ bhikkhu

original: viharati, tassapi dātabboti sambandho. Kinti dātabboti āha “evañca pana dātabbo”ti.
analyzed: viharati tassa api dātabbā iti sambandhaḥ kinti dātabbā iti āha evam ca pana dātabbā iti

original: Dātabbākāraṃ dassento āha “saṅghamajjhe”tiādi.
analyzed: dātabba ākāram dassentaḥ āha saṅgha majjhe itiādi

original: Yaṃ vacanaṃ iccheyya, taṃ vacananti yojanā. Khamāpentassāti saṅghaṃ khamāpentassa tassa bhikkhussāti yojanā.
analyzed: yam vacanam iccheyya tam vacanam iti yojanā khamāpentassa ati saṅgham khamāpentassa tassa bhikkhussa ati yojanā

original: Paṭisaṅkhāti paṭisaṅkhāya, ñāṇena paccavekkhitvāti attho.
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā iti paṭisaṅkhāya ñāṇena paccavekkhitvā attho

original: Yanti avandiyakammaṃ, anuññātanti sambandho. Kena anuññātanti āha “bhagavatā”ti.
analyzed: yanti avandiya kammam anuññātanti sambandhaḥ kena anuññātanti āha bhagavatā ati

original: Kismiṃ khandhake anuññātanti āha “bhikkhunikkhandhake”ti. Kesu vatthūsu anuññātanti
analyzed: kismin khandhake anuññātanti āha bhikkhu nikkhandhaka iti kesu vatthūsu anuññātanti

original: āha “tena kho pana…pe… imesu vatthūsū”ti. Kiṃ katvā anuññātanti āha “dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā”ti.
analyzed: āha tena kho panape imesu vatthūsu iti kim katvā anuññātanti āha dukkaṭam paññapetvā ati

original: Kinti anuññātanti āha “anujānāmi…pe… kātabbo”ti. Tassāti avandiyassa. “Na osāraṇādīnī”ti
analyzed: kim ti anuññātanti āha tassa ati avandiyassa na osāraṇa ādīni iti

original: iminā evasaddassa chaḍḍetabbatthaṃ dasseti. Tassāti kammalakkhaṇabhūtassa avandiyassa.
analyzed: iminā eva saddassa chaḍḍetabba attham dasseti tassa ati kamma lakkhaṇa bhūtassa avandiyassa

original: Tatthevāti bhikkhunikkhandhakeyeva. Nanti kammalakkhaṇaṃ. Idhāpīti parivāre kammavaggepi.
analyzed: tattha iva ati kamma lakkhaṇam idha api iti parivāre kamma vagge pi

original: Apāsādikanti apasādāvahaṃ, apasādajanakaṃ vā.
analyzed: apāsādikam ti apasāda āvaham apasāda janakam vā

original: Tatoti avandiyakaraṇato. Imanti bhikkhuṃ. Vandiyanti vanditabbaṃ, vandanaṃ vā.
analyzed: tatas ti a vandiya karaṇataḥ imanti bhikkhum vandiyanti vanditabbam vandanam vā

original: Etthāti apalokanakamme, bhikkhunisaṅghamūlakaṃ katvā paññattanti yojanā. Bhikkhusaṅghassāpīti
analyzed: ettha ati apalokana kamme bhikkhuni saṅgha mūlakam katvā paññattanti yojanā bhikkhu saṅghassa api iti

original: pisaddo na bhikkhunisaṅghassevāti dasseti. Panasaddo sambhāvanattho, tathā bhikkhunisaṅghamūlakaṃ
analyzed: pi saddaḥ na bhikkhuni saṅghassa iva ati dasseti pana saddaḥ sambhāvana tthaḥ tathā bhikkhuni saṅgha mūlakam

original: paññattampīti attho, labhitabbabhāvaṃ vitthārena dassento āha “yaṃ hī”tiādi. Yaṃ
analyzed: paññattam pi iti atthaḥ labhitabba bhāvam vitthārena dassentaḥ āha yam hi itiādi yam

original: apalokanakammaṃ karotīti yojanā. Appamattakavissajjakena pana dātabbānīti sambandho.
analyzed: apalokana kammam karoti iti yojanā appamattaka vissajjakena pana dātabbāni iti sambandho

original: Tesanti sūciādīnaṃ. Soyevāti appamattakavissajjakoyeva. Tatoti appamattakato. Tatthāti
analyzed: tesanti sūci ādīnam saḥ yeva āti appamattaka vissajjakaḥ yeva tatas ti appamattakato tattha ati

original: senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ. Vuttappakāraṃ gilānabhesajjampīti sambandho. Yopi cāti
analyzed: senāsana khandhaka vaṇṇanāyam vutta ppakāram gilāna bhesajjam pi iti sambandhaḥ yaḥ pi ca ati

original: bhikkhupi ca hotīti sambandho. Tassa dātabbāti sambandho. Tatruppādatoti tasmiṃ mahāvāse
analyzed: ca hoti iti sambandhaḥ tassa dātabbā ati sambandhaḥ tatra uppādataḥ ti tasmin mahāvāse

original: uppādapaccayato, gahetvāti sambandho. “Pesalassā”tiādinā dussīlādīnaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
analyzed: uppāda paccayataḥ gahetvā iti sambandho pesalassa ati ādinā dussīla ādīnam dātum na vaṭṭati iti dasseti

original: Jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha apucchitvā jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “ayaṃ bhikkhū”tiādi. Odissāti uddisitvā.
analyzed: jaggāpetum vaṭṭati iti ettha a pucchitvā jaggāpetum vaṭṭati iti āha ayam bhikkhu iti ādi odissāti uddisitvā

original: Āsanagharaṃ vāti paṭimāgharaṃ vā, kārako manussoti sambandho. Upanikkhepato gahetvāti
analyzed: āsana gharam vā āti paṭimā gharam vā kārakaḥ manussaḥ ti sambandhaḥ upanikkhepataḥ gahetvā iti

analyzed: sambandhaḥ saṅghikena api iti pi saddaḥ na kevalam cetiyassa upanikkhepena iva atha kho

original: saṅghikenapīti dasseti.
analyzed: saṅghikena api iti dasseti

original: Yāpanamattaṃ alabhantehi karontehīti yojanā, paribhuñjantehi hutvāti sambandho. “Vattaṃ
analyzed: yāpana mattam a labhantehi karontehi iti yojanā paribhuñjantehi hutvā iti sambandhaḥ vattam

original: karomā”tiādinā “yāpanamatta”nti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Vihāre ropitā ye phalarukkhāti
analyzed: karoma iti ādinā padassa attham dasseti vihāre ropitāḥ ye phala rukkhā ti

original: yojanā. Yesanti rukkhānaṃ. Tesūti rukkhesu. Ye panāti rukkhā pana, apariggahitā hontīti
analyzed: yojanā yesanti rukkhānam tesu iti rukkhesu ye pana ati rukkhāḥ pana a pariggahitāḥ honti iti

original: sambandho. Taṃ panāti apalokanakammaṃ pana. Salākaṃ gaṇhanti etthāti salākaggaṃ,
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tam pana ati apalokana kammam pana salākam gaṇhanti ettha ati salākaggam

original: ṭhānaṃ. “Yāgaggabhattagga”iti etthāpi eseva nayo. Uposathaggeti uposathassa gahaṇaṭṭhāne,
analyzed: ṭhānam yāga gga bhatta gga iti ettha api esa iva nayaḥ uposatha gga iti uposathassa gahaṇa ṭṭhāne

original: uposathageheti attho. Tatthāti uposathagge. Tanti apalokanakammaṃ.
analyzed: uposatha gehe iti attho tattha ati uposatha gge apalokana kammaṃ

original: Yaṃ mūlatacapattaaṅkurapupphaphalakhādanīyādīti yojanā. Antosīmāyāti anto upacārasīmāya.
analyzed: yam mūla taca patta aṅkura puppha phala khādanīya ādi iti yojanā antosīmāya ati antaḥ upacāra sīmāya

original: Sukatamevāti saṅghena katameva. Uposathadivaseti nidassanamattaṃ yasmiṃ kasmiṃci divasepi katattā.
analyzed: su katam eva ati saṅghena katamā iva uposatha divasā iti nidassanam attam yasmin kasmiṃci divase pi

original: Phalavārenāti rukkhānaṃ phalagahaṇavārena. Rukkhā dharantīti rukkhā tiṭṭhanti, saṃvijjanti
analyzed: phala vārena ati rukkhānam phala gahaṇa vārena rukkhāḥ dharanti iti rukkhāḥ tiṭṭhanti saṃvijjanti

original: vā. Yehīti bhikkhūhi ropitā, hontīti sambandho. Sā eva katikāti pubbe katā sā eva
analyzed: vā yehi iti bhikkhūhi ropitāḥ honti iti sambandho sā eva katikā ati pubbe katā sā eva

original: katikā, aññā katikā na kātabbāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: katikā aññā katikā na kātabbā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Aññasmiṃ vihāreti rukkhānaṃ ṭhitavihārato aññasmiṃ vihāre. Tesanti rukkhānaṃ, sāmīti
analyzed: aññasmim vihāre ti rukkhānam ṭhita vihārataḥ aññasmim vihāre tesanti rukkhānam sāmi iti

original: sambandho. Yepīti rukkhāpi, ropitāti sambandho. Aññato ṭhānatoti yojanā. Tesūti rukkhesu.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ ye pi iti rukkhā api ropitā ati sambandhaḥ aññatas ṭhānato ti yojanā tesu ti rukkhesu

original: Etthāti vihāre. Tehi panāti pariveṇasāmikehi bhikkhūhi pana. Dasabhāganti dasamabhāgaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ati vihāre tehi pana ati pariveṇa sāmikehi bhikkhūhi pana dasa bhāgam ti dasama bhāgam

original: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā dasabhāgaṃ datvāti atthaṃ atidisati.
analyzed: iminā dasa bhāgam da tvā iti attham atidisati

original: Sambhāvanīyabhikkhunoti sīlasutādīhi sambhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno. Tatthāti porāṇavihāre.
analyzed: sambhāvanīya bhikkhuno ti sīla suta ādīhi sambhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno tattha ati porāṇa vihāre

original: Mūleti pubbe, ādikāleti attho. Nikkukkuccenāti “abhājitamida”nti kukkuccavirahena.
analyzed: mūla iti pubbe ādi kāle ti atthaḥ nikkukkuccena ati abhājitam idam ti kukkucca virahena

original: Khiyyanamattameva tanti taṃ khiyyanaṃ khiyyanamattameva, na sāmaṇerānaṃ khiyyanaṃ ruhatīti attho.

original: Panasarukkhanti kaṇṭakīphalarukkhaṃ. Ayaṃ sāmīcīti ayaṃ bhājetvā khādanaṃ anudhammatā.
analyzed: panasa rukkham ti kaṇṭakī phala rukkham ayam sāmīcī iti ayam bhājetvā khādanam anudhammatā

original: Khāyitanti khāditaṃ. Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ katikapaṭippassambhanaṃ nayena ñātuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā
analyzed: khāyitanti khāditam dvinnam tiṇṇam katika paṭippassambhanam nayena ñātum sakkuṇeyya ttā

original: taṃ adassetvā ekasseva katikapaṭippassambhanaṃ dassento āha “ekabhikkhuke panā”tiādi.
analyzed: tam a dassetvā ekassa iva katika paṭippassambhanam dassentaḥ āha ekabhikkhuke pana atiādi

original: Purimakatikāti “yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ruccatī”ti pure katā katikā. Tesanti sāmaṇerānaṃ,
analyzed: purima katikā ati yathāsukham paribhuñjitum ruccati iti pure katā katikā

original: phātikammanti sambandho. Bhājetvāti sāmaṇerānaṃ bhājetvā. Iminā sāmaṇerānaṃ phātikammaṃ
analyzed: phāti kammanti sambandhaḥ bhājetvā iti sāmaṇerānam bhājetvā iminā sāmaṇerānam phāti kammaṃ

original: na dātabbampi bhāgaṃ bhājetabbanti dasseti.
analyzed: na dātabbam pi bhāgam bhājetabbanti dasseti

original: Sāmantagāmehīti āsannagāmehi, āgantvāti sambandho. Ekaṃ ambaṃ ekaṃ labujanti yojanā.
analyzed: sāmanta gāmehi iti āsanna gāmehi āgantvā ati sambandhaḥ ekam ambam ekam yojanā

original: Adiyyamāne dose dassite diyyamāne ānisaṃsampi atthato ñātabbanti dassento āha “adiyyamāne hī”tiādi.
analyzed: a diyyamāne dose dassite diyyamāne ānisaṃsam pi atthataḥ ñātabbanti dassentaḥ āha a diyyamāne hi itiādi

original: Gaṇhantānaṃ manussānanti sambandho. Tatoti katikavattaṭṭhapanato. Na vattabbāti phaladānakuladūsakattā
analyzed: gaṇhantānam manussānam ti sambandhaḥ tatas ti katika vatta ṭṭhapanataḥ na vattabbā ati phala dāna kula dūsaka ttā

original: na vattabbā. Kinti ācikkhitabbanti āha “nāḷikerādīnī”tiādi. Anuvicaritvāti padānamanukkamena
analyzed: na vattabbā kinti ācikkhitabbanti āha nāḷikera ādīni itiādi anuvicaritvā iti padānam anukkamena

original: vicaritvā. Upaḍḍhabhāgoti bhikkhūnaṃ laddhabhāgato upaḍḍho bhāgo. Apaloketvāti saṅghaṃ āpucchitvā.
analyzed: vicaritvā upaḍḍha bhāgaḥ ti bhikkhūnam laddha bhāgataḥ upaḍḍhaḥ bhāgaḥ apaloketvā iti saṅgham āpucchitvā

original: Maggagamiyasatthavāhoti maggaṃ gamiko satthavāho. Soti balakkārena gahetvā khādanto.
analyzed: magga gamiya satthavāho ti maggam gamikaḥ satthavāho saḥ ti balakkārena gahetvā khādanto

original: Chāyādīnantiādisaddena ārāmavanāni saṅgahetabbāni. Sace atthīti sace attho atthi.
analyzed: chāyā ādīnam ti ādi saddena ārāma vanāni saṅgahetabbāni sace atthi iti sace attho atthi

original: Phalabharitāti phalena paripuṇṇā. “Phalabhāritā”tipi pāṭho. Phalasaṅkhātena bhārena
analyzed: phala bharitā ati phalena paripuṇṇā phala bhāritā atipi phala saṅkhātena bhārena

analyzed: pubbe vuttam eva ati pubbe saṅghika ṭṭhāne kuddhaḥ hi saḥ ti ādinā vuttam eva ettha ati puggalika ṭṭhāne

original: Tanti phalārāmaṃ. Soti paṭibalo bhikkhu. Bhāriyaṃ kammanti jagganakammaṃ bhāriyaṃ.
analyzed: tanti phala ārāmam saḥ ti paṭibalaḥ bhikkhu bhāriyam kammanti jaggana kammam bhāriyam

original: Ettakenāti tatiyabhāgaupaḍḍhabhāgamattena. Sabbaṃ phalārāmanti sambandho. Mūlabhāganti
analyzed: ettakena ati sabbam phala ārāman ti sambandhaḥ mūla bhāgan ti

original: paṭhamabhāgaṃ. “Dasabhāgamatta”nti iminā tadatthaṃ dasseti. Datvāti saṅghassa datvā.
analyzed: paṭhama bhāgam dasa bhāgam attanti iminā tad attham dassa iti da tvā iti saṅghassa da tvā

analyzed: so ti bhikkhu akatāvāsanti pubbe akatam navam senāsanam ārāmanti saṅghassa ārāmanti

original: Tehipīti nissitakehipi. Pisaddo ācariyaṃ apekkhati. Tesanti nissitakānaṃ. Jaggitakāleti
analyzed: tehi pi iti nissitakehi pi pi saddaḥ ācariyam apekkhati tesan ti nissitakānam jaggita kāle iti

analyzed: jaggitānam rukkhānam puppha phala bharita kāle jaggana kāle iti jaggana matta kāle jaggana mattam eva

original: vāretabbākāraṃ dasseti.
analyzed: vāretabba ākāram dasseti

original: Phātikammena jagganto na atthīti yojanā. Anāpucchitvāvāti saṅghaṃ anapaloketvāva. Itīti evaṃ.

analyzed: ñatti kammaṭṭhāna bhede pana evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ ti yojanā osāreti saṅgha majjham paveseti imāya ñattiyā ati osāraṇā

original: Nissāriyati saṅghato bahi kariyati imāyāti nissāraṇā. Ñatti uposatho nāmāti idaṃ
analyzed: saṅghataḥ bahi nissāraṇā uposathaḥ nāma ati idam

original: kāraṇūpacāravasena vuttaṃ. Tenāha “uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā”ti. Eseva nayo ñattipavāraṇā nāmāti etthāpi.
analyzed: kāraṇa upacāra vasena vuttam tena āha uposatha kamma vasena ṭhapitā ati esa eva nayaḥ ñatti pavāraṇā nāma ati ettha api

original: Anusāseyyātiādinā paṭhamapurisaeyyavibhattivasena ṭhapitā ñatti attanā paraṃ sammanituṃ
analyzed: anusāseyya ati ādinā paṭhama purisaeyya vibhatti vasena ṭhapitā attanā param sammanitum

original: ṭhapitā ñatti nāma. Anusāseyyantiādinā uttamapurisaeyyaṃvibhattivasena ṭhapitā ñatti

original: attanāva attānaṃ sammanituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti nāma. Attanāva attā vā paro vā sammaniyati

analyzed: imāya ñattiyā ati sammuti nissaṭṭha patta cīvara ādīni dīyanti anena ati dānam ñatti vaccam

original: anapekkhitvā vācakassa niyatanapuṃsakaliṅgattā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena vuttaṃ.

original: Āpatti paṭiggaṇhiyati anenāti paṭiggaho.
analyzed: āpatti paṭiggaṇhiyati anena ati paṭiggahaḥ

original: Paṭimukhaṃ upari kaḍḍhiyati imāyāti paccukkaḍḍhanā.
analyzed: paṭimukham upari kaḍḍhiyati imāya āti paccukkaḍḍhanā

original: Kammamevāti lakkhiyati anenāti kammalakkhaṇaṃ.

original: “Tathā”ti padena “kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāmā”ti padaṃ atidisati. Tatoti sabbasaṅgāhikañattito. Parā dve ñattiyo kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Itītiādi nigamanaṃ.

original: Ñattidutiyakammaṭṭhānabhede osāraṇādīnaṃ visesaṃ dassento āha “vaḍḍhassa licchavino”tiādi. Sīmāsammuti cātiādinā yojanā kātabbā.
analyzed: ñatti dutiya kammaṭṭhāna bhede osāraṇā ādīnam visesam dassentaḥ āha vaḍḍhassa licchavino tiādi sīmā sammuti ca ati ādinā yojanā kātabbā

original: Yā pana dve ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttāti yojanā. Itītiādi nigamanaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana dve ñatti dutiya kamma vācā vuttā ati yojanā iti itiādi nigamanam

original: Ñatticatutthakammaṭṭhānabhede yojanānayo pākaṭoyeva.
analyzed: ñatti catuttha kammaṭṭhāna bhede

original: 497. Catuvaggakaraṇe kammetiādikāya desanāya sambandhaṃ dassento āha “iti kammāni
analyzed: catu vagga karaṇe kamma iti ādikāya desanāya sambandham dassentaḥ āha iti kammāni

original: cā”tiādi. Tattha itīti evaṃ dassetvāti sambandho. Tassatthoti tassa “catuvaggakaraṇe
analyzed: ca atiādi tattha iti iti evam dassetvā ati sambandhaḥ tassa atthaḥ ti tassa catuvagga karaṇe

original: kamme”tiādivacanassa attho veditabboti sambandho.
analyzed: kamma iti ādi vacanassa atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ti sambandho

original: Iti kammavaggavaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti kamma vagga vaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā

original: Atthavasavaggādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: attha vasa vagga ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 498. Evaṃ kammavaggavaṇṇanaṃ dassetvā tassānantare vuttāya “dve atthavase paṭiccā”tiādikāya
analyzed: evam kamma vagga vaṇṇanam dassetvā tassa anantare vuttāya dve atthavase paṭicca ati ādikāya

analyzed: desanāya anusandhim dassentaḥ āha idāni itiādi idāni āraddha nti sambandhaḥ yāni tāni

original: sikkhāpadānīti yojanā. Diṭṭhadhammikaverānanti diṭṭhadhamme pavattattā ca viramitabbattā
analyzed: sikkhāpadāni iti yojanā diṭṭhadhammika verānanti diṭṭhadhamme pavatta ttā ca viramitabba ttā

original: ca diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ verānaṃ. Saṃvarāyāti ettha saṃpubbo varadhātu pidahanattho,

original: suṭṭhu āpanaṃ daṭṭhabbantīti attho.
analyzed: suṭṭhu āpanam daṭṭhabbanti iti atthaḥ

original: Saddhā ca buddhi ca vīriyañca saddhābuddhivīriyāni, visuddhāni ca tāni saddhābuddhivīriyāni
analyzed: saddhā ca buddhi ca vīriyam ca saddhā buddhi vīriyāni visuddhāni ca tāni saddhā buddhi vīriyāni

original: ceti visuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyāni, paramāni ca tāni visuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyāni
analyzed: ca iti visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriyāni paramāni ca tāni visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriyāni

original: ceti paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyāni, tehi parimaṇḍito paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyapaṭimaṇḍito,
analyzed: ca iti parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriyāni tehi parimaṇḍitaḥ parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitaḥ

original: tena, therenāti sambandho. Sīlañca ācāro ca ajjavañca maddavañca sīlācārajjavamaddavāni,
analyzed: tena therena ati sambandhaḥ sīlam ca ācāraḥ ca ajjavan ca maddavan ca sīla ācāra jjava maddavāni

original: tāni ādīni yesaṃ teti sīlācārajjavamaddavādayo, ādisaddena khantisoraccādayo saṅgaṇhāti,
analyzed: tāni ādīni yesam te iti ādi saddena khanti soracca ādayaḥ saṅgaṇhāti

original: teyeva guṇāti sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇā, tesaṃ samudayoti sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayo,
analyzed: teya iva guṇā ati sīla ācāra java mad dava ādi guṇā tesam samudayo ti sīla ācāra java mad dava ādi guṇa samudayaḥ

original: tena samudito suṭṭhu pākaṭoti sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamudito, tena therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: tena samuditaḥ suṭṭhu pākaṭaḥ ti sīla ācāra java maddava ādi guṇa samudaya samuditaḥ tena therena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Sakasamayo ca samayantaro ca sakasamayasamayantarā, teyeva pana gahanasadisattā gahananti
analyzed: saka samayaḥ ca samayantaraḥ ca saka samaya samayantarā teya iva pana

original: sakasamayasamayantaragahanaṃ, tassa ajjhogāhaṇaṃ sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: saka samaya samaya antara gahanam tassa ajjhogāhaṇam saka samaya samaya antara gahana ajjhogāhaṇam

original: tasmiṃ samattho sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamattho. Tena therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: tasmin samatthaḥ tena therena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Visesena añjati pākaṭaṃ karotīti viyatto, puggalo, viyattassa idaṃ veyyattiyaṃ, sati.
analyzed: visesena añjati pākaṭam karoti iti viyattaḥ puggalaḥ viyattassa idam veyyattiyam sati

original: Paññā ca veyyattiyañca paññāveyyattiyaṃ, tena samannāgatenāti sambandho. Samannāgatena therenāti yojanā.
analyzed: paññā ca veyyattiyañca paññāveyyattiyam tena samannāgatena ati sambandho samannāgatena therena ati yojanā

original: Tīṇi piṭakānīti tipiṭakaṃ, tameva pariyāpuṇitabbattā pariyattīti tipiṭakapariyatti,
analyzed: tīṇi piṭakāni iti ti piṭakam tam eva pariyāpuṇitabba ttā pariyatti iti ti piṭaka pariyatti

original: tassa pabhedo ettha satthusāsaneti tipiṭakapariyattipabhedaṃ, tasmiṃ. Saha aṭṭhakathāyāti
analyzed: tassa pabhedaḥ ettha satthu sāsane iti tipiṭaka pariyatti pabhedam tasmim saha aṭṭhakathāyā ati

original: sāṭṭhakathaṃ, satthu sāsanaṃ, tasmiṃ satthusāsaneti sambandho. Satthuno pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena
analyzed: sāṭṭhakatham satthu sāsanam tasmim satthu sāsana iti sambandhaḥ satthuno pariyatti paṭipatti paṭivedha vasena

original: tividhaṃ sāsanaṃ satthusāsanaṃ, byāsopi yujjateva, tasmiṃ satthusāsane “appaṭihata”iti
analyzed: tividham sāsanam satthu sāsanam byāsaḥ api tasmim satthu sāsane a paṭihata eti

original: padena sambandhitabbaṃ. Appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ appaṭihatañāṇaṃ, idaṃ tasmiṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanākāle
analyzed: padena sambandhitabbam appaṭihatam ñāṇam appaṭihata ñāṇam idam tasmim vinaya saṃvaṇṇanā kāle

original: therassa paṭivedhañāṇābhāvato sutamayacintāmayañāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: therassa paṭivedha ñāṇa abhāvato suta maya cintā maya ñāṇam sandhāya vuttan ti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Appaṭihatañāṇassa pabhāvo etassāti appaṭihatañāṇapabhāvo, tena therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: appaṭihata ñāṇassa pabhāvaḥ etassa ati appaṭihata ñāṇa pabhāvaḥ tena therena ati sambandho

original: Mahantaṃ veyyākaraṇametassāti mahāveyyākaraṇo, iminā sikkhāniruttiādīhi chaḷaṅge
analyzed: mahantam veyyākaraṇam etassa ati mahā veyyākaraṇaḥ iminā sikkhā nirutti ādīhi chaḍḍaṅge

original: mahantaveyyākaraṇe therassa appaṭihatañāṇapabhāvataṃ dasseti, tena mahāveyyākaraṇena
analyzed: mahanta veyyākaraṇe therassa appaṭihata ñāṇa pabhāva tam dasseti tena mahā veyyākaraṇena

original: therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: therena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Karaṇaṃ vuccati ṭhānaṃ kariyati uccāriyati ettha, etenāti vā vacanatthena, karaṇassa
analyzed: karaṇam vuccati ṭhānam kariyati uccāriyati ettha etena ati vā vacana atthena karaṇassa

original: sampatti karaṇasampatti, tāya janitaṃ karaṇasampattijanitaṃ. Sukhena theramukhato
analyzed: sampatti karaṇa sampatti janitam karaṇa sampatti janitam sukhena

original: viniggataṃ sukhaviniggataṃ, karaṇasampattijanitena hetubhūtena sukhaviniggataṃ karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggataṃ.
analyzed: viniggatam sukha viniggatam karaṇa sampatti janitena hetu bhūtena sukha viniggatam karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggatam

original: Madhuravacanañca udāravacanañca madhurodāravacanaṃ, pubbapade uttarapadalopo, iminā
analyzed: madhura vacanam ca udāra vacanam ca madhura udāra vacanam pubba pade uttara pada lopaḥ iminā

original: keṭubhapakaraṇe (subodhālaṃkāre 127-142 gāthāsu) vuttesu dasasu saddaguṇesu madhuratāguṇena
analyzed: keṭubha pakaraṇe subodha alaṃkāre gāthāsu vuttesu dasasu sadda guṇesu madhura tā guṇena

original: ca udāratāguṇena ca samannāgatabhāvaṃ dasseti. Karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatañca
analyzed: ca udāra tā guṇena ca samannāgata bhāvam dasseti karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggatam ca

original: taṃ madhurodāravacanañceti karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanaṃ.
analyzed: tam madhura udāra vacanam ca iti karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacanam

original: Atha vā karaṇasampattijanitañca taṃ sukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanañceti karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanaṃ.
analyzed: atha vā karaṇa sampatti janitam ca tam sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacanam ca iti karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacanam

original: Elaṃ vuccati duruttadoso, natthi elametassāti nelā, soyeva vaṇṇo nelavaṇṇo, tena
analyzed: elam vuccati durutta dosaḥ natthi elam etassa ati na ilā saḥ yā iva vaṇṇaḥ na ila vaṇṇo tena

original: yuttaṃ nelavaṇṇayuttaṃ, karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanaṃ nelavaṇṇayuttametassāti
analyzed: yuttam nela vaṇṇa yuttam karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacanam nela vaṇṇa yuttam etassa ati

original: karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacananelavaṇṇayutto, thero. Visesanaparapadasamāso,
analyzed: karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacana nela vaṇṇa yuttaḥ theraḥ visesana para pada samāsaḥ

original: nelavaṇṇayuttakaraṇasampatti janitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanoti hi attho, tena
analyzed: nela vaṇṇa yutta karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacanaḥ ti hi atthaḥ tena

original: therenāti sambandho. Yuttañca parisāya sotena anurūpattā, muttañca parisāya visāradattāti
analyzed: therena ati sambandhaḥ muttam ca parisāya visāradattā ati

original: yuttamuttaṃ, vacanaṃ, taṃ vadati sīlenāti yuttamuttavādī, tena therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: yuttam uttam vacanam tam vadati sīlena ati yutta mutta vādī tena therena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Kammasassataucchedaissaranimmānādivasena nānā vādā etesanti vādino, nānāvādā janā,
analyzed: nānā vādāḥ vādinaḥ nānā vādāḥ

original: vādīnaṃ, vādīsu vā varo kammakiriyavādattāti vādivaro, tena therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: vādīnam vādīsu vā varo vādi varo tena therena ati sambandho

original: Pāḷiyā atthaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ samatthattā mahanto kavi mahākavi, tena therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: pāḷiyāḥ attham vaṇṇetum samatthattā mahantaḥ kavi mahā kavi tena therena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Atthadhammaniruttipaṭibhānavasena pabhinnāya paṭisambhidāya parivāritoti pabhinnapaṭisambhidāparivāro,
analyzed: attha dhamma nirutti paṭibhāna vasena pabhinnāya paṭisambhidāya parivāritaḥ ti pabhinna paṭisambhidā parivāraḥ

original: tasmiṃ uttarimanussadhammeti sambandho. Cha abhiññā ca paṭisambhidā ca chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidā,
analyzed: tasmin uttari manussa dhamma iti sambandhaḥ cha abhiññā ca paṭisambhidā ca chaṭ abhiññā paṭisambhidā

original: tā ādayo yesaṃ teti chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādayo, ādisaddena tevijjādayo saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: tāḥ ādayaḥ yesam te iti chaṭṭha abhiññā paṭisambhidā ādayaḥ ādi saddena tevijja ādayo saṅgaṇhāti

original: Chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādayo pabhedā etassāti chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādippabhedo, soyeva
analyzed: chaṭ abhiññā paṭisambhidā ādayaḥ pabhedāḥ etassa ati chaṭ abhiññā paṭisambhidā ādi pabhedaḥ

original: guṇo chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādippabhedaguṇo, tena paṭimaṇḍito chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādippabhedaguṇapaṭimaṇḍito,
analyzed: guṇo chaṣ abhiññā paṭisambhidā ādi ppabheda guṇo tena paṭimaṇḍito chaṣ abhiññā paṭisambhidā ādi ppabheda guṇa paṭimaṇḍitaḥ

original: tasmiṃ uttarimanussadhammeti sambandho. Uttarimanussānaṃ jhānalābhiādīnaṃ dhammo
analyzed: tasmin uttari manussa dhamma iti sambandhaḥ uttari manussānam jhāna lābhi ādīnam dhammaḥ

original: uttarimanussadhammo, atha vā manussānaṃ kusalakammapathasaṅkhātadhammato uttarīti
analyzed: uttari manussa dhammaḥ atha vā manussānam kusala kammapatha saṅkhāta dhammataḥ uttarī iti

original: uttarimanussadhammo, jhānādidhammo, tasmiṃ, “suppatiṭṭhita” iti padena sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: uttari manussa dhammaḥ jhāna ādi dhammaḥ tasmin suppatiṭṭhitaḥ iti padena sambandhitabbam

original: Suppatiṭṭhitā buddhi etesanti suppatiṭṭhitabuddhino, tesaṃ therānanti sambandho.
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhitā buddhi etesanti suppatiṭṭhita buddhino tesam sambandho

original: Therānaṃ vaṃse pakārena dippanti, padīpo viyāti vā theravaṃsappadīpā, tesaṃ. Thiro
analyzed: therānam vaṃse pakārena dippanti padīpaḥ viyāti vā thera vaṃsa padīpā tesam thiraḥ

original: sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhāto guṇo etesamatthīti therā, tesaṃ, vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtenāti sambandho.
analyzed: sīla samādhi paññā saṅkhātaḥ guṇaḥ etesam atthi iti therā tesam vaṃsa alaṅkāra bhūtena ati sambandho

original: Mahāvihāre vasanasīlā vasanadhammā, vasane sādhukārīti vā mahāvihāravāsino, tesaṃ,
analyzed: mahāvihāre vasana sīlāḥ vasana dhammāḥ vasane sādhu kārī iti vā mahāvihāra vāsino tesam

original: therānanti sambandho. Vaṃse alaṅkāro, vaṃsassa vāti vaṃsālaṅkāro, so hutvā bhūto,
analyzed: sambandhaḥ vaṃse alaṅkāraḥ vaṃsassa vāti vaṃsālaṅkāro saḥ hutvā bhūto

original: vaṃsālaṅkārabhāvaṃ vā pattoti vaṃsālaṅkārabhūto, tena therenāti sambandho.
analyzed: vaṃsa alaṅkāra bhāvam vā tena therena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Vipulā ca sā visuddhā ceti vipulavisuddhā, visesanobhayapado, vipulavisuddhā buddhi
analyzed: vipulā ca sā visuddhā ca iti vipula visuddhā visesana ubhaya padaḥ vipula visuddhā

original: etassāti vipulavisuddhabuddhi, tena therenāti sambandho. Nāmameva nāmadheyyaṃ, gahitaṃ
analyzed: etassa ati tena therena ati sambandhaḥ nāmam eva nāmadheyyam gahitam

original: nāmadheyyametassāti gahitanāmadheyyo, tena therena katā samantapāsādikā nāma ayaṃ
analyzed: nāmadheyyam etassa ati tena therena katā samantapāsādikā nāma ayaṃ

original: vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā tiṭṭhatūti sambandho.
analyzed: vinaya saṃvaṇṇanā tiṭṭhatu iti sambandho

original: Suddhacittassa tādino lokajeṭṭhassa mahesino “buddho”ti nāmampi yāva lokamhi pavattati,
analyzed: suddhacittassa tādinaḥ loka jeṭṭhassa mahesinaḥ buddho ti nāmam pi yāva lokamhi pavattati

original: tāva lokanittharaṇesīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sīlavisuddhāya nayaṃ dassentī lokasmiṃ tiṭṭhatūti yojanā.
analyzed: tāva loka nittharaṇa īsīnam kula puttānam sīla visuddhāya nayam dassentī lokasmim tiṭṭhatu iti yojanā

original: Iti nigamanassa atthayojanā samattā.
analyzed: iti nigamanassa attha yojanā samattā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Ratanapuṇṇanāmassa, purassa rājadhāniyā;
analyzed: ratanapuṇṇa nāmassa purassa rājadhāniyā

original: Dakkhiṇe munirūpassa, īsaṃpācīnanissite.
analyzed: dakkhiṇe īsaṃ pācīna nissite

original: Yo vihāro sapāsādo, kārito rājadeviyā;
analyzed: yaḥ vihāro sa pāsādaḥ kāritaḥ rājadeviyā

original: Yā vasatā mayā tatra, katā pācityādiyojanā.
analyzed: yā vasatā mayā tatra katā pācitya ādi yojanā

original: Māpitaratnapuṇṇassa, sattaraseva rājino;
analyzed: māpita ratna puṇṇassa sattarasā iva rājinaḥ

original: Jayavasseṭṭhārasamhi, sampatteyaṃ suniṭṭhitā.
analyzed: jayavasseṭṭhā rasamhi sampattā iyam su niṭṭhitā

original: “Ratanapuṇṇā”tivhayassa rājadhānīnagarassa dakkhiṇasmiṃ disābhāge pañcayojanappamāṇe
analyzed: ratanapuṇṇātivhayassa rājadhānī nagarassa dakkhiṇasmin disā bhāge pañca yojana ppamāṇe

original: ṭhāne dvīhi mahātaḷākehi susobhitassa midhilanāmanagarassa puratthimasmiṃ disābhāge
analyzed: ṭhāne dvīhi mahā taḷākehi susobhitassa midhila nāma nagarassa puratthimasmin disā bhāge

original: diyaḍḍhagāvutappamāṇe ṭhāne anekatālapantīhi susobhito catunnaṃ kulānaṃ ramaṇīyabhūto
analyzed: ṭhāne catunnam kulānam ramaṇīya bhūtaḥ

original: “kaphrū” iti voharito yo so mahāgāmo patiṭṭhito, tattha paṭisandhiyā jātena sīlādiguṇehi
analyzed: iti voharitaḥ yaḥ saḥ mahā gāmo patiṭṭhito tattha paṭisandhiyā jātena sīla ādi guṇehi

original: pasaṃsitena “jāgaro”ti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena tikkhattuṃ rājūhi rājamuddinā lañchitena
analyzed: pasaṃsitena jāgaroti garūhi gahita nāmadheyyena tikkhattum rājūhi rājamuddinā lañchitena

original: me katāyaṃ pācityādivaṇṇanāya yojanā sampatte jinacakke terasādhikacatuvassasatādhikaṃ
analyzed: me katā ayam pācitya ādi vaṇṇanāya yojanā sampatte jina cakke terasa adhika catu vassa sata adhikam

original: dvisahassaṃ, sakkarāje pana ekatiṃsādhikadvivassasatādhikaṃ sahassaṃ gimhāne jeṭṭhamāse
analyzed: dvi sahassam sakka rāje pana ekatiṃsa adhika dvi vassa sata adhikam sahassam gimhāne jeṭṭha māse

original: juṇhapakkhassa pañcame sukkavāre niṭṭhaṃ pattā anāyāsenāti.
analyzed: juṇha pakkhassa pañcame sukkavāre niṭṭham pattā anāyāsena ati

original: Yojanāya imissāhaṃ, racanassānubhāvato;
analyzed: yojanāya imissā aham

original: Bhaveyyānekajātīsu, piṭakattayadhārako.
analyzed: bhaveyya aneka jātīsu

original: Kusalo cubhayatthesu, parisāsu visārado;
analyzed: kusalaḥ parisāsu visāradaḥ

original: Samijjhantu susaṅkappā, mayhañca sabbapāṇinaṃ.
analyzed: samijjhantu su saṅkappāḥ mayham ca sabba pāṇinam

original: Vappādimanatikkamma, sammā devo pavassatu;
analyzed: vappa ādim an atikkamma sammā devaḥ pavassatu

original: Attajamiva rakkhantu, rājāno cāpi medininti.
analyzed: atta jam iva rakkhantu rājānaḥ ca api

original: Iti bhadantajāgarattherena katā
analyzed: iti bhadanta jāgarattherena katā

original: Pācityādivaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā.
analyzed: pācitya ādi vaṇṇanāya yojanā samattā
